Present invention uses a kind of ice shape contour measuring method based on 3-D supersonic imaging technology, can be used in icing wind tunnel, in model aircraft icing experimentation, to 3D ice shape on-line measurement in model icing growth course.The method utilizes ultrasonic probe to launch ultrasonic signal, receives echo-signal simultaneously and processes, it is thus achieved that two-dimensional ultrasonic image.While gathering echo-signal acquisition two-dimensional ultrasonic image information, utilize the spatial positional information of electromagnetic location sensor acquisition ultrasonic probe correspondence icing model, then it is tied to the Coordinate Conversion between world coordinate system through plane of ultrasound coordinate, obtain the three-dimensional coordinate of model to be measured, thus carry out the three-dimensional reconstruction of wind tunnel model icing 3D ice shape.For 3D ice shape in more intuitive observation model icing growth course, the present invention uses 3 Dimension Image Technique, obtains the three-dimensional ultrasound pattern of can ice shape.The present invention proposes the ice shape contour measuring method of a kind of non-contact measurement, compared with currently used several icing wind tunnel measuring methods, can improve conventional efficient and realize on-line measurement.

titles.text: A kind of wind tunnel model 3D ice shape On-line Measuring Method based on 3-D supersonic imaging technology
一种基于三维超声成像技术的风洞模型3D冰形在线测量方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明使用了一种基于三维超声成像技术的冰形轮廓测量方法，可用于结冰风洞中，飞机模型结冰实验过程中，对模型结冰生长过程中3D冰形在线测量。该方法利用超声探头发射超声信号，同时接收回波信号并进行处理，获得二维超声图像。在采集回波信号获得二维超声图像信息的同时，利用电磁定位传感器采集超声探头对应结冰模型的空间位置信息，然后经超声平面坐标系到世界坐标系之间的坐标转换，获得待测模型的三维坐标，从而进行风洞模型结冰3D冰形的三维重建。为了更直观的观测模型结冰生长过程中3D冰形，本发明采用三维成像技术，得到模型冰形的三维超声图像。本发明提出了一种非接触测量方式的冰形轮廓测量方法，与目前使用的几种结冰风洞测量方法相比，可提高实验效率和实现在线测量。

Present invention uses a kind of ice shape contour measuring method based on 3-D supersonic imaging technology, can be used in icing wind tunnel, in model aircraft icing experimentation, to 3D ice shape on-line measurement in model icing growth course.This method emits ultrasonic signal using ultrasonic probe, while receives echo-signal and being handled, and two-dimensional ultrasonic image is obtained.While acquiring echo-signal acquisition two-dimensional ultrasonic image information, the spatial positional information of icing model is corresponded to using electromagnetic location sensor acquisition ultrasonic probe, then it is converted through plane of ultrasound coordinate system to the coordinate between world coordinate system, the three-dimensional coordinate of model to be measured is obtained, to carry out the three-dimensional reconstruction of wind tunnel model icing 3D ice shape.For 3D ice shape in more intuitive observation model icing growth course, the present invention uses 3 dimension imaging technology, obtains the three-dimensional ultrasound pattern of can ice shape.The invention proposes a kind of ice shape contour measuring methods of non-contact measurement, compared with several icing wind tunnel measurement methods used at present, conventional efficient can be improved and realize on-line measurement.

titles.text: A kind of environmental modeling method and device
一种环境建模方法及装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The embodiment of the invention discloses a kind of environmental modeling method and device, described method includes: obtains image, sets up the 3-dimensional image model of current environment, and described 3-dimensional image model is carried out image recognition, obtain the object model in described 3-dimensional image model；The information of acoustic wave obtained according to detector, calculates the target range of described detector and each object model；According to described 3-dimensional image model and described target range, set up first environment coordinate model.Described device includes: object model acquisition module, distance calculation module and the first model building module.The embodiment of the present invention obtains object model by image recognition, and the distance of detector and object model is determined by the information of acoustic wave of detector, and then set up environment coordinate model, can adapt to the environment of different barrier, reduce the amount of calculation of environmental modeling process simultaneously, improve speed and the degree of accuracy of environmental modeling.

本发明实施例公开了一种环境建模方法及装置，所述方法包括：获取图像，建立当前环境的三维图像模型，并对所述三维图像模型进行图像识别，得到所述三维图像模型中的物体模型；根据探测器获取的声波信息，计算所述探测器与各物体模型的目标距离；根据所述三维图像模型和所述目标距离，建立第一环境坐标模型。所述装置包括：物体模型获取模块、距离计算模块和第一模型建立模块。本发明实施例通过图像识别获取物体模型，并通过探测器的声波信息确定探测器与物体模型的距离，进而建立环境坐标模型，能够适应不同障碍物的环境，同时降低环境建模过程的计算量，提高环境建模的速度和精确度。

titles.text: 一种环境建模方法及装置
A kind of environmental modeling method and device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明实施例公开了一种环境建模方法及装置，所述方法包括：获取图像，建立当前环境的三维图像模型，并对所述三维图像模型进行图像识别，得到所述三维图像模型中的物体模型；根据探测器获取的声波信息，计算所述探测器与各物体模型的目标距离；根据所述三维图像模型和所述目标距离，建立第一环境坐标模型。所述装置包括：物体模型获取模块、距离计算模块和第一模型建立模块。本发明实施例通过图像识别获取物体模型，并通过探测器的声波信息确定探测器与物体模型的距离，进而建立环境坐标模型，能够适应不同障碍物的环境，同时降低环境建模过程的计算量，提高环境建模的速度和精确度。

The embodiment of the invention discloses a kind of environmental modeling method and devices, which comprises obtains image, establishes the 3-dimensional image model of current environment, and carry out image recognition to the 3-dimensional image model, obtain the object model in the 3-dimensional image model；According to the information of acoustic wave that detector obtains, the target range of the detector Yu each object model is calculated；According to the 3-dimensional image model and the target range, first environment coordinate model is established.Described device includes: that object model obtains module, distance calculation module and the first model building module.The embodiment of the present invention obtains object model by image recognition, and determine detector at a distance from object model by the information of acoustic wave of detector, and then establish environment coordinate model, it can adapt to the environment of different barriers, the calculation amount for reducing environmental modeling process simultaneously, improves the speed and accuracy of environmental modeling.

titles.text: Transformer mechanical fault diagnosis method based on acoustic imaging technology
一种基于声学成像技术的变压器机械故障诊断方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于声学成像技术的变压器机械故障诊断方法，包括以下步骤：1)绘制变压器各机械状态下的声场分布；2)提取变压器各机械状态下声场分布的所有声像特征；3)得到各声像特征的识别率，然后根据各声像特征的识别率确定最优声像特征，并建立最优声像特征与变压器的机械状态之间的对应关系，然后根据最优特征与变压器的机械状态之间的对应关系构建分类器；4)绘制待测变压器的声场分布，计算待测变压器工作过程中各声像特征的识别率；5)确定待测变压器的最优声像特征，再输入到分类器中，得待测变压器的机械状态，该方法能够采用非接触的方式实现变压器机械故障的诊断，并且不需要对变压器进行停机。

The invention discloses a transformer mechanical fault diagnosis method based on acoustic imaging technology. The method comprises the following steps: 1) drawing sound field distribution of a transformer under each mechanical state; 2) extracting all acoustic image characteristics of the sound field distribution of the transformer under each mechanical state; 3) obtaining recognition rate of each acoustic image characteristic, then, determining the optimum acoustic image characteristic according to the recognition rate of each acoustic image characteristic, establishing a correspondence relation between the optimum acoustic image characteristic and mechanical states of the transformer and constructing a classifier according to the correspondence relation between the optimum acoustic image characteristic and the mechanical states of the transformer; 4) drawing sound field distribution of a transformer to be detected and calculating recognition rate of each acoustic image characteristic of the transformer to be detected in the working process; and 5) determining the optimum acoustic image characteristic of the transformer to be detected, and inputting the optimum acoustic image characteristic to the classifier to obtain the mechanical state of the transformer to be detected. The method can realize transformer mechanical fault diagnosis through a non-contact mode and without stopping the transformer.

titles.text: Acoustic array imaging system and method thereof
一种声学阵列成像系统与方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种声学阵列成像系统及方法。该系统包括：数据采集模块101、第一成像模块102、第二成像模块103和图像复合模块104。该方法包括以下步骤：对声学阵列中的阵元依次发射并采回波信号,得到解析信号；根据发射阵元和阵列中接收阵元之间的声传播关系得到延时值，根据解析信号和延时值计算接收阵元的图像；采用级联式并行复合处理单元对所有接收阵元的图像进行复合；将所有复合图像进行叠加，再进行包络处理，获得全矩阵数据采集成像结果。本发明有益于在采集各个阵元数据时就进行处理，所以占用的存储空间少、采用并行提高运算速度、实际应用中计算耗时小、可实现高帧率成像，适用于实时数据处理和高分辨成像。此外，本发明适用于在不同的频率和应用场景下的声学阵列成像。

The method relates to an acoustic array imaging system and a method thereof. The system comprises a data acquisition module 101, a first imaging module 102, a second imaging module 103 and an image composite module 104. The method comprises the following steps of successively emitting array elements in an acoustic array and collecting echo signals so as to acquire an analysis signal; according to a sound propagation relation between the emitted array elements and receiving array elements in an array, acquiring a time-delay value, and according to the analysis signal and the time-delay value, calculating images of the receiving array elements; using a cascaded parallel composite processing unit to recombine the image of all the receiving array elements; and superposing all the composite images and carrying out envelope processing so as to acquire a full-matrix data acquisition imaging result. The system and the method have advantages that when each array element data is collected, processing is performed so that an occupied storage space is small; a parallel mode is used to increase an operation speed; during an actual application, calculating time consuming is less, and high frame rate imaging can be realized; and the method and the system are suitable for real-time data processing and high resolution imaging. In addition, the system and the method are suitable for acoustic array imaging under different frequency and application scenes.

titles.text: 一种声学阵列成像系统与方法
A kind of acoustic array imaging system and method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present invention relates to a kind of acoustic array imaging system and methods.The system includes: data acquisition module 101, the first image-forming module 102, the second image-forming module 103 and image composite module 104.Method includes the following steps: successively emitting the array element in acoustic array and adopting echo-signal, analytic signal is obtained；Delay value is obtained according to the acoustic propagation relationship between array element is received in transmitting array element and array, the image for receiving array element is calculated according to analytic signal and delay value；All images for receiving array element are carried out using tandem type parallel composition processing unit compound；All combination pictures are overlapped, then carry out envelope processing, obtain complete matrix data acquisition imaging result.The present invention is beneficial to just handle when acquiring each array element data, so the memory space occupied is few, is imaged using calculating time-consuming is small, high frame per second can be achieved in parallel raising arithmetic speed, practical application, is suitable for real time data processing and high-resolution imaging.In addition, the present invention is suitable for the acoustic array imaging under different frequencies and application scenarios.

本发明涉及一种声学阵列成像系统及方法。该系统包括：数据采集模块101、第一成像模块102、第二成像模块103和图像复合模块104。该方法包括以下步骤：对声学阵列中的阵元依次发射并采回波信号,得到解析信号；根据发射阵元和阵列中接收阵元之间的声传播关系得到延时值，根据解析信号和延时值计算接收阵元的图像；采用级联式并行复合处理单元对所有接收阵元的图像进行复合；将所有复合图像进行叠加，再进行包络处理，获得全矩阵数据采集成像结果。本发明有益于在采集各个阵元数据时就进行处理，所以占用的存储空间少、采用并行提高运算速度、实际应用中计算耗时小、可实现高帧率成像，适用于实时数据处理和高分辨成像。此外，本发明适用于在不同的频率和应用场景下的声学阵列成像。

titles.text: The sparse imaging method in Terahertz near field based on MIMO array
基于多发多收阵列的太赫兹近场稀疏成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种基于多发多收阵列的太赫兹近场稀疏成像方法，经过成像场景设置、获取太赫兹回波、回波离散化、通过Akaike信息量准则估计出散射点数目、最后通过稀疏重构算法估计目标点坐标，实现多发多收阵列的太赫兹近场稀疏成像。所提方法保留了目标信息在路径延迟中的非线性，利用观测矩阵列原子序号与目标场景之间的一一映射关系，基于稀疏重构技术的贪婪思想实现目标重构。其中，为了改善经典贪婪算法对目标稀疏度（即散射点个数）的依赖性，所提算法在每次迭代选择原子序列时，利用Akaike信息量准则，基于余量对目标的稀疏度进行自适应估计，从而进一步提高了目标重构算法的普适性和实用性。

The present invention relates to a kind of sparse imaging method in Terahertz near field based on MIMO array, set by image scene, obtain Terahertz echo, echo discretization, scattering is estimated by Akaike information rules counted out, estimate coordinate of ground point finally by sparse restructing algorithm, realizing the sparse imaging in Terahertz near field of MIMO array.Institute's extracting method remains that target information is non-linear in path delay, and using the mapping relations one by one between observing matrix row atom sequence number and target scene, the Greedy idea based on sparse reconfiguration technique realizes object reconstruction.Wherein, in order to improve classical greedy algorithm to target sparse degree（That is scattering point number）Dependence, carry algorithm each iteration select atomic series when, using Akaike information rules, ART network is carried out to the degree of rarefication of target based on surplus, so as to further increase the universality and practicality of object reconstruction algorithm.

titles.text: 基于多发多收阵列的太赫兹近场稀疏成像方法
The sparse imaging method in Terahertz near field based on multiple-input multiple-output array

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present invention relates to a kind of sparse imaging method in Terahertz near field based on multiple-input multiple-output array, scattering point number is estimated by image scene setting, acquisition Terahertz echo, echo discretization, by Akaike information rule, estimates coordinate of ground point finally by sparse restructing algorithm, realizes the sparse imaging in Terahertz near field of multiple-input multiple-output array.Mentioned method remains that target information is non-linear in path delay, and using the mapping relations one by one between observing matrix column atom serial number and target scene, the Greedy idea based on sparse reconfiguration technique realizes object reconstruction.Wherein, in order to improve classical greedy algorithm to the dependence of target sparse degree (i.e. scattering point number), mentioned algorithm is when each iteration selects atomic series, utilize Akaike information rule, ART network is carried out based on degree of rarefication of the surplus to target, to further improve the universality and practicability of object reconstruction algorithm.

本发明涉及一种基于多发多收阵列的太赫兹近场稀疏成像方法，经过成像场景设置、获取太赫兹回波、回波离散化、通过Akaike信息量准则估计出散射点数目、最后通过稀疏重构算法估计目标点坐标，实现多发多收阵列的太赫兹近场稀疏成像。所提方法保留了目标信息在路径延迟中的非线性，利用观测矩阵列原子序号与目标场景之间的一一映射关系，基于稀疏重构技术的贪婪思想实现目标重构。其中，为了改善经典贪婪算法对目标稀疏度（即散射点个数）的依赖性，所提算法在每次迭代选择原子序列时，利用Akaike信息量准则，基于余量对目标的稀疏度进行自适应估计，从而进一步提高了目标重构算法的普适性和实用性。

titles.text: The transducer array of the two-dimensional ultrasonic imaging of the active detection position with non-rectangle
具有非矩形的有源检测部位的二维超声波成像的换能器阵列

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一种超声波成像系统(102)，包括具有多排换能器元件(114)的二维阵列的换能器阵列(108)。各排换能器元件沿着长轴线(116)延伸。该多排相互平行。该换能器阵列包括非矩形组的有源换能器元件。该超声波成像系统进一步包括传输电路(118)，该传输电路启动该换能器元件传输超声波信号。该超声波成像系统进一步包括接收电路(120)，该接收电路接收响应于超声波信号和结构之间的相互作用所产生并由换能器元件接收的回波。该超声波成像系统进一步包括波束形成器，该波束形成器处理该回波并且生成一个或多个指示结构的扫描线。

A kind of ultrasonic imaging system (102), including the two-dimensional array with multiple rows of element of transducer (114) transducer array (108).Each row's element of transducer extends along long axis (116).This is multiple rows of to be parallel to each other.The transducer array includes the active transducer element of non-rectangle group.The ultrasonic imaging system further includes transmission circuit (118), and the transmission circuit starts element of transducer transmission ultrasonic signal.The ultrasonic imaging system further includes receiving circuit (120), and the receiving circuit receives the echo in response to being received produced by the interaction between ultrasonic signal and structure and by element of transducer.The ultrasonic imaging system further includes Beam-former, and the Beam-former processes the echo and generates the scan line of one or more instruction structures.

titles.text: Transducer array for two-dimensional ultrasound imaging with non-rectangular active sensing sites
具有非矩形的有源检测部位的二维超声波成像的换能器阵列

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An ultrasound imaging system (102) includes a transducer array (108) having a two-dimensional array of multiple rows of transducer elements (114). Each row of transducer elements extends along a long axis (116). The rows are parallel to each other. The transducer array includes a non-rectangular set of active transducer elements. The ultrasound imaging system further includes transmit circuitry (118) that activates the transducer elements to transmit ultrasound signals. The ultrasound imaging system further includes receive circuitry (120) that receives echoes generated in response to interaction between the ultrasound signals and the structure and received by the transducer elements. The ultrasound imaging system further includes a beamformer that processes the echoes and generates one or more scanlines indicative of the structure.

一种超声波成像系统(102)，包括具有多排换能器元件(114)的二维阵列的换能器阵列(108)。各排换能器元件沿着长轴线(116)延伸。该多排相互平行。该换能器阵列包括非矩形组的有源换能器元件。该超声波成像系统进一步包括传输电路(118)，该传输电路启动该换能器元件传输超声波信号。该超声波成像系统进一步包括接收电路(120)，该接收电路接收响应于超声波信号和结构之间的相互作用所产生并由换能器元件接收的回波。该超声波成像系统进一步包括波束形成器，该波束形成器处理该回波并且生成一个或多个指示结构的扫描线。

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging method and system
超声成像方法及系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses an ultrasonic imaging method and system, and belongs to the technical field of detection. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring two groups of ultrasonic signals of an object to be detected through an ultrasonic sensor, wherein each group of ultrasonic signals comprises signals of n channels; respectively acquiring a symmetrical synthetic signal and an asymmetrical synthetic signal of each group of ultrasonic signals according to a preset synthetic algorithm; respectively acquiring a positive symmetric signal, a negative symmetric signal, a positive asymmetric signal and a negative asymmetric signal of the object to be detected by a preset superposition algorithm; and respectively carrying out Hilbert transform and low-pass filtering on the four signals to obtain four interface images of the object to be detected. The invention solves the problem of lower data processing perfection in the related technology by performing signal separation and direction separation on the ultrasonic signals, and improves the accuracy of detecting the defects of the object interface. The invention is used for ultrasonic imaging.

本发明公开了一种超声成像方法及系统，属于检测技术领域。所述方法包括：通过超声波传感器采集待测物体的两组超声波信号，每组该超声波信号包括n个通道的信号；根据预设的合成算法，分别获取每组该超声波信号的对称合成信号和非对称合成信号；再通过预设的叠加算法，分别获取该待测物体的正向对称信号、负向对称信号、正向非对称信号和负向非对称信号；分别对该四种信号进行希尔伯特变换和低通滤波，得到四幅该待测物体的分界面图像。本发明通过对超声波信号进行信号分离和方向分离，解决了相关技术中对数据处理完善度较低的问题，提高了对物体分界面进行缺陷检测时的准确性。本发明用于超声成像。

titles.text: A kind of ultrasound detection and imaging method and its system
一种超声检测与成像方法及其系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种超声检测与成像方法及其系统，该方法包括：超声换能器各阵元向待检区域各预设焦点依次发射两个脉冲；控制超声换能器各阵元向预设焦点发射两个脉冲之间的时间差，使第一个脉冲激发的横波和第二个脉冲激发的纵波同时到达预设焦点；以及控制超声换能器各阵元发射的第一个脉冲的时间延迟，使超声换能器各阵元发射的第一个脉冲激发的横波同时到达预设焦点，进而实现纵波和横波在预设焦点处同时聚焦；改变待检区域内预设焦点的位置，当待检区域内所有预设焦点聚焦后，则完成多波聚焦声束对待检区域的扫描过程；根据超声换能器各阵元依次接收到来自缺陷的回波信号得到待检区域的各预设焦点的检测信号，再将检测信号进行成像处理。

The present invention relates to a kind of ultrasound detection and imaging method and its system, this method includes：Each array element of ultrasonic transducer launches two pulses successively to each default focus in region to be checked；Control each array element of ultrasonic transducer to launch the time difference between two pulses to default focus, make first pulsed shear wave and second pulsed compressional wave while reaching default focus；And the time delay of first pulse of each array element transmitting of control ultrasonic transducer, make first pulsed shear wave of each array element transmitting of ultrasonic transducer while reach default focus, and then realize that compressional wave and shear wave are focused in default focal point simultaneously；Change the position that focus is preset in region to be checked, after all default focal points in region to be checked, then complete scanning process of many ripple focused beams to region to be checked；The detection signal for each default focus that region to be checked is obtained from flaw echo is sequentially received according to each array element of ultrasonic transducer, then detection signal is subjected to imaging.

titles.text: 一种超声检测与成像方法及其系统
A kind of ultrasound detection and imaging method and its system

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present invention relates to a kind of ultrasound detections and imaging method and its system, this method comprises: each array element of ultrasonic transducer successively emits two pulses to each default focus in region to be checked；Each array element of ultrasonic transducer is controlled to the time difference between two pulses of transmitting of default focus, makes first pulsed shear wave and second pulsed longitudinal wave while reaching default focus；And the time delay of first pulse of each array element transmitting of control ultrasonic transducer, make first pulsed shear wave of each array element transmitting of ultrasonic transducer while reaching default focus, and then realizes that longitudinal wave and shear wave focus simultaneously in default focal point；More wave focused beams are then completed to the scanning process in region to be checked after all default focal points in region to be checked in the position for changing default focus in region to be checked；It is sequentially received the detection signal for obtaining each default focus in region to be checked from flaw echo according to each array element of ultrasonic transducer, then will test signal and carry out imaging.

本发明涉及一种超声检测与成像方法及其系统，该方法包括：超声换能器各阵元向待检区域各预设焦点依次发射两个脉冲；控制超声换能器各阵元向预设焦点发射两个脉冲之间的时间差，使第一个脉冲激发的横波和第二个脉冲激发的纵波同时到达预设焦点；以及控制超声换能器各阵元发射的第一个脉冲的时间延迟，使超声换能器各阵元发射的第一个脉冲激发的横波同时到达预设焦点，进而实现纵波和横波在预设焦点处同时聚焦；改变待检区域内预设焦点的位置，当待检区域内所有预设焦点聚焦后，则完成多波聚焦声束对待检区域的扫描过程；根据超声换能器各阵元依次接收到来自缺陷的回波信号得到待检区域的各预设焦点的检测信号，再将检测信号进行成像处理。

titles.text: A kind of large-scale component damage probability based on sound ultrasound is imaged localization method
一种基于声‑超声的大型构件损伤概率成像定位方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于声‑超声的大型构件损伤概率成像定位方法。通过若干个压电换能器组成的声‑超声检测网络，采集直接接收和经损伤边界反射的声‑超声信号，综合使用基于信号能量的相异系数损伤概率成像法，和基于渡越时间的椭圆环相交损伤概率成像法，实现大型构件损伤的高效检测和快速定位。本发明的技术效果在于，通过声‑超声检测网络，使用相异系数和渡越时间的组合损伤概率成像算法，实现了大型构件损伤的无基准检测及快速定位。

Localization method is imaged the invention discloses a kind of large-scale component damage probability based on sound ultrasound.The sound ultrasound detection network being made up of several PZT (piezoelectric transducer)s, collection is directly received and through damaging the sound ultrasonic signal that border is reflected, it is comprehensive to use the different coefficient damage probability imaging method based on signal energy, intersect damage probability imaging method with the elliptical ring based on the transition time, realize the efficient detection of large-scale component damage and quick positioning.The technical effects of the invention are that, by sound ultrasound detection network, using different coefficient and the combination damage probability imaging algorithm of transition time, realize large-scale component damage without benchmaring and quick positioning.

titles.text: It is a kind of that localization method is imaged based on sound-ultrasound large-scale component damage probability
一种基于声-超声的大型构件损伤概率成像定位方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于声‑超声的大型构件损伤概率成像定位方法。通过若干个压电换能器组成的声‑超声检测网络，采集直接接收和经损伤边界反射的声‑超声信号，综合使用基于信号能量的相异系数损伤概率成像法，和基于渡越时间的椭圆环相交损伤概率成像法，实现大型构件损伤的高效检测和快速定位。本发明的技术效果在于，通过声‑超声检测网络，使用相异系数和渡越时间的组合损伤概率成像算法，实现了大型构件损伤的无基准检测及快速定位。

Localization method is imaged based on sound-ultrasound large-scale component damage probability the invention discloses a kind of.The acousto-ultrasonic testing network being made up of several PZT (piezoelectric transducer)s, acquisition directly receives and sound-ultrasonic signal through the reflection of damage boundary, it is comprehensive to use the different coefficient damage probability imaging method based on signal energy, intersect damage probability imaging method with the elliptical ring based on the transition time, realizes the efficient detection and quickly positioning of large-scale component damage.The technical effects of the invention are that by acousto-ultrasonic testing network, using the combination damage probability imaging algorithm of different coefficient and transition time, realize large-scale component damage without benchmaring and quickly positioning.

titles.text: A kind of CFRP porosity ultrasonic characterization methods based on ultrasonic backscattered signal recurrence quantification analysis
一种基于超声背散射信号递归定量分析的CFRP孔隙率超声表征方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一种基于超声背散射信号递归定量分析的CFRP孔隙率超声表征方法，其属于无损检测技术领域。该方法采用一套包括超声波探伤仪、延迟块探头及数字示波器构成的超声信号采集系统，采集超声背散射信号并对其进行相空间重构。计算相空间中任意两个时间向量之间的距离，设定参考阈值，获得二维递归矩阵，将其图像化得到递归图(Recurrence Plot，RP)。使用RQA量化指标递归度(Recurrence Rate，RR)对RP图进行定量计算，最终建立CFRP孔隙率P与RR二者之间的相关关系，即RR＝aP‑1，实现孔隙率的表征。与超声衰减法相比，该方法克服底面回波不存在或较弱时无法表征孔隙率的限制，具有良好的推广前景。

A kind of CFRP porosity ultrasonic characterization methods based on ultrasonic backscattered signal recurrence quantification analysis, it belongs to technical field of nondestructive testing.This method is gathered ultrasonic backscattered signal and is carried out phase space reconfiguration to it using a set of ultrasonic signal acquisition system formed including supersonic detector, delay block probe and digital oscilloscope.The distance between any two time arrow in phase space is calculated, reference threshold is set, obtains two-dimentional recursion matrix, its image conversion is obtained into recurrence plot (Recurrence Plot, RP).Quantitative calculating is carried out to RP figures using RQA quantizating index recurrence degree (Recurrence Rate, RR), finally establishes CFRP porositys P and the dependency relations of RR therebetween, i.e. RR=aP‑1, realize the sign of porosity.Compared with ultrasonic attenuation method, this method overcomes Bottom echo can not characterize the limitation of porosity when being not present or be weaker, has good promotion prospect.

titles.text: 基于超声背散射信号递归定量分析的CFRP孔隙率表征方法
CFRP porosity characterizing method based on ultrasonic backscattered signal recurrence quantification analysis

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一种基于超声背散射信号递归定量分析的CFRP孔隙率表征方法，其属于无损检测技术领域。该方法采用一套包括超声波探伤仪、延迟块探头及数字示波器构成的超声信号采集系统，采集超声背散射信号并对其进行相空间重构。计算相空间中任意两个时间向量之间的距离，设定参考阈值，获得二维递归矩阵，将其图像化得到递归图(Recurrence Plot，RP)。使用RQA量化指标递归度(Recurrence Rate，RR)对RP图进行定量计算，最终建立CFRP孔隙率P与RR二者之间的相关关系，即RR＝aP‑1，实现孔隙率的表征。与超声衰减法相比，该方法克服底面回波不存在或较弱时无法表征孔隙率的限制，具有良好的推广前景。

A kind of CFRP porosity characterizing method based on ultrasonic backscattered signal recurrence quantification analysis, belongs to technical field of nondestructive testing.This method is acquired ultrasonic backscattered signal and is carried out phase space reconfiguration to it using a set of ultrasonic signal acquisition system constituted including supersonic detector, delay block probe and digital oscilloscope.The distance between any two time arrow in phase space is calculated, reference threshold is set, two-dimentional recursion matrix is obtained, its image conversion is obtained into recurrence plot (Recurrence Plot, RP).Quantitative calculating is carried out to RP figure using RQA quantizating index recurrence degree (Recurrence Rate, RR), finally establishes CFRP porosity P and correlativity RR between the two, i.e. RR=aP‑1, realize the characterization of porosity.Compared with ultrasonic attenuation method, this method overcomes Bottom echo to be not present or be unable to characterize when weaker the limitation of porosity, has good promotion prospect.

titles.text: A kind of ultrasonic imaging processing method and processing system based on ultrasonic echo RF data
一种基于超声回波RF数据的超声成像处理方法及处理系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种基于超声回波RF数据的超声成像处理方法及处理系统，所示方法包括：S1、通过超声探头向目标测试物发射超声检测信号，并接收超声回波信号；S2、计算所述超声回波信号的最优加权矢量；S3、利用所述的最优加权矢量计算所述回波信号中的RF数据；S4、采用经验模态分解算法将回波信号分解为若干个固有模态函数；S5、求取所述各个固有模态函数的瞬时频率，对含有非目标频率的固有模态函数进行修正；S6、将调整后的固有模态函数进行加权合成为修正后的RF信号；S7、基于所述的RF数据，进行超声成像处理获取测试目标图像。该方法及系统能够解决常规超声成像方法中分辨率及对比度上局限，提高超声图像的对比度和分辨率。

The present invention provides a kind of ultrasonic imaging processing method and processing system based on ultrasonic echo RF data, and shown method includes：S1, ultrasound detection signal launched to target detection thing by ultrasonic probe, and receive ultrasound echo signal；S2, the optimal weighting vector for calculating the ultrasound echo signal；S3, utilize the RF data in echo-signal described in described optimal weighting Vector operation；S4, echo-signal is decomposed into by several intrinsic mode functions using empirical mode decomposition algorithm；S5, the instantaneous frequency for asking for each intrinsic mode function, are modified to the intrinsic mode function containing non-targeted frequency；S6, the intrinsic mode function after adjustment is weighted synthesizes revised RF signals；S7, based on described RF data, carry out ultrasonic imaging processing and obtain test target images.This method and system can solve the problem that limits in conventional Ultrasound imaging method intermediate-resolution and contrast, improves the contrast and resolution ratio of ultrasonoscopy.

titles.text: A kind of workpiece nondestructive detection system based on ultrasonic imaging
一种基于超声波成像的工件无损检测系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于超声波成像的工件无损检测系统，其特征在于，至少包括：发射超声波的超声波发射单元、接收所述超声波发射单元发射后的超声波的超声波接收单元、将接收到的超声波信号进行分析处理的信号处理单元、对工件进行扫描的扫描单元、显示所述扫描单元扫描后的图像的显示单元以及控制上述单元的控制单元。本发明能够准确的判断工件是否有损伤，并且能准确的掌握有损工件的具体损伤位置，减少了大量的人力物力，同时增加了检测的准确性。

The invention discloses a kind of workpiece nondestructive detection system based on ultrasonic imaging, it is characterised in that includes at least：Launch the display unit of the image after the ultrasonic transmitting element of ultrasonic wave, the ultrasonic wave receiving unit for receiving the ultrasonic wave after the ultrasonic transmitting element is launched, the signal processing unit that the ultrasonic signal received is analyzed and processed, the scanning element being scanned to workpiece, the display scanning element scanning and control the control unit of said units.The present invention can accurately judge whether workpiece has damage, and can accurately grasp the specific damage position for damaging workpiece, reduce substantial amounts of manpower and materials, while add the accuracy of detection.

titles.text: The pixel receiver that low-frequency noise for supersonic imaging device reduces
用于超声成像装置的低频噪声降低的像素接收机

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 公开了用于生成DC像素电压的装置和方法。该装置包括：放大器，其被配置为放大输入信号以生成电压信号，其中输入信号响应于从待成像物体反射并经由压电层传播的超声波而生成；降噪电路，其被配置为将电压信号从放大器的输出传递到节点，同时减少从放大器的输出到节点的噪声的传播；以及电路，其被配置为基于噪声降低的电压信号来生成DC像素电压。

Disclose the apparatus and method for generating DC pixel voltages.The device includes：Amplifier, it is configured as amplification input signal to generate voltage signal, and wherein input signal from object to be imaged in response to reflecting and being generated via the ultrasonic wave of piezoelectricity Es-region propagations；Dolby circuit, it is configured as voltage signal being delivered to node from the output of amplifier, while reduces the sonic propagation of making an uproar for being output to node from amplifier；And circuit, it is configured as generating DC pixel voltages based on voltage signal of noise reduction.

titles.text: A kind of workpiece lossless detection method based on ultrasonic imaging
一种基于超声波成像的工件无损检测方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于超声波成像的工件无损检测方法，包括以下步骤：S1：控制单元控制超声波发射单元发射超声波；S2：超声波接收单元接收所述超声波发射单元发出的超声波；S3：通过扫描单元对工件进行扫描，并将扫描后的图像传递至信号处理单元，显示在显示单元；S4：通过信号处理单元将接收到的超声波信号进行分析处理；S5：通过显示单元显示处理后的图像。本发明能够准确的判断工件是否有损伤，并且能准确的掌握有损工件的具体损伤位置，减少了大量的人力物力，同时增加了检测的准确性。

The invention discloses a kind of workpiece lossless detection methods based on ultrasonic imaging, include the following steps：S1：Control unit control ultrasonic transmitting element transmitting ultrasonic wave；S2：Ultrasonic wave receiving unit receives the ultrasonic wave that the ultrasonic transmitting element is sent out；S3：Workpiece is scanned by scanning element, and the image after scanning is transferred to signal processing unit, is shown in display unit；S4：The ultrasonic signal received is analyzed and processed by signal processing unit；S5：Pass through the image after display unit display processing.The present invention can accurately judge whether workpiece has damage, and can accurately grasp the specific damage position for damaging workpiece, reduce a large amount of manpower and materials, while increase the accuracy of detection.

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging system and method
超声波成像系统及方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: A kind of ultrasonic imaging system includes multiple supersonic sensing units, setup module, image analysis module and frequency setting module.Each supersonic sensing unit transmitting ultrasonic wave simultaneously receives the ultrasonic wave converted electrical number of reflection as image evidence.Setup module selects a supersonic sensing unit successively, and the supersonic sensing unit currently selected is arranged and emits ultrasonic wave under the driving of multiple detection frequencies successively, so that the supersonic sensing unit currently selected forms multiple corresponding detection images.It is stored with standard picture in image analysis module, the corresponding all detection images of the supersonic sensing unit currently selected are compared with standard picture respectively to select a detection image as with reference to image.Reference picture is the detection image that picture quality is better than standard picture.The corresponding detection frequency of reference picture is set as the corresponding driving frequency of supersonic sensing unit currently selected and stored by frequency setting module.The present invention also provides a kind of method for ultrasonic imaging.

一种超声波成像系统包括多个超声波传感单元、设置模块、图像分析模块及频率设定模块。每个超声波传感单元发射超声波并接收反射的超声波转换电信号作为图像据。设置模块依次选择一个超声波传感单元，设置当前选择的超声波传感单元依次在多个检测频率的驱动下发射超声波，以使得当前选择的超声波传感单元形成多个对应的检测图像。图像分析模块内存储有标准图像，将当前选择的超声波传感单元对应的所有检测图像分别与标准图像进行比较以选择一个检测图像作为参考图像。参考图像为图像质量好于标准图像的检测图像。频率设定模块将参考图像对应的检测频率设定为当前选择的超声波传感单元对应的驱动频率并存储。本发明还提供了一种超声波成像方法。

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging method and device
超声成像方法和装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种超声成像方法和装置，装置包括存储模块，用于存储超声体数据并生成超声体数据的副本；第一处理器，用于获取超声体数据的副本；将超声体数据的副本转化为视觉三维图像；第一图像输出模块，用于输出视觉三维图像；第二处理器，用于获取超声体数据；将超声体数据转化为视觉二维图像；第二图像输出模块，用于输出视觉二维图像。上述超声成像方法和装置，对获取的超声体数据进行处理以获取供专业人员查看的视觉二维图像，且可以对获取的超声体数据的副本进行处理以获取供普通用户查看的视觉三维图像，增强了超声成像所形成图像的直观性。视觉三维图像是对超声体数据的副本进行处理得到，避免生成视觉二维图像和视觉三维图像时彼此影响。

The present invention relates to a kind of ultrasonic imaging method and device, device includes memory module, for storing ultrasonic volume data and generating the copy of ultrasonic volume data；First processor, the copy for obtaining ultrasonic volume data；Convert the copy of ultrasonic volume data to 3 D visual image；First image output module, for exporting 3 D visual image；Second processor, for obtaining ultrasonic volume data；Convert ultrasonic volume data to vision two dimensional image；Second image output module, for exporting vision two dimensional image.Above-mentioned ultrasonic imaging method and device, the ultrasonic volume data of acquisition is handled to obtain the vision two dimensional image checked for professional, and the copy of the ultrasonic volume data of acquisition can be handled to obtain the 3 D visual image checked for ordinary user, enhance the intuitive of the formed image of ultrasonic imaging.3 D visual image is to be handled to obtain to the copy of ultrasonic volume data, avoids affecting one another when generating vision two dimensional image and 3 D visual image.

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging method and device
超声成像方法和装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to an ultrasonic imaging method and device, the device comprises a storage module, a storage module and a processing module, wherein the storage module is used for storing ultrasonic volume data and generating copies of the ultrasonic volume data; a first processor for obtaining a copy of the ultrasound volume data; converting a copy of the ultrasound volume data into a visual three-dimensional image; the first image output module is used for outputting a visual three-dimensional image; a second processor for acquiring ultrasound volume data; converting the ultrasonic volume data into a visual two-dimensional image; and the second image output module is used for outputting the visual two-dimensional image. According to the ultrasonic imaging method and device, the acquired ultrasonic volume data are processed to acquire the visual two-dimensional image for viewing by a professional, and the copy of the acquired ultrasonic volume data can be processed to acquire the visual three-dimensional image for viewing by a common user, so that the intuitiveness of the image formed by ultrasonic imaging is enhanced. The visual three-dimensional image is obtained by processing the copy of the ultrasonic volume data, so that the visual two-dimensional image and the visual three-dimensional image are prevented from being influenced by each other when being generated.

本发明涉及一种超声成像方法和装置，装置包括存储模块，用于存储超声体数据并生成超声体数据的副本；第一处理器，用于获取超声体数据的副本；将超声体数据的副本转化为视觉三维图像；第一图像输出模块，用于输出视觉三维图像；第二处理器，用于获取超声体数据；将超声体数据转化为视觉二维图像；第二图像输出模块，用于输出视觉二维图像。上述超声成像方法和装置，对获取的超声体数据进行处理以获取供专业人员查看的视觉二维图像，且可以对获取的超声体数据的副本进行处理以获取供普通用户查看的视觉三维图像，增强了超声成像所形成图像的直观性。视觉三维图像是对超声体数据的副本进行处理得到，避免生成视觉二维图像和视觉三维图像时彼此影响。

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging system and Supersonic wave imaging method
超音波成像系统及超音波成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开一种超音波成像系统及超音波成像方法，该超音波成像系统包含超音波探头、滤波器、第一神经网络以及处理器。超音波探头以多个第一扫描参数产生目标超音波影像以及多个第一参考超音波影像，滤波器对该目标超音波影像进行滤波，以产生第一滤波超音波影像，该第一神经网络根据该多个第一参考超音波影像对该目标超音波影像进行滤波，以产生第二滤波超音波影像，处理器将该第一滤波超音波影像与该第二滤波超音波影像结合为复合超音波影像，藉此，本发明可有效降低复合超音波影像中的噪声，进而增进复合超音波影像的准确度。

The present invention discloses a kind of ultrasonic imaging system and Supersonic wave imaging method, which includes ultrasound scanner head, filter, first nerves network and processor.Ultrasound scanner head generates target ultrasound video and multiple first with reference to ultrasound video with multiple first sweep parameters, filter is filtered the target ultrasound video, to generate the first filtering ultrasound video, the first nerves network is filtered the target ultrasound video with reference to ultrasound video according to multiple first, to generate the second filtering ultrasound video, the first filtering ultrasound video and the second filtering ultrasound video are combined into compound ultrasound video by processor, thereby, the present invention can effectively reduce the noise in compound ultrasound video, and then promote the accuracy of compound ultrasound video.

titles.text: 超音波成像系统及超音波成像方法
Ultrasonic imaging system and ultrasonic imaging method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开一种超音波成像系统及超音波成像方法，该超音波成像系统包含超音波探头、滤波器、第一神经网络以及处理器。超音波探头以多个第一扫描参数产生目标超音波影像以及多个第一参考超音波影像，滤波器对该目标超音波影像进行滤波，以产生第一滤波超音波影像，该第一神经网络根据该多个第一参考超音波影像对该目标超音波影像进行滤波，以产生第二滤波超音波影像，处理器将该第一滤波超音波影像与该第二滤波超音波影像结合为复合超音波影像，藉此，本发明可有效降低复合超音波影像中的噪声，进而增进复合超音波影像的准确度。

The invention discloses an ultrasonic imaging system and an ultrasonic imaging method. The ultrasonic probe generates a target ultrasonic image and a plurality of first reference ultrasonic images according to a plurality of first scanning parameters, the filter filters the target ultrasonic image to generate a first filtered ultrasonic image, the first neural network filters the target ultrasonic image according to the plurality of first reference ultrasonic images to generate a second filtered ultrasonic image, and the processor combines the first filtered ultrasonic image and the second filtered ultrasonic image into a composite ultrasonic image.

titles.text: A kind of real-time 3D total focus phased array supersonic imaging method, device and storage medium
一种实时3D全聚焦相控阵超声成像方法、装置及存储介质

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明实施例公开了一种实时3D全聚焦相控阵超声成像方法，包括步骤：以所述待测工件以顶面建立三维空间直角坐标系;计算所述二维面阵换能器每一阵元依次发射的超声波经耦合区传递到所述待测工件内的目标缺陷点的发射时间，以及经所述标缺陷点反射的超声波经所述待测工件至所述耦合区被所述二维面阵换能器接收的反射时间；以所述发射时间、反射时间建立全矩阵数据将目标缺陷点进行3D全聚焦重构。本发明实施例还公开了一种用于实时3D全聚焦相控阵超声成像的装置及可读存储介质。采用本发明，实时采集待测工件内部三维空间的全矩阵波形信号进行实时3D全聚焦成像检测，检测成像结果非常直观，检测速度快，检测结果可靠、伤损容易观察。

The embodiment of the invention discloses a kind of real-time 3D total focus phased array supersonic imaging methods, including step：Three dimensions rectangular coordinate system is established with top surface with the workpiece for measurement;The coupled block transitive of ultrasonic wave that each array element of two-dimensional array energy converter emits successively is calculated to the launch time of the target defect point in the workpiece for measurement, and reflection interval that the ultrasonic wave through the mark defect point reflection is received through the workpiece for measurement to the coupled zone by the two-dimensional array energy converter；Complete matrix data are established with the launch time, reflection interval, and target defect point is subjected to 3D total focus reconstruct.The embodiment of the invention also discloses a kind of devices and readable storage medium storing program for executing for the imaging of real-time 3D total focus phased array supersonic.Using the present invention, the complete matrix waveform signal for acquiring workpiece for measurement interior three-dimensional space in real time carries out real-time 3D total focus image checking, and detection imaging results are very intuitive, and detection speed is fast, and testing result is reliable, hurt is easy observation.

titles.text: A kind of coal gas extraction borehole unstability differentiates experimental rig and method
一种煤体瓦斯抽采钻孔失稳判别试验装置及方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开一种煤体瓦斯抽采钻孔失稳判别试验装置，包括承载支架、钻孔装置和数据测试与采集系统；所述承载支架上设置有试验箱，所述试验箱包括底板，所述底板两端对称安装有固定挡板，两个所述固定挡板之间设置有钢化玻璃板，所述固定挡板顶端连接有上盖，所述上盖等间距的设置有多个液压加载油缸；所述钻孔装置包括钻机，所述钻机侧壁上活动连接有升降油缸，所述钻机端部安装有钻杆；所述数据测试与采集系统包括推进杆和依次串联的应力传感器，所述应力传感器通过集中器连接有计算机。本发明还公开一种煤体瓦斯抽采钻孔失稳判别试验方法，该方法利用上述装置进一步研究采动应力对瓦斯抽采钻孔的变形破坏规律，更好地提高钻孔的瓦斯抽采率。

The present invention discloses a kind of coal gas extraction borehole unstability differentiation experimental rig, including bearing support, drilling equipment and data test and acquisition system；Chamber is provided on the bearing support, the chamber includes bottom plate, and the bottom plate both ends are symmetrically installed with fixed baffle, is provided with armorplate glass between two fixed baffles, the fixed baffle top is connected with upper cover, and the upper cover is provided with multiple hydraulic strokers at equal intervals；The drilling equipment includes drilling machine, and lifting cylinder is connected on the drilling machine side wall, and the drilling machine end is equipped with drilling rod；The data test and acquisition system include pushing ram and the strain gauge being sequentially connected in series, and the strain gauge is connected with computer by concentrator.Invention additionally discloses a kind of coal gas extraction borehole unstabilitys to differentiate that test method, this method further study mining induced stress to the Distortion Disciplinarian of mash gas pumping drilling using above-mentioned apparatus, preferably improve the gas drainage rate of drilling.

titles.text: 一种煤体瓦斯抽采钻孔失稳判别试验装置及方法
Coal gas extraction borehole instability discrimination test device and method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a coal gas extraction drilling instability discrimination test device which comprises a bearing bracket, a drilling device and a data testing and collecting system, wherein the bearing bracket is provided with a drilling device; the test box comprises a bottom plate, two ends of the bottom plate are symmetrically provided with fixed baffles, a toughened glass plate is arranged between the two fixed baffles, the top end of each fixed baffle is connected with an upper cover, and a plurality of hydraulic loading cylinders are arranged on the upper cover at equal intervals; the drilling device comprises a drilling machine, a lifting oil cylinder is movably connected to the side wall of the drilling machine, and a drill rod is arranged at the end part of the drilling machine; the data testing and collecting system comprises a pushing rod and stress sensors which are sequentially connected in series, and the stress sensors are connected with a computer through a concentrator. The invention also discloses a coal gas extraction borehole instability discrimination test method, which utilizes the device to further research the deformation damage rule of mining stress on the gas extraction borehole, and better improves the gas extraction rate of the borehole.

本发明公开一种煤体瓦斯抽采钻孔失稳判别试验装置，包括承载支架、钻孔装置和数据测试与采集系统；所述承载支架上设置有试验箱，所述试验箱包括底板，所述底板两端对称安装有固定挡板，两个所述固定挡板之间设置有钢化玻璃板，所述固定挡板顶端连接有上盖，所述上盖等间距的设置有多个液压加载油缸；所述钻孔装置包括钻机，所述钻机侧壁上活动连接有升降油缸，所述钻机端部安装有钻杆；所述数据测试与采集系统包括推进杆和依次串联的应力传感器，所述应力传感器通过集中器连接有计算机。本发明还公开一种煤体瓦斯抽采钻孔失稳判别试验方法，该方法利用上述装置进一步研究采动应力对瓦斯抽采钻孔的变形破坏规律，更好地提高钻孔的瓦斯抽采率。

titles.text: The image generating method of ultrasonograph device and ultrasonograph device
超声波影像装置以及超声波影像装置的图像生成方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种超声波影像装置以及超声波影像装置的图像生成方法，目的在于使工件的多个接合面同时影像化。作为解决手段的超声波影像装置(4)具备：信号处理部(46)，其使用探头(2)对工件照射预定频率的超声波(1)，并对由探头(2)检测出的超声波的反射波进行闸门处理来输出工件(1)的两个接合面上的反射波的位移；图像生成部(47)，其根据两个接合面上的各反射波的位移，分别生成两个接合面的图像；以及高度调整部(41)，其调整探头(2)的高度。高度调整部(41)通过探头(2)的高度调整，将探头(2)的焦点设定在两个接合面之间。

The present invention provides the image generating method of a kind of ultrasonograph device and ultrasonograph device, it is therefore intended that makes multiple joint surfaces of workpiece Image Creation simultaneously.Ultrasonograph device (4) as solution has: signal processing part (46), its using probe (2) to ultrasonic wave (1) of workpiece irradiation preset frequency, and the displacement to the back wave that gate is handled on two joint surfaces to export workpiece (1) is carried out by the back wave for the ultrasonic wave that (2) detect of popping one's head in；Image production part (47) generates the image on two joint surfaces according to the displacement of each back wave on two joint surfaces respectively；And height adjusting part (41), the height of adjustment probe (2).The focus of probe (2) is set between two joint surfaces by height adjusting part (41) by the height adjustment of probe (2).

titles.text: 超声波影像装置以及超声波影像装置的图像生成方法
Ultrasonic imaging apparatus and image generation method for ultrasonic imaging apparatus

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种超声波影像装置以及超声波影像装置的图像生成方法，目的在于使工件的多个接合面同时影像化。作为解决手段的超声波影像装置(4)具备：信号处理部(46)，其使用探头(2)对工件照射预定频率的超声波(1)，并对由探头(2)检测出的超声波的反射波进行闸门处理来输出工件(1)的两个接合面上的反射波的位移；图像生成部(47)，其根据两个接合面上的各反射波的位移，分别生成两个接合面的图像；以及高度调整部(41)，其调整探头(2)的高度。高度调整部(41)通过探头(2)的高度调整，将探头(2)的焦点设定在两个接合面之间。

The invention provides an ultrasonic imaging apparatus and an image generating method of the ultrasonic imaging apparatus, aiming to image a plurality of bonding surfaces of a workpiece simultaneously. An ultrasonic imaging device (4) as a solution is provided with: a signal processing unit (46) that irradiates the workpiece with ultrasonic waves (1) of a predetermined frequency using the probe (2), and performs a gating process on reflected waves of the ultrasonic waves detected by the probe (2) to output displacements of the reflected waves on both joining surfaces of the workpiece (1); an image generation unit (47) that generates images of the two joint surfaces, respectively, based on the displacement of each reflected wave on the two joint surfaces; and a height adjustment unit (41) for adjusting the height of the probe (2). The height adjustment unit (41) sets the focal point of the probe (2) between the two bonding surfaces by adjusting the height of the probe (2).

titles.text: A kind of minimum variance ultrasonic imaging method merging highly coherent filter
一种融合高度相干滤波器的最小方差超声成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present invention relates to a kind of minimum variance ultrasonic imaging methods for merging highly coherent filter, belong to ultrasonic imaging technique field.This method comprises: carrying out compensation of delay processing to the received echo-signal of ultrasound element, ultrasound echo signal is obtained；In conjunction with space smoothing and diagonal loading technique, sample covariance matrix is obtained；According to minimum variance criteria, minimum variance weight vectors are obtained；Covariance matrix is decomposed, signal subspace and noise subspace are obtained；Minimum variance weight vectors are projected into signal subspace, obtain feature space minimum variance weight vectors；The relevant summation of subarray echo and incoherent summation are obtained according to coherence factor, and then obtains coherent filtering coefficient；Feature space minimum variance weight vectors are merged to obtain highly coherent weight vectors with coherent filtering coefficient, form adaptive beam signal.The present invention improves the resolution ratio, contrast and the robustness to noise of ultrasound image, to improve the quality of ultrasonic imaging on the whole.

本发明涉及一种融合高度相干滤波器的最小方差超声成像方法，属于超声成像技术领域。该方法包括：对超声阵元接收的回波信号进行延时补偿处理，得到超声回波信号；结合空间平滑和对角加载技术，获得样本协方差矩阵；根据最小方差原理，得到最小方差加权矢量；对协方差矩阵分解，得到信号子空间和噪声子空间；将最小方差加权矢量投影到信号子空间，得到特征空间最小方差加权矢量；根据相干因子得到子阵列回波相干总和与非相干总和，进而得到相干滤波系数；将特征空间最小方差加权矢量与相干滤波系数融合得到高度相干加权矢量，形成自适应波束信号。本发明提高了超声图像的分辨率、对比度以及对噪声的鲁棒性，从而在整体上提高超声成像的质量。

titles.text: A kind of online supersonic damage-free detection method based on 3D printing
一种基于3D打印的在线超声无损检测方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于3D打印的在线超声无损检测方法，属于超声无损检测领域，该方法通过建立3D打印模型并转化成STL文件，采用切分软件处理获取打印层的制造信息；针对不同3D打印机喷头的形状和待打印件的物理信息(材料属性、厚度等)，选取合适的空气超声探头与打印喷头配合，进行打印参数和扫描参数的设置；进而对超声探头获取的超声信息进行信号处理和图像处理，设置阈值区分不可保留缺陷和无关缺陷，对检测层的总缺陷率统计；通过将超声处理后的图像与切分处理后的图像进行在线对比来及时调整打印参数甚至停止不良成型的打印；最后将超声成像进行三维重建，对所有打印产品的成型质量进行建档。

The invention discloses a kind of online supersonic damage-free detection method based on 3D printing, belongs to field of ultrasonic nondestructive detection, and this method handles the manufacture information for obtaining printable layer using cutting software by establishing 3D printing model and being converted to stl file；The physical message (material properties, thickness etc.) of shape and part to be printed for different 3D printer spray heads, chooses suitable air ultrasound probe and printing head cooperates, and carries out the setting of print parameters and sweep parameter；And then signal processing and image procossing are carried out to the ultrasound information that ultrasonic probe obtains, setting threshold value, which is distinguished, can not retain defect and nuisance defects, count to the overall defect rate of detection layers；By by after ultrasonic treatment image and cutting treated image carry out online comparison and to adjust print parameters in time even to stop bad molding printing；Ultrasonic imaging is finally subjected to three-dimensional reconstruction, is filed to the Forming Quality of all printed products.

titles.text: Online ultrasonic nondestructive testing method based on 3D printing
一种基于3D打印的在线超声无损检测方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于3D打印的在线超声无损检测方法，属于超声无损检测领域，该方法通过建立3D打印模型并转化成STL文件，采用切分软件处理获取打印层的制造信息；针对不同3D打印机喷头的形状和待打印件的物理信息(材料属性、厚度等)，选取合适的空气超声探头与打印喷头配合，进行打印参数和扫描参数的设置；进而对超声探头获取的超声信息进行信号处理和图像处理，设置阈值区分不可保留缺陷和无关缺陷，对检测层的总缺陷率统计；通过将超声处理后的图像与切分处理后的图像进行在线对比来及时调整打印参数甚至停止不良成型的打印；最后将超声成像进行三维重建，对所有打印产品的成型质量进行建档。

The invention discloses an online ultrasonic nondestructive testing method based on 3D printing, which belongs to the field of ultrasonic nondestructive testing, and is characterized in that a 3D printing model is established and converted into an STL file, and segmentation software is adopted to process and obtain manufacturing information of a printing layer; selecting a proper air ultrasonic probe to be matched with the printing nozzle according to the shapes of different 3D printer nozzles and physical information (material properties, thickness and the like) of a piece to be printed, and setting printing parameters and scanning parameters; then, signal processing and image processing are carried out on ultrasonic information acquired by the ultrasonic probe, a threshold value is set to distinguish the irretentive defect and the irrelevant defect, and the total defect rate of the detection layer is counted; the image after ultrasonic treatment and the image after segmentation treatment are compared on line to adjust the printing parameters in time and even stop the printing of poor molding; and finally, performing three-dimensional reconstruction on the ultrasonic imaging, and filing the molding quality of all printed products.

titles.text: A kind of low complex degree minimum variance ultrasonic imaging method that fusion feature value is decomposed
一种融合特征值分解的低复杂度最小方差超声成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种融合特征值分解的低复杂度最小方差超声成像方法，属于超声成像领域。首先，利用离散余弦变换将回波数据转换到维数较少的波束域，然后对样本协方差矩阵进行特征值分解提取信号子空间，并选取最大的特征值和其对应的特征向量，其余特征值在保证样本协方差矩阵迹不变的情况下取相同值，将矩阵的求逆运算简化为向量的乘法运算。本发明提出的算法能够使运行时间明显少于基于特征值分解的最小方差算法，且对噪声具有良好的鲁棒性，成像效果明显优于传统的延时叠加算法、最小方差算法和波束域最小方差算法。

The present invention relates to the low complex degree minimum variance ultrasonic imaging methods that a kind of fusion feature value is decomposed, and belong to ultrasonic imaging field.First, echo data is transformed into the less Beam Domain of dimension using discrete cosine transform, then Eigenvalues Decomposition is carried out to sample covariance matrix and extracts signal subspace, and choose maximum characteristic value feature vector corresponding with its, remaining characteristic value takes identical value in the case where guaranteeing that sample covariance matrix mark is constant, and the inversion operation of matrix is reduced to the multiplying of vector.Algorithm proposed by the present invention can make runing time be considerably less than the minimum variation algorithm based on Eigenvalues Decomposition, and noise is had good robustness, imaging effect is substantially better than traditional delay superposition algorithm, minimum variation algorithm and Beam Domain minimum variation algorithm.

titles.text: 一种融合特征值分解的低复杂度最小方差超声成像方法
Low-complexity minimum variance ultrasonic imaging method fused with eigenvalue decomposition

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种融合特征值分解的低复杂度最小方差超声成像方法，属于超声成像领域。首先，利用离散余弦变换将回波数据转换到维数较少的波束域，然后对样本协方差矩阵进行特征值分解提取信号子空间，并选取最大的特征值和其对应的特征向量，其余特征值在保证样本协方差矩阵迹不变的情况下取相同值，将矩阵的求逆运算简化为向量的乘法运算。本发明提出的算法能够使运行时间明显少于基于特征值分解的最小方差算法，且对噪声具有良好的鲁棒性，成像效果明显优于传统的延时叠加算法、最小方差算法和波束域最小方差算法。

The invention relates to a low-complexity minimum variance ultrasonic imaging method fused with eigenvalue decomposition, and belongs to the field of ultrasonic imaging. Firstly, echo data are converted into a beam domain with less dimensionality by discrete cosine transform, then eigenvalue decomposition is carried out on a sample covariance matrix to extract a signal subspace, the maximum eigenvalue and the corresponding eigenvector are selected, the other eigenvalues take the same value under the condition that the trace of the sample covariance matrix is not changed, and the inversion operation of the matrix is simplified into the multiplication operation of the vector. The algorithm provided by the invention can enable the running time to be obviously less than that of a minimum variance algorithm based on characteristic value decomposition, has good robustness on noise, and has an imaging effect obviously superior to that of the traditional delay superposition algorithm, the minimum variance algorithm and the beam domain minimum variance algorithm.

titles.text: 声发射源时反定位成像方法
Antidirection finding imaging method when acoustic emission source

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及损伤检测方法技术领域，具体来说是一种声发射源时反定位成像方法，本次发明的定位方法通过测量不同区域的声速，计算出材料平均声速，然后通过对传感器接收到的声发射信号进行时间反转增强处理后，计算出各传感器反向加载后在损伤声源处散射回来的信号，取信号包络线波形作为成像处理信号。最后重建检测区域波动图，确定图中幅值最大的像素坐标位置即为声发射源位置。这种采用平均声速的时间反转定位成像方法适用于内部结构不均匀的其他各向异性材料声发射源定位，具有重要的实际应用价值。

The present invention relates to damage detecting method technical fields, a kind of specifically antidirection finding imaging method when acoustic emission source, the velocity of sound that the localization method of this invention passes through measurement different zones, calculate material bulk sound velocity, then after carrying out time reversal enhancing processing by the acoustic emission signal received to sensor, it is scattered back the signal come at damage sound source after calculating each sensor Opposite side loading, takes signal envelope waveform as imaging signal.Detection zone wave pattern is finally rebuild, determines that the pixel coordinate position of amplitude maximum in figure is acoustic emission source position.This time reversal positioning and imaging method using bulk sound velocity is suitable for non-uniform other anisotropic material acoustic emission sources positioning of internal structure, has important practical application value.

titles.text: 一种随机分布传声器阵列
A kind of random distribution microphone array

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a kind of random distribution microphone arrays, including array, array hold-down support, acoustics camera, three-dimensional sound intensity probe bracket.The present invention optimizes microphone measuring point using Gaussian mixtures, so that this array can be used for the near field acoustic holography positioning of middle low frequency, medium and long distance, is also applied for medium-high frequency, the Wave beam forming location technology of medium and long distance.Three-dimensional sound intensity probe can also be installed on array simultaneously, carry out three-dimensional sound intersity measurement.Compared to traditional single form array structure, random distribution microphone array rack device function of the present invention is more, and the scope of application is wider.
本发明公开了一种随机分布传声器阵列，包括阵列架、阵列固定支座、声学相机、三维声强探头支架。本发明采用混合高斯分布对传声器测点进行优化，使得本阵列既能用于中低频、中远距离的近场声全息定位，也适用于中高频、中远距离的波束形成定位技术。同时阵列架上也可以安装三维声强探头，进行三维声强测量。相比传统的单一形式阵列架结构，本发明所述的随机分布传声器阵列架装置功能更多，适用范围更广。

titles.text: 一种随机分布传声器阵列
Random distribution microphone array

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种随机分布传声器阵列，包括阵列架、阵列固定支座、声学相机、三维声强探头支架。本发明采用混合高斯分布对传声器测点进行优化，使得本阵列既能用于中低频、中远距离的近场声全息定位，也适用于中高频、中远距离的波束形成定位技术。同时阵列架上也可以安装三维声强探头，进行三维声强测量。相比传统的单一形式阵列架结构，本发明所述的随机分布传声器阵列架装置功能更多，适用范围更广。

The invention discloses a random distribution microphone array, which comprises an array frame, an array fixing support, an acoustic camera and a three-dimensional sound intensity probe support. The invention optimizes the microphone measuring points by adopting mixed Gaussian distribution, so that the array can be used for near-field acoustic holographic positioning of middle and low frequency and middle and long distance, and is also suitable for beam forming positioning technology of middle and high frequency and middle and long distance. Meanwhile, a three-dimensional sound intensity probe can be installed on the array frame to measure the three-dimensional sound intensity. Compared with the traditional single-form array frame structure, the random distribution microphone array frame device has more functions and wider application range.

titles.text: A kind of acoustic beam calibration method of total focus imaging
一种全聚焦成像的声束校准方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The step of present invention is a kind of acoustic beam calibration method of total focus imaging, and this method establishes acoustic beam calibration matrix by the amplitude information of horizontal through-hole in actual measurement reference block with compensation sound wave energy attenuation, calibration is as follows: production reference block；The acquisition and storage of complete matrix data；The extraction of sub- complete matrix data；Total focus imaging is carried out to each sub- complete matrix data；It extracts horizontal through-hole amplitude information and generates original calibration data；Linear interpolation is done to original calibration data and calculates generation acoustic beam calibration matrix；Total focus is imaged and carries out acoustic beam calibration.The method of the present invention can effectively reduce defect quantitative detection error and detection omission factor, improve total focus image energy uniformity.

本发明是一种全聚焦成像的声束校准方法，该方法通过实际测量标准试块中横通孔的幅值信息来建立声束校准矩阵以补偿声波能量衰减，校准的步骤如下：制作标准试块；全矩阵数据的采集及存储；子全矩阵数据的提取；对每一个子全矩阵数据进行全聚焦成像；提取横通孔幅值信息并生成原始校准数据；对原始校准数据做线性插值计算生成声束校准矩阵；对全聚焦成像进行声束校准。本发明方法可有效减小缺陷定量检测误差和检测漏检率，改善全聚焦图像能量均匀性。

titles.text: 一种全聚焦成像的声束校准方法
Acoustic beam calibration method for full-focus imaging

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明是一种全聚焦成像的声束校准方法，该方法通过实际测量标准试块中横通孔的幅值信息来建立声束校准矩阵以补偿声波能量衰减，校准的步骤如下：制作标准试块；全矩阵数据的采集及存储；子全矩阵数据的提取；对每一个子全矩阵数据进行全聚焦成像；提取横通孔幅值信息并生成原始校准数据；对原始校准数据做线性插值计算生成声束校准矩阵；对全聚焦成像进行声束校准。本发明方法可有效减小缺陷定量检测误差和检测漏检率，改善全聚焦图像能量均匀性。

The invention relates to a sound beam calibration method of full-focus imaging, which establishes a sound beam calibration matrix to compensate sound wave energy attenuation by actually measuring amplitude information of a transverse through hole in a standard test block, and comprises the following calibration steps: manufacturing a standard test block; collecting and storing full matrix data; extracting sub-full matrix data; carrying out full-focus imaging on each sub full-matrix data; extracting amplitude information of the transverse through hole and generating original calibration data; performing linear interpolation calculation on the original calibration data to generate an acoustic beam calibration matrix; and carrying out sound beam calibration on the full focus imaging. The method can effectively reduce the error of quantitative defect detection and the detection omission ratio, and improve the energy uniformity of the full-focus image.

titles.text: A kind of gate inhibition's communication device
一种门禁通信装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present invention relates to a kind of gate inhibition's communication device, solution is anti-interference weak technical problem, by using including image acquisition units and sound collection unit, control unit, image communication unit and sound communication unit；The technical solution that the switching of described image communication unit and audio communication unit is controlled by control unit according to information source data result, preferably resolves the problem, can be used in access control applications.
本发明涉及一种门禁通信装置，解决的是抗干扰弱的技术问题，通过采用包括图像采集单元和声音采集单元，控制单元，图像通信单元和声音通信单元；所述图像通信单元与声音通信单元的切换由控制单元根据信源数据结果控制的技术方案，较好的解决了该问题，可用于门禁应用中。

titles.text: 一种门禁通信装置
Entrance guard communication device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种门禁通信装置，解决的是抗干扰弱的技术问题，通过采用包括图像采集单元和声音采集单元，控制单元，图像通信单元和声音通信单元；所述图像通信单元与声音通信单元的切换由控制单元根据信源数据结果控制的技术方案，较好的解决了该问题，可用于门禁应用中。

The invention relates to an access control communication device, which solves the technical problem of weak interference resistance and comprises an image acquisition unit, a sound acquisition unit, a control unit, an image communication unit and a sound communication unit; the technical scheme that the switching between the image communication unit and the sound communication unit is controlled by the control unit according to the information source data result better solves the problem and can be used in entrance guard application.

titles.text: A kind of single-sensor acoustics camera based on space folding acoustic metamaterial
一种基于空间折叠声学超材料的单传感器声学相机

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供了一种基于空间折叠声学超材料的单传感器声学相机，包括：至少一个声学通道模块，所述声学通道模块内设置有空间折叠结构的声学通道，所述声学通道的一端为声学输入端，另一端为声学输出端，不同所述声学通道模块之间相邻放置且所述声学输出端朝向同一位置；一个声学传感器，设置于所有所述声学输出端所朝向的所述位置；声波从至少一个所述声学通道模块的声学输入端进入所述声学通道，对入射声波进行方向性调制，再由声学输出端输出后被所述声学传感器获取。本发明只包含一个声学传感器，且模型可以通过3D打印制造，具有频带宽、精度高、体积小、成本低等优点。

The present invention provides a kind of single-sensor acoustics camera based on space folding acoustic metamaterial, it include: at least one acoustical passage module, the acoustical passage of space folding structure is provided in the acoustical passage module, one end of the acoustical passage is acoustics input terminal, the other end is acoustic output end, is placed adjacent between the different acoustical passage modules and the acoustic output end is towards same position；One acoustic sensor is set to the position of all acoustic output end institute directions；Sound wave enters the acoustical passage from the acoustics input terminal of acoustical passage module described at least one, carries out directionality modulation to incident acoustic wave, then by being obtained after the output of acoustic output end by the acoustic sensor.The present invention only includes an acoustic sensor, and model can be manufactured by 3D printing, has many advantages, such as that bandwidth, precision are high, small in size, at low cost.

titles.text: Single-sensor acoustic camera based on space folding acoustic metamaterial
一种基于空间折叠声学超材料的单传感器声学相机

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a single-sensor acoustic camera based on a space folding acoustic metamaterial, which comprises: the acoustic channel module is internally provided with an acoustic channel with a space folding structure, one end of the acoustic channel is an acoustic input end, the other end of the acoustic channel is an acoustic output end, the acoustic channel modules are adjacently placed, and the acoustic output ends face the same position; an acoustic sensor disposed at said location toward which all of said acoustic outputs are directed; and sound waves enter the acoustic channel from the acoustic input end of at least one acoustic channel module, the incident sound waves are subjected to directional modulation, and the incident sound waves are output by the acoustic output end and then acquired by the acoustic sensor. The invention only comprises one acoustic sensor, and the model can be manufactured by 3D printing, and has the advantages of wide frequency band, high precision, small volume, low cost and the like.

本发明提供了一种基于空间折叠声学超材料的单传感器声学相机，包括：至少一个声学通道模块，所述声学通道模块内设置有空间折叠结构的声学通道，所述声学通道的一端为声学输入端，另一端为声学输出端，不同所述声学通道模块之间相邻放置且所述声学输出端朝向同一位置；一个声学传感器，设置于所有所述声学输出端所朝向的所述位置；声波从至少一个所述声学通道模块的声学输入端进入所述声学通道，对入射声波进行方向性调制，再由声学输出端输出后被所述声学传感器获取。本发明只包含一个声学传感器，且模型可以通过3D打印制造，具有频带宽、精度高、体积小、成本低等优点。

titles.text: The real-time pattern of acoustic reflectance image identifies and automatic interpretation
声反射图像的实时图案识别和自动解释

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一种用于与地层相交的钻孔中执行测井以获得和传输地层的声反射图像的方法、系统、装置和产品。方法包括识别声反射图像中基本上拟合图案的特征集，其中所述特征集对应于地层的至少一个反射结构界面的一部分；以及使用图案的表示作为声反射图像的压缩表示。特征可以是声反射图像中的幅度峰值，并且图案可以是其中从幅度峰值获得的线段。识别所述特征集可以包括生成幅度峰值的二进制图像。

Well logging is executed in a kind of drilling for intersecting with stratum to obtain and transmit method, system, device and the product of the acoustic reflectance image on stratum.Method includes identifying the feature set that pattern is substantially fitted in acoustic reflectance image, wherein the feature set corresponds to a part at least one catoptric arrangement interface on stratum；And use compression expression of the expression of pattern as acoustic reflectance image.Feature can be the amplitude peak in acoustic reflectance image, and pattern can be the line segment wherein obtained from amplitude peak.Identify that the feature set may include the binary picture for generating amplitude peak.

titles.text: Real-time pattern recognition and automatic interpretation of acoustic reflectance images
声反射图像的实时图案识别和自动解释

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一种用于与地层相交的钻孔中执行测井以获得和传输地层的声反射图像的方法、系统、装置和产品。方法包括识别声反射图像中基本上拟合图案的特征集，其中所述特征集对应于地层的至少一个反射结构界面的一部分；以及使用图案的表示作为声反射图像的压缩表示。特征可以是声反射图像中的幅度峰值，并且图案可以是其中从幅度峰值获得的线段。识别所述特征集可以包括生成幅度峰值的二进制图像。

A method, system, apparatus and article for performing well logging in a borehole intersecting an earth formation to obtain and transmit acoustic reflection images of the earth formation. The method includes identifying a set of features in the acoustic reflection image that substantially fit a pattern, wherein the set of features corresponds to a portion of at least one reflective structural interface of the formation; and using the representation of the pattern as a compressed representation of the acoustic reflection image. The feature may be an amplitude peak in the acoustic reflection image, and the pattern may be a line segment in which the amplitude peak is obtained. Identifying the set of features may include generating a binary image of the amplitude peaks.

titles.text: Multi-modal acoustics imaging tool
多模态声学成像工具

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 多模态声学成像工具。针对声学分析的系统和方法可以包括：多个声学传感器阵列，每个声学传感器阵列包括多个声学传感器元件；以及与多个声学传感器阵列通信的处理器。处理器可以被配置成基于一个或多个输入参数来选择多个声学传感器阵列中的一个或多个，并基于来自选定的一个或多个声学传感器阵列的接收的声学数据来生成表示声学场景的声学图像数据。此类输入参数可以包括距离信息和/或频率信息。不同的声学传感器阵列可以共享共同的声学传感器元件或者可以彼此完全分离。声学图像数据可以与来自电磁成像工具的电磁图像数据组合以生成显示图像。

Multi-modal acoustics imaging tool.System and method for acoustic analysis may include: multiple acoustic sensor array, and each acoustic sensor array includes multiple acoustic sensor elements；And the processor communicated with multiple acoustic sensor array.Processor is configured to one or more input parameters to select one or more of multiple acoustic sensor array, and the acoustic image data for indicating acoustics scene is generated based on the received acoustic data from selected one or more acoustic sensor array.Such input parameter may include range information and/or frequency information.Different acoustic sensor array can share common acoustic sensor element or can be completely separated from each other.Acoustic image data can be combined with the electromagnetic image data from magnetography tool to generate display image.

titles.text: Multi-modal acoustic imaging tool
多模态声学成像工具

abstracts.paragraph_markup: A multi-modal acoustic imaging tool. Systems and methods for acoustic analysis may include: a plurality of acoustic sensor arrays, each acoustic sensor array comprising a plurality of acoustic sensor elements; and a processor in communication with the plurality of acoustic sensor arrays. The processor may be configured to select one or more of the plurality of acoustic sensor arrays based on the one or more input parameters and generate acoustic image data representative of the acoustic scene based on received acoustic data from the selected one or more acoustic sensor arrays. Such input parameters may include distance information and/or frequency information. The different acoustic sensor arrays may share a common acoustic sensor element or may be completely separate from each other. The acoustic image data may be combined with electromagnetic image data from an electromagnetic imaging tool to generate a display image.

多模态声学成像工具。针对声学分析的系统和方法可以包括：多个声学传感器阵列，每个声学传感器阵列包括多个声学传感器元件；以及与多个声学传感器阵列通信的处理器。处理器可以被配置成基于一个或多个输入参数来选择多个声学传感器阵列中的一个或多个，并基于来自选定的一个或多个声学传感器阵列的接收的声学数据来生成表示声学场景的声学图像数据。此类输入参数可以包括距离信息和/或频率信息。不同的声学传感器阵列可以共享共同的声学传感器元件或者可以彼此完全分离。声学图像数据可以与来自电磁成像工具的电磁图像数据组合以生成显示图像。

titles.text: GIS mechanical breakdown electrification detection system based on acoustics imaging
基于声学成像的GIS机械故障带电检测系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present invention relates to a kind of GIS mechanical breakdown electrification detection system based on acoustics imaging.Its main feature is that: including sequentially connected sound intersity measurement unit, acquisition module and test host, wherein sound intersity measurement unit includes half-round metal bracket, 5 groups of sound intensity probes are along the circumferential direction installed on the half-round metal bracket, every group of sound intensity probe is the P-P type sound intensity probe being made of 2 sound intensity microphone sensors.Test proves that may be implemented to assess running GIS device state and provide fault diagnosis after using method of the invention.
本发明涉及一种基于声学成像的GIS机械故障带电检测系统。其特点是：包括依次连接的声强测量单元、采集模块和测试主机，其中声强测量单元包括半圆形金属支架，在该半圆形金属支架上沿圆周方向安装有5组声强探头，每组声强探头均为由2只声强麦克风传感器构成的P‑P型声强探头。经过试用证明，采用本发明的方法后，可以实现对运行中的GIS设备状态进行评估并且给出故障诊断。

titles.text: A kind of three-dimension ultrasonic imaging system
一种三维超声成像系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种三维超声成像系统，包括：一个二维CMUT阵列、模拟前端收发模块、时间增益补偿模块、低通滤波器模块、ADC转化模块、数字信号处理与控制模块，所述模拟前端收发器包括：高压发射/接收隔离开关、跨阻放大器、脉冲发生器；所述二维CMUT阵列和模拟前端收发模块的阵列通过垂直的硅通孔对应连接；所述跨阻放大器包括：一个单端放大器和一个反馈电阻Rf；所述单端放大器由一个共源级放大器MN1级联一个N管类型的源跟随器MN3构成。本发明提供的三维超声成像系统，模拟接收器中的高频跨阻放大器输入电阻低、跨导及反馈电阻高等特点使该系统具有较宽的频带宽度，使系统能够工作在更高的频率中，3D成像的空间分辨率更高。

The present invention provides a kind of three-dimension ultrasonic imaging system, it include: a two dimension CMUT array, AFE(analog front end) transceiver module, time gain compensation module, low pass filter blocks, ADC conversion module, Digital Signal Processing and control module, the analog front end transceiver includes: that high pressure emits/receive disconnecting switch, trans-impedance amplifier, impulse generator；The array of the two dimension CMUT array and AFE(analog front end) transceiver module is correspondingly connected with by vertical through silicon via；The trans-impedance amplifier includes: a single-ended amplifier and a feedback resistance Rf；The single-ended amplifier is made of the source follower MN3 that a common-source stage amplifier MN1 cascades a N tubing type.Three-dimension ultrasonic imaging system provided by the invention, the features such as high frequency trans-impedance amplifier input resistance in analog receiver is low, mutual conductance and feedback resistance are high makes the system have wider frequency bandwidth, work is enabled a system in higher frequency, the spatial resolution of 3D imaging is higher.

titles.text: 一种三维超声成像系统
Three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging system

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种三维超声成像系统，包括：一个二维CMUT阵列、模拟前端收发模块、时间增益补偿模块、低通滤波器模块、ADC转化模块、数字信号处理与控制模块，所述模拟前端收发器包括：高压发射/接收隔离开关、跨阻放大器、脉冲发生器；所述二维CMUT阵列和模拟前端收发模块的阵列通过垂直的硅通孔对应连接；所述跨阻放大器包括：一个单端放大器和一个反馈电阻Rf；所述单端放大器由一个共源级放大器MN1级联一个N管类型的源跟随器MN3构成。本发明提供的三维超声成像系统，模拟接收器中的高频跨阻放大器输入电阻低、跨导及反馈电阻高等特点使该系统具有较宽的频带宽度，使系统能够工作在更高的频率中，3D成像的空间分辨率更高。

The invention provides a three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging system, comprising: two-dimensional CMUT array, analog front end receiving and transmitting module, time gain compensation module and low-pass filterThe module, ADC conversion module, digital signal processing and control module, analog front end transceiver includes: the high-voltage transmitting/receiving isolating switch, the trans-impedance amplifier and the pulse generator; the two-dimensional CMUT array and the array of the analog front-end transceiver module are correspondingly connected through vertical silicon through holes; the transimpedance amplifier includes: a single-ended amplifier and a feedback resistor Rf(ii) a The single-ended amplifier is formed by cascading a common source amplifier MN1 with an N-tube type source follower MN 3. According to the three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging system, the high-frequency trans-impedance amplifier in the analog receiver has the characteristics of low input resistance, high transconductance, high feedback resistance and the like, so that the system has wider frequency bandwidth, the system can work in higher frequency, and the spatial resolution of 3D imaging is higher.

titles.text: A kind of design method of complete matrix linear ultrasonic transducer array
一种全矩阵线性超声换能器阵列的设计方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present invention provides a kind of design methods of complete matrix linear ultrasonic transducer array, comprising: establishes complete matrix linear ultrasonic transducer array list array element space sound-filed simulation P；Establish directivity function D (θ1, θ2)；Solve effective beam width w；Determine rectangle array element length a and rectangle array element width b；Determine array element spacing d；According to given array element number and effective detection aperture, array image-forming quality is assessed.The present invention solves the problems, such as current complete matrix ultrasonic imaging technique without special sensor array design method, realizes the defect detection effect and image quality for being better than conventional phased array array, reduces array element quantity, while improving detection time efficiency.

本发明提供了一种全矩阵线性超声换能器阵列的设计方法，包括：建立全矩阵线性超声换能器阵列单阵元空间声场分布P；建立阵元指向性函数D(θ1，θ2)；求解有效声束宽度w；确定矩形阵元长度a和矩形阵元宽度b；确定阵元间距d；根据给定阵元数目和有效检测孔径，评估阵列成像质量。本发明解决了目前全矩阵超声成像技术无专门的传感器阵列设计方法的问题，实现优于常规相控阵阵列的缺陷检出效果以及成像质量，降低阵元数量，同时提高检测时间效率。

titles.text: Design method of full-matrix linear ultrasonic transducer array
一种全矩阵线性超声换能器阵列的设计方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a design method of a full matrix linear ultrasonic transducer array, which comprises the following steps: establishing the spatial sound field distribution P of single array elements of the full-matrix linear ultrasonic transducer array; establishing array element directivity function D (theta) 1 ，θ 2 ) The method comprises the steps of carrying out a first treatment on the surface of the Solving the effective sound beam width w; determining a rectangular array element length a and a rectangular array element width b; determining an array element distance d; and evaluating the imaging quality of the array according to the given array element number and the effective detection aperture. The invention solves the problem that the existing full-matrix ultrasonic imaging technology has no special sensor array design method, realizes the defect detection effect and imaging quality superior to the conventional phased array, reduces the number of array elements, and improves the detection time efficiency.

本发明提供了一种全矩阵线性超声换能器阵列的设计方法，包括：建立全矩阵线性超声换能器阵列单阵元空间声场分布P；建立阵元指向性函数D(θ1，θ2)；求解有效声束宽度w；确定矩形阵元长度a和矩形阵元宽度b；确定阵元间距d；根据给定阵元数目和有效检测孔径，评估阵列成像质量。本发明解决了目前全矩阵超声成像技术无专门的传感器阵列设计方法的问题，实现优于常规相控阵阵列的缺陷检出效果以及成像质量，降低阵元数量，同时提高检测时间效率。

titles.text: A kind of multi-modality image registration method based on synthesis ultrasound image
一种基于合成超声图像的多模态图像配准方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种基于合成超声图像的多模态图像配准方法，根据磁共振图像和真实超声图像，通过构建包括生成器和判别器的生成对抗网络，生成拟真的合成超声图像，并将拟真的合成超声图像和真实超声图像进行配准得到配准参数，将配准参数应用于磁共振图像，完成最终的磁共振图像和超声图像的配准融合。本方法能够实时从磁共振图像中合成超声图像，满足实时影像引导手术的要求；合成的拟真超声图像更接近于真实超声图像，图像质量更高，更好的保存了重要的细节信息；当磁共振图像包含肿瘤时，依然可以准确的合成拟真超声图像；最终的配准技术不需要很复杂的配准算法，只需要传统的简单的配准算法就可以达到很好的配准效果。

The present invention provides a kind of multi-modality image registration method based on synthesis ultrasound image, according to magnetic resonance image and live ultrasound image, network is fought by constructing the generation including generator and arbiter, it generates and intends really synthesizing ultrasound image, and quasi- it will really synthesize ultrasound image and live ultrasound image is registrated to obtain registration parameter, registration parameter is applied to magnetic resonance image, completes the registration fusion of final magnetic resonance image and ultrasound image.This method can synthesize ultrasound image from magnetic resonance image in real time, meet the requirement of real-time imaging guidance operation；Synthesis intends true ultrasound image closer to live ultrasound image, and picture quality is higher, preferably saves important detailed information；When magnetic resonance image includes tumour, it still can accurately synthesize and intend true ultrasound image；Final registration technique does not need very complicated registration Algorithm, it is only necessary to which traditional simple registration Algorithm can reach good registration effect.

titles.text: 一种基于合成超声图像的多模态图像配准方法
Multi-modal image registration method based on synthetic ultrasound image
