abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种基于合成超声图像的多模态图像配准方法，根据磁共振图像和真实超声图像，通过构建包括生成器和判别器的生成对抗网络，生成拟真的合成超声图像，并将拟真的合成超声图像和真实超声图像进行配准得到配准参数，将配准参数应用于磁共振图像，完成最终的磁共振图像和超声图像的配准融合。本方法能够实时从磁共振图像中合成超声图像，满足实时影像引导手术的要求；合成的拟真超声图像更接近于真实超声图像，图像质量更高，更好的保存了重要的细节信息；当磁共振图像包含肿瘤时，依然可以准确的合成拟真超声图像；最终的配准技术不需要很复杂的配准算法，只需要传统的简单的配准算法就可以达到很好的配准效果。

The invention provides a multi-mode image registration method based on a synthetic ultrasonic image, which is characterized in that according to a magnetic resonance image and a real ultrasonic image, a generating countermeasure network comprising a generator and a discriminator is constructed to generate a simulated synthetic ultrasonic image, the simulated synthetic ultrasonic image and the real ultrasonic image are registered to obtain registration parameters, and the registration parameters are applied to the magnetic resonance image to complete the final registration fusion of the magnetic resonance image and the ultrasonic image. The method can synthesize the ultrasonic image from the magnetic resonance image in real time, and meet the requirement of real-time image-guided surgery; the synthesized true-to-true ultrasonic image is closer to a real ultrasonic image, the image quality is higher, and important detail information is better saved; when the magnetic resonance image contains the tumor, the simulation ultrasonic image can be accurately synthesized; the final registration technology does not need a complex registration algorithm, and can achieve a good registration effect only by a traditional simple registration algorithm.

titles.text: A kind of near field acoustic holography test macro and application under noise circumstance
一种用于噪声环境下的近场声全息测试系统及应用

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种用于噪声环境下的近场声全息测试系统及应用，其中系统包括刚性声学屏蔽罩、传声器阵列、底座、数据采集仪和上位机，传声器阵列包括多个传感器，刚性声学屏蔽罩包括一个底面和四个侧面，且底面上离散地设置有多个开孔，开孔的数目与传感器的数目一致，各开孔和各传感器一一对应，传感器嵌于刚性声学屏蔽罩底面的对应开孔中，且传声器与底面的内表面平齐设置，传声器阵列、数据采集仪和上位机依次连接，刚性声学屏蔽罩和传声器阵列由底座固定并支撑。与现有技术相比，本发明具有能够更方便地在噪声环境下重建声源表面振速等优点。

The present invention relates to a kind of near field acoustic holography test macros and application under noise circumstance, wherein system includes rigid acoustical enclosures, microphone array, pedestal, data collecting instrument and host computer, microphone array includes multiple sensors, rigid acoustical enclosures include a bottom surface and four sides, and multiple apertures are discretely provided on bottom surface, the number of aperture and the number of sensor are consistent, each aperture and each sensor correspond, sensor is embedded in the correspondence aperture of rigid acoustical enclosures bottom surface, and microphone is concordant with the inner surface of bottom surface is arranged, microphone array, data collecting instrument and host computer are sequentially connected, rigid acoustical enclosures and microphone array are fixed and are supported by pedestal.Compared with prior art, the present invention has many advantages, such as more easily rebuild sound source surface vibration velocity in a noisy environment.

titles.text: 一种用于噪声环境下的近场声全息测试系统及应用
Near-field acoustic holography test system used in noise environment and application

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种用于噪声环境下的近场声全息测试系统及应用，其中系统包括刚性声学屏蔽罩、传声器阵列、底座、数据采集仪和上位机，传声器阵列包括多个传感器，刚性声学屏蔽罩包括一个底面和四个侧面，且底面上离散地设置有多个开孔，开孔的数目与传感器的数目一致，各开孔和各传感器一一对应，传感器嵌于刚性声学屏蔽罩底面的对应开孔中，且传声器与底面的内表面平齐设置，传声器阵列、数据采集仪和上位机依次连接，刚性声学屏蔽罩和传声器阵列由底座固定并支撑。与现有技术相比，本发明具有能够更方便地在噪声环境下重建声源表面振速等优点。

The invention relates to a near-field acoustic holography test system used in a noise environment and application thereof, wherein the system comprises a rigid acoustic shielding cover, a microphone array, a base, a data acquisition instrument and an upper computer, the microphone array comprises a plurality of sensors, the rigid acoustic shielding cover comprises a bottom surface and four side surfaces, a plurality of openings are discretely arranged on the bottom surface, the number of the openings is consistent with the number of the sensors, the openings correspond to the sensors one by one, the sensors are embedded in the corresponding openings on the bottom surface of the rigid acoustic shielding cover, the microphone is arranged in parallel and level with the inner surface of the bottom surface, the microphone array, the data acquisition instrument and the upper computer are sequentially connected, and the rigid acoustic shielding cover and the microphone array are fixed and supported by the base. Compared with the prior art, the method has the advantages that the surface vibration speed of the sound source can be reconstructed more conveniently in a noise environment, and the like.

titles.text: For using the compound Fresnel that is concerned with to focus the system and method for carrying out Ultrasound beamforming
用于使用相干复合菲涅尔聚焦进行超声波束形成的系统和方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 在选定仰角处进行菲涅尔仰角聚焦是通过发射一组连续菲涅尔聚焦超声脉冲来执行的，其中针对每个脉冲使用不同菲涅尔相位图案，并且其中对接收信号进行相干复合。不同菲涅尔图案经由对旁瓣区中的压力场的变化进行平均来致使旁瓣能量降低。在一些实施例中，相干复合菲涅尔聚焦方法与方位角方向上的相干复合散焦波(例如，平面波或发散波)成像相结合。通过改变分别在发射平面波或发散波序列时采用的菲涅尔图案来收集每个仰角切片，使得相干复合能够同时有益于两个平面。哈达玛接收编码和随后的动态接收波束形成可以用于进一步改善仰角方向上的性能。

Progress Fresnel Elevation focus is to focus ultrasonic pulse by one group of continuous Fresnel of transmitting to be performed at the selected elevation angle, wherein using different phase Fresnel patterns for each pulse, and it is compound wherein be concerned with to reception signal.Different Fresnel patterns averagely cause side-lobe energy to reduce via the variation to the pressure field in secondary lobe area.In some embodiments, the compound Fresnel focus method that is concerned with compound defocus wave (for example, plane wave or diverging wave) imaging and combines with being concerned on azimuth direction.By changing, in plane of departure wave or diverging wave train, the Fresnel pattern that uses is sliced to collect each elevation angle respectively, so that be concerned with compound can be beneficial to two planes simultaneously.Hadamard receives coding and subsequent dynamic receives Wave beam forming and can be used for further improving the performance on elevation direction.

titles.text: System and method for ultrasound beamforming using coherent composite fresnel focusing
用于使用相干复合菲涅尔聚焦进行超声波束形成的系统和方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 在选定仰角处进行菲涅尔仰角聚焦是通过发射一组连续菲涅尔聚焦超声脉冲来执行的，其中针对每个脉冲使用不同菲涅尔相位图案，并且其中对接收信号进行相干复合。不同菲涅尔图案经由对旁瓣区中的压力场的变化进行平均来致使旁瓣能量降低。在一些实施例中，相干复合菲涅尔聚焦方法与方位角方向上的相干复合散焦波(例如，平面波或发散波)成像相结合。通过改变分别在发射平面波或发散波序列时采用的菲涅尔图案来收集每个仰角切片，使得相干复合能够同时有益于两个平面。哈达玛接收编码和随后的动态接收波束形成可以用于进一步改善仰角方向上的性能。

Fresnel elevation focusing at a selected elevation angle is performed by transmitting a set of consecutive fresnel focused ultrasound pulses, wherein a different fresnel phase pattern is used for each pulse, and wherein the received signals are coherently combined. Different fresnel patterns cause a reduction in sidelobe energy via averaging the changes in the pressure field in the sidelobe region. In some embodiments, the coherent composite fresnel focusing method is combined with coherent composite defocused wave (e.g., plane wave or divergent wave) imaging in the azimuth direction. Each elevation slice is collected by varying the fresnel pattern employed when transmitting a plane wave or sequence of divergent waves, respectively, so that coherent compounding can benefit both planes simultaneously. Hadamard receive coding and subsequent dynamic receive beamforming may be used to further improve performance in the elevation direction.

titles.text: 一种基于脉冲对发射的目标声成像及测速方法与系统
A kind of target acoustic imaging and speed-measuring method and system based on pulse pair transmitting

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种基于脉冲对发射的目标声成像及测速方法与系统，本方法包括：将信号发生器产生的脉冲对信号，经过功率放大器施加在发射换能器上，向媒质中辐射声波；通过接收换能器阵列所有阵元接收辐射声波在媒质中目标散射形成的回波信号，并将所有阵元接收通道的信号经多通道信号采集转换为数字信号；各接收通道数字信号经数字信号处理器进行延时叠加处理，完成对所有扫描波束的计算，得到波束形成；根据波束形成结果，得到目标所在体像素的径向速度估计，并提取波束的时域信号包络，完成对所有扫描波束的计算，得到扫描声图像。本发明可以在实现声成像的同时，对所有包含点状目标的像素进行速度估计，获得介质中所有目标的径向速度估计。

The present invention provides a kind of target acoustic imaging and speed-measuring method and system based on pulse pair transmitting, and this method includes: the impulse pair signals for generating signal generator, is applied on transmitting transducer by power amplifier, the radiative acoustic wave into medium；The radiative acoustic wave echo-signal that target scattering is formed in medium is received by receiving all array elements of transducer array, and the signal of all array element receiving channels is converted into digital signal through multi-channel signal acquiring；Each receiving channel digital signal carries out delay superposition processing through digital signal processor, completes the calculating to all scanning beams, obtains Wave beam forming；According to Wave beam forming as a result, obtaining the radial velocity estimation of volumetric pixel where target, and the time-domain signal envelope of wave beam is extracted, completes the calculating to all scanning beams, obtain scanning acoustic image.The present invention can carry out velocity estimation to all pixels comprising point target while realizing acoustic imaging, obtain the radial velocity estimation of all targets in medium.

titles.text: 一种基于脉冲对发射的目标声成像及测速方法与系统
Target acoustic imaging and speed measuring method and system based on pulse pair emission

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种基于脉冲对发射的目标声成像及测速方法与系统，本方法包括：将信号发生器产生的脉冲对信号，经过功率放大器施加在发射换能器上，向媒质中辐射声波；通过接收换能器阵列所有阵元接收辐射声波在媒质中目标散射形成的回波信号，并将所有阵元接收通道的信号经多通道信号采集转换为数字信号；各接收通道数字信号经数字信号处理器进行延时叠加处理，完成对所有扫描波束的计算，得到波束形成；根据波束形成结果，得到目标所在体像素的径向速度估计，并提取波束的时域信号包络，完成对所有扫描波束的计算，得到扫描声图像。本发明可以在实现声成像的同时，对所有包含点状目标的像素进行速度估计，获得介质中所有目标的径向速度估计。

The invention provides a target acoustic imaging and speed measuring method and system based on pulse pair emission, wherein the method comprises the following steps: applying a pulse pair signal generated by a signal generator to a transmitting transducer through a power amplifier to radiate sound waves into a medium; receiving echo signals formed by target scattering of radiated sound waves in a medium through all array elements of a receiving transducer array, and acquiring and converting signals of all array element receiving channels into digital signals through multi-channel signals; the digital signals of all receiving channels are subjected to delay superposition processing by a digital signal processor to complete the calculation of all scanning beams, and beam formation is obtained; and according to the beam forming result, obtaining the radial velocity estimation of the voxel where the target is located, extracting the time domain signal envelope of the beam, completing the calculation of all scanning beams, and obtaining a scanning acoustic image. The invention can estimate the speed of all pixels containing point targets while realizing acoustic imaging, and obtain the radial speed estimation of all targets in the medium.

titles.text: 一种表征内阻尼力学性能的空气耦合超声特征成像方法
A kind of Air Coupling ultrasonic feature imaging system method of the interior damping mechanical property of characterization

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一种表征聚合物和复合材料内阻尼力学性能的空气耦合超声特征成像方法，属于材料性能测试与表征技术领域。该发明包括对材料损耗角正切值的计算方法、空气耦合超声扫查以及声学参数特征成像方法。具体步骤是首先基于空气耦合超声回波信号计算得出聚合物和复合材料的损耗角正切值，该参数反映了聚合物和复合材料的动态粘弹性能；然后以损耗角正切值为声学特征参量，结合脉冲反射式空气耦合超声扫描成像方法得到基于材料损耗正切角与X、Y扫描方位和频率的三维图像，可实现对聚合物和复合材料内阻尼力学性能的真正无损测试和评价。

A kind of Air Coupling ultrasonic feature imaging system method of characterization polymer and the interior damping mechanical property of composite material, belongs to material properties test and characterization technique field.The invention includes the calculation method to material loss angle tangent value, Air Coupling ultrasonic scan and parameters,acoustic characteristic imaging method.It comprises the concrete steps that and is primarily based on the loss tangent that polymer and composite material is calculated in Air Coupling ultrasound echo signal, which reflects the Dynamic Viscoelastic performance of polymer and composite material；Then using loss tangent as acoustic feature parameter, the 3-D image based on material loss tangents angle and X, Y scan orientation and frequency is obtained in conjunction with pulse reflection Air Coupling ultrasonic scanning image method, it can be achieved that the real non-destructive testing of damping mechanical property and evaluation in polymer and composite material.

titles.text: A kind of high-resolution minimum variance ultrasonic imaging method based on frequency domain segmentation
一种基于频域分段的高分辨率最小方差超声成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种基于频域分段的高分辨率最小方差超声成像方法，属于超声成像领域。该方法首先对阵元接收的采样信号进行延时处理，获得超声聚焦所需的回波数据；其次根据STFT中自适应窗函数的最大集中度测量准则，选取频域分段最优窗函数；利用STFT将超声回波信号转换为窄带子信号；利用共轭对称性，前一半窄带子信号经过共轭对称处理生成另一半窄带信号；将接收阵列依次划分为具有重叠阵元的子阵，对频域信号进行前后向平滑和对角加载处理，获得样本协方差矩阵；最后利用快速傅里叶逆变换对频域分段最小方差波束形成权值进行处理，得出最终时域自适应波束形成信号。该方法可以显著提升超声成像分辨率，提高对比度，可以在整体上提高超声成像的质量。

The present invention relates to a kind of high-resolution minimum variance ultrasonic imaging methods based on frequency domain segmentation, belong to ultrasonic imaging field.This method carries out delay process to the received sampled signal of array element first, echo data needed for obtaining focus ultrasonic；Secondly it according to the maximum concentration degree measuring criterion of adaptive windows function in STFT, chooses frequency domain and is segmented optimal window function；Ultrasound echo signal is converted into narrow band sub-signal using STFT；Using conjugate symmetry, the first half narrow band sub-signal generates the other half narrow band signal by conjugation symmetrical treatment；Receiving array is in turn divided into the submatrix with overlapping array element, front and back is carried out to smooth and diagonal loading processing to frequency-region signal, obtains sample covariance matrix；Finally frequency domain segmentation minimum variance Wave beam forming weight is handled using inverse fast Fourier transform, obtains final time-domain adaptive Wave beam forming signal.This method can be obviously improved ultrasonic imaging resolution ratio, improve contrast, can improve the quality of ultrasonic imaging on the whole.

titles.text: 一种基于频域分段的高分辨率最小方差超声成像方法
High-resolution minimum variance ultrasonic imaging method based on frequency domain segmentation

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种基于频域分段的高分辨率最小方差超声成像方法，属于超声成像领域。该方法首先对阵元接收的采样信号进行延时处理，获得超声聚焦所需的回波数据；其次根据STFT中自适应窗函数的最大集中度测量准则，选取频域分段最优窗函数；利用STFT将超声回波信号转换为窄带子信号；利用共轭对称性，前一半窄带子信号经过共轭对称处理生成另一半窄带信号；将接收阵列依次划分为具有重叠阵元的子阵，对频域信号进行前后向平滑和对角加载处理，获得样本协方差矩阵；最后利用快速傅里叶逆变换对频域分段最小方差波束形成权值进行处理，得出最终时域自适应波束形成信号。该方法可以显著提升超声成像分辨率，提高对比度，可以在整体上提高超声成像的质量。

The invention relates to a high-resolution minimum variance ultrasonic imaging method based on frequency domain segmentation, and belongs to the field of ultrasonic imaging. Firstly, carrying out time delay processing on a sampling signal received by an array element to obtain echo data required by ultrasonic focusing; secondly, selecting a frequency domain segmentation optimal window function according to the maximum concentration measurement criterion of the self-adaptive window function in the STFT; converting the ultrasonic echo signal into a narrow-band sub-signal by using STFT; by utilizing the conjugate symmetry, the first half of narrow-band signals are subjected to conjugate symmetry processing to generate the other half of narrow-band signals; sequentially dividing a receiving array into sub-arrays with overlapped array elements, and carrying out forward and backward smoothing and diagonal loading processing on frequency domain signals to obtain a sample covariance matrix; and finally, processing the frequency domain segmentation minimum variance beam forming weight by utilizing inverse fast Fourier transform to obtain a final time domain self-adaptive beam forming signal. The method can remarkably improve the ultrasonic imaging resolution, improve the contrast and improve the ultrasonic imaging quality on the whole.

titles.text: 一种超声波三维重建的物料监测系统及方法
Material monitoring system and method based on ultrasonic three-dimensional reconstruction

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开一种超声波三维重建的物料监测系统及方法。通过信息采集模块采集待检测物料的二维超声图像信息和待检测物料的位置参数信息；超声成像设备与信息采集模块连接，超声成像设备显示二维超声图像信息；时间同步模块与信息采集模块连接，时间同步模块将超声重建服务器接收的二维超声图像信息与待检测物料的位置参数信息对应；超声重建服务器分别与超声成像设备和时间同步模块连接，三维重建服务器根据二维超声图像信息和对应的支架参数信息，对待检测物料进行三维重建，得到被检测物料的三维图像，三维重建服务器根据被检测物料的三维图像与物料固有示意图像判断被检测物料是否合格。本发明能够提高生产效率以及获得物料的详细信息。

The invention discloses a material monitoring system and method based on ultrasonic three-dimensional reconstruction. Acquiring two-dimensional ultrasonic image information of a material to be detected and position parameter information of the material to be detected by an information acquisition module; the ultrasonic imaging equipment is connected with the information acquisition module and displays two-dimensional ultrasonic image information; the time synchronization module is connected with the information acquisition module and corresponds the two-dimensional ultrasonic image information received by the ultrasonic reconstruction server with the position parameter information of the material to be detected; the ultrasonic reconstruction server is respectively connected with the ultrasonic imaging equipment and the time synchronization module, the three-dimensional reconstruction server carries out three-dimensional reconstruction on the material to be detected according to the two-dimensional ultrasonic image information and the corresponding support parameter information to obtain a three-dimensional image of the detected material, and the three-dimensional reconstruction server judges whether the detected material is qualified or not according to the three-dimensional image of the detected material and the inherent schematic image of the material. The invention can improve the production efficiency and obtain the detailed information of the material.

titles.text: Three-dimensional frequency domain full-acoustic wave imaging method and device
三维频率域全声波成像方法及装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本说明书一个或多个实施例公开了一种三维频率域全波形声波成像方法及装置，用以解决现有全波形声波成像方法中频率域正演模拟时常用差分方法存在的严重数值频散问题，以及全波形反演时容易陷入局部极小值的问题。所述方法包括：确定三维均匀介质下的频率域声波方程；频率域声波方程包含以下参数：频率域波场、声波传播的角频率、空间位置坐标、频率域震源及声波传播速度；获取对频率域声波进行全声波反演的初始模型，根据初始模型确定所述全声波反演的目标函数；根据频率域声波方程以及利用近似解析离散化NAD方法对频率域声波方程对应的真实模型的正演结果，对目标函数进行反演，得到目标模型参数；根据目标模型参数确定目标反演模型。

One or more embodiments of the present disclosure disclose a three-dimensional frequency domain full-waveform acoustic wave imaging method and apparatus, so as to solve the problem of severe numerical dispersion in the conventional frequency domain forward simulation method and the problem of local minima in full-waveform inversion. The method comprises the following steps: determining a frequency domain acoustic wave equation under a three-dimensional uniform medium; the frequency domain acoustic wave equation contains the following parameters: a frequency domain wave field, angular frequency of sound wave propagation, a spatial position coordinate, a frequency domain seismic source and sound wave propagation speed; acquiring an initial model for performing full acoustic wave inversion on frequency domain acoustic waves, and determining a target function of the full acoustic wave inversion according to the initial model; inverting the target function according to the frequency domain acoustic wave equation and a forward result of a real model corresponding to the frequency domain acoustic wave equation by using an approximate analytical discretization NAD method to obtain target model parameters; and determining a target inversion model according to the target model parameters.

titles.text: 三维频率域全声波成像方法及装置
Three-dimensional frequency domain full-acoustic wave imaging method and device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本说明书一个或多个实施例公开了一种三维频率域全波形声波成像方法及装置，用以解决现有全波形声波成像方法中频率域正演模拟时常用差分方法存在的严重数值频散问题，以及全波形反演时容易陷入局部极小值的问题。所述方法包括：确定三维均匀介质下的频率域声波方程；频率域声波方程包含以下参数：频率域波场、声波传播的角频率、空间位置坐标、频率域震源及声波传播速度；获取对频率域声波进行全声波反演的初始模型，根据初始模型确定所述全声波反演的目标函数；根据频率域声波方程以及利用近似解析离散化NAD方法对频率域声波方程对应的真实模型的正演结果，对目标函数进行反演，得到目标模型参数；根据目标模型参数确定目标反演模型。

titles.text: 一种风力机叶片超声无损检测方法
Ultrasonic nondestructive testing method for wind turbine blade

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种风力机叶片超声无损检测方法，该方法能够使超声探伤设备在使用过程中简化现场操作步骤，以及减少对有经验操作人员的依赖。该方法以超声检测图像作为分类对象，将不同种类的超声损伤图像通过机器学习方法开展分类训练，构建图像‑损伤分类识别模型，在现场操作中简化操作过程，达到高效识别检测图像损伤类型的功能。该方法提出的高效无损检测方法，能够快速、有效地开展现场操作及后期的损伤种类识别，协助对产品质量进行判断，保证了检测质量，以应对风力机叶片检测过程中对检测效率高和分析经验足的实际需求。

The invention discloses an ultrasonic nondestructive testing method for a wind turbine blade, which can simplify field operation steps of ultrasonic flaw detection equipment in the using process and reduce the dependence on experienced operators. The method takes ultrasonic detection images as classification objects, carries out classification training on different types of ultrasonic damage images through a machine learning method, constructs an image-damage classification recognition model, simplifies the operation process in field operation, and achieves the function of efficiently recognizing and detecting the damage types of the images. The efficient nondestructive testing method provided by the method can be used for rapidly and effectively carrying out field operation and later damage type identification, assisting in judging the product quality and ensuring the testing quality so as to meet the actual requirements of high testing efficiency and sufficient analysis experience in the wind turbine blade testing process.

titles.text: 用于多相流测量的阵列式超声扫描成像系统
Array type ultrasonic scanning imaging system for multiphase flow measurement

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种用于多相流测量的阵列式超声扫描成像系统，采用模块化的设计方案，包括超声相控阵传感器、主控模块、M个收发前端模块和背板，其特征在于，所述的超声相控阵传感器由M个超声相控阵探头均匀分布在被测管段的相同截面位置，每个超声相控阵探头由N个阵元线性排列而成，各个阵元均能够单独进行激励和接收。依据设定的扫描方式产生不同角度的平面波进行扫描，每个超声相控阵探头发射一组不同角度的平面波扫描结束后，切换至其相邻的下一个超声相控阵探头进行激励，直至所有超声相控阵探头按顺序扫描一圈后，完成一幅截面数据的激励与采集。

The invention relates to an array type ultrasonic scanning imaging system for multiphase flow measurement, which adopts a modularized design scheme and comprises an ultrasonic phased array sensor, a main control module, M transceiving front end modules and a back plate. Generating plane waves with different angles according to a set scanning mode to scan, switching to the next adjacent ultrasonic phased array probe to excite after each ultrasonic phased array probe transmits a group of plane waves with different angles to scan, and finishing excitation and acquisition of a section of data after all the ultrasonic phased array probes scan for one circle in sequence.

titles.text: Fault detection system based on acoustic imaging
基于声学成像的故障检测系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to a fault detection system based on acoustic imaging. The fault detection system includes: the device comprises a signal acquisition unit, a data comparison unit and a controller; the signal acquisition unit comprises a first signal acquisition unit and a second signal acquisition unit which are respectively used for acquiring fault sound signals and background noise signals; the data comparison unit is connected with the first signal acquisition unit and the second signal acquisition unit and is used for carrying out interference elimination analysis to obtain an audio signal to be detected; the controller is connected with the data comparison unit and used for performing acoustic imaging calculation according to the audio signal to be detected to obtain a corresponding sound source position of the main characteristic value, and performing fault diagnosis to obtain a diagnosis result. The fault detection system can obtain complete and non-interference fault sound signals in a coherent sound field, so that a pure fault sound effect is provided for the fault detection system, and the fault detection system can carry out accurate fault diagnosis.

本发明涉及一种基于声学成像的故障检测系统。所述故障检测系统包括：信号采集单元，数据对比单元及控制器；其中，所述信号采集单元包括第一信号采集单元和第二信号采集单元，分别用于采集故障声音信号和采集背景噪声信号；所述数据对比单元与所述第一信号采集单元和所述第二信号采集单元相连接，用于进行去扰分析以得到待测音频信号；所述控制器与所述数据比对单元相连接，用于根据所述待测音频信号进行声学成像计算，得到主要特征值的对应声源位置，进行故障诊断得到诊断结果。上述故障检测系统，可以在相干声场中得到完整的无干扰的故障声音信号，从而为故障检测系统提供了纯净的故障音效使得所述故障检测系统可以进行准确的故障诊断。

titles.text: Acoustic imaging method, acoustic imaging device, acoustic imaging equipment and readable storage medium
声学成像方法、装置、设备及可读存储介质

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The application discloses an acoustic imaging method, an acoustic imaging device, acoustic imaging equipment and a readable storage medium, wherein the difference of noise forms is considered, the noise forms are divided into a stable state and an unstable state, a corresponding sound field thermodynamic diagram generation strategy is configured, the target noise state at the current moment can be actively determined in the imaging process, and a final acoustic imaging diagram is generated according to the target noise state, so that the generated acoustic imaging diagram has a better effect, and a user can more conveniently position the noise position. Furthermore, the method and the device can actively determine the target noise state of the current moment according to the sound field distribution data without manual intervention of a user, improve the operation convenience, realize the purpose of more accurately determining the current noise state, and provide a basis for subsequent acoustic imaging.

本申请公开了一种声学成像方法、装置、设备及可读存储介质，本申请考虑了噪声形态的区别，将其划分为稳态和非稳态，并配置了对应的声场热力图生成策略，成像过程中可以主动确定当前时刻所处的目标噪声态，并据此生成最终的声学成像图，使得生成的声学成像图效果更好，更加方便用户定位噪声位置。进一步，本申请能够主动依据声场分布数据去确定当前时刻所处的目标噪声态，无需用户手动干预，提高了操作便利度，同时又实现了更加准确的确定当前噪声态的目的，为后续声学成像提供基础。

titles.text: 一种基于多阵元等幅同步激励的材料缺陷超声三维成像方法
Material defect ultrasonic three-dimensional imaging method based on multi-array element equal-amplitude synchronous excitation

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a material defect ultrasonic three-dimensional imaging method based on multi-array element equal-amplitude synchronous excitation. Secondly, reconstructing full matrix data from the ultrasonic echo data by using a compressed sensing technology, and carrying out full focusing processing on the reconstructed full matrix data to obtain ultrasonic imaging results of the material sections at different scanning positions. And finally, arranging the slice ultrasonic imaging results at different positions according to the space scanning position, displaying the slice ultrasonic imaging results in a three-dimensional image, and determining the defect position and the outer contour information in the material. Compared with a full-matrix data full-focusing method, the method has the advantages that a new array signal acquisition mode is provided, ultrasonic three-dimensional imaging can be completed by using less data, scanning time is saved, and detection efficiency is improved.

本发明公开一种基于多阵元等幅同步激励的材料缺陷超声三维成像方法，首先，在各扫查位置处，一维线性阵列超声换能器只进行若干次多阵元等幅同步激励，所有阵元接收回波信号，以得到少量的超声回波数据。其次，利用压缩感知技术，从超声回波数据中重构全矩阵数据，并对重构的全矩阵数据进行全聚焦处理，获取不同扫查位置处的材料断面超声成像结果。最后，将不同位置处的切片超声成像结果根据空间扫查位置排列，并以三维体图像进行展示，确定出材料内部的缺陷位置及外轮廓信息。相比全矩阵数据全聚焦方法，本发明的优势在于提出了一种新的阵列信号采集方式，可以利用更少的数据完成超声三维成像，节省扫查时间，提高了检测效率。

titles.text: 一种基于确定性测量矩阵的压缩感知超声成像方法
Compressed sensing ultrasonic imaging method based on deterministic measurement matrix

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种基于确定性测量矩阵的压缩感知超声成像方法，属于超声成像技术领域。该方法包括：对超声阵列接收到的回波信号进行处理，得到所需要的超声回波信号x；构造确定性测量矩阵，即二元稀疏块对角矩阵BSBD对超声回波信号进行压缩采样，得到测量信号y；选取离散余弦变换DCT作为稀疏字典Ψ，对超声回波信号x进行稀疏表示；通过计算得到二元稀疏块对角矩阵BSBD和稀疏字典Ψ之间的相干系数μ；利用重构算法求解最优化问题，恢复出原始超声信号利用原始超声信号进行波束合成并最终成像；本发明能够显著提高超声信号测量效率，并且硬件实现简单，能够对超声信号进行快速、近似最优的重构。

The invention relates to a compressed sensing ultrasonic imaging method based on a deterministic measurement matrix, and belongs to the technical field of ultrasonic imaging. The method comprises the following steps: processing the echo signals received by the ultrasonic array to obtain required ultrasonic echo signals x; constructing a deterministic measurement matrix, namely, a binary sparse block diagonal matrix BSBD (binary sparse block diagonal) for carrying out compression sampling on an ultrasonic echo signal to obtain a measurement signal y; selecting Discrete Cosine Transform (DCT) as a sparse dictionary psi, and carrying out sparse representation on the ultrasonic echo signal x; obtaining a coherence coefficient mu between a binary sparse block diagonal matrix BSBD and a sparse dictionary psi through calculation; solving the optimization problem by using a reconstruction algorithm and recovering the original ultrasonic signalUsing the original ultrasonic signalPerforming beam forming and final imaging; the invention can obviously improve the ultrasonic signal measurement efficiency, has simple hardware realization and can carry out quick and approximately optimal reconstruction on the ultrasonic signal.

titles.text: 一种基于确定性测量矩阵的压缩感知超声成像方法
Compressed sensing ultrasonic imaging method based on deterministic measurement matrix

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to a compressed sensing ultrasonic imaging method based on a deterministic measurement matrix, and belongs to the technical field of ultrasonic imaging. The method comprises the following steps: processing echo signals received by an ultrasonic array to obtain a required ultrasonic echo signal x; constructing a deterministic measurement matrix, namely performing compressed sampling on the ultrasonic echo signals by a binary sparse block diagonal matrix BSBD to obtain measurement signals y; selecting discrete cosine transform DCT as a sparse dictionary ψ, and performing sparse representation on an ultrasonic echo signal x; obtaining a coherence coefficient mu between the binary sparse block diagonal matrix BSBD and the sparse dictionary ψ through calculation; solving the optimization problem by using a reconstruction algorithm to recover the original ultrasonic signalUsing raw ultrasound signalsPerforming beam synthesis and finally imaging; the invention can obviously improve the ultrasonic signal measurement efficiency, has simple hardware realization and can reconstruct the ultrasonic signal rapidly and approximately optimally.

titles.text: 一种全聚焦与相控阵双扫查成像方法
Full-focusing and phased array double-scanning imaging method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a full-focusing and phased array double-scanning imaging method, which is characterized in that when phased array and full-focusing double-scanning imaging is carried out, the transmitting and receiving module control and focusing imaging processing of the phased array are simultaneously and parallelly carried out in a full-focusing imaging time period, so that on one hand, mutual interference of two modes is avoided, normal work of the two imaging modes is ensured, on the other hand, the imaging frame rate of the whole system is effectively improved, and the real-time requirement in practical application is met.
本发明提供了一种全聚焦与相控阵双扫查成像方法，在进行相控阵与全聚焦双扫查成像时，通过在全聚焦的成像时间段内同时并行进行相控阵的发射接收模块控制以及聚焦成像处理，一方面避免了两种方式的互相干扰，保证两种成像方式都能正常工作，另一方面又有效的提升整个系统的成像帧率，从而满足实际应用中的实时性要求。

titles.text: 一种全聚焦与相控阵双扫查成像方法
Full-focusing and phased array double-scanning imaging method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供了一种全聚焦与相控阵双扫查成像方法，在进行相控阵与全聚焦双扫查成像时，通过在全聚焦的成像时间段内同时并行进行相控阵的发射接收模块控制以及聚焦成像处理，一方面避免了两种方式的互相干扰，保证两种成像方式都能正常工作，另一方面又有效的提升整个系统的成像帧率，从而满足实际应用中的实时性要求。

The invention provides a full-focusing and phased array double-scanning imaging method, which is characterized in that when phased array and full-focusing double-scanning imaging are carried out, the control of a transmitting and receiving module of the phased array and the focusing imaging processing are simultaneously carried out in parallel in the full-focusing imaging time period, so that the mutual interference of two modes is avoided, the normal operation of the two imaging modes is ensured, the imaging frame rate of the whole system is effectively improved, and the real-time requirement in practical application is met.

titles.text: 一种基于正交基线性表示测量矩阵的压缩感知超声成像方法
Compressed sensing ultrasonic imaging method based on orthogonal basis linear representation measurement matrix

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to a compressive sensing ultrasonic imaging method based on an orthogonal basis linear representation measurement matrix, and belongs to the technical field of ultrasonic imaging. The method comprises the following steps: processing the echo signals received by the ultrasonic array to obtain required ultrasonic echo signals x; constructing a measurement matrix, namely, an orthogonal basis linear representation matrix OBLR (on-board echo laser) performs compression sampling on the ultrasonic echo signal to obtain a measurement signal y; selecting Discrete Cosine Transform (DCT) as a sparse dictionary psi, and carrying out sparse representation on the ultrasonic echo signal x; obtaining a coherence coefficient mu between an orthogonal basis linear representation matrix OBLR and a sparse dictionary psi through calculation; solving the optimization problem by using a reconstruction algorithm and recovering the original ultrasonic signalUsing the original ultrasonic signalPerforming beam forming and final imaging; book (I)The invention can obviously improve the measurement efficiency of the ultrasonic signals and can carry out rapid and approximately optimal reconstruction on the ultrasonic signals.

本发明涉及一种基于正交基线性表示测量矩阵的压缩感知超声成像方法，属于超声成像技术领域。该方法包括：对超声阵列接收到的回波信号进行处理，得到所需要的超声回波信号x；构造测量矩阵，即正交基线性表示矩阵OBLR对超声回波信号进行压缩采样，得到测量信号y；选取离散余弦变换DCT作为稀疏字典Ψ，对超声回波信号x进行稀疏表示；通过计算得到正交基线性表示矩阵OBLR和稀疏字典Ψ之间的相干系数μ；利用重构算法求解最优化问题，恢复出原始超声信号利用原始超声信号进行波束合成并最终成像；本发明能够显著提高超声信号测量效率，能够对超声信号进行快速、近似最优的重构。

titles.text: 一种基于正交基线性表示测量矩阵的压缩感知超声成像方法
Compressed sensing ultrasonic imaging method based on orthogonal basis linear representation measurement matrix

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to a compressive sensing ultrasonic imaging method based on an orthogonal basis linear representation measurement matrix, and belongs to the technical field of ultrasonic imaging. The method comprises the following steps: processing echo signals received by an ultrasonic array to obtain a required ultrasonic echo signal x; constructing a measurement matrix, namely compressing and sampling an ultrasonic echo signal by an orthogonal basis linear representation matrix (OBLR) to obtain a measurement signal (y); selecting discrete cosine transform DCT as a sparse dictionary ψ, and performing sparse representation on an ultrasonic echo signal x; obtaining a coherence coefficient mu between an orthogonal basis linear representation matrix OBLR and a sparse dictionary psi through calculation; solving the optimization problem by using a reconstruction algorithm to recover the original ultrasonic signalUsing raw ultrasound signalsPerforming beam synthesis and finally imaging; the invention can obviously improve the ultrasonic signal measurement efficiency and can reconstruct the ultrasonic signal rapidly and approximately optimally.

titles.text: 超声平面波复合成像方法、装置及存储介质
Ultrasonic plane wave composite imaging method, device and storage medium

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供的超声平面波成像方法、装置及存储介质，通过对自然图像进行图像处理，得到与真实超声图像相近但数量庞大的超声仿真图像，利用这海量的超声仿真图像对深度学习网络进行训练，将满足条件的训练模型应用到真实的小规模超声数据集上进行迁移学习，得到鲁棒性强泛化性高的实用模型；使用3个角度的低质量平面波超声图像，通过训练好的深度学习网络，直接生成与多角度复合成像得到的图像图像质量一致甚至更高的超声图像，最大程度上保留平面波超声成像成像速度快帧率高的优势。解决了目前基于深度学习的超声平面波成像方法中存在的训练数据少、存在过拟合现象，无法得到鲁棒性强、泛化性高的实用模型的问题。

According to the ultrasonic plane wave imaging method, the ultrasonic plane wave imaging device and the storage medium, the natural image is subjected to image processing to obtain the ultrasonic simulation images which are similar to the real ultrasonic images but are huge in quantity, the massive ultrasonic simulation images are used for training the deep learning network, the training model meeting the conditions is applied to the real small-scale ultrasonic data set for transfer learning, and the practical model with strong robustness and high generalization is obtained; the low-quality plane wave ultrasonic images at 3 angles are used, and the ultrasonic images with the same quality as or even higher quality than the image obtained by multi-angle compound imaging are directly generated through a trained deep learning network, so that the advantages of high imaging speed and high frame rate of the plane wave ultrasonic imaging are retained to the maximum extent. The method solves the problems that the existing ultrasonic plane wave imaging method based on deep learning has less training data, overfitting phenomenon and can not obtain a practical model with strong robustness and high generalization.

titles.text: 超声平面波复合成像方法、装置及存储介质
Ultrasonic plane wave composite imaging method, device and storage medium

abstracts.paragraph_markup: According to the ultrasonic plane wave imaging method, the device and the storage medium, the natural images are subjected to image processing to obtain the ultrasonic simulation images which are similar to the real ultrasonic images but huge in quantity, the massive ultrasonic simulation images are utilized to train a deep learning network, a training model meeting the conditions is applied to a real small-scale ultrasonic data set to carry out migration learning, and a practical model with high robustness is obtained; the low-quality plane wave ultrasonic images with 3 angles are used, an ultrasonic image with the image quality consistent with or even higher than that of the image obtained by multi-angle composite imaging is directly generated through a trained deep learning network, and the advantage of high imaging speed and high frame rate of the plane wave ultrasonic imaging is reserved to the greatest extent. The method solves the problems that the existing ultrasonic plane wave imaging method based on deep learning has few training data and over-fitting phenomenon, and a practical model with strong robustness and high generalization can not be obtained.

本发明提供的超声平面波成像方法、装置及存储介质，通过对自然图像进行图像处理，得到与真实超声图像相近但数量庞大的超声仿真图像，利用这海量的超声仿真图像对深度学习网络进行训练，将满足条件的训练模型应用到真实的小规模超声数据集上进行迁移学习，得到鲁棒性强泛化性高的实用模型；使用3个角度的低质量平面波超声图像，通过训练好的深度学习网络，直接生成与多角度复合成像得到的图像图像质量一致甚至更高的超声图像，最大程度上保留平面波超声成像成像速度快帧率高的优势。解决了目前基于深度学习的超声平面波成像方法中存在的训练数据少、存在过拟合现象，无法得到鲁棒性强、泛化性高的实用模型的问题。

titles.text: 一种基于HRTF-PSO-FCM的无人机侦察视觉信息可听化方法
HRTF-PSO-FCM-based unmanned aerial vehicle reconnaissance visual information audibility method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及基于HRTF‑PSO‑FCM的无人机侦察视觉信息可听化方法，是一种对无人机侦察方向的分布式视觉信息实现可听化的算法实现，属于目标追踪与机器学习领域，其特征在于采用如下步骤：(1)计算更新隶属度；(2)计算更新适应度；(3)更新每个粒子的速度；(4)更新每个粒子的位置；(5)进行灰度变换；(6)确定图像与声音的映射关系。本设计采用PSO‑FCM算法很好的将背景与信息主体相分离，极大加快主要信息的图像向声音的转换的过程，提高系统效率，促进实时性转换。采用声音的频率、响度和音长特征进行编码，有利于将图像信息的多维空间信息进行表示，提高图像信息转化为声音信息的辨识能力。

The invention relates to an unmanned aerial vehicle reconnaissance visual information audibility method based on HRTF-PSO-FCM, which is an algorithm implementation for realizing audibility of distributed visual information of an unmanned aerial vehicle reconnaissance direction, belongs to the field of target tracking and machine learning, and is characterized by comprising the following steps of: (1) calculating and updating membership degrees; (2) calculating and updating fitness; (3) updating the velocity of each particle; (4) updating the position of each particle; (5) carrying out gray level conversion; (6) and determining the mapping relation of the image and the sound. The design adopts the PSO-FCM algorithm to well separate the background from the information main body, greatly quickens the process of converting the image of the main information into the sound, improves the system efficiency and promotes the real-time conversion. The frequency, loudness and duration characteristics of the sound are adopted for coding, so that the multi-dimensional space information of the image information can be represented, and the identification capability of converting the image information into the sound information is improved.

titles.text: 一种基于HRTF-PSO-FCM的无人机侦察视觉信息可听化方法

The invention relates to an unmanned aerial vehicle reconnaissance visual information audibility method based on HRTF-PSO-FCM, which is an algorithm implementation for realizing audibility of distributed visual information of an unmanned aerial vehicle reconnaissance direction, belongs to the field of target tracking and machine learning, and is characterized by comprising the following steps of: (1) calculating and updating membership degrees; (2) calculating and updating fitness; (3) updating the velocity of each particle; (4) updating the position of each particle; (5) carrying out gray level conversion; (6) and determining the mapping relation of the image and the sound. The design adopts the PSO-FCM algorithm to well separate the background from the information main body, greatly quickens the process of converting the image of the main information into the sound, improves the system efficiency and promotes the real-time conversion. The frequency, loudness and duration characteristics of the sound are adopted for coding, so that the multi-dimensional space information of the image information can be represented, and the identification capability of converting the image information into the sound information is improved.

titles.text: Method and device for determining fetus section based on ultrasonic dynamic image
基于超声动态图像的胎儿切面的确定方法及装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于超声动态图像的胎儿切面的确定方法及装置，该方法包括：将获取到的连续多帧胎儿超声图像中每帧胎儿超声图像依次输入预先确定出的特征检测模型中进行分析；获取特征检测模型依次输出的分析结果，作为每帧胎儿超声图像的特征信息；根据每帧胎儿超声图像的部位特征的类别以及该胎儿超声图像的结构特征的类别确定该胎儿超声图像对应的切面。可见，实施本发明通过获取连续多帧胎儿超声图像的部位特征以及结构特征，并结合胎儿超声图像的部位特征以及结构特征，确定胎儿超声图像的切面，能够提高胎儿超声图像的切面的确定准确性，即能够提升胎儿超声图像的切面的标准化程度；还能够提高胎儿超声图像的切面的确定效率。

The invention discloses a method and a device for determining a fetal section based on an ultrasonic dynamic image, wherein the method comprises the following steps: sequentially inputting each frame of fetal ultrasound image in the obtained continuous multi-frame fetal ultrasound images into a predetermined characteristic detection model for analysis; obtaining analysis results sequentially output by the characteristic detection model as characteristic information of each frame of fetal ultrasound image; and determining a section corresponding to the fetal ultrasonic image according to the type of the position characteristics of each frame of fetal ultrasonic image and the type of the structural characteristics of the fetal ultrasonic image. Therefore, by acquiring the position characteristics and the structural characteristics of continuous multi-frame fetal ultrasonic images and combining the position characteristics and the structural characteristics of the fetal ultrasonic images, the section of the fetal ultrasonic images is determined, the accuracy of determining the section of the fetal ultrasonic images can be improved, and the standardization degree of the section of the fetal ultrasonic images can be improved; the determination efficiency of the section of the fetal ultrasonic image can be improved.

titles.text: 基于超声动态图像的胎儿切面的确定方法及装置
Method and device for determining fetal section based on ultrasonic dynamic image

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于超声动态图像的胎儿切面的确定方法及装置，该方法包括：将获取到的连续多帧胎儿超声图像中每帧胎儿超声图像依次输入预先确定出的特征检测模型中进行分析；获取特征检测模型依次输出的分析结果，作为每帧胎儿超声图像的特征信息；根据每帧胎儿超声图像的部位特征的类别以及该胎儿超声图像的结构特征的类别确定该胎儿超声图像对应的切面。可见，实施本发明通过获取连续多帧胎儿超声图像的部位特征以及结构特征，并结合胎儿超声图像的部位特征以及结构特征，确定胎儿超声图像的切面，能够提高胎儿超声图像的切面的确定准确性，即能够提升胎儿超声图像的切面的标准化程度；还能够提高胎儿超声图像的切面的确定效率。

The invention discloses a method and a device for determining a fetal section based on an ultrasonic dynamic image, wherein the method comprises the following steps: sequentially inputting each frame of fetal ultrasonic image in the obtained continuous multi-frame fetal ultrasonic images into a predetermined characteristic detection model for analysis; acquiring analysis results sequentially output by the feature detection model, and taking the analysis results as feature information of each frame of fetal ultrasonic image; and determining a section corresponding to the fetal ultrasonic image according to the category of the part characteristic of each frame of the fetal ultrasonic image and the category of the structural characteristic of the fetal ultrasonic image. Therefore, by acquiring the position features and the structural features of the continuous multi-frame fetal ultrasonic image and combining the position features and the structural features of the fetal ultrasonic image, the method and the device can determine the section of the fetal ultrasonic image, can improve the determination accuracy of the section of the fetal ultrasonic image, namely can improve the standardization degree of the section of the fetal ultrasonic image; the determination efficiency of the tangential plane of the fetal ultrasound image can also be improved.

titles.text: 一种基于声波的图像对抗样本生成方法及系统
Image countermeasure sample generation method and system based on sound waves

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses an image countermeasure sample generation method and system based on sound waves, which creatively proposes to use sound waves to construct an image countermeasure sample suitable for a physical world by utilizing the vulnerability of an inertial sensor and a deep learning algorithm in the existing machine vision system so as to deceive the machine vision system. Compared with the existing image countermeasure sample construction method based on the digital domain, the image countermeasure sample constructed by the method has stronger applicability in the real physical world; compared with the existing image countermeasure sample construction method based on the physical domain, the method provided by the invention does not need to modify the appearance of the object or inject light into the camera, and has better concealment.

本发明公开了一种基于声波的图像对抗样本生成方法及系统，该方法利用现有机器视觉系统中惯性传感器和深度学习算法的脆弱性，创新性地提出使用声波构造适用于物理世界的图像对抗样本，从而欺骗机器视觉系统。相比于现有基于数字域的图像对抗样本构造方法，本发明方法构造的图像对抗样本在真实物理世界中具有更强的适用性；相比于现有基于物理域的图像对抗样本构造方法，本发明方法无需修改物体的外表或向摄像头中注入光线，具有更好的隐蔽性。

titles.text: Ultrasound imaging by sparse sampling and associated devices, systems, and methods
通过稀疏采样进行的超声成像和相关联的设备、系统和方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 提供了用于通过稀疏采样进行超声成像的系统、设备和方法。在一个实施例中，超声成像系统包括超声换能器元件的阵列、电子电路和波束形成器，所述电子电路与超声换能器元件的所述阵列通信并被配置为选择包括多个邻接的超声换能器元件和至少一个非邻接的超声换能器元件的所述阵列的第一接收孔径，所述波束形成器与所述电子电路通信。所述第一接收孔径的每个超声换能器元件被配置为接收反射的超声回波并生成表示成像数据的电信号。所述波束形成器被配置为：接收由所述第一接收孔径生成的所述电信号，并且对由所述邻接的超声换能器元件生成的所述电信号和由所述至少一个非邻接的超声换能器元件生成的所述电信号施加不同的权重。

Systems, devices, and methods for ultrasound imaging with sparse sampling are provided. In one embodiment, an ultrasound imaging system includes an array of ultrasound transducer elements, electronic circuitry in communication with the array of ultrasound transducer elements and configured to select a first receive aperture of the array comprising a plurality of contiguous ultrasound transducer elements and at least one non-contiguous ultrasound transducer element, and a beamformer in communication with the electronic circuitry. Each ultrasonic transducer element of the first receive aperture is configured to receive a reflected ultrasonic echo and generate an electrical signal representative of imaging data. The beamformer is configured to: receive the electrical signal generated by the first receive aperture and apply different weights to the electrical signal generated by the abutting ultrasound transducer element and the electrical signal generated by the at least one non-abutting ultrasound transducer element.

titles.text: 通过稀疏采样进行的超声成像和相关联的设备、系统和方法
Ultrasound imaging by sparse sampling and associated devices, systems, and methods

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Systems, devices, and methods for ultrasound imaging through sparse sampling are provided. In one embodiment, an ultrasound imaging system includes an array of ultrasound transducer elements, electronic circuitry in communication with the array of ultrasound transducer elements and configured to select a first receive aperture of the array including a plurality of contiguous ultrasound transducer elements and at least one non-contiguous ultrasound transducer element, and a beamformer in communication with the electronic circuitry. Each ultrasound transducer element of the first receive aperture is configured to receive reflected ultrasound echoes and generate electrical signals representing imaging data. The beamformer is configured to: the electrical signals generated by the first receive aperture are received and different weights are applied to the electrical signals generated by the adjacent ultrasound transducer elements and the electrical signals generated by the at least one non-adjacent ultrasound transducer element.

提供了用于通过稀疏采样进行超声成像的系统、设备和方法。在一个实施例中，超声成像系统包括超声换能器元件的阵列、电子电路和波束形成器，所述电子电路与超声换能器元件的所述阵列通信并被配置为选择包括多个邻接的超声换能器元件和至少一个非邻接的超声换能器元件的所述阵列的第一接收孔径，所述波束形成器与所述电子电路通信。所述第一接收孔径的每个超声换能器元件被配置为接收反射的超声回波并生成表示成像数据的电信号。所述波束形成器被配置为：接收由所述第一接收孔径生成的所述电信号，并且对由所述邻接的超声换能器元件生成的所述电信号和由所述至少一个非邻接的超声换能器元件生成的所述电信号施加不同的权重。

titles.text: 超声方法和装置
Ultrasound method and apparatus

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 所描述的各方面和实施例提供了一种超声方法、超声装置以及可操作以执行该方法的计算机产品。该超声方法包括：配置两个或多个分离的超声发射器以将信号发射至重合区域；配置接收阵列，以在发射信号与位于重合区域内的介质进行相互作用之后接收表示来自两个或多个发射器中每一个的发射信号的波前；分析每个接收到的波前以确定两个或多个分离的超声发射器中每一个的相对空间位置；以及在发射信号与位于重合区域内的介质进行相互作用之后，使用两个或多个分离的超声发射器中每一个的确定的相对空间位置来对来自两个或多个发射器中每一个且在接收阵列处接收的波前进行相干信号组合。因此，在一些实施例中，该方法通过提供一种在系统中准确地定位换能器的鲁棒方法来提供多换能器超声成像系统，以便对最终图像进行波束形成。所描述的方法和装置可以在分辨率、深度穿透、对比度和信噪比(SNR)方面改善成像质量。

The described aspects and embodiments provide an ultrasound method, an ultrasound apparatus, and a computer product operable to perform the method. The ultrasonic method comprises the following steps: configuring two or more separate ultrasound transmitters to transmit signals to the coincident regions; configuring a receiving array to receive a wavefront representing the transmitted signal from each of the two or more transmitters after the transmitted signal has interacted with the medium located within the coincidence region; analyzing each received wavefront to determine the relative spatial location of each of the two or more separate ultrasound transmitters; and using the determined relative spatial location of each of the two or more separate ultrasound transmitters to coherently signal combine wavefronts received at the receive array from each of the two or more transmitters after the transmit signals interact with the medium located within the coincidence region. Thus, in some embodiments, the method provides a multi-transducer ultrasound imaging system by providing a robust method of accurately positioning the transducers in the system for beamforming the final image. The described methods and apparatus may improve imaging quality in terms of resolution, depth penetration, contrast, and signal-to-noise ratio (SNR).

titles.text: 超声方法和装置
Ultrasound method and apparatus

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The described aspects and embodiments provide an ultrasound method, an ultrasound apparatus, and a computer product operable to perform the method. The ultrasonic method comprises the following steps: configuring two or more separate ultrasound transmitters to transmit signals to the coincident regions; configuring a receive array to receive a wavefront representing a transmitted signal from each of two or more transmitters after the transmitted signal interacts with a medium located within the region of coincidence; analyzing each received wavefront to determine a relative spatial location of each of two or more separate ultrasound transmitters; and using the determined relative spatial position of each of the two or more separate ultrasonic transmitters to coherently combine the wave fronts received at the receive array from each of the two or more transmitters after the transmitted signals interact with the medium located within the region of coincidence. Thus, in some embodiments, the method provides a multi-transducer ultrasound imaging system by providing a robust method of accurately positioning transducers in the system for beamforming the final image. The described methods and apparatus may improve imaging quality in terms of resolution, depth penetration, contrast, and signal-to-noise ratio (SNR).
