titles.text: Metadata generation for multiple object types
针对多个对象类型的元数据生成

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 元数据计算装置(56)包括主机接口(68)、存储接口(60)以及一个或多个处理器(64)。主机接口被配置为通过计算机网络(28)与一个或多个远程主机(24)通信。存储接口被配置为与一个或多个存储设备(44)的一个或多个非易失性存储器(52)通信。处理器被配置为：管理在非易失性存储器中，对媒体对象的本地存储或取回；计算针对多个媒体对象的元数据，该多个媒体对象被存储在存储设备上、或在去往存储在存储设备上的途中，其中媒体对象具有多个媒体类型，其中所计算的元数据标记多个媒体类型之中的至少两个不同媒体类型的媒体对象中的目标特征；以及在非易失性存储器中存储标记该至少两个不同媒体类型中所找到的目标特征的元数据，以用于由主机使用。

The metadata computation device (56) includes a host interface (68), a storage interface (60), and one or more processors (64). The host interface is configured to communicate with one or more remote hosts (24) over a computer network (28). The storage interface is configured to communicate with one or more non-volatile memories (52) of one or more storage devices (44). The processor is configured to: managing local storage or retrieval of media objects in non-volatile memory; calculating metadata for a plurality of media objects stored on or en route to a storage device, wherein the media objects have a plurality of media types, wherein the calculated metadata tags target features in media objects of at least two different media types among the plurality of media types; and storing metadata in non-volatile memory marking the target features found in the at least two different media types for use by the host.

titles.text: Metadata generation for multiple object types
针对多个对象类型的元数据生成

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 元数据计算装置(56)包括主机接口(68)、存储接口(60)以及一个或多个处理器(64)。主机接口被配置为通过计算机网络(28)与一个或多个远程主机(24)通信。存储接口被配置为与一个或多个存储设备(44)的一个或多个非易失性存储器(52)通信。处理器被配置为：管理在非易失性存储器中，对媒体对象的本地存储或取回；计算针对多个媒体对象的元数据，该多个媒体对象被存储在存储设备上、或在去往存储在存储设备上的途中，其中媒体对象具有多个媒体类型，其中所计算的元数据标记多个媒体类型之中的至少两个不同媒体类型的媒体对象中的目标特征；以及在非易失性存储器中存储标记该至少两个不同媒体类型中所找到的目标特征的元数据，以用于由主机使用。

The metadata computing device (56) includes a host interface (68), a storage interface (60), and one or more processors (64). The host interface is configured to communicate with one or more remote hosts (24) over a computer network (28). The storage interface is configured to communicate with one or more non-volatile memories (52) of one or more storage devices (44). The processor is configured to: managing local storage or retrieval of media objects in non-volatile memory; calculating metadata for a plurality of media objects stored on or en route to a storage device, wherein the media objects have a plurality of media types, wherein the calculated metadata marks target features in media objects of at least two different media types among the plurality of media types; and storing, in the non-volatile memory, metadata marking the target feature found in the at least two different media types for use by the host computer.

titles.text: Metadata generation at storage edges
存储边缘处的元数据生成

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 用于在数据处理系统(20、90)的存储设备(44、114)中使用的控制器(56)包括主机接口(68)、存储器接口(60)以及一个或多个处理器(64)。主机接口被配置为通过计算机网络(28、98)来与数据处理系统的一个或多个远程主机(24、102)进行通信。存储器接口被配置为与存储设备的非易失性存储器(52)本地通信。一个或多个处理器被配置为管理在非易失性存储器处的媒体对象的本地存储或取回(80)并且选择性地计算元数据(84)，元数据限定了在非易失性存储器中存储的或将要存储的媒体对象的内容特性。

A controller (56) for use in a storage device (44, 114) of a data processing system (20, 90) includes a host interface (68), a memory interface (60), and one or more processors (64). The host interface is configured to communicate with one or more remote hosts (24, 102) of the data processing system over a computer network (28, 98). The memory interface is configured to communicate locally with a non-volatile memory (52) of the storage device. The one or more processors are configured to manage local storage or retrieval (80) of the media object at the non-volatile memory and to selectively calculate metadata (84) defining content characteristics of the media object stored or to be stored in the non-volatile memory.

titles.text: Ultrahigh sound speed target imaging method
一种超高音速目标成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开一种超高音速目标成像方法，真实可靠、简单易行。本发明方法，包括：(10)亚音速目标数据处理：将实测亚音速目标总回波数据处理并保存到各帧的二维采样矩阵中；(20)亚音速目标运动一维距离成像：提取两帧回波数据分别到二维矩阵中，通过IFFT变换和图像拼接，得到两帧运动距离像；(30)亚音速目标静止成像：对目标回波进行速度补偿，再次通过IFFT变换和像拼接，得到亚音速目标静止一维距离距离像；(40)等效超高音速运动一维距离像：根据高速目标信息等效出两帧的超高音速目标运动一维距离像；(50)超高音速目标静止一维距离成像：对超高音速目标回波作速度补偿，IFFT变换和像拼接，得到静止一维距离像。

The invention discloses an ultrahigh sound speed target imaging method which is real, reliable, simple and feasible. The method comprises the following steps: (10) processing subsonic target data: processing and storing the actually measured subsonic target total echo data into a two-dimensional sampling matrix of each frame; (20) and (3) moving one-dimensional distance imaging of the subsonic target: extracting two frames of echo data to be respectively sent to a two-dimensional matrix, and obtaining two frames of motion distance images through IFFT transformation and image splicing; (30) subsonic target still imaging: carrying out speed compensation on the target echo, and obtaining a still one-dimensional distance image of the subsonic target through IFFT conversion and image splicing again; (40) equivalent hypersonic motion one-dimensional distance image: equivalent two frames of ultrahigh sound speed target motion one-dimensional distance images according to the high speed target information; (50) static one-dimensional distance imaging of the hypersonic target: and performing speed compensation, IFFT (inverse fast Fourier transform) conversion and image splicing on the echo of the hypersonic target to obtain a static one-dimensional distance image.

titles.text: Ultrahigh sound speed target imaging method
一种超高音速目标成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开一种超高音速目标成像方法，真实可靠、简单易行。本发明方法，包括：(10)亚音速目标数据处理：将实测亚音速目标总回波数据处理并保存到各帧的二维采样矩阵中；(20)亚音速目标运动一维距离成像：提取两帧回波数据分别到二维矩阵中，通过IFFT变换和图像拼接，得到两帧运动距离像；(30)亚音速目标静止成像：对目标回波进行速度补偿，再次通过IFFT变换和像拼接，得到亚音速目标静止一维距离距离像；(40)等效超高音速运动一维距离像：根据高速目标信息等效出两帧的超高音速目标运动一维距离像；(50)超高音速目标静止一维距离成像：对超高音速目标回波作速度补偿，IFFT变换和像拼接，得到静止一维距离像。

The invention discloses an ultrahigh sound speed target imaging method which is real, reliable, simple and feasible. The method comprises the following steps: (10) processing subsonic target data: processing and storing the actually measured subsonic target total echo data into a two-dimensional sampling matrix of each frame; (20) and (3) moving one-dimensional distance imaging of the subsonic target: extracting two frames of echo data to be respectively sent to a two-dimensional matrix, and obtaining two frames of motion distance images through IFFT transformation and image splicing; (30) subsonic target still imaging: carrying out speed compensation on the target echo, and obtaining a still one-dimensional distance image of the subsonic target through IFFT conversion and image splicing again; (40) equivalent hypersonic motion one-dimensional distance image: equivalent two frames of ultrahigh sound speed target motion one-dimensional distance images according to the high speed target information; (50) static one-dimensional distance imaging of the hypersonic target: and performing speed compensation, IFFT (inverse fast Fourier transform) conversion and image splicing on the echo of the hypersonic target to obtain a static one-dimensional distance image.

titles.text: Storage aggregator controller with metadata computation control
具有元数据计算控制的存储聚合器控制器

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本公开描述了一种具有元数据计算控制的存储聚合器控制器，该存储聚合器控制器经由主机接口、通过计算机网络与一个或多个远程主机通信，并且还经由存储设备接口与多个本地存储设备通信，该多个本地存储设备与(多个)远程主机分开并且具有相应的非易失性存储器。存储聚合器控制器管理本地存储设备用于存储或取回媒体对象。存储聚合器控制器还在存储设备中的一个或多个存储设备的聚合器控制电路系统或存储设备控制器处管控元数据的选择性计算，该元数据限定从多个存储设备取回的媒体对象的内容特点、或限定通过计算机网络从一个或多个主机接收以供存储在多个存储设备中的媒体对象的内容特点。

The present disclosure describes a storage aggregator controller with metadata computation control that communicates with one or more remote hosts over a computer network via a host interface and also communicates with a plurality of local storage devices, separate from the remote host(s) and having corresponding non-volatile memory, via a storage device interface. The storage aggregator controller manages the local storage devices for storing or retrieving media objects. The storage aggregator controller also governs the selective computation of metadata defining content characteristics of media objects retrieved from the plurality of storage devices, or defining content characteristics of media objects received from one or more hosts over a computer network for storage in the plurality of storage devices, at aggregator control circuitry or storage device controllers of one or more of the storage devices.

titles.text: 具有元数据计算控制的存储聚合器控制器
Storage aggregator controller with metadata computation control

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present disclosure describes a storage aggregator controller with metadata computing control that communicates with one or more remote hosts over a computer network via a host interface and also communicates with a plurality of local storage devices separate from the remote host(s) and having corresponding nonvolatile memory via a storage device interface. The storage aggregator controller manages the local storage device for storing or retrieving media objects. The storage aggregator controller also manages selective computation of metadata at the aggregator control circuitry or storage device controller of one or more of the storage devices defining content characteristics of media objects retrieved from the plurality of storage devices or defining content characteristics of media objects received over the computer network from one or more hosts for storage in the plurality of storage devices.

本公开描述了一种具有元数据计算控制的存储聚合器控制器，该存储聚合器控制器经由主机接口、通过计算机网络与一个或多个远程主机通信，并且还经由存储设备接口与多个本地存储设备通信，该多个本地存储设备与(多个)远程主机分开并且具有相应的非易失性存储器。存储聚合器控制器管理本地存储设备用于存储或取回媒体对象。存储聚合器控制器还在存储设备中的一个或多个存储设备的聚合器控制电路系统或存储设备控制器处管控元数据的选择性计算，该元数据限定从多个存储设备取回的媒体对象的内容特点、或限定通过计算机网络从一个或多个主机接收以供存储在多个存储设备中的媒体对象的内容特点。

titles.text: 3D ultrasound imaging with wide focused transmit beams at high display frame rates
利用宽聚焦发射波束以高显示帧速率进行3D超声成像

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 超声系统以高显示帧速率产生3D图像。利用平面波或发散发射波束扫描体积区域以随着每个发射事件而声穿透大部分或者甚至整个体积区域。为了避免在方位角和仰角维度上采集到杂波信号，以在仰角和方位角方向中间的角度发射平面波或发散波束。通过以均为仰角和方位角方向两者的组合的多个不同角度发射平面波或发散波束，在得到的复合图像中减少了旁瓣杂波。

Ultrasound systems produce 3D images at high display frame rates. A volumetric region is scanned with a plane wave or diverging transmit beam to insonify a majority or even the entire volumetric region with each transmit event. To avoid clutter signals being collected in both the azimuth and elevation dimensions, a plane wave or diverging beam is transmitted at an angle intermediate to the elevation and azimuth directions. By transmitting plane waves or diverging beams at a plurality of different angles, both in elevation and in azimuth, a combination of both reduces side lobe clutter in the resulting composite image.

titles.text: System and method for generating metadata describing unstructured data objects at the edge of storage
用于在存储边缘处生成描述非结构化数据对象的元数据的系统和方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 存储控制设备与存储设备耦合、并且远离主机设备而被定位，存储控制设备从主机设备接收媒体对象数据。存储控制设备标识媒体对象数据的类型，并且基于所标识的类型，从多个计算模型之中选择由存储控制设备的计算引擎使用的计算模型。计算引擎使用所选择的计算模型来生成描述媒体对象数据的元数据。元数据被存储在存储设备中，从而使元数据与媒体对象数据分开地从存储设备选择性地可取回。

A storage control device is coupled with the storage device and is located remotely from the host device from which the storage control device receives the media object data. The storage control device identifies a type of the media object data and, based on the identified type, selects a computational model for use by a computational engine of the storage control device from among a plurality of computational models. The calculation engine uses the selected calculation model to generate metadata describing the media object data. The metadata is stored in the storage device such that the metadata is selectively retrievable from the storage device separately from the media object data.

titles.text: Sound intensity sparse measurement high-resolution imaging method based on simulation sound field prior information
一种基于模拟声场先验信息的声强稀疏测量高分辨率成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种基于模拟声场先验信息的声强稀疏测量高分辨率成像方法，首先，对目标声源元件进行结构噪声辐射分析，获取其模拟声强分布的可视化图像；随后提取模拟声场的先验信息包括：声强强点的位置、稀疏矩阵以及稀疏度K；再结合声强强点位置和混合高斯分布模型，完成声强测点的位置设计，并根据设计好的测点位置推导出观测矩阵的数学模型；最后基于稀疏矩阵、观测矩阵和贪婪算法所构成的压缩感知数据处理框架，对声强稀疏测量值进行算法重构，实现高分辨率成像。

The invention relates to a sound intensity sparse measurement high-resolution imaging method based on simulation sound field prior information, which comprises the steps of firstly, carrying out structural noise radiation analysis on a target sound source element to obtain a visual image of simulation sound intensity distribution of the target sound source element; subsequently extracting prior information for the simulated sound field includes: the positions of the sound intensity points, the sparse matrix and the sparsity K; combining the positions of the sound intensity points and the Gaussian mixture distribution model to complete the position design of the sound intensity measuring points, and deducing a mathematical model of an observation matrix according to the designed measuring point positions; and finally, performing algorithm reconstruction on the sound intensity sparse measurement value based on a compressed sensing data processing frame formed by a sparse matrix, an observation matrix and a greedy algorithm to realize high-resolution imaging.

titles.text: Sound intensity sparse measurement high-resolution imaging method based on simulation sound field prior information
一种基于模拟声场先验信息的声强稀疏测量高分辨率成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to a sound intensity sparse measurement high-resolution imaging method based on simulation sound field prior information, which comprises the steps of firstly, carrying out structural noise radiation analysis on a target sound source element to obtain a visual image of simulation sound intensity distribution of the target sound source element; subsequently extracting prior information for the simulated sound field includes: the positions of the sound intensity points, the sparse matrix and the sparsity K; combining the positions of the sound intensity points and the Gaussian mixture distribution model to complete the position design of the sound intensity measuring points, and deducing a mathematical model of an observation matrix according to the designed measuring point positions; and finally, performing algorithm reconstruction on the sound intensity sparse measurement value based on a compressed sensing data processing frame formed by a sparse matrix, an observation matrix and a greedy algorithm to realize high-resolution imaging.

本发明涉及一种基于模拟声场先验信息的声强稀疏测量高分辨率成像方法，首先，对目标声源元件进行结构噪声辐射分析，获取其模拟声强分布的可视化图像；随后提取模拟声场的先验信息包括：声强强点的位置、稀疏矩阵以及稀疏度K；再结合声强强点位置和混合高斯分布模型，完成声强测点的位置设计，并根据设计好的测点位置推导出观测矩阵的数学模型；最后基于稀疏矩阵、观测矩阵和贪婪算法所构成的压缩感知数据处理框架，对声强稀疏测量值进行算法重构，实现高分辨率成像。

titles.text: System and method for projecting and displaying acoustic data
用于投射和显示声学数据的系统和方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 系统可以包括被配置成接收声信号的声学传感器阵列、被配置成发射电磁辐射的照明器、被配置成接收电磁辐射的电磁成像工具、距离测量工具以及处理器。该处理器可以经由照明器照亮目标场景、从电磁成像工具接收代表被照亮场景的电磁图像数据、从声学传感器阵列接收声学数据，以及从距离测量工具接收距离信息。该处理器可以被进一步配置成基于所接收的声学数据和所接收的距离信息来生成场景的声学图像数据，并且生成包括所组合的声学图像数据和电磁图像数据的显示图像。该处理器可以确定各种声音信号在场景内的深度，并且生成场景的表示，其示出了所确定的深度，包括平面图和体积表示。

The system may include an acoustic sensor array configured to receive acoustic signals, an illuminator configured to emit electromagnetic radiation, an electromagnetic imaging tool configured to receive electromagnetic radiation, a distance measurement tool, and a processor. The processor may illuminate a target scene via the illuminator, receive electromagnetic image data representative of the illuminated scene from the electromagnetic imaging tool, receive acoustic data from the acoustic sensor array, and receive range information from the range measurement tool. The processor may be further configured to generate acoustic image data of the scene based on the received acoustic data and the received distance information, and generate a display image including the combined acoustic image data and electromagnetic image data. The processor may determine the depth of various sound signals within the scene and generate a representation of the scene showing the determined depth, including a plan view and a volumetric representation.

titles.text: System and method for representing acoustic features from a target scene
用于表示来自目标场景的声学特征的系统和方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 声学成像系统可以包括声学感测阵列、电磁成像工具、显示器和音频设备。处理器可以从声学传感器阵列和电磁成像工具接收数据，以生成组合了声学图像数据和电磁图像数据的显示图像。系统可以包括从处理器接收音频输出并且向用户输出音频反馈信号的音频设备。音频反馈信号可以表示来自声学场景的声信号。系统可以向用户提供包括声学图像数据的显示图像，并且用户可以选择向音频设备提供对应音频输出的声信号。音频输出和显示图像可以响应于声学感测阵列的指向变化而动态变化，诸如通过改变立体声音频输出进行。

The acoustic imaging system may include an acoustic sensing array, an electromagnetic imaging tool, a display, and an audio device. The processor may receive data from the acoustic sensor array and the electromagnetic imaging tool to generate a display image that combines acoustic image data and electromagnetic image data. The system may include an audio device that receives audio output from the processor and outputs an audio feedback signal to the user. The audio feedback signal may represent an acoustic signal from an acoustic scene. The system may provide a display image including acoustic image data to a user, and the user may select an acoustic signal that provides a corresponding audio output to the audio device. The audio output and display image may be dynamically changed in response to changes in the orientation of the acoustic sensing array, such as by changing the stereo audio output.

titles.text: Transformer state detection method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
变压器状态检测方法、装置、计算机设备和存储介质

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The application relates to a transformer state detection method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: and acquiring acoustic image information of the transformer to be detected, and performing gray level processing on the acoustic image information to obtain a corresponding gray level image to be detected. And extracting the texture characteristic value of the gray image to be detected, verifying the texture characteristic value according to the theoretical characteristic value to generate a verification result, and determining the mechanical state of the transformer to be detected according to the verification result. By adopting the method, the acquisition of the visual acoustic image information of the transformer to be detected and the accurate verification of the texture characteristic value of the corresponding acoustic information are realized, so that the fault or normal state of the transformer to be detected is rapidly distinguished, and the accuracy of the mechanical fault detection result of the transformer is improved.

本申请涉及一种变压器状态检测方法、装置、计算机设备和存储介质。所述方法包括：获取待检测变压器的声学图像信息，并对声学图像信息进行灰度处理，得到对应的待检测灰度图像。提取待检测灰度图像的纹理特征值，并根据理论特征值，对纹理特征值进行校验，生成校验结果，进而根据校验结果，确定待检测变压器的机械状态。采用本方法实现了对待检测变压器的直观声学图像信息的获取，以及对相应声学信息的纹理特征值的精确校验，进而实现对待检测变压器的故障或正常状态的快速区分，提升了对变压器的机械故障检测结果的准确性。

titles.text: Transformer state detection method, device, computer equipment and storage medium
变压器状态检测方法、装置、计算机设备和存储介质

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The application relates to a transformer state detection method, a transformer state detection device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: and acquiring acoustic image information of the transformer to be detected, and carrying out gray processing on the acoustic image information to obtain a corresponding gray image to be detected. And extracting texture characteristic values of the gray level image to be detected, checking the texture characteristic values according to the theoretical characteristic values to generate a checking result, and further determining the mechanical state of the transformer to be detected according to the checking result. By adopting the method, the visual acoustic image information of the transformer to be detected is acquired, the texture characteristic value of the corresponding acoustic information is accurately checked, the fault or normal state of the transformer to be detected is rapidly distinguished, and the accuracy of the mechanical fault detection result of the transformer is improved.

本申请涉及一种变压器状态检测方法、装置、计算机设备和存储介质。所述方法包括：获取待检测变压器的声学图像信息，并对声学图像信息进行灰度处理，得到对应的待检测灰度图像。提取待检测灰度图像的纹理特征值，并根据理论特征值，对纹理特征值进行校验，生成校验结果，进而根据校验结果，确定待检测变压器的机械状态。采用本方法实现了对待检测变压器的直观声学图像信息的获取，以及对相应声学信息的纹理特征值的精确校验，进而实现对待检测变压器的故障或正常状态的快速区分，提升了对变压器的机械故障检测结果的准确性。

titles.text: System and method for tagging and linking acoustic images
用于标记和链接声学图像的系统和方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一些系统包括被配置成接收声信号的声学传感器阵列、被配置成接收电磁辐射的电磁成像工具、被配置成输出方位信息的方位传感器、存储器和处理器。处理器可以从声学传感器阵列接收声学数据，并且根据所接收的声学数据生成声学图像数据。处理器可以从电磁成像工具接收电磁图像数据，并且将生成的声学图像数据和所接收的电磁图像数据进行组合以生成显示图像。处理器可以从方位传感器接收方位信息，并且将显示图像保存在与所接收的方位信息相关联的存储器中。方位信息可以存储在显示图像的元数据中，或者在显示图像内显示。处理器可以被配置成诸如基于与这样的图像相关联的方位信息来链接存储在存储器中的图像。

Some systems include an acoustic sensor array configured to receive acoustic signals, an electromagnetic imaging tool configured to receive electromagnetic radiation, an orientation sensor configured to output orientation information, a memory, and a processor. The processor may receive acoustic data from the acoustic sensor array and generate acoustic image data from the received acoustic data. The processor may receive electromagnetic image data from the electromagnetic imaging tool and combine the generated acoustic image data and the received electromagnetic image data to generate a display image. The processor may receive orientation information from the orientation sensor and save a display image in memory associated with the received orientation information. The orientation information may be stored in metadata of the display image or displayed within the display image. The processor may be configured to link images stored in the memory, such as based on orientation information associated with such images.

titles.text: System and method for analyzing and displaying acoustic data
用于分析和显示声学数据的系统和方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一些系统包括被配置成接收声信号的声学传感器阵列、被配置成接收电磁辐射的电磁成像工具、用户界面、显示器和处理器。处理器可以接收来自电磁成像工具的电磁数据和来自声学传感器阵列的声学数据。处理器可以基于所接收的声学数据生成场景的声学图像数据，生成包括所组合的声学图像数据和电磁图像数据的显示图像，并且在显示器上呈现显示图像。处理器可以从用户界面接收注释输入，并且基于所接收的注释输入来更新显示图像。处理器可以被配置成确定与所接收的声信号相关联的一个或多个声学参数，并且确定与声信号相关联的关键度。用户可以利用所确定的关键度信息或其他所确定的信息来注释显示图像。

Some systems include an acoustic sensor array configured to receive acoustic signals, an electromagnetic imaging tool configured to receive electromagnetic radiation, a user interface, a display, and a processor. The processor may receive electromagnetic data from an electromagnetic imaging tool and acoustic data from an acoustic sensor array. The processor may generate acoustic image data of the scene based on the received acoustic data, generate a display image including the combined acoustic image data and electromagnetic image data, and present the display image on the display. The processor may receive annotation input from the user interface and update the display image based on the received annotation input. The processor may be configured to determine one or more acoustic parameters associated with the received acoustic signal and determine criticality associated with the acoustic signal. The user may annotate the display image with the determined criticality information or other determined information.

titles.text: Systems and methods for detachable and attachable acoustic imaging sensors
用于可拆卸和可附接的声学成像传感器的系统和方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Some systems include an electromagnetic imaging tool configured to receive electromagnetic radiation, a communication interface, a processor in communication with the electromagnetic imaging tool and the communication interface, and a housing. The system may include: a first sensor head having a first plurality of acoustic sensor elements arranged in a first acoustic sensor array. The communication interface may provide communication between the processor and the sensor head via wired or wireless communication. The communication interface may include: a docking port in communication with the processor and configured to removably receive a corresponding docking mechanism of the first sensor head. Some systems may include: a second sensor head having a second plurality of acoustic sensor elements. The second sensor head may be interchangeably connectable to the communication interface and/or the first sensor head.

一些系统包括被配置成接收电磁辐射的电磁成像工具、通信接口、与电磁成像工具和通信接口通信的处理器以及壳体。系统可以包括：第一传感器头，其具有以第一声学传感器阵列布置的第一多个声学传感器元件。通信接口可以经由有线或无线通信提供处理器与传感器头之间的通信。通信接口可以包括：对接端口，其与处理器通信并且被配置成可移除地接收第一传感器头的对应的对接机构。一些系统可以包括：具有第二多个声学传感器元件的第二传感器头。第二传感器头可以可互换地可连接到通信接口和/或第一传感器头。

titles.text: 用于可拆卸和可附接的声学成像传感器的系统和方法
Systems and methods for detachable and attachable acoustic imaging sensors

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一些系统包括被配置成接收电磁辐射的电磁成像工具、通信接口、与电磁成像工具和通信接口通信的处理器以及壳体。系统可以包括：第一传感器头，其具有以第一声学传感器阵列布置的第一多个声学传感器元件。通信接口可以经由有线或无线通信提供处理器与传感器头之间的通信。通信接口可以包括：对接端口，其与处理器通信并且被配置成可移除地接收第一传感器头的对应的对接机构。一些系统可以包括：具有第二多个声学传感器元件的第二传感器头。第二传感器头可以可互换地可连接到通信接口和/或第一传感器头。

Some systems include an electromagnetic imaging tool configured to receive electromagnetic radiation, a communication interface, a processor in communication with the electromagnetic imaging tool and the communication interface, and a housing. The system may include: a first sensor head having a first plurality of acoustic sensor elements arranged in a first acoustic sensor array. The communication interface may provide communication between the processor and the sensor head via wired or wireless communication. The communication interface may include: a docking port in communication with the processor and configured to removably receive a corresponding docking mechanism of the first sensor head. Some systems may include: a second sensor head having a second plurality of acoustic sensor elements. The second sensor head may be interchangeably connectable to the communication interface and/or the first sensor head.

titles.text: Storage edge controller with metadata computation engine
具有元数据计算引擎的存储边缘控制器

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Embodiments described herein provide improved methods and systems for generating metadata for media objects at a compute engine (such as an artificial intelligence engine) within a storage edge controller, and for storing and using such metadata in a data processing system.
本文中所描述的实施例提供了改善的方法和系统，用于在存储边缘控制器内的计算引擎(诸如人工智能引擎)处生成用于媒体对象的元数据，以及用于在数据处理系统中存储并其使用这种元数据。

titles.text: Additive manufacturing laser ultrasonic signal defect imaging method based on waveform separation
一种基于波形分离的增材制造激光超声信号缺陷成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a material increase manufacturing laser ultrasonic signal defect imaging method based on waveform separation, which mainly comprises the following steps: 1. acquiring an original ultrasonic signal of a tested piece; 2. performing wavelet de-noising on an original ultrasonic signal by adopting wavelet decomposition; 3. decomposing the wavelet packet; 4. extracting and reconstructing a surface wave signal or a longitudinal wave signal; 5. normalization processing; 6. performing neighborhood subtraction to obtain a defect echo signal; 7. determining an ellipse cluster boundary; 8. dividing a wave field plane imaging grid; 9. acquiring an actual imaging area; 10. mapping the amplitude of the defect echo signal to an actual imaging area; 11. and (4) ellipse cluster superposition and focusing imaging. The method realizes the acquisition of quantitative information of the defect from the defect echo signal, realizes the synthetic aperture focusing of the wave with specific components, and has good imaging effect and high resolution.

本发明公开了一种基于波形分离的增材制造激光超声信号缺陷成像方法，该方法的主要步骤为：1、获取被测试件的原始超声波信号；2、采用小波分解对原始超声波信号进行小波降噪；3、小波包分解；4、表面波信号或纵波信号的提取和重构；5、归一化处理；6、邻域相减，获取缺陷回波信号；7、确定椭圆簇边界；8、划分波场平面成像网格；9、获取实际的成像区域；10、缺陷回波信号幅值映射至实际的成像区域；11、椭圆簇叠加与聚焦成像。通过该方法实现了从缺陷回波信号中得到缺陷的定量信息，同时实现了对特定成分的波进行合成孔径聚焦，并且成像效果好，分辨率高。

titles.text: 一种基于波形分离的增材制造激光超声信号缺陷成像方法
Additive manufacturing laser ultrasonic signal defect imaging method based on waveform separation

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于波形分离的增材制造激光超声信号缺陷成像方法，该方法的主要步骤为：1、获取被测试件的原始超声波信号；2、采用小波分解对原始超声波信号进行小波降噪；3、小波包分解；4、表面波信号或纵波信号的提取和重构；5、归一化处理；6、邻域相减，获取缺陷回波信号；7、确定椭圆簇边界；8、划分波场平面成像网格；9、获取实际的成像区域；10、缺陷回波信号幅值映射至实际的成像区域；11、椭圆簇叠加与聚焦成像。通过该方法实现了从缺陷回波信号中得到缺陷的定量信息，同时实现了对特定成分的波进行合成孔径聚焦，并且成像效果好，分辨率高。

titles.text: High-precision arc tangent fitting system and ultrasonic imaging device
一种高精度的反正切拟合系统及超声成像装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a high-precision arc tangent fitting system and an ultrasonic imaging device, wherein the system comprises: the lookup table construction module is used for constructing an angle lookup table in the nonlinear model; the parameter calculation module is used for calculating the parameters of the nonlinear model; a basic coefficient calculation module for calculating a basic coefficient; the fitting coefficient calculation module is used for calculating a fitting coefficient of the nonlinear model according to the basic coefficient; and the fitting module is used for fitting the arc tangent value based on the nonlinear model. Compared with the prior art, the invention has the advantages that: 1. compared with the existing polynomial fitting method lower than 3 orders, the method can obtain higher calculation precision; 2. compared with the existing polynomial fitting method lower than 3 orders, the method has the advantages that the calculation complexity is not obviously increased, in addition, the model fitting coefficient of the method can be calculated in advance, and the calculation efficiency is further improved.

本发明公开一种高精度的反正切拟合系统及超声成像装置，其系统包括：查找表构建模块，用于构建非线性模型中的角度查找表；参数计算模块，用于计算非线性模型参数；基础系数计算模块，用于计算基础系数；拟合系数计算模块，用于根据基础系数计算得到非线性模型的拟合系数；拟合模块，用于基于非线性模型对反正切值进行拟合。本发明相对于现有技术优点在于：1、相比于现有低于3阶的多项式拟合方法，本方法可以得到更高的计算精度；2、相比于现有低于3阶的多项式拟合方法，本方法的计算复杂度没有显著增加，此外该方法的模型拟合系数可以提前计算，进一步提高了计算效率。

titles.text: 一种高精度的反正切拟合系统及超声成像装置
High-precision arctangent fitting system and ultrasonic imaging device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a high-precision arctangent fitting system and an ultrasonic imaging device, wherein the system comprises: the lookup table construction module is used for constructing an angle lookup table in the nonlinear model; the parameter calculation module is used for calculating nonlinear model parameters; the basic coefficient calculation module is used for calculating basic coefficients; the fitting coefficient calculation module is used for calculating fitting coefficients of the nonlinear model according to the basic coefficients; and the fitting module is used for fitting the arctangent value based on the nonlinear model. Compared with the prior art, the invention has the advantages that: 1. compared with the existing polynomial fitting method lower than 3 steps, the method can obtain higher calculation accuracy; 2. compared with the existing polynomial fitting method lower than 3 th order, the method has the advantages that the calculation complexity is not remarkably increased, in addition, the model fitting coefficient of the method can be calculated in advance, and the calculation efficiency is further improved.

本发明公开一种高精度的反正切拟合系统及超声成像装置，其系统包括：查找表构建模块，用于构建非线性模型中的角度查找表；参数计算模块，用于计算非线性模型参数；基础系数计算模块，用于计算基础系数；拟合系数计算模块，用于根据基础系数计算得到非线性模型的拟合系数；拟合模块，用于基于非线性模型对反正切值进行拟合。本发明相对于现有技术优点在于：1、相比于现有低于3阶的多项式拟合方法，本方法可以得到更高的计算精度；2、相比于现有低于3阶的多项式拟合方法，本方法的计算复杂度没有显著增加，此外该方法的模型拟合系数可以提前计算，进一步提高了计算效率。

titles.text: Method and device for determining parameters of ultrasonic imaging equipment in cavity based on simulation
基于仿真确定腔内超声成像设备参数的方法及装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a method and a device for determining parameters of an ultrasonic imaging device in a cavity based on simulation, which relate to the field of imaging and are used for determining the size of an object to be imaged; acquiring an optimal aperture mode of the transducer array according to the size and a preset aperture parameter template, wherein the preset aperture parameter template comprises a plurality of preset aperture modes, and each preset aperture mode is the optimal aperture mode determined by aiming at objects to be imaged with different sizes based on a simulation module; receiving a desired imaging resolution; acquiring an optimal frequency mode of the transducer array according to the imaging resolution and a preset frequency parameter template; parameters of the transducer array are adjusted according to the optimal aperture mode and the optimal frequency mode, parameters of the ultrasonic imaging equipment can be directly, rapidly and accurately adjusted, and the cycle flow of processing, trial and error and redesign is greatly shortened.

本发明提供一种基于仿真确定腔内超声成像设备参数的方法及装置，涉及成像领域，通过识别待成像物体的尺寸；根据尺寸和预设的孔径参数模板，获取换能器阵列的最佳孔径模式，预设的孔径参数模板包括有多个预设的孔径模式，每个预设的孔径模式是基于仿真模块针对不同尺寸的待成像物体确定的最佳孔径模式；接收所需的成像分辨率；根据成像分辨率和预设的频率参数模板，获取换能器阵列的最佳频率模式；根据最佳孔径模式和最佳频率模式调节换能器阵列的参数，可以直接迅速准确的调整超声成像设备参数，极大地缩短加工‑试错‑再设计的循环流程。

titles.text: Method and device for determining parameters of intracavity ultrasonic imaging equipment based on simulation
基于仿真确定腔内超声成像设备参数的方法及装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a method and a device for determining parameters of an intracavity ultrasonic imaging device based on simulation, which relate to the field of imaging and are used for identifying the size of an object to be imaged; obtaining an optimal aperture mode of the transducer array according to the size and a preset aperture parameter template, wherein the preset aperture parameter template comprises a plurality of preset aperture modes, and each preset aperture mode is an optimal aperture mode determined for objects to be imaged with different sizes based on a simulation module; receiving a desired imaging resolution; acquiring an optimal frequency mode of the transducer array according to the imaging resolution and a preset frequency parameter template; parameters of the transducer array can be adjusted according to the optimal aperture mode and the optimal frequency mode, parameters of ultrasonic imaging equipment can be directly, rapidly and accurately adjusted, and the cycle flow of processing, trial and error and redesign is greatly shortened.

本发明提供一种基于仿真确定腔内超声成像设备参数的方法及装置，涉及成像领域，通过识别待成像物体的尺寸；根据尺寸和预设的孔径参数模板，获取换能器阵列的最佳孔径模式，预设的孔径参数模板包括有多个预设的孔径模式，每个预设的孔径模式是基于仿真模块针对不同尺寸的待成像物体确定的最佳孔径模式；接收所需的成像分辨率；根据成像分辨率和预设的频率参数模板，获取换能器阵列的最佳频率模式；根据最佳孔径模式和最佳频率模式调节换能器阵列的参数，可以直接迅速准确的调整超声成像设备参数，极大地缩短加工‑试错‑再设计的循环流程。

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging method based on defect multi-feature intelligent extraction and fusion
基于缺陷多特征智能提取与融合的超声成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供了一种基于缺陷多特征智能提取与融合的超声成像方法，包括：将获得的待检测物的三维A扫信号矩阵转换为二维信号矩阵；利用主成分分析对转换得到的二维信号矩阵进行分析，提取信号中最有区分度的k个特征；将所提取的k个特征作为神经网络的输入训练得到多特征融合分类器；利用训练好的分类器进行信号识别，从而得到多特征融合识别结果矩阵，并根据原始的三维A扫信号矩阵中的信号排列方式对识别结果矩阵进行整形使其成像；本发明利用降维机器学习算法智能提取采集的信号矩阵中缺陷特征信息，并利用所提特征信息进行融合成像，使得成像中融合了丰富的缺陷信息，可大幅度改善缺陷成像的信噪比，适合任何超声检测技术的C扫成像。

The invention provides an ultrasonic imaging method based on defect multi-feature intelligent extraction and fusion, which comprises the following steps: converting the obtained three-dimensional A-scanning signal matrix of the object to be detected into a two-dimensional signal matrix; analyzing the two-dimensional signal matrix obtained by conversion by utilizing principal component analysis, and extracting k features with the most discrimination in the signals; using the extracted k features as input training of a neural network to obtain a multi-feature fusion classifier; performing signal identification by using a trained classifier so as to obtain a multi-feature fusion identification result matrix, and shaping the identification result matrix according to a signal arrangement mode in an original three-dimensional A-scanning signal matrix so as to form an image; the invention intelligently extracts the defect characteristic information in the acquired signal matrix by using the dimensionality reduction machine learning algorithm and performs fusion imaging by using the extracted characteristic information, so that abundant defect information is fused in imaging, the signal-to-noise ratio of defect imaging can be greatly improved, and the method is suitable for C-scan imaging of any ultrasonic detection technology.

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging method based on intelligent extraction and fusion of defect multiple features
基于缺陷多特征智能提取与融合的超声成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides an ultrasonic imaging method based on intelligent extraction and fusion of defect multiple features, which comprises the following steps: converting the obtained three-dimensional A-scan signal matrix of the object to be detected into a two-dimensional signal matrix; analyzing the two-dimensional signal matrix obtained by conversion by utilizing principal component analysis, and extracting k features with the most distinguishing degree in the signal; the extracted k features are used as input training of a neural network to obtain a multi-feature fusion classifier; performing signal recognition by using a trained classifier to obtain a multi-feature fusion recognition result matrix, and shaping the recognition result matrix according to a signal arrangement mode in an original three-dimensional A-scan signal matrix to form an image; the invention intelligently extracts the defect characteristic information in the acquired signal matrix by using the dimension reduction machine learning algorithm, and performs fusion imaging by using the extracted characteristic information, so that the imaging fuses rich defect information, the signal-to-noise ratio of the defect imaging can be greatly improved, and the invention is suitable for C-scan imaging of any ultrasonic detection technology.

本发明提供了一种基于缺陷多特征智能提取与融合的超声成像方法，包括：将获得的待检测物的三维A扫信号矩阵转换为二维信号矩阵；利用主成分分析对转换得到的二维信号矩阵进行分析，提取信号中最有区分度的k个特征；将所提取的k个特征作为神经网络的输入训练得到多特征融合分类器；利用训练好的分类器进行信号识别，从而得到多特征融合识别结果矩阵，并根据原始的三维A扫信号矩阵中的信号排列方式对识别结果矩阵进行整形使其成像；本发明利用降维机器学习算法智能提取采集的信号矩阵中缺陷特征信息，并利用所提特征信息进行融合成像，使得成像中融合了丰富的缺陷信息，可大幅度改善缺陷成像的信噪比，适合任何超声检测技术的C扫成像。

titles.text: Acoustic imaging method and system combined with short-time pulse detection
结合短时脉冲检测的声学成像方法和系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种结合短时脉冲检测的声学成像方法和系统，可以捕获到所有脉冲音频信号，在一个较低的云图计算频率下显示所有有价值的音频云图，在不损失连续计算云图效果的同时，做到了CPU降级、功耗降低等优点。其技术方案为：通过音频预处理将最有价值的音频提取出来进行运算，可以增加声学定位的准确性，减少漏检率。此外，通过本发明通过在检测音频数据是否有脉冲的处理中通过只采集一路音频进行计算来节约CPU消耗，由此可以采用性价比更高的CPU，节约成本，降低功耗。另外，可以根据不同的环境噪音，调节脉冲检测中的参数值，来适应不同的测试环境。

The invention discloses an acoustic imaging method and system combined with short-time pulse detection, which can capture all pulse audio signals, display all valuable audio cloud pictures at a lower cloud picture calculation frequency, and realize the advantages of CPU degradation, power consumption reduction and the like while not losing the effect of continuously calculating the cloud pictures. The technical scheme is as follows: the most valuable audio is extracted for operation through audio preprocessing, so that the accuracy of acoustic positioning can be improved, and the omission factor is reduced. In addition, the invention saves the CPU consumption by acquiring only one path of audio for calculation in the process of detecting whether the audio data has pulses, thereby adopting the CPU with higher cost performance, saving the cost and reducing the power consumption. In addition, parameter values in pulse detection can be adjusted according to different environmental noises to adapt to different test environments.

结合短时脉冲检测的声学成像方法和系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses an acoustic imaging method and system combined with short-time pulse detection, which can capture all pulse audio signals, display all valuable audio cloud pictures at a lower cloud picture calculation frequency, and realize the advantages of CPU degradation, power consumption reduction and the like while not losing the effect of continuously calculating the cloud pictures. titles.text: Acoustic imaging detection method based on multi-scale Markov random field
基于多尺度马尔可夫随机场的声学成像探测方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于多尺度马尔可夫随机场的声学成像探测方法，包括如下步骤：首先，构建多尺度声学成像数据马尔可夫随机场模型；其次，结合多尺度马尔可夫随机场模型和水平集模型，构建多尺度马尔科夫随机场‑水平集联合模型；最后，通过多尺度马尔科夫随机场‑水平集联合模型收敛实现声学成像探测，本发明克服了声学成像信息在探测过程中低分辨、高噪声的实质性缺陷。

The invention discloses an acoustic imaging detection method based on a multi-scale Markov random field, which comprises the following steps: firstly, constructing a multi-scale acoustic imaging data Markov random field model; secondly, combining a multi-scale Markov random field model and a level set model to construct a multi-scale Markov random field-level set combined model; and finally, the acoustic imaging detection is realized through the convergence of the multi-scale Markov random field-level set combined model, and the substantial defects of low resolution and high noise of the acoustic imaging information in the detection process are overcome.

titles.text: 基于多尺度马尔可夫随机场的声学成像探测方法
Acoustic imaging detection method based on multi-scale Markov random field

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于多尺度马尔可夫随机场的声学成像探测方法，包括如下步骤：首先，构建多尺度声学成像数据马尔可夫随机场模型；其次，结合多尺度马尔可夫随机场模型和水平集模型，构建多尺度马尔科夫随机场‑水平集联合模型；最后，通过多尺度马尔科夫随机场‑水平集联合模型收敛实现声学成像探测，本发明克服了声学成像信息在探测过程中低分辨、高噪声的实质性缺陷。

The invention discloses an acoustic imaging detection method based on a multi-scale Markov random field, which comprises the following steps: firstly, constructing a multi-scale acoustic imaging data Markov random field model; secondly, constructing a multi-scale Markov random field-level set combined model by combining the multi-scale Markov random field model and the level set model; finally, the acoustic imaging detection is realized through the convergence of the multi-scale Markov random field-level set combined model, and the invention overcomes the substantial defect of low resolution and high noise of acoustic imaging information in the detection process.

titles.text: Novel multi-beam acoustic imaging method and system
一种新型多波束声学成像方法与系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a novel multi-beam acoustic imaging system which comprises a broadband acoustic transducer, a transceiving conversion device, a transmitter, a receiver, an electronic system control module, a signal processing module, a display control module, an interconnection cable and a connector, wherein the display control module is connected with the electronic system control module and the signal processing module, the signal processing module is connected with the receiver, the electronic system control module is connected with the transmitter, the transmitter and the receiver are respectively connected with the transceiving conversion device, and the transceiving conversion device is connected with the broadband acoustic transducer. The invention provides a novel multi-beam acoustic imaging method by arranging a broadband acoustic transducer, a transceiving conversion device, a transmitter, a receiver, an electronic system control module, a signal processing module, a display control module, an interconnection cable and a connector to form an acoustic imaging system and matching the acoustic imaging system.

本发明公开了一种新型多波束声学成像系统，包括宽带声学换能器、收发转换装置、发射机、接收机、电子系统控制模块、信号处理模块、显示控制模块、互联缆和接插件，所述显示控制模块与电子系统控制模块、信号处理模块连接，所述信号处理模块与接收机连接，所述电子系统控制模块与发射机连接，所述发射机、接收机分别与收发转换装置连接，所述收发转换装置与宽带声学换能器连接。本发明通过设置宽带声学换能器、收发转换装置、发射机、接收机、电子系统控制模块、信号处理模块、显示控制模块、互联缆和接插件组成声学成像系统，并配合此系统提出一种新型多波束声学成像方法，整个系统的功耗小，且整体结构体积小，做到手持轻量化设计。

titles.text: Apparatus and method for reproducing spatially extended sound source, or apparatus and method for generating bitstream from spatially extended sound source
再现空间扩展声源的设备与方法、或从空间扩展声源生成比特流的设备与方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一种再现空间扩展声源的设备，空间扩展声源在空间中具有限定位置及几何形状，该设备包含：接口(100)，用以接收收听者位置；投影仪(120)，用于使用收听者位置、有关空间扩展声源的几何形状的信息、及有关空间扩展声源的位置的信息，计算投影至投影面上的与空间扩展声源相关联的二维或三维外壳的投影；声音位置计算器(140)，用于使用投影面计算用于空间扩展声源的至少两个声源的位置；以及渲染器(160)，用于在该类位置处渲染至少两个声源，以获得具有两个或更多个输出信号的空间扩展声源的再现，其中，渲染器(160)用以对不同位置使用不同声音信号，其中不同声音信号与空间扩展声源相关联。

An apparatus for reproducing a spatially extended sound source having a defined position and geometry in space, the apparatus comprising: an interface (100) to receive a listener position; a projector (120) for calculating a projection of a two-dimensional or three-dimensional shell associated with a spatially extended sound source onto a projection plane using the listener position, information on the geometry of the spatially extended sound source, and information on the position of the spatially extended sound source; a sound position calculator (140) for calculating positions of at least two sound sources for spatially expanding the sound sources using the projection plane; and a renderer (160) for rendering at least two sound sources at the class of locations to obtain a reproduction of a spatially extended sound source having two or more output signals, wherein the renderer (160) is configured to use different sound signals for different locations, wherein the different sound signals are associated with the spatially extended sound source.

titles.text: 再现空间扩展声源的设备与方法、或从空间扩展声源生成比特流的设备与方法
Apparatus and method for reproducing spatially extended sound source, or apparatus and method for generating bit stream from spatially extended sound source

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An apparatus for reproducing a spatially extended sound source having a defined position and geometry in space, the apparatus comprising: an interface (100) to receive a listener position; a projector (120) for calculating a projection of a two-dimensional or three-dimensional shell associated with the spatially extended sound source onto a projection surface using the listener position, the information about the geometry of the spatially extended sound source, and the information about the position of the spatially extended sound source; a sound position calculator (140) for calculating positions of at least two sound sources for spatially expanding the sound sources using the projection surface; and a renderer (160) for rendering at least two sound sources at such locations to obtain a reproduction of a spatially extended sound source having two or more output signals, wherein the renderer (160) is configured to use different sound signals for different locations, wherein the different sound signals are associated with the spatially extended sound source.

一种再现空间扩展声源的设备，空间扩展声源在空间中具有限定位置及几何形状，该设备包含：接口(100)，用以接收收听者位置；投影仪(120)，用于使用收听者位置、有关空间扩展声源的几何形状的信息、及有关空间扩展声源的位置的信息，计算投影至投影面上的与空间扩展声源相关联的二维或三维外壳的投影；声音位置计算器(140)，用于使用投影面计算用于空间扩展声源的至少两个声源的位置；以及渲染器(160)，用于在该类位置处渲染至少两个声源，以获得具有两个或更多个输出信号的空间扩展声源的再现，其中，渲染器(160)用以对不同位置使用不同声音信号，其中不同声音信号与空间扩展声源相关联。

titles.text: 一种基于3D摄像头的监控系统及方法
Monitoring system and method based on 3D camera

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种基于3D摄像头的监控系统，涉及监控系统领域，包括：身份识别模块、坐标模型创建模块、数据采集模块、图像处理模块、声音分析模块、定位模块及通信模块所述身份识别模块用于验证考员的人脸与个人身份证信息是否匹配；坐标模型创建模块用于对考场建立平面坐标系，并将每个考员的座位落入对应的平面坐标系中坐标中；数据采集模块用于采集考场内考员的动态人脸图像和声音数据；所述图像处理模块用于对动态人脸图像进行分析，判断是否有替考嫌疑或者作弊嫌疑；本发明用于解决现有技术中电子监考系统不够完善，不能杜绝替考、作弊行为的发生，并且监考过程中仍然需要有监考老师在场参与，电子监考不能完全替代人工监考的技术问题。

The invention provides a monitoring system based on a 3D camera, which relates to the field of monitoring systems and comprises the following components: the system comprises an identity recognition module, a coordinate model creation module, a data acquisition module, an image processing module, a sound analysis module, a positioning module and a communication module, wherein the identity recognition module is used for verifying whether the face of an examinee is matched with personal identity card information; the coordinate model creating module is used for establishing a plane coordinate system for the examination room and enabling the seat of each examiner to fall into the coordinate in the corresponding plane coordinate system; the data acquisition module is used for acquiring dynamic face images and sound data of examinees in the examination hall; the image processing module is used for analyzing the dynamic face image and judging whether a suspicion of examination by substitute or a cheating suspicion exists; the invention is used for solving the technical problems that the electronic invigilation system in the prior art is not perfect enough, the taking-in of the examination and the cheating cannot be avoided, the invigilation teacher still needs to participate in the invigilation process, and the electronic invigilation cannot completely replace the manual invigilation.

titles.text: Wireless acoustic imaging method and device for valve leakage monitoring
一种阀门泄漏监测的无线声学成像方法及装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a wireless acoustic imaging method and a wireless acoustic imaging device for valve leakage monitoring, wherein the method comprises the following steps: step S1: moving a camera, and aligning a lens to a target area needing valve leakage monitoring; step S2: detecting whether a valve leaks in a target area, and if so, acquiring leakage position data and leakage intensity data of the valve; step S3: producing a leak image based on the leak location data and the leak intensity data; step S4: and fusing the leakage image with the scene image of the target area shot by the lens, and outputting a fusion result. According to the wireless acoustic imaging method and device for monitoring the valve leakage, when the lens of the camera is aligned to the target area, the field image of the target area and the position where the valve leakage occurs are displayed in the display screen, a special acoustic sensor array does not need to be arranged at each valve or in the gathering area of a plurality of valves, and the cost is reduced.

本发明提供一种阀门泄漏监测的无线声学成像方法及装置，其中，方法包括：步骤S1：移动相机，将镜头对准需要进行阀门泄漏监测的目标区域；步骤S2：检测目标区域内是否有阀门发生泄漏，若是，获取阀门发生泄漏的泄漏位置数据和泄漏强度数据；步骤S3：基于泄漏位置数据和泄漏强度数据制作泄漏图像；步骤S4：将泄漏图像与镜头拍摄的目标区域的现场图像进行融合，输出融合结果。本发明的阀门泄漏监测的无线声学成像方法及装置，当相机的镜头对准目标区域时，在显示屏内既显示目标区域的现场图像，也显示发生阀门泄漏的位置，无需在各个阀门处或多个阀门的聚集区域设置专门的声学传感器阵列，降低了成本。

titles.text: 一种阀门泄漏监测的无线声学成像方法及装置
Wireless acoustic imaging method and device for valve leakage monitoring

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a wireless acoustic imaging method and a device for valve leakage monitoring, wherein the method comprises the following steps: step S1: moving the camera to aim the lens at a target area needing valve leakage monitoring; step S2: detecting whether a valve leaks in a target area, if so, acquiring leakage position data and leakage intensity data of the valve; step S3: creating a leakage image based on the leakage position data and the leakage intensity data; step S4: and fusing the leakage image with the field image of the target area shot by the lens, and outputting a fusion result. According to the wireless acoustic imaging method and device for valve leakage monitoring, when the lens of the camera is aligned to the target area, the on-site image of the target area is displayed in the display screen, and the position where valve leakage occurs is also displayed, so that special acoustic sensor arrays are not required to be arranged at each valve or in the aggregation areas of a plurality of valves, and the cost is reduced.

本发明提供一种阀门泄漏监测的无线声学成像方法及装置，其中，方法包括：步骤S1：移动相机，将镜头对准需要进行阀门泄漏监测的目标区域；步骤S2：检测目标区域内是否有阀门发生泄漏，若是，获取阀门发生泄漏的泄漏位置数据和泄漏强度数据；步骤S3：基于泄漏位置数据和泄漏强度数据制作泄漏图像；步骤S4：将泄漏图像与镜头拍摄的目标区域的现场图像进行融合，输出融合结果。本发明的阀门泄漏监测的无线声学成像方法及装置，当相机的镜头对准目标区域时，在显示屏内既显示目标区域的现场图像，也显示发生阀门泄漏的位置，无需在各个阀门处或多个阀门的聚集区域设置专门的声学传感器阵列，降低了成本。

titles.text: 一种基于主频近似的声波介质时空域高斯束偏移成像方法
Sound wave medium time-space domain Gaussian beam migration imaging method based on main frequency approximation

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本说明书实施例公开了一种基于主频近似的声波介质时空域高斯束偏移成像方法。输入速度参数场和观测数据；确定所述观察数据的主频；根据所述速度参数场，通过对主频近似确定正向波场和时间反传波场的虚部；根据所述正向波场和时间反传波场的虚部进行互相关生成成像结果。本发明既能保持与传统时空域高斯束偏移方法相比拟的成像精度和分辨率，又大大提高了时空域高斯束偏移方法的实现效率，为复杂构造区域的地震数据处理提供了高精度成像保障，且具有更少的时间成本消耗，提高了后续解释工作的质量与效率率。

The embodiment of the specification discloses a sound wave medium time-space domain Gaussian beam migration imaging method based on main frequency approximation. Inputting a speed parameter field and observation data; determining a dominant frequency of the observation data; determining the imaginary parts of a forward wave field and a time backward wave field by approximating the main frequency according to the speed parameter field; and carrying out cross correlation according to the imaginary parts of the forward wave field and the time backward wave field to generate an imaging result. The method can keep the imaging precision and resolution ratio which are similar to those of the traditional time-space domain Gaussian beam migration method, greatly improves the realization efficiency of the time-space domain Gaussian beam migration method, provides high-precision imaging guarantee for the seismic data processing of a complex structure area, has less time cost consumption, and improves the quality and efficiency rate of the subsequent interpretation work.

titles.text: 一种基于主频近似的声波介质时空域高斯束偏移成像方法
Acoustic wave medium time-space domain Gaussian beam offset imaging method based on dominant frequency approximation

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The embodiment of the specification discloses an acoustic wave medium time-space domain Gaussian beam offset imaging method based on dominant frequency approximation. Inputting a speed parameter field and observation data; determining a dominant frequency of the observed data; determining the imaginary parts of the forward wave field and the time inverse wave field by approximating the main frequency according to the speed parameter field; and performing cross-correlation according to the imaginary parts of the forward wave field and the time anti-transmission wave field to generate an imaging result. The method can maintain imaging precision and resolution ratio which are compared with the traditional time-space domain Gaussian beam deviation method, greatly improve the implementation efficiency of the time-space domain Gaussian beam deviation method, provide high-precision imaging guarantee for seismic data processing of a complex structural area, have less time cost consumption, and improve the quality and efficiency ratio of subsequent interpretation work.

本说明书实施例公开了一种基于主频近似的声波介质时空域高斯束偏移成像方法。输入速度参数场和观测数据；确定所述观察数据的主频；根据所述速度参数场，通过对主频近似确定正向波场和时间反传波场的虚部；根据所述正向波场和时间反传波场的虚部进行互相关生成成像结果。本发明既能保持与传统时空域高斯束偏移方法相比拟的成像精度和分辨率，又大大提高了时空域高斯束偏移方法的实现效率，为复杂构造区域的地震数据处理提供了高精度成像保障，且具有更少的时间成本消耗，提高了后续解释工作的质量与效率率。

titles.text: Ultrasonic full-focus image defect processing method and device based on nuclear density estimation
基于核密度估计的超声波全聚焦图像缺陷处理方法及装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于核密度估计的超声波全聚焦图像缺陷处理方法及装置。所述方法，包括：获取超声波全聚焦图像和所述超声波全聚焦图像的图像矩阵，根据所述图像矩阵对所述超声波全聚焦图像进行图像预处理，得到预处理图像；基于所述预处理图像得到超声强度阈值和每一像素点的核密度估计值，根据每一所述像素点的核密度估计值与所述超声强度阈值的比较结果设置对应所述像素点的像素值，得到中间处理图像；对所述中间处理图像进行二值化处理，得到目标图像，并对所述目标图像中的缺陷区域进行定位和定量。本发明能够有效消除超声波全聚焦图像中的伪影，对超声波全聚焦图像中的缺陷进行定位和定量，提高超声波全聚焦图像缺陷处理的准确度和效率。

The invention discloses a method and a device for processing ultrasonic full-focus image defects based on nuclear density estimation. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an ultrasonic full-focus image and an image matrix of the ultrasonic full-focus image, and performing image preprocessing on the ultrasonic full-focus image according to the image matrix to obtain a preprocessed image; obtaining an ultrasonic intensity threshold value and a kernel density estimation value of each pixel point based on the preprocessed image, and setting a pixel value corresponding to each pixel point according to a comparison result of the kernel density estimation value of each pixel point and the ultrasonic intensity threshold value to obtain an intermediate processed image; and carrying out binarization processing on the intermediate processing image to obtain a target image, and positioning and quantifying a defect area in the target image. The method can effectively eliminate the artifacts in the ultrasonic full-focus image, position and quantify the defects in the ultrasonic full-focus image, and improve the accuracy and efficiency of defect processing of the ultrasonic full-focus image.

titles.text: 基于核密度估计的超声波全聚焦图像缺陷处理方法及装置
Ultrasonic wave full focusing image defect processing method and device based on nuclear density estimation

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses an ultrasonic wave full focusing image defect processing method and device based on nuclear density estimation. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an ultrasonic wave full-focus image and an image matrix of the ultrasonic wave full-focus image, and carrying out image preprocessing on the ultrasonic wave full-focus image according to the image matrix to obtain a preprocessed image; obtaining an ultrasonic intensity threshold value and a nuclear density estimated value of each pixel point based on the preprocessed image, and setting a pixel value corresponding to the pixel point according to a comparison result of the nuclear density estimated value of each pixel point and the ultrasonic intensity threshold value to obtain an intermediate processed image; and carrying out binarization processing on the intermediate processing image to obtain a target image, and positioning and quantifying a defect area in the target image. The invention can effectively eliminate the artifact in the ultrasonic wave full-focusing image, position and quantify the defect in the ultrasonic wave full-focusing image, and improve the accuracy and efficiency of the defect treatment of the ultrasonic wave full-focusing image.

本发明公开了一种基于核密度估计的超声波全聚焦图像缺陷处理方法及装置。所述方法，包括：获取超声波全聚焦图像和所述超声波全聚焦图像的图像矩阵，根据所述图像矩阵对所述超声波全聚焦图像进行图像预处理，得到预处理图像；基于所述预处理图像得到超声强度阈值和每一像素点的核密度估计值，根据每一所述像素点的核密度估计值与所述超声强度阈值的比较结果设置对应所述像素点的像素值，得到中间处理图像；对所述中间处理图像进行二值化处理，得到目标图像，并对所述目标图像中的缺陷区域进行定位和定量。本发明能够有效消除超声波全聚焦图像中的伪影，对超声波全聚焦图像中的缺陷进行定位和定量，提高超声波全聚焦图像缺陷处理的准确度和效率。

titles.text: Ultrasonic matrix imaging apparatus
超声矩阵成像设备

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to an ultrasound imaging device (100) comprising a plurality of lines (L)i) And column (C)j) A plurality of ultrasound transducers (101) arranged in a matrix, each transducer having a first electrode (E1) and a second electrode (E2), wherein the first electrodes of transducers of a same row are interconnected and the second electrodes of transducers of a same column are interconnected.
本发明涉及一种超声成像设备(100)，包括以行(Li)和列(Cj)的矩阵布置的多个超声换能器(101)，每个换能器具有第一电极(E1)和第二电极(E2)，其中，同一行的换能器的第一电极互相连接，并且同一列的换能器的第二电极互相连接。

titles.text: Ultra-high resolution ultrasonic imaging method based on repeated accumulation analysis
一种基于复累积量分析的超高分辨超声成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种基于复累积量分析的超高分辨超声成像方法，其特征在于，首先，将获取的原始超声平面波图像的实数域信号通过希尔伯特变换得到复数域超声信号，然后，通过构建复数域累积量分析框架对复数域超声信号进行高阶累积量分析的处理，从而拓展对超声图像数据的统计框架，解决由于超声信号双极脉冲响应所导致实数域信号的轴向振荡的问题，最后，对复累积量分析处理得到的复累积量结果进行反卷积处理，进一步提升超高分辨超声成像的空间分辨率。

The invention provides a super-high resolution ultrasonic imaging method based on repeated accumulation amount analysis, which is characterized in that firstly, real number domain signals of an obtained original ultrasonic plane wave image are subjected to Hilbert transform to obtain complex number domain ultrasonic signals, then, a complex number domain accumulation amount analysis frame is constructed to carry out high-order accumulation amount analysis processing on the complex number domain ultrasonic signals, so that a statistical frame for ultrasonic image data is expanded, the problem of axial oscillation of the real number domain signals caused by bipolar pulse response of the ultrasonic signals is solved, and finally, the repeated accumulation amount results obtained by the repeated accumulation amount analysis processing are subjected to deconvolution processing, so that the spatial resolution of the super-high resolution ultrasonic imaging is further improved.

titles.text: Data calling method for acoustic imaging equipment
一种声学成像设备数据调取方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An acoustic imaging device data retrieval method, comprising: constructing a dynamic link library, and loading the dynamic link library through an external program; creating a memory block, opening up a memory space in the memory block, and acquiring the address of the first storage unit of the memory space; the address of the first storage unit of the memory block is transmitted into a dynamic link library, and the data length is 0; the dynamic link library circularly reads sound signal data from the acoustic imaging equipment, and gradually fills the sound signal data into the memory space according to the acquired sequence until the sound signal data in the acoustic imaging equipment is completely read; and the dynamic link library counts and returns the length of the sound signal data, and the external program reads the sound data through the address of the memory space and the length of the data and performs subsequent analysis. According to the invention, through the dynamic link library, the sound signal data can be directly called from the chip of the acoustic imaging equipment to the outside of the chip, and the data is analyzed by using equipment with higher calculation power outside, so that the reliability of the final calculation result is improved.

一种声学成像设备数据调取方法，包括：构建动态链接库，并通过外部程序加载动态链接库；创建内存块，在内存块中开辟内存空间，并获取内存空间的首个存储单元的地址；将内存块首个存储单元的地址传入动态链接库中并数据长度为0；动态链接库从声学成像设备中循环读取声音信号数据，并按获取的顺序向内存空间逐步填充声音信号数据，直至声学成像设备中的声音信号数据读取完毕；动态链接库统计并返回声音信号数据的长度，外部程序通过内存空间的地址和数据的长度读取声音数据并进行后续的分析。本发明通过动态链接库，可从声学成像设备的芯片中直接调取声音信号数据到芯片外部，利用外部更高算力的设备对数据进行分析，提高最终计算结果的可靠性。

titles.text: Single sound source acoustic imaging method and terminal equipment
一种单声源声学成像方法及终端设备

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a single sound source acoustic imaging method and terminal equipment, belonging to the technical field of acoustic imaging, and comprising the steps of collecting multi-channel data of an acoustic array and preprocessing the multi-channel data; roughly dividing a to-be-tested area formed by multi-channel data into grids; carrying out sound field reconstruction processing on the multi-channel data to obtain a sound field of a preset area and obtain the position of the maximum point of the sound field; using the maximum position of sound field as center of circle, RdThe radius is a target area; carrying out mesh fine division on the area to be tested, and calculating the sound field value of a point positioned in the target area; based on a preset sound field threshold value, the sound field value of a point in a target area is subjected to de-marginalization processing, and RGB parameter conversion is performed on the sound field according to the sound field range subjected to de-marginalization processing and an RGB conversion rule to obtain a color image, so that the purpose of performing acoustic imaging on the multi-channel data of the acoustic array is achieved. The invention effectively solves the problem of large positioning calculation amount of a single sound source sound field through two-stage data processing.

本发明公开了一种单声源声学成像方法及终端设备，属于声学成像技术领域，包括采集声列阵的多通道数据，并对多通道数据进行预处理；将多通道数据形成的待测试区域进行网格粗划分；对多通道数据进行声场重建处理，得到预定区域的声场，获得声场最大点位置；以声场最大点位置为圆心，Rd为半径为目标区域；对待测试区域进行网格细划分，并计算出位于目标区域内点的声场值；基于预设的声场门限值，对位于目标区域内点的声场值去边缘化处理，并根据去边缘化处理的声场范围和RGB转换规则，对声场进行RGB参数转换，得到彩色图像，以实现将声列阵的多通道数据进行声学成像的目的。本发明通过两级数据处理，有效解决单声源声场定位运算量大的问题。

titles.text: Intersection event collection and application method based on AR map
一种基于AR地图的路口事件采集及应用方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种基于AR地图的路口事件采集及应用方法，步骤一：在服务器中存放所有路口的三维模型数据，并在地图上展示；步骤二：路口上安装多个维度AR设备，通过AR设备，将虚拟信息与真实世界巧妙融合在地图中；步骤三：路口上安装多个维度投影成像设备，将虚拟人物投入在指定的道路位置上，实现达到将投影成像的警员在指定的地面位置上与现场人员进行互动交涉；步骤四：通过AR的GIS地图指挥控制系统，实现看到虚拟和真实的AR视角呈现在眼前，再结合多维投影成像技术和声音传递、声音识别等技术应用在AR地图中。本发明让用户使用不需要去现场，就能看到实时的真实现场效果，指挥和处理当前的路口事件。

The invention relates to an intersection event acquisition and application method based on an AR map, which comprises the following steps: storing the three-dimensional model data of all intersections in a server and displaying the three-dimensional model data on a map; step two: installing a plurality of dimension AR devices on the intersection, and skillfully fusing virtual information and the real world in a map through the AR devices; step three: a plurality of dimension projection imaging devices are installed at the intersection, and virtual characters are thrown at the specified road positions, so that the police officers who perform projection imaging can interactively negotiate with field personnel at the specified ground positions; step four: the virtual and real AR visual angle is displayed in front of eyes through the GIS map command control system of the AR, and the virtual and real AR visual angle is combined with the technologies of multi-dimensional projection imaging, sound transmission, sound recognition and the like to be applied to the AR map. The invention enables the user to see real-time real site effect without going to the site, and commands and processes the current intersection event.

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging method with fusion of non-orthogonal projection and generalized sidelobe canceller
一种非正交投影与广义旁瓣对消器相融合的超声成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种非正交投影与广义旁瓣对消器相融合的超声成像方法，属于超声成像领域；该方法包括：S1：对超声阵元接收的回波信号放大、AD转换和滤波预处理，得到超声回波数据，再将每个收发孔径得到的数据存入数据表T中；S2：计算每个像素点所对应的样本协方差矩阵；S3：根据信号子空间构造新的矩阵SA来近似干扰噪声方向矩阵的正交投影矩阵；S4：利用期望方向向量构成的子空间和矩阵SA计算得到非正交投影矩阵；S5：利用非正交投影矩阵将权值再次投影，得到新的自适应权值；S6：对单帧成像数据进行空间复合得到最终的超声图像数据；该方法能够在维持图像分辨率的基础上，抑制背景噪声，增强算法稳健性，提升超声成像质量。

The invention relates to an ultrasonic imaging method with non-orthogonal projection and generalized sidelobe canceller fused, belonging to the ultrasonic imaging field; the method comprises the following steps: s1: amplifying, AD converting and filtering preprocessing echo signals received by the ultrasonic array elements to obtain ultrasonic echo data, and storing the data obtained by each transceiving aperture into a data table T; s2: calculating a sample covariance matrix corresponding to each pixel point; s3: constructing a new matrix S from the signal subspaceATo approximate an orthogonal projection matrix of the interference noise direction matrix; s4: subspace sum matrix S constructed with desired direction vectorsACalculating to obtain a non-orthogonal projection matrix; s5: projecting the weight again by using a non-orthogonal projection matrix to obtain a new self-adaptive weight; s6: carrying out spatial compounding on the single-frame imaging data to obtain final ultrasonic image data; the method can inhibit background noise, enhance algorithm robustness and improve ultrasonic imaging quality on the basis of maintaining image resolution.

titles.text: Transient signal acoustic imaging method based on wavelet decomposition
基于小波分解的瞬态信号声成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了基于小波分解的瞬态信号声成像方法，具体涉及声成像技术领域，包括步骤如下：A1：首先，由信号频谱能量特征确定出信号的有效带宽，根据小波频窗与尺度的关系得到有效带宽内对应的多个尺度因子，构造出Morlet小波；A2：其次，通过对信号进行小波变换，获得多组不同带宽的小波变换系数以建立多分辨时频阵列信号模型；A3：最后，对目标瞬态信号所在平面进行网格划分，使用每个小波域上的时频阵列信号模型对各个网格点进行波束形成，实现对目标信号的声成像。通过对比宽带信号下傅里叶变换和小波变换的频带范围，傅里叶变换的频带带宽是均匀划分的，在小波变换中，频率越高，其对应的频带带宽也越大，这充分体现了小波变换的“变焦”特性。

The invention discloses a transient signal acoustic imaging method based on wavelet decomposition, and particularly relates to the technical field of acoustic imaging, wherein the method comprises the following steps: a1: firstly, determining the effective bandwidth of a signal according to the signal spectrum energy characteristics, obtaining a plurality of corresponding scale factors in the effective bandwidth according to the relation between a wavelet frequency window and the scale, and constructing a Morlet wavelet; a2: secondly, performing wavelet transformation on the signals to obtain a plurality of groups of wavelet transformation coefficients with different bandwidths so as to establish a multi-resolution time-frequency array signal model; a3: and finally, carrying out grid division on the plane where the target transient signal is located, and carrying out beam forming on each grid point by using a time-frequency array signal model on each wavelet domain to realize acoustic imaging of the target signal. By comparing the frequency band ranges of the Fourier transform and the wavelet transform under the broadband signal, the frequency band bandwidth of the Fourier transform is uniformly divided, and in the wavelet transform, the higher the frequency is, the larger the corresponding frequency band bandwidth is, which fully embodies the 'zooming' characteristic of the wavelet transform.

titles.text: Phased array ultrasonic detection system and method
一种相控阵超声检测系统和方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本申请公开了一种相控阵超声检测方法，使用超声相控阵检测角接结构，在被检测物和超声相控阵阵元表面之间进行介质填充，使来自阵元表面的超声波通过介质材料导波作用到达被检测物，通过超声成像识别角接结构内的材料突变。本申请还包含用于实现所述方法的系统。本申请解决金属角接结构不易实现超声检测探伤的问题。

The application discloses phased array ultrasonic testing method uses ultrasonic phased array to detect the angle and connects the structure, carries out the medium and fills between being detected thing and ultrasonic phased array element surface, makes the ultrasonic wave that comes from the array element surface reach through the medium material guided wave effect and is detected the thing, through the material sudden change in the ultrasonic imaging discernment angle and connects the structure. The application also includes a system for implementing the method. The problem of metal angle joint structure be difficult for realizing ultrasonic testing flaw detection is solved in this application.

titles.text: 一种相控阵超声检测系统和方法
Phased array ultrasonic detection system and method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The application discloses a phased array ultrasonic detection method, which uses an ultrasonic phased array detection angle joint structure to fill medium between a detected object and the surface of an ultrasonic phased array element, so that ultrasonic waves from the surface of the array element reach the detected object through the guided wave action of a medium material, and material mutation in the angle joint structure is identified through ultrasonic imaging. The application also includes a system for implementing the method. The problem that the ultrasonic detection flaw detection is difficult to realize in this application solution metal angle joint structure.
本申请公开了一种相控阵超声检测方法，使用超声相控阵检测角接结构，在被检测物和超声相控阵阵元表面之间进行介质填充，使来自阵元表面的超声波通过介质材料导波作用到达被检测物，通过超声成像识别角接结构内的材料突变。本申请还包含用于实现所述方法的系统。本申请解决金属角接结构不易实现超声检测探伤的问题。

titles.text: Array element planar array arrangement method suitable for air acoustic three-dimensional imaging
一种适用于空气声三维成像的阵元平面阵列排布方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及超声波成像领域，具体涉及阵元布局的优化设计。本发明是通过以下技术方案得以实现的：一种适用于空气声三维成像的阵元平面阵列排布方法，包含如下步骤：S01、阵列排布结构确定步骤；确定费马螺旋为阵列排布结构；S02、阵元总数最小值Nmin确定步骤；S03、阵元排布螺旋最小直径Dmin确定步骤；S04、确定螺旋发散角α；S05、阵列排布生成步骤；设定阵元总数N大于等于Nmin，设定螺旋直径D大于等于Dmin，基于发散角α，以费马螺旋为阵列排布结构，得到最终的阵元阵列排布布局。本发明的目的是提供一种适用于空气声三维主动超声成像的阵元平面阵列排布方法，限定了在成像过程中阵元的平面空间布局的方式，优化了硬件消耗成本，保证了超声成像质量。

The invention relates to the field of ultrasonic imaging, in particular to an optimal design of array element layout. The invention is realized by the following technical scheme: an array element plane array arrangement method suitable for air acoustic three-dimensional imaging comprises the following steps: s01, determining an array arrangement structure; determining a Fermat spiral as an array arrangement structure; s02 minimum value N of array element total numberminA determination step; s03 minimum diameter D of array element arrangement spiralminA determination step; s04, determining a spiral divergence angle alpha; s05, array arrangement generating; setting the total number N of array elements to be more than or equal to NminSetting the diameter D of the helix to be equal to or larger than DminAnd based on the divergence angle alpha, taking the Fermat spiral as an array arrangement structure to obtain the final array element array arrangement layout. The invention aims to provide an array element plane array arrangement method suitable for aeroacoustic three-dimensional active ultrasonic imaging, which limits array elements in the imaging processThe mode of plane space layout optimizes hardware consumption cost and ensures ultrasonic imaging quality.

titles.text: 一种适用于空气声三维成像的阵元平面阵列排布方法
Array element plane array arrangement method suitable for air sound three-dimensional imaging

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to the field of ultrasonic imaging, in particular to an optimal design of array element layout. The invention is realized by the following technical scheme: an array element plane array arrangement method suitable for air acoustic three-dimensional imaging comprises the following steps: s01, determining an array arrangement structure; determining a Fermat spiral as an array arrangement structure; s02 minimum value N of array element total numberminA determination step; s03 minimum diameter D of array element arrangement spiralminA determination step; s04, determining a spiral divergence angle alpha; s05, array arrangement generating; setting the total number N of array elements to be more than or equal to NminSetting the diameter D of the helix to be equal to or larger than DminAnd based on the divergence angle alpha, taking the Fermat spiral as an array arrangement structure to obtain the final array element array arrangement layout. The invention aims to provide an array element planar array arrangement method suitable for aeroacoustic three-dimensional active ultrasonic imaging, which limits the planar spatial layout mode of array elements in the imaging process, optimizes the hardware consumption cost and ensures the ultrasonic imaging quality.

本发明涉及超声波成像领域，具体涉及阵元布局的优化设计。本发明是通过以下技术方案得以实现的：一种适用于空气声三维成像的阵元平面阵列排布方法，包含如下步骤：S01、阵列排布结构确定步骤；确定费马螺旋为阵列排布结构；S02、阵元总数最小值Nmin确定步骤；S03、阵元排布螺旋最小直径Dmin确定步骤；S04、确定螺旋发散角α；S05、阵列排布生成步骤；设定阵元总数N大于等于Nmin，设定螺旋直径D大于等于Dmin，基于发散角α，以费马螺旋为阵列排布结构，得到最终的阵元阵列排布布局。本发明的目的是提供一种适用于空气声三维主动超声成像的阵元平面阵列排布方法，限定了在成像过程中阵元的平面空间布局的方式，优化了硬件消耗成本，保证了超声成像质量。

titles.text: Method and device for determining porosity
孔面率确定方法和装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种孔面率确定方法和装置，其中，该方法包括：根据预设的二值化阈值，对储层的超声图像进行二值化分割处理，得到分割后的图像，其中，分割后的图像中具有至少一个连通区域；对分割后的图像中的连通区域进行识别处理，确定分割后的图像中的假裂缝区域和干扰区域；消除分割后的图像中的假裂缝区域和干扰区域，得到处理后的图像；根据处理后的图像中的像素点的灰度值，计算超声图像的孔面率，其中，孔面率表征了储层的裂缝和孔洞的发育程度。可以得到较为准确的孔面率信息；计算的孔面率能够定性反映裂缝和孔洞的发育程度，为储层的分析提供参考依据。

The invention provides a method and a device for determining a porosity, wherein the method comprises the following steps: performing binarization segmentation processing on an ultrasonic image of a reservoir layer according to a preset binarization threshold value to obtain a segmented image, wherein the segmented image has at least one connected region; identifying and processing a connected region in the segmented image, and determining a false crack region and an interference region in the segmented image; eliminating a false crack area and an interference area in the segmented image to obtain a processed image; and calculating the pore surface rate of the ultrasonic image according to the gray value of the pixel point in the processed image, wherein the pore surface rate represents the development degree of the cracks and the holes of the reservoir. More accurate hole surface rate information can be obtained; the calculated pore surface rate can qualitatively reflect the development degree of cracks and holes, and provides a reference basis for reservoir analysis.

titles.text: Compression storage method for ultrasonic imaging dynamic focusing delay parameter fused with dynamic aperture
一种融合动态孔径的超声成像动态聚焦延时参数的压缩存储方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种融合动态孔径的超声成像动态聚焦延时参数的压缩存储方法，属于超声成像技术领域。该方法首先根据外层阵元动态聚焦延时参数差值计算分段边界位置；然后根据分段边界值计算各个阵元在各分段内的递减情况；再根据相邻聚焦线之间的间距计算动态孔径的分段情况；最后将聚焦分段结果和孔径分段结果相融合，除去冗余数据后，将数据压缩后进行存储，以供超声波束形成时输出动态聚焦延时参数。本发明能减小近场盲区区域，并能把聚焦误差控制在给定的范围之内，还能有效压缩动态聚焦延时参数存储空间，从而大幅度减少超声动态聚焦对硬件资源的需求，该方法对于便携式超声诊断设备具有重要的应用前景。

The invention relates to a compression storage method of ultrasonic imaging dynamic focusing time delay parameters with fused dynamic apertures, belonging to the technical field of ultrasonic imaging. Firstly, calculating the position of a segmented boundary according to the difference value of the dynamic focusing delay parameters of the outer array elements; then, calculating the decreasing condition of each array element in each segment according to the segment boundary value; calculating the segmentation condition of the dynamic aperture according to the distance between the adjacent focusing lines; and finally, fusing the focusing segmentation result and the aperture segmentation result, removing redundant data, compressing the data and storing the data so as to output dynamic focusing delay parameters when ultrasonic beams are formed. The invention can reduce the near-field blind area, control the focusing error in a given range, and effectively compress the storage space of the dynamic focusing delay parameter, thereby greatly reducing the requirements of ultrasonic dynamic focusing on hardware resources.

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging method for improving transverse and lateral resolution
一种提高横向和侧向分辨率的超声成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种提高横向和侧向分辨率的超声成像方法，包括：控制单行一维超声探头采集二维超声图像，并设置横向聚焦深度与传感器的侧向聚焦深度相同；移动探头连续扫描，并同步获取对应的位姿信息，直至目标成像区域的所有深度范围均在超声探头的侧向聚焦深度附近得到过扫描；绕侧向旋转探头或成像目标约90度，重复扫描过程；结合二维超声图像序列及对应的位姿信息，重建三维超声图像；从三维体数据中提取截面。本发明充分利用超声传感器的声场分布性质，在不增加成本和系统复杂度的情况下，有效提高了侧向和横向分辨率，从而改变了常见超声成像横向和侧向分辨率低的缺点。

The invention discloses an ultrasonic imaging method for improving transverse and lateral resolution, which comprises the following steps: controlling a single-row one-dimensional ultrasonic probe to acquire a two-dimensional ultrasonic image, and setting the transverse focusing depth to be the same as the lateral focusing depth of the sensor; continuously scanning by moving the probe, and synchronously acquiring corresponding pose information until all depth ranges of a target imaging area are close to the lateral focusing depth of the ultrasonic probe to obtain overscan; rotating the probe or imaging target about 90 degrees laterally, repeating the scanning process; reconstructing a three-dimensional ultrasonic image by combining the two-dimensional ultrasonic image sequence and the corresponding pose information; a cross section is extracted from the three-dimensional volume data. The invention fully utilizes the sound field distribution property of the ultrasonic sensor, and effectively improves the lateral resolution and the transverse resolution under the condition of not increasing the cost and the system complexity, thereby changing the defect of low lateral resolution and the transverse resolution of common ultrasonic imaging.

titles.text: Multi-turn subspace target three-dimensional imaging method based on improved OMP algorithm
一种基于改进的OMP算法的多圈次空间目标三维成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a multi-turn space target three-dimensional imaging method based on an improved OMP algorithm, which comprises the following steps of firstly, establishing a signal model of a space target to obtain a two-dimensional ISAR imaging sequence; secondly, based on the sparse two-dimensional ISAR imaging sequences, an improved OMP algorithm is used for recovering height information of the space target; and finally, combining the two-dimensional information of the two-dimensional ISAR imaging with the height of the space target to finally obtain the three-dimensional ISAR imaging of the space target. The experimental result shows that compared with the existing imaging method, the three-dimensional imaging method provided by the invention has better imaging performance and can better balance the relationship between the calculation cost and the three-dimensional imaging quality.

本发明公开了一种基于改进的OMP算法的多圈次空间目标三维成像方法，首先，建立空间目标的信号模型，获得二维ISAR成像序列；其次，基于这些稀疏的二维ISAR成像序列，利用一种改进的OMP算法来恢复空间目标的高度信息；最后，通过将二维ISAR成像的二维信息与空间目标的高度相结合，最终获得空间目标的三维ISAR成像。实验结果表明，本发明所提的三维成像方法相比于现有的成像方法，具有更好的成像性能，并且能够更好地平衡计算成本和三维成像质量之间关系。

titles.text: 一种基于改进的OMP算法的多圈次空间目标三维成像方法
Multi-circle space target three-dimensional imaging method based on improved OMP algorithm
