abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a multi-turn space target three-dimensional imaging method based on an improved OMP algorithm, which comprises the steps of firstly, establishing a signal model of a space target to obtain a two-dimensional ISAR imaging sequence; secondly, based on the sparse two-dimensional ISAR imaging sequences, recovering the height information of the space target by utilizing an improved OMP algorithm; finally, combining the two-dimensional information of the two-dimensional ISAR imaging with the height of the space target to finally obtain the three-dimensional ISAR imaging of the space target. Experimental results show that compared with the existing imaging method, the three-dimensional imaging method provided by the invention has better imaging performance, and the relation between the calculation cost and the three-dimensional imaging quality can be balanced better.

本发明公开了一种基于改进的OMP算法的多圈次空间目标三维成像方法，首先，建立空间目标的信号模型，获得二维ISAR成像序列；其次，基于这些稀疏的二维ISAR成像序列，利用一种改进的OMP算法来恢复空间目标的高度信息；最后，通过将二维ISAR成像的二维信息与空间目标的高度相结合，最终获得空间目标的三维ISAR成像。实验结果表明，本发明所提的三维成像方法相比于现有的成像方法，具有更好的成像性能，并且能够更好地平衡计算成本和三维成像质量之间关系。

titles.text: Acoustic wave induction device capable of reducing acoustic imaging based on acoustic transformation
一种基于变换声学的可缩减声成像的声波诱导装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种基于变换声学的可缩减声成像的声波诱导装置，包括设置在二维平面上且均匀分布的多个声学超材料单元，声学超材料单元采用外层为固体结构的声学超材料制成，声学超材料的等效质量密度和体积模量呈各向异性分布；所述的多个声学超材料单元按照圆形分布有多层多列，且每一个声学超材料单元与其相邻的声学超材料单元之间的间距相等；所述的声学超材料单元采用的是长度为d，宽度为t的米字型单元结构；每一层米字型单元结构的长度d不同。本发明通过设置的多个声学超材料单元，改变每层声学超材料单元的折射率，影响声波通过声波诱导装置时产生的散射场，达到缩减声成像的目的。

The invention discloses a sound wave induction device capable of reducing sound imaging based on acoustic transformation, which comprises a plurality of acoustic metamaterial units which are arranged on a two-dimensional plane and are uniformly distributed, wherein the acoustic metamaterial units are made of an acoustic metamaterial with a solid structure on the outer layer, and the equivalent mass density and the volume modulus of the acoustic metamaterial are in anisotropic distribution; the plurality of acoustic metamaterial units are distributed in multiple layers and multiple columns according to a circle, and the distance between each acoustic metamaterial unit and the adjacent acoustic metamaterial unit is equal; the acoustic metamaterial unit adopts a meter-shaped unit structure with the length of d and the width of t; the length d of each layer of the unit structure shaped like a Chinese character 'mi' is different. According to the invention, the refractive index of each layer of acoustic metamaterial unit is changed through the plurality of acoustic metamaterial units, so that a scattered field generated when sound waves pass through the sound wave induction device is influenced, and the purpose of reducing sound imaging is achieved.

titles.text: Sub-wave-independent viscoacoustic least square reverse time migration imaging method
一种不依赖子波的粘声最小二乘逆时偏移成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention belongs to the technical field of oil reservoir development, and particularly relates to a wavelet-independent viscoacoustic least square reverse time migration imaging method. The method can meet the requirements of oil-gas exploration and development on imaging of complex underground structures, improves the identification precision of oil-gas reservoirs, and improves the core competitiveness of oil-gas exploration and development in China.

本发明属于油藏开发技术领域，具体涉及一种不依赖子波粘声最小二乘逆时偏移成像方法，在方法中采用常分数阶解耦拉普拉斯粘声波动方程模拟地震波在粘声介质中的传播，建立卷积目标函数，构建具有相同震源的模拟数据和观测数据间的匹配，从而降低对震源子波的敏感性，推导正演算子与伴随算子，在迭代过程中补偿衰减效应，实现不依赖子波的粘声最小二乘逆时偏移，在震源子波不准确的情况下，获取可靠的能够补偿深层能量的成像结果。本方法更能满足油气勘探开发对复杂地下构造成像的需求，提高对油气藏的识别精度，提升我国油气勘探开发核心竞争力。

titles.text: 一种不依赖子波的粘声最小二乘逆时偏移成像方法
Wavelet-independent viscous-acoustic least square reverse time migration imaging method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention belongs to the technical field of oil reservoir development, and particularly relates to a wavelet-independent viscous-acoustic least square reverse time migration imaging method, wherein a constant fractional order Jie Oula Laplace viscous-acoustic wave dynamic equation is adopted to simulate the propagation of seismic waves in a viscous-acoustic medium in the method, a convolution objective function is established, and matching between simulation data and observation data with the same seismic source is constructed, so that the sensitivity to the seismic source wavelet is reduced, a forward operator and an accompanying operator are deduced, the attenuation effect is compensated in an iterative process, the wavelet-independent viscous-acoustic least square reverse time migration is realized, and a reliable imaging result capable of compensating deep energy is obtained under the condition that the seismic source wavelet is inaccurate. The method can meet the requirements of oil and gas exploration and development on imaging of complex underground structures, improves the recognition accuracy of oil and gas reservoirs, and improves the oil and gas exploration and development core competitiveness of China.

本发明属于油藏开发技术领域，具体涉及一种不依赖子波粘声最小二乘逆时偏移成像方法，在方法中采用常分数阶解耦拉普拉斯粘声波动方程模拟地震波在粘声介质中的传播，建立卷积目标函数，构建具有相同震源的模拟数据和观测数据间的匹配，从而降低对震源子波的敏感性，推导正演算子与伴随算子，在迭代过程中补偿衰减效应，实现不依赖子波的粘声最小二乘逆时偏移，在震源子波不准确的情况下，获取可靠的能够补偿深层能量的成像结果。本方法更能满足油气勘探开发对复杂地下构造成像的需求，提高对油气藏的识别精度，提升我国油气勘探开发核心竞争力。

titles.text: Frequency domain segmentation orthogonal projection-based synthetic aperture minimum variance ultrasonic imaging method
基于频域分割正交投影的合成孔径最小方差超声成像方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to a synthetic aperture minimum variance ultrasonic imaging method based on frequency domain segmentation orthogonal projection, which belongs to the technical field of ultrasonic imaging and comprises the following steps: s1: carrying out time delay processing on the sampling signals received by the ultrasonic array elements; s2: selecting a frequency domain segmentation length to convert the ultrasonic echo signal into a frequency domain sub-band signal; s3: obtaining a sample covariance matrix under a sub-band; s4: obtaining a time-frequency signal subspace under the current sub-frequency band; s5: obtaining a time-frequency orthogonal projection subspace; s6: calculating the output weight of the beam former under each sub-frequency band; s7: obtaining the frequency domain weight and frequency domain output of the frequency domain orthogonal projection minimum variance beam former; s8: converting the frequency domain output value into a time domain output value, sequentially obtaining low-resolution images, and then synthesizing to obtain a high-resolution imaging result; the invention can effectively improve the resolution and the contrast of the ultrasonic image.

本发明涉及一种基于频域分割正交投影的合成孔径最小方差超声成像方法，属于超声成像技术领域，包括以下步骤：S1：对超声阵元接收的采样信号进行延时处理；S2：选取频域分段长度将超声回波信号转换为频域的子频带信号；S3：得到子频带下的样本协方差矩阵；S4：得到当前子频带下的时频信号子空间；S5：得到时频正交投影子空间；S6：计算各个子频带下波束形成器输出权值；S7：得到频域正交投影最小方差波束形成器的频域权值、频域输出；S8：将频域输出值转换为时域输出值，依次得到低分辨率图像，然后合成获得高分辨率成像结果；本发明能够有效提高超声图像的分辨率和对比度。

titles.text: Sensor array for dry-type transformer acoustic imaging detection and output calculation method
用于干式变压器声成像检测的传感器阵列及输出计算方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一种用于干式变压器声成像检测的传感器阵列，传感器阵列包括螺旋结构和圆环结构；螺旋结构为多臂螺旋结构，包括多条悬臂，每条悬臂上设置多个阵元；悬臂数量与每条悬臂上的阵元数相等；圆环结构包括等距排列的多个阵元；所述圆环结构包围螺旋结构；每条悬臂上靠近阵列中心的第一个阵元组成阵列内围；本发明提供的阵列采用的不规则结构能够减少传感器使用数量；阵列较小，提高了检测时的动态范围，提高了阵列的抗干扰能力；外环结构提高了检测分辨率；各传感器位置可以公式化表示，便于传感器位置的确定。

A sensor array for dry-type transformer acoustic imaging detection comprises a spiral structure and a circular ring structure; the spiral structure is a multi-arm spiral structure and comprises a plurality of cantilevers, and each cantilever is provided with a plurality of array elements; the number of the cantilevers is equal to the number of the array elements on each cantilever; the circular ring structure comprises a plurality of array elements which are arranged at equal intervals; the circular ring structure surrounds the spiral structure; the first array element on each cantilever close to the center of the array forms the inner periphery of the array; the array provided by the invention adopts an irregular structure, so that the use number of sensors can be reduced; the array is small, so that the dynamic range during detection is improved, and the anti-interference capability of the array is improved; the outer ring structure improves the detection resolution; each sensor location may be formulated to facilitate determination of the sensor location.

titles.text: Noise reduction method for acoustic wave remote detection imaging graph
一种声波远探测成像图的降噪方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种声波远探测成像图的降噪方法，所述该方法包括以下步骤：步骤1：准备数据集；步骤2：构建降噪网络模型；步骤3：数据预处理；步骤4：训练网络模型；步骤5：现场成像图处理。本发明通过图像处理的角度对声波远探测成像图进行直接降噪，构建降噪神经网络模型，训练端到端的降噪神经网络，不需要复杂的参数设置，在保留成像图边缘信息的同时，自动快速地移除成像图中干扰噪声，提高了成像图的质量。

The invention discloses a noise reduction method for an acoustic wave remote detection imaging graph, which comprises the following steps: step 1: preparing a data set; and 2, step: constructing a noise reduction network model; and step 3: preprocessing data; and 4, step 4: training a network model; and 5: and (4) processing a field imaging graph. According to the method, the acoustic wave remote detection imaging image is subjected to direct noise reduction through the angle of image processing, a noise reduction neural network model is constructed, an end-to-end noise reduction neural network is trained, complex parameter setting is not needed, interference noise in the imaging image is automatically and rapidly removed while edge information of the imaging image is kept, and the quality of the imaging image is improved.

titles.text: 再现空间扩展声源的装置和方法或使用锚定信息生成空间扩展声源的描述的装置和方法
Apparatus and method for reproducing spatially extended sound source or apparatus and method for generating description of spatially extended sound source using anchor information

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 用于在空间中再现具有定义的位置或取向和几何形状的空间扩展声源的装置，装置包括用于接收听者位置的接口(100)；用于使用听者位置、关于空间扩展声源的几何形状信息和关于空间扩展声源的位置信息计算与空间扩展声源相关联的二维或三维包壳在投影平面上的投影的投影仪(120)；用于使用投影平面计算空间扩展声源的至少两个声源的位置的声音位置计算器(140)；以及用于在位置处渲染至少两个声源以获得具有两个或更多个输出信号的空间扩展声源的再现的渲染器(160)，其中渲染器(160)被配置为针对不同的位置使用不同的声音信号，其中不同的声音信号与空间扩展声源相关联，并且其中渲染器(160)被配置为响应于接收到的特定信息相对于空间扩展声源的固定位置和/或取向来渲染至少两个声源。

Apparatus for reproducing a spatially extended sound source having a defined position or orientation and geometry in space, the apparatus comprising an interface (100) for receiving a listener's position; a projector (120) for calculating a projection of a two-dimensional or three-dimensional enclosure associated with the spatially extended sound source on a projection plane using the listener position, the geometric shape information on the spatially extended sound source, and the position information on the spatially extended sound source; a sound position calculator (140) for calculating positions of at least two sound sources of the spatially extended sound sources using the projection plane; and a renderer (160) for rendering the at least two sound sources at the location to obtain a reproduction of a spatially extended sound source having two or more output signals, wherein the renderer (160) is configured to use different sound signals for different locations, wherein the different sound signals are associated with the spatially extended sound source, and wherein the renderer (160) is configured to render the at least two sound sources in response to the received specific information with respect to the fixed position and/or orientation of the spatially extended sound source.

titles.text: 一种基于超声的场景全息成像的方法
Ultrasonic-based scene holographic imaging method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses an ultrasonic-based scene holographic imaging method, which adopts a plurality of ultrasonic transmitting probes arranged in a two-dimensional square matrix to form a transmitting array, transmits ultrasonic signals in turn in a time-sharing manner, receives the ultrasonic signals after being reflected by an object by a receiving array arranged in the two-dimensional square matrix, determines the position of a reconstruction surface according to the delay of the reflected signals, solves the sparse reconstruction optimization problem by adopting a compressed sensing reconstruction algorithm aiming at echo signals from reflecting points on a specific reconstruction surface to all the transmitting probes, obtains a plurality of groups of optimized target reflecting point positions and signal intensity data, and obtains a target point cloud image. And obtaining point cloud data by changing the position and superposing a plurality of groups of target reflection point positions and signal intensity data, fitting the point cloud data to obtain the position and the shape of the target and form the holographic imaging of the target.

本发明公开了一种基于超声的场景全息成像的方法，该方法采用二维方阵排布的多个超声发射探头组成发射阵列，分时轮流发射超声信号，经物体反射后由二维方阵排布的接收阵列进行接收，根据反射信号的延时，确定出重建面的位置，针对特定重建面上反射点到各发射探头的回波信号，采用压缩感知重建算法对稀疏重构优化问题进行求解，并得出优化后的多组目标反射点位置及信号强度数据，并得出目标点云图像。并通过改变位置和将多组目标反射点位置及信号强度数据叠加，得出点云数据，对上述点云数据进行拟合，可得到目标的位置和形状，形成目标的全息成像，该方法能够实现对近场目标的超声全息成像。

titles.text: 一种基于自然语言处理的算力网络5G数据解析系统及方法
Computing power network 5G data analysis system and method based on natural language processing

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种基于自然语言处理的算力网络5G数据解析系统及方法，属于算网运营5G大数据解析技术领域，本发明利用机器学习在大数据自然语言处理及语义分析领域的方法，自动遍历、标注、分析、检索、提取用户所需的文本、图片、音频、视频等各类关键数据信息，完成算力网络5G数据自适应解析，简化了5G业务自动化开通效率以及生命周期的自配置和自管理流程，提高了算网5G数据应用的安全性、可扩展性、灵活性和智能性，构建完整的算力网络5G数据解析的自然语言处理语料库。

The invention provides a computing power network 5G data analysis system and method based on natural language processing, which belong to the technical field of computing power network operation 5G big data analysis, utilize a method of machine learning in the field of big data natural language processing and semantic analysis to automatically traverse, label, analyze, retrieve and extract various key data information such as texts, pictures, audios, videos and the like required by a user, complete the self-adaptive analysis of computing power network 5G data, simplify the automatic opening efficiency of 5G services and the self-configuration and self-management process of the life cycle, improve the safety, expandability, flexibility and intelligence of computing power network 5G data application, and construct a complete natural language processing corpus of computing power network 5G data analysis.

titles.text: 一种基于自然语言处理的算力网络5G数据解析系统及方法
Computing power network 5G data analysis system and method based on natural language processing

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供一种基于自然语言处理的算力网络5G数据解析系统及方法，属于算网运营5G大数据解析技术领域，本发明利用机器学习在大数据自然语言处理及语义分析领域的方法，自动遍历、标注、分析、检索、提取用户所需的文本、图片、音频、视频等各类关键数据信息，完成算力网络5G数据自适应解析，简化了5G业务自动化开通效率以及生命周期的自配置和自管理流程，提高了算网5G数据应用的安全性、可扩展性、灵活性和智能性，构建完整的算力网络5G数据解析的自然语言处理语料库。

The invention provides a system and a method for analyzing 5G data of a power computing network based on natural language processing, which belong to the technical field of 5G big data analysis of power computing network operation.

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging apparatus
超声成像设备

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本说明书涉及一种超声成像设备，其包括分布成多个子集合(105)的超声换能器(103)的集合(100)，每个子集合为P个换能器(103)的子集合，对于每个子集合(105)，该设备包括：‑K个收发器电路(123k)；以及‑可配置的路由电路(125)，其将子集合(105)中的P个换能器(103)连接到K个收发器电路(123k)，P和K是大于或等于2的整数，其中K严格小于P，并且每个子集合(105)包括被称为移动换能器的至少一个换能器，其能够经由路由电路(125)与子组件的K个收发器电路(123k)中的预定义的若干收发器电路(123k)中的任何一个断开连接或与其连接。

The present description relates to an ultrasound imaging apparatus comprising a set (100) of ultrasound transducers (103) distributed in a plurality of subsets (105), each subset being a subset of P transducers (103), the apparatus comprising, for each subset (105): -K transceiver circuits (123) k ) (ii) a And-a configurable routing circuit (125) connecting the P transducers (103) in the subset (105) to the K transceiver circuits (123) k ) P and K are integers greater than or equal to 2, where K is strictly less than P, anAnd each subset (105) comprising at least one transducer, called mobile transducer, capable of communicating with the K transceiver circuits (123) of the sub-assembly via the routing circuit (125) k ) A predefined number of transceiver circuits (123) k ) Is disconnected or connected thereto.

titles.text: 基于波形协方差的超声导波相控阵成像方法
Ultrasonic guided wave phased array imaging method based on waveform covariance

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Disclosed is an ultrasonic guided wave phased array imaging method based on waveform covariance, which belongs to the ultrasonic nondestructive testing technical field. The method comprises the steps of carrying out frequency dispersion and amplitude compensation on phased array acquisition signals; extracting signal wave packets belonging to the current imaging point from all the signals; calculating the waveform covariance coefficients between every two wave packets; and calculating an imaging index based on the waveform covariance coefficient. The method can realize damage imaging of the ultrasonic guided wave waveguide structure and has the advantages of low imaging result background noise and low pseudo point interference.
公开了一种基于波形协方差的超声导波相控阵成像方法，属于超声无损检测技术领域。方法包括对相控阵采集信号进行频散和幅值补偿；对所有信号提取属于当前成像点的信号波包；计算所有波包两两之间的波形协方差系数；基于波形协方差系数，计算成像指标。本方法可以实现超声导波波导结构的损伤成像，具有成像结果背景噪声及伪点干扰小的优点。

titles.text: 一种相控阵超声衍射声时成像方法
Phased array ultrasonic diffraction acoustic time imaging method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to a phased array ultrasonic diffraction acoustic time imaging method, which comprises the steps of firstly establishing a target imaging area comprising a plurality of imaging points according to a target detection object and defects on the target detection object, arranging a transmitting phased array probe and a receiving phased array probe for TOFD detection on the target detection object, operating the transmitting phased array probe and the receiving phased array probe in a full matrix capture mode, constructing a full matrix data set according to detected TOFD echo signals, and then carrying out full focus imaging on the basis of the full matrix data set according to acoustic time information of each imaging point so as to obtain a target image of the target imaging area. Compared with the prior art, the invention skillfully combines the two technologies of ultrasonic diffraction time difference method and phased array full focus imaging together, solves the problem that the measurement signal detected by the probe is not intuitive enough in the prior TOFD technology, and has a series of advantages of better resolution, higher signal-to-noise ratio, quicker imaging and the like.

本发明涉及一种相控阵超声衍射声时成像方法，根据目标检测物体及目标检测物体上的缺陷，先建立包括多个成像点的目标成像区域，并在目标检测而物体上设置TOFD检测用的发射相控阵探头和接收相控阵探头，以全矩阵捕获的方式运行发射相控阵探头和接收相控阵探头，根据检测得到的TOFD回波信号构建全矩阵数据集，然后根据每个成像点的声时信息，基于全矩阵数据集进行全聚焦成像，便可以得到目标成像区域的目标图像。相比于现有技术，本发明巧妙地将超声波衍射时差法、相控阵全聚焦成像两种技术结合至一起，解决了现有的TOFD技术中，探头检测的测量信号不够直观的问题，并且具有较好的分辨率、较高的信噪比，成像较快等一系列优点。

titles.text: Automatic frequency selection method applied to acoustic imaging
一种应用于声学成像的自动选频方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to an automatic frequency selection method applied to acoustic imaging, which comprises the following steps: carrying out full-band scanning to obtain a plurality of acoustic cloud pictures, carrying out peak value detection, recording the peak value position, judging the position of an effective sound source with a stable peak value according to the peak value position, splitting the acoustic cloud pictures into frequency sub-pictures, detecting whether the peak value exists near the effective sound source position in each frequency sub-picture, if not, removing the frequency sub-pictures, clustering all reserved frequency sub-pictures, calculating the total energy of all frequency sub-pictures in a clustering set, selecting alternative clusters until the total energy of the alternative clusters reaches a certain specified proportion of the total energy of all frequency sub-pictures, and carrying out frequency selection according to the corresponding frequency sum. According to the method, the peak positions in a plurality of acoustic cloud pictures are compared, a noise source is eliminated, energy calculation is carried out on the sound at the effective sound source position through clustering, and the frequency range which is at the effective sound source position and provides most of energy is obtained through frequency selection.

本发明涉及一种应用于声学成像的自动选频方法，包括步骤：进行全频段扫描，获得若干张声学云图，进行峰值检测，并记录峰值位置，根据峰值的位置判断具有稳定峰值的有效声源位置，将声学云图拆分为频率分图，在每个频率分图中检测有效声源位置附近是否存在峰值，若否则将该频率分图剔除，对全部被保留的频率分图进行聚类，算聚类集合中全部频率分图的总能量，挑选备选簇直到备选簇的总能量达到全部频率分图的总能量某一指定比例，以对应的频率和进行选频。本发明的方法通过对比多张声学云图中的峰值位置，排除掉噪声源，再通过聚类对处于有效声源位置的声音进行能量计算，选频得到处于有效声源位置、且提供了大部分能量的频率范围。

titles.text: 一种应用于声学成像的自动选频方法
Automatic frequency selection method applied to acoustic imaging

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to an automatic frequency selection method applied to acoustic imaging, which comprises the following steps: carrying out full-band scanning to obtain a plurality of acoustic cloud pictures, carrying out peak value detection, recording peak value positions, judging effective sound source positions with stable peak values according to the peak value positions, splitting the acoustic cloud pictures into frequency sub-pictures, detecting whether peak values exist near the effective sound source positions in each frequency sub-picture, if not, rejecting the frequency sub-pictures, clustering all reserved frequency sub-pictures, calculating the total energy of all frequency sub-pictures in a clustering set, selecting alternative clusters until the total energy of the alternative clusters reaches a certain specified proportion of the total energy of all frequency sub-pictures, and carrying out frequency selection according to corresponding frequency sum. According to the method, the peak positions in a plurality of acoustic cloud pictures are compared, a noise source is eliminated, energy calculation is carried out on the sound at the effective sound source position through clustering, and the frequency range which is at the effective sound source position and provides most of energy is obtained through frequency selection.

本发明涉及一种应用于声学成像的自动选频方法，包括步骤：进行全频段扫描，获得若干张声学云图，进行峰值检测，并记录峰值位置，根据峰值的位置判断具有稳定峰值的有效声源位置，将声学云图拆分为频率分图，在每个频率分图中检测有效声源位置附近是否存在峰值，若否则将该频率分图剔除，对全部被保留的频率分图进行聚类，算聚类集合中全部频率分图的总能量，挑选备选簇直到备选簇的总能量达到全部频率分图的总能量某一指定比例，以对应的频率和进行选频。本发明的方法通过对比多张声学云图中的峰值位置，排除掉噪声源，再通过聚类对处于有效声源位置的声音进行能量计算，选频得到处于有效声源位置、且提供了大部分能量的频率范围。

titles.text: 压铸件缺陷超声波3D虚拟成像系统及压铸件缺陷检测方法
Die casting defect ultrasonic 3D virtual imaging system and die casting defect detection method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to the technical field of workpiece detection, in particular to a die casting defect ultrasonic 3D virtual imaging system and a die casting defect detection method, wherein the die casting defect ultrasonic 3D virtual imaging system comprises a detection mechanism, an acquisition mechanism and a server; the acquisition mechanism is used for carrying out three-dimensional ultrasonic vector scanning on the workpiece according to a preset instruction and sending acquired ultrasonic data to the server; the server is internally provided with a 3D model database and a defect model database and is used for carrying out conversion processing and defect type analysis on received ultrasonic data, calling a minimum feature model of a corresponding defect model in the defect model database according to the result of the defect type analysis, carrying out vector combination on the minimum feature model in a virtual space, calling a corresponding 3D space virtual model from the 3D model database according to the vector combination result of the minimum feature model to carry out corresponding vector combination, and constructing a 3D space virtual image of the physical defect in the workpiece; the workpiece defect detection is more intuitive for detection personnel.

本发明涉及工件检测技术领域，尤其涉及一种压铸件缺陷超声波3D虚拟成像系统及压铸件缺陷检测方法，包括检测机构、采集机构和服务器；采集机构用于按照预设的指令对工件进行三维空间的超声波矢量扫描，并将采集的超声波数据发送给服务器；服务器内设置有3D模型数据库和缺陷模型数据库，用于对接收到的超声波数据进行换算处理和缺陷类型分析，并根据缺陷类型分析的结果调用缺陷模型库中对应的缺陷模型的最小特征模型，在虚拟空间进行最小特征模型的矢量组合，并根据最小特征模型的矢量组合结果从3D模型数据库中调用相对应的3D空间虚拟模型进行相应的矢量组合，构建工件内部物理缺陷的3D空间虚拟图像；方便检测人员更加直观的对工件进行缺陷检测。

titles.text: 空气耦合超声波成像装置和机器人
Air coupling ultrasonic imaging device and robot

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供了一种空气耦合超声波成像装置和机器人，该装置包括：计算单元、驱动单元、发射单元、接收单元、采集单元、信号处理单元和上位机；计算单元分别与驱动单元和信号处理单元连接；驱动单元与发射单元连接；采集单元分别与信号处理单元和接收单元连接；发射单元包括多个发射阵元；接收单元包括多个接收阵元；信号处理单元与上位机连接。采用本发明可以提高超声波测距的精度，进而保证超声波成像的质量，从而拓宽超声波测距在机器人感知中的应用。

The invention provides an air coupling ultrasonic imaging device and a robot, wherein the device comprises: the device comprises a computing unit, a driving unit, a transmitting unit, a receiving unit, an acquisition unit, a signal processing unit and an upper computer; the computing unit is respectively connected with the driving unit and the signal processing unit; the driving unit is connected with the transmitting unit; the acquisition unit is respectively connected with the signal processing unit and the receiving unit; the transmitting unit comprises a plurality of transmitting array elements; the receiving unit comprises a plurality of receiving array elements; the signal processing unit is connected with the upper computer. The invention can improve the precision of ultrasonic ranging, thereby ensuring the quality of ultrasonic imaging and widening the application of the ultrasonic ranging in robot perception.

titles.text: 异常工况监测定位方法、系统、电子设备及存储介质
Abnormal working condition monitoring and positioning method and system, electronic equipment and storage medium

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a method and a system for monitoring and positioning abnormal working conditions, wherein the method comprises the following steps: A. respectively carrying out space calibration on the plurality of installed acoustic cameras, and forming a corresponding relation between a two-dimensional plane picture of each acoustic camera and a real three-dimensional space; B. fusing a three-dimensional model of a monitoring target into a coordinate system of a real three-dimensional space according to the real size; C. acquiring a space coordinate range of a component and/or a part according to the division of a monitoring target component and/or part; D. calculating and acquiring a space coordinate value of the monitored abnormal noise source in a coordinate system of the real three-dimensional space, and comparing the space coordinate value with a space coordinate range of a component and/or a part to acquire the position of the noise source; E. and monitoring abnormal working conditions according to the position of the noise source and the collected noise signal characteristics.

本发明公开了一种异常工况监测定位方法及系统，该方法包括如下步骤：A、对安装后的多个声学相机分别进行空间标定，将声学相机的二维平面画面与真实三维空间形成对应关系；B、将监测目标的三维模型按照真实尺寸融合至真实三维空间的坐标系中；C、根据监测目标部件和/或部位的划分，获取部件和/或部位的空间坐标范围；D、将监测到的异常噪声源通过计算获取噪声源在所述真实三维空间的坐标系中的空间坐标值，并与部件和/或部位的空间坐标范围进行比对，获得噪声源的位置；E、根据噪声源的位置以及采集到的噪声信号特征，对异常工况进行监测。

titles.text: 基于双边阵元的皮尔逊加权系数的超声成像方法
Ultrasonic imaging method based on Pearson weighting coefficient of bilateral array element

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种基于双边阵元的皮尔逊加权系数的超声成像方法，属于超声成像技术领域。该方法包括：S1：对超声阵元接收的回波信号进行预处理，获得处理后的超声回波数据；S2：选取阵列左右两端的两个阵元回波数据，利用前后一段采样时刻的数据计算皮尔逊加权系数；S3：选取阵列最中心的两个阵元，求取其回波均值，利用前后一段采样时刻的数据计算其与左右两端阵元回波数据的皮尔逊加权系数；S4：根据所求得的皮尔逊加权系数求取带有权重的加权平均值，计算得到当前采样时刻最终的皮尔逊加权系数；S5：对回波构成的延时叠加波束形成器输出进行加权，依次得到单帧成像子图；S6：对多张成像子图进行空间复合，得到高质量的超声成像结果。

The invention relates to an ultrasonic imaging method based on a Pearson weighting coefficient of bilateral array elements, belonging to the technical field of ultrasonic imaging. The method comprises the following steps: s1: preprocessing echo signals received by the ultrasonic array elements to obtain processed ultrasonic echo data; s2: selecting two array element echo data at the left end and the right end of the array, and calculating a Pearson weighting coefficient by using data at a front section and a rear section of sampling time; s3: selecting two array elements at the center of the array, solving the echo mean value of the two array elements, and calculating the Pearson weighting coefficient between the two array elements and the echo data of the array elements at the left end and the right end by using the data of the front section and the rear section of sampling time; s4: calculating a weighted average value with weights according to the calculated Pearson weighting coefficient, and calculating to obtain a final Pearson weighting coefficient at the current sampling moment; s5: weighting the output of a delay superposition beam former formed by echo waves to sequentially obtain single-frame imaging subgraphs; s6: and carrying out spatial compounding on the multiple imaging subgraphs to obtain a high-quality ultrasonic imaging result.

titles.text: 基于图像处理实现固化剂对产品力学性能影响的检测方法
Method for detecting influence of curing agent on mechanical properties of product based on image processing

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及固化剂固化效果检测技术领域，尤其是基于图像处理实现固化剂对产品力学性能影响的检测方法，包括如下步骤：配置多组脆性绝缘浇注料流体备用；准备若干个器皿容器；依次向对应器皿容器内浇注对应酸酐固化剂含量的等量的脆性绝缘浇注料流体，静置并等待浇注料凝固；当各个器皿容器内部的脆性绝缘浇注料流体完全定型后形成成型浇注毛坯，依次将各个成型浇注毛坯取出；形成检测试样，依次对各个检测试样进行检测；得到批量检测试样对应的极限抗载荷数值。本发明中还针对试验制备的检测试样进行了内部特征分布的超声扫描成像三维图，在三维软件内部依靠有限元分析及参数处理可以较为快捷、客观的量化模型的力学性能。

The invention relates to the technical field of curing effect detection of curing agents, in particular to a method for detecting the influence of the curing agents on the mechanical properties of products based on image processing, which comprises the following steps: preparing a plurality of groups of brittle insulating casting material fluid for standby; preparing a plurality of vessel containers; sequentially pouring an equal amount of brittle insulating castable fluid corresponding to the content of the anhydride curing agent into a corresponding vessel container, standing and waiting for the castable to solidify; forming molding casting blanks after the brittle insulating casting material fluid in each vessel container is completely shaped, and sequentially taking out each molding casting blank; forming detection samples, and sequentially detecting each detection sample; and obtaining the limit load resistance value corresponding to the batch detection samples. In the invention, an ultrasonic scanning imaging three-dimensional graph of internal characteristic distribution is also carried out on a detection sample prepared by a test, and the mechanical property of the model can be quantized rapidly and objectively by means of finite element analysis and parameter processing in three-dimensional software.

titles.text: Method for detecting influence of curing agent on mechanical properties of product based on image processing
基于图像处理实现固化剂对产品力学性能影响的检测方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to the technical field of curing effect detection of curing agents, in particular to a method for detecting the influence of the curing agents on the mechanical properties of products based on image processing, which comprises the following steps: preparing a plurality of groups of brittle insulating casting material fluid for standby; preparing a plurality of vessel containers; sequentially pouring an equal amount of brittle insulating castable fluid corresponding to the content of the anhydride curing agent into a corresponding vessel container, standing and waiting for the castable to solidify; forming molding casting blanks after the brittle insulating casting material fluid in each vessel container is completely shaped, and sequentially taking out each molding casting blank; forming detection samples, and sequentially detecting each detection sample; and obtaining the limit load resistance value corresponding to the batch detection samples. In the invention, an ultrasonic scanning imaging three-dimensional graph of internal characteristic distribution is also carried out on a detection sample prepared by a test, and the mechanical property of the model can be quantized rapidly and objectively by means of finite element analysis and parameter processing in three-dimensional software.

本发明涉及固化剂固化效果检测技术领域，尤其是基于图像处理实现固化剂对产品力学性能影响的检测方法，包括如下步骤：配置多组脆性绝缘浇注料流体备用；准备若干个器皿容器；依次向对应器皿容器内浇注对应酸酐固化剂含量的等量的脆性绝缘浇注料流体，静置并等待浇注料凝固；当各个器皿容器内部的脆性绝缘浇注料流体完全定型后形成成型浇注毛坯，依次将各个成型浇注毛坯取出；形成检测试样，依次对各个检测试样进行检测；得到批量检测试样对应的极限抗载荷数值。本发明中还针对试验制备的检测试样进行了内部特征分布的超声扫描成像三维图，在三维软件内部依靠有限元分析及参数处理可以较为快捷、客观的量化模型的力学性能。

titles.text: 空气声成像传感器
Air sound imaging sensor

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses an aero-acoustic imaging sensor, comprising: the deflection device comprises a mounting seat, a first deformation piece and a fixed seat, wherein two ends of the first deformation piece are respectively connected with the mounting seat and the fixed seat; the air sound imaging sensing device is arranged on the fixed seat; the driving device is arranged on the deflection device and is used for driving the first deformation piece to deform so as to deflect the fixed seat. According to the air sound imaging sensor provided by the embodiment of the invention, the first deformation piece is driven to deform through the driving device, so that the air sound imaging sensor is installed on the fixed seat to deflect, the effect of adjusting the deflection angle of the air sound imaging sensor is achieved, dynamic scanning imaging is realized, and compared with the existing structure for driving the deflection of the transducer, the air sound imaging sensor provided by the invention has the advantages of small whole volume, high integration level, small occupied space range in the movement process and low cost.

本发明公开了一种空气声成像传感器，包括：偏转装置，包括安装座、第一形变件以及固定座，所述第一形变件的两端分别与所述安装座以及固定座相连接；空气声成像传感装置，安装于所述固定座上；驱动装置，安装于偏转装置上，所述驱动装置用于驱使所述第一形变件发生形变，以使安装于所述固定座偏转。本发明实施方式的空气声成像传感器，通过驱动装置驱使所述第一形变件发生形变，以使安装于所述固定座偏转，从而达到调节空气声成像传感装置偏转角度的作用，空气声成像传感器实现动态扫描成像，相比于现有的驱动换能器偏转的结构，本发明的空气声成像传感器具有整体体积小、集成度高，运动过程占用的空间范围小以及成本低的优点。

titles.text: 一种基于声光定位系统的三维超声重建探头
Three-dimensional ultrasonic reconstruction probe based on acousto-optic positioning system

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a three-dimensional ultrasonic reconstruction probe based on an acousto-optic positioning system, which comprises an embedded upper computer, an ultrasonic imaging module, an acousto-optic positioning system and a positioning handle, wherein the ultrasonic imaging module is connected with the embedded upper computer; the ultrasonic imaging module is used for acquiring a two-dimensional ultrasonic image sequence, the acousto-optic positioning system is used for acquiring pose information of each frame of two-dimensional ultrasonic image, and the embedded upper computer is provided with a display module for displaying the three-dimensional ultrasonic image. The sound wave of the three-dimensional ultrasonic reconstruction probe based on the acousto-optic positioning system is not blocked, the defect of an optical sensor can be overcome in some special occasions, and compared with other three-dimensional positioning technologies, the technology is basically not influenced by external environment.
本发明提出一种基于声光定位系统的三维超声重建探头，包括嵌入式上位机、超声成像模块和声光定位系统、定位手柄；超声成像模块用于获取二维超声图像序列，声光定位系统用于获取每帧二维超声图像的位姿信息，嵌入式上位机设有用于显示三维超声图像的显示模块。基于声光定位系统的三维超声重建探头的声波不受遮挡，可以在某些特殊场合弥补光学传感器的不足，相比其他三维定位技术，该技术基本不受外界环境影响。

titles.text: 超声图像融合方法、装置、计算机设备及存储介质
Ultrasonic image fusion method, device, computer equipment and storage medium

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to the technical field of image processing, and discloses an ultrasonic image fusion method, an ultrasonic image fusion device, computer equipment and a storage medium. Wherein the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of ultrasonic images to be fused, wherein the imaging frequencies of the ultrasonic images are different; registering the plurality of ultrasonic images to obtain a target registration image; and carrying out regional fusion processing on the target registration image to generate a target fusion image. By implementing the technical scheme of the invention, the ultrasonic images with different frequencies can be displayed in real time through one target fusion image, so that the ultrasonic images in different areas can be observed through one target fusion image.
本发明涉及图像处理技术领域，公开了一种超声图像融合方法、装置、计算机设备及存储介质。其中，该方法包括：获取待融合的多个超声图像，多个超声图像的成像频率不同；对多个超声图像进行配准，得到目标配准图像；对目标配准图像进行分区域融合处理，生成目标融合图像。通过实施本发明技术方案，能够通过一副目标融合图像实时显示不同频率的超声图像，实现了通过一副目标融合图像观察不同区域的超声图像。

titles.text: Ultrasonic image fusion method, device, computer equipment and storage medium
超声图像融合方法、装置、计算机设备及存储介质

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及图像处理技术领域，公开了一种超声图像融合方法、装置、计算机设备及存储介质。其中，该方法包括：获取待融合的多个超声图像，多个超声图像的成像频率不同；对多个超声图像进行配准，得到目标配准图像；对目标配准图像进行分区域融合处理，生成目标融合图像。通过实施本发明技术方案，能够通过一副目标融合图像实时显示不同频率的超声图像，实现了通过一副目标融合图像观察不同区域的超声图像。

The invention relates to the technical field of image processing, and discloses an ultrasonic image fusion method, an ultrasonic image fusion device, computer equipment and a storage medium. Wherein the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of ultrasonic images to be fused, wherein the imaging frequencies of the ultrasonic images are different; registering the plurality of ultrasonic images to obtain a target registration image; and carrying out regional fusion processing on the target registration image to generate a target fusion image. By implementing the technical scheme of the invention, the ultrasonic images with different frequencies can be displayed in real time through one target fusion image, so that the ultrasonic images in different areas can be observed through one target fusion image.

titles.text: High-speed pavement detection system and method based on unmanned aerial vehicle
一种基于无人机的高速路面检测系统及方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供了一种基于无人机的高速路面检测系统及方法，属于高速路面检测技术领域，方法通过系统实现，一种基于无人机的高速路面检测系统，包括：无人机，配置有用于控制无人机进行飞行作业的远程系统和/或近程控制器；摄像头，搭载在无人机上，用于采集高速路面的图像，作为第一图像；超声波传感器，搭载在无人机上，用于对高速路面进行超声波成像，作为第二图像；存储器，用于存储第一图像和第二图像；远程系统装载有图像处理器，当无人机与远程系统通讯时，远程系统获取存储器内存储的第一图像和第二图像，并控制图像处理器对第一图像和第二图像进行图像处理，并将图像处理后得到的图像集作为高速路面检测结果。本发明可以提高检测效率。

The invention provides a system and a method for detecting a high-speed road surface based on an unmanned aerial vehicle, which belong to the technical field of high-speed road surface detection, and the method is realized through the system, and the system for detecting the high-speed road surface based on the unmanned aerial vehicle comprises the following steps: the unmanned aerial vehicle is provided with a remote system and/or a short-range controller for controlling the unmanned aerial vehicle to carry out flight operation; the camera is mounted on the unmanned aerial vehicle and used for collecting images of the high-speed pavement and taking the images as first images; an ultrasonic sensor mounted on the unmanned aerial vehicle for performing ultrasonic imaging on the high-speed road surface as a second image; a memory for storing a first image and a second image; the remote system is provided with an image processor, when the unmanned aerial vehicle is communicated with the remote system, the remote system acquires a first image and a second image stored in a memory, controls the image processor to perform image processing on the first image and the second image, and takes an image set obtained after the image processing as a high-speed pavement detection result. The invention can improve the detection efficiency.

titles.text: 一种基于无人机的高速路面检测系统及方法
High-speed pavement detection system and method based on unmanned aerial vehicle

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a system and a method for detecting a high-speed road surface based on an unmanned aerial vehicle, which belong to the technical field of high-speed road surface detection, and the method is realized through the system, and the system for detecting the high-speed road surface based on the unmanned aerial vehicle comprises the following steps: the unmanned aerial vehicle is provided with a remote system and/or a short-range controller for controlling the unmanned aerial vehicle to carry out flight operation; the camera is mounted on the unmanned aerial vehicle and used for collecting images of the high-speed pavement and taking the images as first images; an ultrasonic sensor mounted on the unmanned aerial vehicle for performing ultrasonic imaging on the high-speed road surface as a second image; a memory for storing a first image and a second image; the remote system is provided with an image processor, when the unmanned aerial vehicle is communicated with the remote system, the remote system acquires a first image and a second image stored in a memory, controls the image processor to perform image processing on the first image and the second image, and takes an image set obtained after the image processing as a high-speed pavement detection result. The invention can improve the detection efficiency.

本发明提供了一种基于无人机的高速路面检测系统及方法，属于高速路面检测技术领域，方法通过系统实现，一种基于无人机的高速路面检测系统，包括：无人机，配置有用于控制无人机进行飞行作业的远程系统和/或近程控制器；摄像头，搭载在无人机上，用于采集高速路面的图像，作为第一图像；超声波传感器，搭载在无人机上，用于对高速路面进行超声波成像，作为第二图像；存储器，用于存储第一图像和第二图像；远程系统装载有图像处理器，当无人机与远程系统通讯时，远程系统获取存储器内存储的第一图像和第二图像，并控制图像处理器对第一图像和第二图像进行图像处理，并将图像处理后得到的图像集作为高速路面检测结果。本发明可以提高检测效率。

titles.text: 融合小波特征的深度学习超声图像纹理诊断方法及系统
Deep learning ultrasonic image texture diagnosis method and system integrating wavelet features

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a deep learning ultrasonic image texture diagnosis method and a system for fusing wavelet features, wherein the method preprocesses an interested region of an original ultrasonic image; taking the convolutional neural network as a backbone network, and enabling the learnable wavelet branches to be connected with the backbone network in parallel to obtain a deep learning ultrasonic image texture diagnosis model; inputting the preprocessed ultrasonic image into a deep learning ultrasonic image texture diagnosis model, and training the deep learning ultrasonic image texture diagnosis model; and acquiring an ultrasonic image to be processed, preprocessing, and inputting a trained deep learning ultrasonic image texture diagnosis model to obtain a diagnosis result. By adopting the technical scheme, the deep learning ultrasonic image texture diagnosis model is utilized to learn the information of low frequency, high frequency, space domain and frequency domain, and high-precision diagnosis is realized in an interpretable mode.

本发明公开了一种融合小波特征的深度学习超声图像纹理诊断方法及系统，该方法对原始超声图像的感兴趣区域进行预处理；将卷积神经网络作为主干网络，使可学习的小波分支与主干网络并联，得到深度学习超声图像纹理诊断模型；将预处理后的超声图像输入深度学习超声图像纹理诊断模型，训练深度学习超声图像纹理诊断模型；获取待处理的超声图像并预处理后，输入训练后的深度学习超声图像纹理诊断模型，得到诊断结果。采用本技术方案，利用深度学习超声图像纹理诊断模型学习低频与高频、空间域与频域的信息，以可解释的方式实现高精度诊断。

titles.text: 一种切面类别识别方法、装置及超声设备和存储介质
Method and device for identifying section type, ultrasonic equipment and storage medium

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本申请公开了一种切面类别识别方法、装置及一种超声设备和计算机可读存储介质，该方法包括：从视频流中获取目标超声图像，将目标超声图像输入分类模型中得到目标超声图像对应的每个切面类别的预测分数；将预测分数最大值对应的切面类别确定为目标超声图像的目标候选类别；在视频流中确定目标超声图像之前的预设数量帧的超声图像的状态类别；若状态类别与目标候选类别一致，则将状态类别确定为目标超声图像对应的目标切面类别。本申请提供的切面类别识别方法，提高了切面类别识别的准确度。

The application discloses a method and a device for identifying a section class, ultrasonic equipment and a computer readable storage medium, wherein the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a target ultrasonic image from the video stream, and inputting the target ultrasonic image into a classification model to obtain a prediction score of each section class corresponding to the target ultrasonic image; determining a section class corresponding to the maximum value of the prediction score as a target candidate class of the target ultrasonic image; determining the state category of ultrasonic images of a preset number of frames before a target ultrasonic image in a video stream; and if the state category is consistent with the target candidate category, determining the state category as the target section category corresponding to the target ultrasonic image. The method for identifying the section type improves the accuracy of identifying the section type.

titles.text: 多任务学习的相位声全息图生成方法、系统、设备和介质
Method, system, device and medium for generating phase acoustic holograms for multitasking learning

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The application provides a method, a system, equipment and a medium for generating a phase acoustic hologram for multitasking learning, wherein the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a sound field image of a given sound field; inputting the sound field image into a first prediction unit to obtain a first source domain phase hologram, wherein the first prediction unit is obtained by performing network training based on the similarity between a target domain hologram and a sound field sample image input into a preset first prediction network, and the target domain hologram is obtained by performing sound field forward propagation based on the source domain phase hologram output by the first prediction network; inputting the sound field image and the first source domain phase hologram into a second prediction unit to obtain a second source domain phase hologram; generating a predicted source domain phase hologram from the first source domain phase hologram and the second source domain phase hologram. The method and the device can improve the efficiency of generating the phase acoustic hologram and ensure the prediction precision.

本申请提供一种多任务学习的相位声全息图生成方法、系统、设备和介质，该方法包括：获取给定声场的声场图像；将所述声场图像输入第一预测单元，得到第一源域相位全息图，其中所述第一预测单元是基于目标域全息图与输入预设的第一预测网络的声场样本图像的相似度进行网络训练得到的，所述目标域全息图是基于所述第一预测网络输出的源域相位全息图进行声场前向传播得到的；将所述声场图像和所述第一源域相位全息图输入第二预测单元，得到第二源域相位全息图；根据所述第一源域相位全息图和所述第二源域相位全息图生成预测源域相位全息图。本申请可提高生成相位声全息图的效率，保证预测精度。

titles.text: 一种保密会议室的漏声检测方法、系统、设备及存储介质
Sound leakage detection method, system, equipment and storage medium for secret conference room

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to a sound leakage detection method, a system, equipment and a storage medium of a secret conference room, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining image data and view angle range data corresponding to the image data; according to the image data, corresponding sound data are called, the sound data comprise sound spectrum data and sound imaging data, the sound spectrum data are sound spectrograms of sound, and the sound imaging data can embody images of sound source distribution positions; based on a preset matching rule, matching the sound source position in the view angle range data according to the view angle range data and the acoustic imaging data, and marking a target sound source in the acoustic imaging data; according to a preset image analysis rule and acoustic imaging data, adjusting the acoustic spectrum data to obtain target acoustic spectrum data; and carrying out inverse transformation on the target sound spectrum data based on a preset sound spectrum transformation model to obtain target audio data corresponding to the image data. The invention realizes the effect of monitoring the sound condition in the limited range outside the secret conference room.

本发明涉及一种保密会议室的漏声检测方法、系统、设备及存储介质，其方法包括获取图像数据和图像数据对应的视角范围数据；根据图像数据，调取对应的声音数据，声音数据包括声谱数据和声成像数据，声谱数据为声音的声谱图，声成像数据可以体现声源分布位置的图像；基于预设的匹配规则，根据视角范围数据和声成像数据，匹配在视角范围数据内的声源位置，并在声成像数据中做目标声源标记；根据预设的图像分析规则和声成像数据，对声谱数据作调整，得到目标声谱数据；基于预设的声谱变换模型，对目标声谱数据进行逆变换，得到与图像数据对应的目标音频数据。本发明实现了对保密会议室外有限范围内的声音情况进行监控的效果。

titles.text: 二维超声成像的坐标变换方法及相关装置
Coordinate transformation method and related device for two-dimensional ultrasonic imaging

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The application relates to the technical field of ultrasonic image processing, in particular to a coordinate transformation method and a related device for two-dimensional ultrasonic imaging, which are used for solving the problems of complex process of scanning coordinate and display coordinate transformation, high error probability and low measurement precision in ultrasonic imaging coordinate transformation in related technologies. Firstly, for any target point, obtaining a physical coordinate of the target point in a physical coordinate system based on a scanning coordinate of the target point in the scanning coordinate system and a first conversion relation, and obtaining a display coordinate of the target point in a display coordinate system based on the physical coordinate of the target point and a second conversion relation; or, for any target point, obtaining the physical coordinates of the target point in the physical coordinate system based on the display coordinates of the target point in the display coordinate system and the third conversion relation, and obtaining the scanning coordinates of the target point in the scanning coordinate system based on the physical coordinates of the target point and the fourth conversion relation. In summary, the application has the advantages of small error probability and high measurement precision in the ultrasonic imaging coordinate transformation process.

本申请涉及超声图像处理技术领域，尤其涉及二维超声成像的坐标变换方法及相关装置，用以解决相关技术中超声成像坐标变换时扫描坐标和显示坐标转换过程复杂且出错的概率大、测量精度低的问题。首先，针对任意目标点，基于目标点在扫描坐标系中的扫描坐标和第一转换关系得到目标点在物理坐标系中的物理坐标，并基于目标点的物理坐标和第二转换关系，得到目标点在显示坐标系中的显示坐标；或者，针对任意目标点，基于目标点在显示坐标系中的显示坐标和第三转换关系得到目标点在物理坐标系中的物理坐标，并基于目标点的物理坐标和第四转换关系，得到目标点在扫描坐标系中的扫描坐标。综上，本申请使得超声成像坐标变换过程出错的概率小且测量精度高。

titles.text: 一种电子产品的智能检测系统
Intelligent detection system of electronic product

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides an intelligent detection system for electronic products, which comprises a detection table, a remote control terminal, a detection server and a cloud server. The remote control terminal receives the input work task file and generates detection task data; the detection server generates a detection task plan according to detection task data sent by the remote control terminal; the detection platform constructs detection conditions according to a detection task plan sent by the detection server, executes a detection task, and sends a detection result to the detection server for downloading by the remote control terminal; the cloud server builds standard three-dimensional image models of different electronic products and builds a plurality of standard working models of different detection platforms when detecting different electronic products. The scheme can provide standard working models of different detection platforms when detecting different electronic products, automatically configures the detection conditions of the detection platforms according to the working tasks, saves debugging time and improves working efficiency.

本发明提出一种电子产品的智能检测系统，所述智能检测系统包括检测台、远程控制终端、检测服务器、云服务器。远程控制终端接收输入的工作任务文件，生成检测任务数据；检测服务器根据远程控制终端发送的检测任务数据，生成检测任务计划；检测台根据检测服务器发送的检测任务计划，构建检测条件，执行检测任务，并将检测结果发送至检测服务器以供远程控制终端下载；云服务器构建不同电子产品的标准三维图像模型并构建各个不同的检测台在检测不同电子产品时的多个标准工作模型。本方案能提供不同的检测台在检测不同电子产品时的标准工作模型，并根据工作任务自动配置检测台的检测条件，节省了调试时间，提高了工作效率。

titles.text: 一种电子产品的智能检测系统
Intelligent detection system of electronic product

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides an intelligent detection system for electronic products, which comprises a detection table, a remote control terminal, a detection server and a cloud server. The remote control terminal receives the input work task file and generates detection task data; the detection server generates a detection task plan according to detection task data sent by the remote control terminal; the detection platform constructs detection conditions according to a detection task plan sent by the detection server, executes a detection task, and sends a detection result to the detection server for downloading by the remote control terminal; the cloud server builds standard three-dimensional image models of different electronic products and builds a plurality of standard working models of different detection platforms when detecting different electronic products. titles.text: 一种反刍动物的反刍信息采集装置和系统
Ruminant information acquisition device and system

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及信息采集技术领域，具体公开了一种反刍动物的反刍信息采集装置，包括：数据采集机构、无线通信设备、处理器、存储介质，数据采集机构包括用于采集反刍动物图像数据的视频录像设备和用于记录反刍动物声音信息的音频收录设备，并将获取的反刍动物图像数据和声音信息发送至无线通信设备；无线通信设备用于将获取的反刍动物图像数据和声音信息汇总整合并发送至处理器和存储介质中；本发明通过在反刍动物养殖区域设置反刍信息采集装置，以反刍动物的图像数据配上相应的声音信息，在通过数据程序处理后将相应反刍动物的结果报表反馈给工作人员，同时可模拟反刍动物在养殖区域的三维模型使得代入数据的结果准确性更高。

The invention relates to the technical field of information acquisition, and particularly discloses a ruminant information acquisition device for ruminants, which comprises the following components: the ruminant image data acquisition device comprises a data acquisition mechanism, a wireless communication device, a processor and a storage medium, wherein the data acquisition mechanism comprises a video recording device for acquiring ruminant image data and an audio recording device for recording ruminant sound information, and the acquired ruminant image data and the acquired ruminant sound information are sent to the wireless communication device; the wireless communication device is used for summarizing, integrating and transmitting the acquired ruminant image data and sound information to the processor and the storage medium; according to the ruminant data processing system, the ruminant information acquisition device is arranged in the ruminant breeding area, the image data of the ruminant is matched with the corresponding sound information, the result report of the corresponding ruminant is fed back to staff after being processed by the data program, and meanwhile, the three-dimensional model of the ruminant in the breeding area can be simulated, so that the accuracy of the result substituted into the data is higher.

titles.text: 一种沉浸式全息实物异形投影系统
Immersive holographic entity special-shaped projection system

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种沉浸式全息实物异形投影系统，它置于演出场所内，该演出场所包括观众区，在观众区前还设置有异形投影展示区，该投影系统能够将真实物体与虚拟物体产生交互的全息投影技术，实现真实世界和虚拟世界之间的无缝衔接，以创造更加沉浸式、身临其境的体验。通过这项技术，用户可以在真实物体和虚拟物体之间自由移动，观看、感受、交互和动态更改这些对象。

The invention discloses an immersive holographic real object special-shaped projection system which is arranged in a performance place, wherein the performance place comprises a spectator area, and a special-shaped projection display area is arranged in front of the spectator area. Through this technique, the user can freely move between real and virtual objects, view, feel, interact, and dynamically alter these objects.

titles.text: 一种基于超声主动激振的密闭容器泄漏检测装置及方法
Device and method for detecting leakage of closed container based on ultrasonic active excitation

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及气密性检测领域，具体是涉及一种基于超声主动激振的密闭容器泄漏检测装置及方法，其中检测装置，包括支撑结构、超声波发生器、声学成像仪及驱动检测机构；支撑结构用于放置待测的罐体；驱动检测机构包括用于驱动超声波发生器沿着罐体内侧轴向移动及用于驱动声学成像仪围绕罐体周向旋转的旋转行进组件，罐体内还装设有能使超声波发生器与罐体的内壁相抵接的弹性抵压组件。本发明通过超声波发生器和声学成像仪结合的方式对罐体进行气密性检测，弹性抵压组件促使超声波发生器与罐体的内壁接触，进而保证振动源能够有效作用于罐体上，便于声学成像仪高效、精准的捕捉罐体上的泄漏位置，有利于提高罐体的气密性检测效果。

The invention relates to the field of air tightness detection, in particular to a closed container leakage detection device and method based on ultrasonic active excitation, wherein the detection device comprises a support structure, an ultrasonic generator, an acoustic imaging instrument and a driving detection mechanism; the support structure is used for placing the tank body to be tested; the driving detection mechanism comprises a rotary advancing assembly for driving the ultrasonic generator to axially move along the circumferential direction of the tank body and for driving the acoustic imaging instrument to circumferentially rotate around the tank body, and the tank body is also internally provided with an elastic pressing assembly which can enable the ultrasonic generator to be abutted against the inner wall of the tank body. According to the invention, the tank body is subjected to air tightness detection in a mode of combining the ultrasonic generator and the acoustic imaging instrument, the elastic pressing component enables the ultrasonic generator to be in contact with the inner wall of the tank body, so that the vibration source can be effectively acted on the tank body, the acoustic imaging instrument can be conveniently used for capturing the leakage position on the tank body efficiently and accurately, and the air tightness detection effect of the tank body can be improved.

titles.text: 一种基于超声主动激振的密闭容器泄漏检测装置及方法
Device and method for detecting leakage of closed container based on ultrasonic active excitation

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to the field of air tightness detection, in particular to a closed container leakage detection device and method based on ultrasonic active excitation, wherein the detection device comprises a support structure, an ultrasonic generator, an acoustic imaging instrument and a driving detection mechanism; the support structure is used for placing the tank body to be tested; the driving detection mechanism comprises a rotary advancing assembly for driving the ultrasonic generator to axially move along the circumferential direction of the tank body and for driving the acoustic imaging instrument to circumferentially rotate around the tank body, and the tank body is also internally provided with an elastic pressing assembly which can enable the ultrasonic generator to be abutted against the inner wall of the tank body. According to the invention, the tank body is subjected to air tightness detection in a mode of combining the ultrasonic generator and the acoustic imaging instrument, the elastic pressing component enables the ultrasonic generator to be in contact with the inner wall of the tank body, so that the vibration source can be effectively acted on the tank body, the acoustic imaging instrument can be conveniently used for capturing the leakage position on the tank body efficiently and accurately, and the air tightness detection effect of the tank body can be improved.
