titles.text: 一种探头中心频率强度系数加权的超声成像方法
Ultrasonic imaging method for weighting intensity coefficient of probe center frequency

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses an ultrasonic imaging method for weighting intensity coefficients of probe center frequency, which comprises the steps of firstly collecting echo signals received by an ultrasonic probe, determining the positions of echo signals corresponding to pixel points and the intensities of the echo signals according to coordinate information of the pixel points, then taking a section of signals before and after the echo positions to form short-time echo signals, and then carrying out Fourier transform on the short-time echo signals to obtain a frequency spectrum; and then selecting a frequency spectrum intensity value corresponding to the center frequency of the probe, and multiplying the frequency spectrum intensity value by the echo signal intensity value of the pixel point to obtain a high-quality imaging result. The invention can restrain stronger noise without losing other information.
本发明公开了一种探头中心频率强度系数加权的超声成像方法，是首先将根据超声探头接收到的回波信号进行采集，并根据像素点的坐标信息确定像素点对应的回波信号位置及回波信号的强度，然后在回波位置前后取一段信号，构成短时回波信号，再对短时回波信号进行傅里叶变换，得到频谱；接着选取探头中心频率对应的频谱强度值，并与像素点回波信号强度值相乘得到高质量的成像结果。本发明能抑制较强的噪声，且不会损失其他信息。

titles.text: 一种基于超声阵列与图像的天然气泄漏定位声像系统
Natural gas leakage positioning sound image system based on ultrasonic array and image

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明提供了一种基于超声阵列与图像的天然气泄漏定位声像系统，包括：多阵元超声阵列、快拍A/D设备、数据缓冲器、嵌入式处理机、超声泄漏报警设备、摄像头组件、图像变换存储器、图像融合定位设备以及LCD显控设备，所述多阵元超声阵列与所述快拍A/D设备连接，所述快拍A/D设备与所述数据缓冲器连接，所述摄像头组件与所述图像变换存储器连接，所述数据缓冲器、所述超声泄漏报警设备、所述图像变换存储器、所述图像融合定位设备以及所述LCD显控设备均与所述嵌入式处理机连接。

The invention provides a natural gas leakage positioning sound image system based on an ultrasonic array and an image, which comprises: the ultrasonic device comprises a multi-array-element ultrasonic array, a snapshot A/D device, a data buffer, an embedded processor, an ultrasonic leakage alarm device, a camera component, an image transformation memory, an image fusion positioning device and an LCD display control device, wherein the multi-array-element ultrasonic array is connected with the snapshot A/D device, the snapshot A/D device is connected with the data buffer, the camera component is connected with the image transformation memory, and the data buffer, the ultrasonic leakage alarm device, the image transformation memory, the image fusion positioning device and the LCD display control device are all connected with the embedded processor.

titles.text: 基于逆问题的超声全聚焦成像稀疏正则化重构方法及设备
Inverse problem-based ultrasonic full-focusing imaging sparse regularization reconstruction method and equipment

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种基于逆问题的超声全聚焦成像稀疏正则化重构方法及设备，包括以下步骤：S1、采集被测试样的全矩阵捕捉数据集；S2、选取目标区域进行离散化处理，构建全聚焦原理等效加权矩阵，将全矩阵捕捉数据集映射到目标区域得到重构图像；S3、构建逆问题模型，并采用稀疏正则化策略和快速迭代收缩阈值算法求解，获得目标区域的最终成像结果，所述快速迭代收缩阈值算法中引入ReLU函数，对每次的迭代结果进行非负约束。与现有技术相比，本发明能够进行高质量超声相控阵成像检测，为构件安全服役提供更好的参考。

The invention relates to an ultrasonic full-focus imaging sparse regularization reconstruction method and equipment based on an inverse problem, comprising the following steps of: s1, collecting a full-matrix capturing data set of a tested sample; s2, selecting a target area to carry out discretization, constructing a full-focus principle equivalent weighting matrix, and mapping a full-matrix capturing data set to the target area to obtain a reconstructed image; s3, constructing an inverse problem model, solving by adopting a sparse regularization strategy and a rapid iteration shrinkage threshold algorithm, and obtaining a final imaging result of the target region, wherein a ReLU function is introduced into the rapid iteration shrinkage threshold algorithm, and non-negative constraint is carried out on each iteration result. Compared with the prior art, the method can perform high-quality ultrasonic phased array imaging detection, and provides a better reference for safe service of the component.

titles.text: 一种超声相控阵扇形扫描实时插值成像方法
Ultrasonic phased array sector scanning real-time interpolation imaging method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种超声相控阵扇形扫描实时插值成像方法，先初始化超声相控阵的各个参数，设置超声相控阵发射波束在被测试件中的角度范围，再确定各个波束的起始采样位置和延时时间，然后超声相控阵根据各波束的延时时间，控制采样端对各波束从起始采样点开始采样，并根据采样值计算每个像素点的像素值，最后使用多线程分区绘图，从而快速绘制出扇扫图像，实现实时插值成像。

The invention discloses an ultrasonic phased array sector scanning real-time interpolation imaging method, which comprises the steps of initializing various parameters of an ultrasonic phased array, setting an angle range of an ultrasonic phased array transmitting wave beam in a tested piece, determining a starting sampling position and delay time of each wave beam, controlling a sampling end to sample each wave beam from the starting sampling point according to the delay time of each wave beam by the ultrasonic phased array, calculating a pixel value of each pixel point according to a sampling value, and finally drawing a sector scanning image by using a multithread partition, thereby realizing real-time interpolation imaging.

titles.text: 一种超声成像方法、装置及超声设备和存储介质
Ultrasonic imaging method and device, ultrasonic equipment and storage medium

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The application discloses an ultrasonic imaging method, an ultrasonic imaging device, ultrasonic equipment and a computer readable storage medium, wherein the method comprises the following steps: sequentially focusing and transmitting ultrasonic signals based on a first preset aperture from one end to the other end of the ultrasonic probe, and receiving echo signals to acquire a first ultrasonic image; determining an aperture range of the emitted plane wave at two ends of the ultrasonic probe according to the first preset aperture, emitting the plane wave in the aperture range, and receiving the echo signal to obtain a second ultrasonic image; and superposing the first ultrasonic image and the second ultrasonic image to obtain an output ultrasonic image. The ultrasonic imaging method provided by the application improves the signal-to-noise ratio and the resolution of the output ultrasonic image, which are close to the two ends of the edge of the ultrasonic probe.

本申请公开了一种超声成像方法、装置及一种超声设备和计算机可读存储介质，该方法包括：从超声探头的一端至另一端依次基于第一预设孔径聚焦发射超声信号，并接收回波信号，以获取第一超声图像；根据第一预设孔径在超声探头的两端确定发射平面波的孔径范围，在孔径范围内发射平面波，并接收回波信号，以获取第二超声图像；对第一超声图像和第二超声图像进行叠加得到输出的超声图像。本申请提供的超声成像方法，提高了输出的超声图像中靠近超声探头边缘两端的信噪比和分辨率。

titles.text: 超声波成像方法、装置、及电子设备
Ultrasonic imaging method and device and electronic equipment

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The application provides an ultrasonic imaging method, an ultrasonic imaging device and electronic equipment. In the method, the ultrasonic signals acquired at each position in the virtual enlarged aperture focusing group corresponding to each position are subjected to focus alignment superposition to obtain the focused enhanced ultrasonic signal superposition result, so that the target image with higher resolution is obtained based on the focused enhanced ultrasonic signal superposition result, and imaging with higher resolution can be realized even under the condition that the sampling frequency of the ultrasonic probe is limited. The analysis signals corresponding to the ultrasonic signals acquired by each position in the virtual enlarged aperture focusing group corresponding to each position are subjected to focus point alignment superposition to obtain analysis signal superposition results with noise signals effectively suppressed, so that the signal to noise ratio of a target image is improved, the resolution ratio and the signal to noise ratio of the target image are effectively improved, and the accuracy of detecting whether defects exist in a detected sample by using the target image is improved.

本申请提供一种超声波成像方法、装置、及电子设备。在该方法中，通过对每一位置对应的虚拟扩大孔径聚焦组中各位置采集的超声信号进行聚焦点对齐叠加，以获得被聚焦增强的超声信号叠加结果，以基于各聚焦增强后的超声信号叠加结果来获得分辨率更高的目标图像，这使得即使在超声探头的采样频率受限制的情况下，也能实现较高分辨率的成像。通过对每一位置对应的虚拟扩大孔径聚焦组中的各位置采集的超声信号所对应的解析信号进行聚焦点对齐叠加，以获得噪声信号被有效抑制的解析信号叠加结果，以提高目标图像的信噪比，这有效提高了目标图像的分辨率和信噪比，从而提高了利用该目标图像检测被检测试样是否存在缺陷的准确度。

titles.text: 一种声学相机的自适应调整方法、装置、设备及存储介质
Self-adaptive adjustment method, device and equipment of acoustic camera and storage medium

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a self-adaptive adjustment method, a device, equipment and a storage medium of an acoustic camera, wherein the method comprises the following steps: according to background noise of different powers and background peaks in the spatial spectrum corresponding to the background noise, determining the corresponding relation between the power and the background peaks; collecting signals of a target channel in an acoustic camera, and calculating a target peak value in a corresponding spatial spectrum according to the signals of the target channel; determining target power corresponding to a signal of a target channel, and determining a reference peak value corresponding to the target power according to the corresponding relation and the target power; the target peak value is taken as the upper limit of the display range, and the reference peak value is taken as the lower limit of the display range. According to the self-adaptive adjustment method, device and equipment for the acoustic camera and the storage medium, provided by the embodiment of the invention, the acoustic imaging is carried out based on the display range, so that the interference of background noise in the acoustic imaging process can be eliminated, and the imaging effect of the acoustic camera is effectively improved.

本发明提供了一种声学相机的自适应调整方法、装置、设备及存储介质，其中，该方法包括：根据不同功率的背景噪声以及背景噪声对应空间谱中的背景峰值，确定功率与背景峰值之间的对应关系；采集声学相机中目标通道的信号，根据目标通道的信号计算出对应空间谱中的目标峰值；确定目标通道的信号对应的目标功率，并根据对应关系和目标功率，确定目标功率对应的参考峰值；将目标峰值作为显示范围的上限，将参考峰值作为显示范围的下限。通过本发明实施例提供的声学相机的自适应调整方法、装置、设备及存储介质，基于该显示范围进行声学成像，能够排除声学成像过程中背景噪声的干扰，有效提高了声学相机的成像效果。

titles.text: 一种基于四阶累积量的矢量声成像方法及系统
Vector acoustic imaging method and system based on fourth-order cumulant

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to the technical field of acoustic imaging, in particular to a vector acoustic imaging method and system based on fourth-order cumulant. The method comprises the following steps: receiving a sound source signal by using a vector array and constructing a received signal model y; calculating a fourth-order cumulant matrix C of the received signal model y; based on the fourth-order cumulant matrix C, a space energy spectrum is obtained through a vector conventional beam forming method or a high-resolution beam forming acoustic imaging method; and superposing the spatial energy spectrum to an original video image to obtain an acoustic imaging diagram so as to realize sound field visualization. On one hand, the invention improves the suppression capability to Gaussian noise and self noise and mutual noise by utilizing the fourth-order cumulant, improves the signal-to-noise ratio and improves the performance of an acoustic imaging method. On the other hand, after four-order cumulant processing is carried out on the array signals, richer array channel time delay can be obtained, virtual expansion of array aperture is realized, and the processing capacity of the acoustic imaging method on low-frequency signals is improved.

本发明涉及声成像技术领域，特别涉及一种基于四阶累积量的矢量声成像方法及系统。该方法包括：利用矢量阵列接收声源信号，并构建为接收信号模型y；计算所述接收信号模型y的四阶累积量矩阵C；基于所述四阶累积量矩阵C，通过矢量常规波束形成方法或高分辨波束形成声成像方法获得空间能量谱；将所述空间能量谱叠加至原视频图像，得到声成像图，以实现声场可视化。一方面，本发明利用四阶累积量提高对高斯噪声，以及自噪声和互噪声的抑制能力，提高了信噪比，改善了声成像方法性能。另一方面，对阵列信号做四阶累积量处理后，可以获得更丰富的阵列通道时延，实现阵列孔径虚拟扩展，提高了声成像方法对低频信号的处理能力。

titles.text: 声成像孔洞识别评价方法、装置、计算设备及存储介质
Acoustic imaging hole recognition evaluation method, acoustic imaging hole recognition evaluation device, computing equipment and storage medium

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The embodiment of the application discloses an acoustic imaging hole identification evaluation method, an acoustic imaging hole identification evaluation device, a computing device and a storage medium, wherein the method comprises the following steps: identifying an interference characteristic region in the acoustic imaging image, and removing and filling pixel values in the interference characteristic region to form a preprocessing image; detecting characteristic edges of the preprocessed image, removing the background in the preprocessed image according to the detected characteristic edges, and generating a gradual change image; processing the gradual change image by using a maximum inter-class variance method, and determining the segmentation threshold values corresponding to the gradual change image at different depth points; and dividing pixels corresponding to the different depth points in the gradual change image according to the dividing threshold values corresponding to the different depth points, determining hole pixels corresponding to the different depth points, and calculating hole densities corresponding to the different depth points. The scheme provides a mode for quantitatively evaluating the holes based on the acoustic imaging image, effectively extracts the hole information, and accurately calculates the hole surface porosity, the hole density and the like.

本申请实施例公开了一种声成像孔洞识别评价方法、装置、计算设备及存储介质，其中，该方法包括：识别声成像图像中的干扰特征区域，对干扰特征区域中的像素值进行移除和填充处理，形成预处理图像；对预处理图像进行特征边缘检测，依据检测到的特征边缘，去除预处理图像中的背景，生成渐变图像；利用最大类间方差法，对渐变图像进行处理，确定渐变图像在不同深度点对应的分割阈值；根据不同深度点对应的分割阈值对渐变图像中不同深度点对应的像素进行分割，确定不同深度点对应的孔洞像素，并计算不同深度点对应的孔洞密度。该方案提供了一种基于声成像图像进行孔洞定量评价的方式，有效提取孔洞信息，精准计算出孔洞面孔率和孔洞密度等。

titles.text: 图像处理方法、装置、计算机设备及计算机可读存储介质
Image processing method, device, computer equipment and computer readable storage medium

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本申请实施例提供一种图像处理方法、装置、计算机设备及计算机可读存储介质，可以获取待处理图像，以及获取待处理图像对应的图像音频；对待处理图像进行场景识别，得到待处理图像的图像场景；根据图像场景，从图像音频中，提取出图像场景对应的场景音频；根据场景音频和待处理图像，构建有声图像。由于本申请实施例可以基于待处理图像的图像场景，从图像音频中，提取出图像场景对应的场景音频，如此可以去除不需要的音频，进而可以利用场景音频和待处理图像，构建有声图像，从而减小有声图像的体积。

The embodiment of the application provides an image processing method, an image processing device, computer equipment and a computer readable storage medium, which can acquire an image to be processed and acquire image audio corresponding to the image to be processed; performing scene recognition on the image to be processed to obtain an image scene of the image to be processed; extracting scene audio corresponding to the image scene from the image audio according to the image scene; and constructing a sound image according to the scene audio and the image to be processed. Because the embodiment of the application can extract the scene audio corresponding to the image scene from the image audio based on the image scene of the image to be processed, the unnecessary audio can be removed, and further the sound image can be constructed by utilizing the scene audio and the image to be processed, so that the volume of the sound image is reduced.

titles.text: 特高压并联式电抗器声成像检测的传感器阵列系统及方法
Sensor array system and method for acoustic imaging detection of extra-high voltage parallel reactor

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一种用于特高压并联式电抗器声成像检测的传感器阵列，所述传感器阵列由多个阵元组成，传感器阵列包括自最外层开始至最内层的第1至第4不同直径圆环子阵列，各圆环子阵列上均设置8个阵元；其中，在相邻的两个圆环子阵列中，第1至第3圆环子阵列的半径相对于第4圆环子阵列的半径比为分别为2.5、2、1.5；各圆环相邻两个阵元之间的角度差为π/4。本发明中较大直径的圆环子阵列可以提高阵列的定位精度，较小直径的圆环子阵列可以提高阵列分辨率，阵列上的各个阵元分布较为均匀，具有一定的抗畸变能力。阵列整体较小，占用空间较小，且阵列上各传感器位置易于确定。

The sensor array for acoustic imaging detection of the ultra-high voltage parallel reactor comprises a plurality of array elements, wherein the sensor array comprises 1 st to 4 th annular subarrays with different diameters from the outermost layer to the innermost layer, and 8 array elements are arranged on each annular subarray; wherein, in the two adjacent circular subarrays, the ratio of the radius of the 1 st circular subarray to the radius of the 3 rd circular subarray to the radius of the 4 th circular subarray is 2.5, 2 and 1.5 respectively; the angle difference between two adjacent array elements of each ring is pi/4. The circular subarray with larger diameter can improve the positioning accuracy of the array, the circular subarray with smaller diameter can improve the resolution of the array, and each array element on the array is uniformly distributed and has certain distortion resistance. The whole array is smaller, the occupied space is smaller, and the positions of the sensors on the array are easy to determine.

titles.text: 一种基于SegViT神经网络的自适应高分辨率声波成像方法
SegViT neural network-based self-adaptive high-resolution acoustic wave imaging method

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明涉及一种基于SegViT神经网络的自适应高分辨率声波成像方法，属于人工智能领域。该方法包括：1)数据集处理：在固定间距下的随机声源坐标、强度和声源数量的情况下，使用波束成像方法仿真实现带噪声情况下的波束成像云图；使用仿真声源的强度和位置坐标构建无网格的自适应高分辨成像目标云图；2)模型训练与测试：将波束成像云图作为输入，目标成像云图作为网络训练标签，输入到SegViT神经网络模型中进行模型训练，并通过测试集的效果选择最佳权重；S3：模型验证：对比验证集中自适应高分辨成像目标云图与生成结果图。本发明避免了噪声干扰和近源干涉问题，实现了波束成像云图的高分辨率成像。

The invention relates to a self-adaptive high-resolution acoustic wave imaging method based on a SegViT neural network, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: 1) Data set processing: under the conditions of random sound source coordinates, intensity and sound source quantity at fixed intervals, a beam imaging method is used for simulating and realizing a beam imaging cloud picture under the noisy condition; constructing a grid-free self-adaptive high-resolution imaging target cloud picture by using the intensity and position coordinates of the simulated sound source; 2) Model training and testing: the wave beam imaging cloud image is used as input, the target imaging cloud image is used as a network training label, the input is input into a SegViT neural network model for model training, and the optimal weight is selected through the effect of a test set; s3: model verification: and comparing the self-adaptive high-resolution imaging target cloud images in the verification set and generating a result image. The invention avoids the problems of noise interference and near source interference and realizes the high-resolution imaging of the beam imaging cloud picture.

titles.text: 基于目标追踪的超声影像目标多角度融合分析系统及方法
Ultrasonic image target multi-angle fusion analysis system and method based on target tracking

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An ultrasonic image target multi-angle fusion analysis system and method based on target tracking, the system comprises: the invention relates to a target three-dimensional model reconstruction method, which comprises a single-frame image preprocessing module, a target detection positioning module, a target track tracking multi-angle information acquisition module and a target multi-angle information fusion analysis module.
一种基于目标追踪的超声影像目标多角度融合分析系统及方法，该系统包括：单帧图像预处理模块、目标检测定位模块、目标轨迹追踪多角度信息获取模块和目标多角度信息融合分析模块，本发明基于轻量化目标识别网络对超声检测图像进行感兴趣目标识别定位，多角度采集与感兴趣目标有关的关键帧序列，以完成目标三维模型重建和目标三维模型形态特征分析，基于三维形态分析提供该目标的内部性质和外部轮廓的描述。

titles.text: 基于傅里叶梅林矩的单像素成像方法及系统
Single-pixel imaging method and system based on Fourier Mei Linju

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a single-pixel imaging method and a system based on Fourier Mei Linju, comprising the following steps: generating a two-dimensional intensity imaging code from fourier Mei Linju; loading the two-dimensional intensity imaging code into a spatial light modulator; the Fourier Mellin light field generated by modulating the laser beam by the spatial light modulator illuminates a target object; collecting echo signals from a target object, and obtaining the intensity of the echo signals; reconstructing a two-dimensional image of the target object based on the echo signal intensities and the two-dimensional intensity imaging code. The invention realizes the reconstruction of the target image based on Fourier-Mellin light field illumination, and effectively exerts the distortion invariant characteristic advantage of Fourier Mei Linju in the field of target classification and identification.

本发明提出一种基于傅里叶梅林矩的单像素成像方法及系统，包括：根据傅立叶梅林矩生成二维强度成像编码；将所述二维强度成像编码载入空间光调制器；激光束经所述所述空间光调制器调制后生成的傅立叶梅林光场照明目标物体；收集来自目标物体的回波信号，获取回波信号强度；基于所述回波信号强度和所述二维强度成像编码重构所述目标物体的二维图像。本发明实现了基于傅立叶梅林光场照明的目标图像重构，有效发挥了傅立叶梅林矩在目标分类和识别领域的畸变不变特性优势。

titles.text: 基于傅里叶梅林矩的单像素成像方法及系统
Single-pixel imaging method and system based on Fourier Mei Linju

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides a single-pixel imaging method and a system based on Fourier Mei Linju, comprising the following steps: generating a two-dimensional intensity imaging code from the fourier Mei Linju; loading the two-dimensional intensity imaging code into a spatial light modulator; the Fourier Mellin light field generated by modulating the laser beam by the spatial light modulator illuminates a target object; collecting echo signals from a target object, and obtaining the intensity of the echo signals; reconstructing a two-dimensional image of the target object based on the echo signal intensities and the two-dimensional intensity imaging code. The invention realizes the reconstruction of the target image based on Fourier-Mellin light field illumination, and effectively exerts the distortion invariant characteristic advantage of Fourier Mei Linju in the field of target classification and identification.

本发明提出一种基于傅里叶梅林矩的单像素成像方法及系统，包括：根据傅立叶梅林矩生成二维强度成像编码；将所述二维强度成像编码载入空间光调制器；激光束经所述所述空间光调制器调制后生成的傅立叶梅林光场照明目标物体；收集来自目标物体的回波信号，获取回波信号强度；基于所述回波信号强度和所述二维强度成像编码重构所述目标物体的二维图像。本发明实现了基于傅立叶梅林光场照明的目标图像重构，有效发挥了傅立叶梅林矩在目标分类和识别领域的畸变不变特性优势。

titles.text: 一种声波红外图像温度补偿监测开关柜运行状态系统
Acoustic wave infrared image temperature compensation monitoring switch cabinet running state system

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses an operation state system of a sound wave infrared image temperature compensation monitoring switch cabinet, which comprises an infrared image acquisition module, a sound wave acquisition module, a microprocessor and a display module, wherein the infrared image acquisition module acquires switch cabinet infrared image signals and transmits the switch cabinet infrared image signals to the microprocessor; the method and the device realize the fault identification processing of the infrared image signal of the switch cabinet and the acoustic signal of the switch cabinet, and accurately monitor the running state of the switch cabinet.

本发明公开了一种声波红外图像温度补偿监测开关柜运行状态系统，包括红外图像采集模块、声波采集模块、微处理器、显示模块，红外图像采集模块采集开关柜红外图像信号传输至微处理器，微处理器接收红外图像采集模块传输的开关柜红外图像信号，声波采集模块采集开关柜声波信号传输至微处理器，微处理器接收声波采集模块传输的开关柜声波信号，微处理器对开关柜红外图像信号和开关柜声波信号进行故障识别处理，微处理器传输故障识别处理结果传输至显示模块，显示模块接收微处理器传输的故障识别处理结果并进行显示；实现了通过对开关柜红外图像信号和开关柜声波信号进行故障识别处理，精确监测开关柜的运行状态。

titles.text: 基于神经网络匹配确认系数的锂电池内部微产气检测方法及系统
Lithium battery internal micro-gas production detection method and system based on neural network matching confirmation coefficient

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a lithium battery internal micro-gas generation detection method and system based on a neural network matching confirmation coefficient, wherein the method comprises the following steps: scanning the surface of the lithium battery based on an ultrasonic penetration method and a bottom wave height method, and respectively calculating to obtain the maximum attenuation C A Maximum attenuation C B Based on the maximum attenuation C A Maximum attenuation C B The simulation test is carried out to obtain a corresponding bubble confirmation coefficient Sf and a bubble confirmation coefficient Rf, and a training set is constructed and a neural network model is trained; scanning imaging is carried out on the lithium battery to be detected based on an ultrasonic penetration-bottom wave height method to obtain the maximum attenuation C A Maximum attenuation C B And obtaining optimal bubble confirmation coefficients Sf and Rf based on the trained neural network model, and performing ultrasonic internal gas-generating lithium battery imaging based on the optimal bubble confirmation coefficients Sf and Rf. The invention realizes the lithium treatmentAnd the micro gas generation state inside the battery is imaged and judged more comprehensively and accurately.

本发明公开了一种基于神经网络匹配确认系数的锂电池内部微产气检测方法及系统，该方法包括下述步骤：基于超声穿透法、底波高度法扫描锂电池面，分别计算得到最大衰减量CA、最大衰减量CB，基于最大衰减量CA、最大衰减量CB模拟测试得到对应的气泡确认系数Sf、气泡确认系数Rf，构建训练集并训练神经网络模型；基于超声穿透‑底波高度法对待测的锂电池进行扫描成像得到最大衰减量CA、最大衰减量CB，并基于训练后的神经网络模型得到最优的气泡确认系数Sf、气泡确认系数Rf，基于最优的气泡确认系数Sf、气泡确认系数Rf进行超声波内产气锂电池成像。本发明实现对锂电池内部微产气状态的更全面、更精确成像和判断。

titles.text: 气体泄漏量检测方法、装置及电子设备
Gas leakage amount detection method and device and electronic equipment

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本申请实施例提供一种气体泄漏量检测方法、装置及电子设备。本申请实施例在获取到指定气体泄漏环境下的超声信号以及对应的气体泄漏量时，通过提取超声信号的特征值，并建立特征值与气体泄漏量之间的模型关系，得到了指定气体泄漏环境对应的气体泄漏量模型，后续再获取到指定气体泄漏环境下的超声信号时，能够通过该气体泄漏量模型进行气体泄漏量的检测，解决了目前的声学成像设备无法对气体泄漏量进行检测的问题，实现了在发生气体泄漏时通过声学成像设备在获取泄漏位置的同时能够直接检测出气体泄漏量。

The embodiment of the application provides a method and a device for detecting gas leakage and electronic equipment. According to the embodiment of the application, when the ultrasonic signal and the corresponding gas leakage amount under the specified gas leakage environment are obtained, the characteristic value of the ultrasonic signal is extracted, and the model relation between the characteristic value and the gas leakage amount is established, so that the gas leakage amount model corresponding to the specified gas leakage environment is obtained, and when the ultrasonic signal under the specified gas leakage environment is obtained later, the gas leakage amount can be detected through the gas leakage amount model, the problem that the current acoustic imaging equipment cannot detect the gas leakage amount is solved, and the gas leakage amount can be directly detected when the gas leakage occurs while the leakage position is obtained through the acoustic imaging equipment.

titles.text: Gas leakage amount detection method and device and electronic equipment
气体泄漏量检测方法、装置及电子设备

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本申请实施例提供一种气体泄漏量检测方法、装置及电子设备。本申请实施例在获取到指定气体泄漏环境下的超声信号以及对应的气体泄漏量时，通过提取超声信号的特征值，并建立特征值与气体泄漏量之间的模型关系，得到了指定气体泄漏环境对应的气体泄漏量模型，后续再获取到指定气体泄漏环境下的超声信号时，能够通过该气体泄漏量模型进行气体泄漏量的检测，解决了目前的声学成像设备无法对气体泄漏量进行检测的问题，实现了在发生气体泄漏时通过声学成像设备在获取泄漏位置的同时能够直接检测出气体泄漏量。

According to the embodiment of the application, when the ultrasonic signal and the corresponding gas leakage amount under the specified gas leakage environment are obtained, the characteristic value of the ultrasonic signal is extracted, and the model relation between the characteristic value and the gas leakage amount is established, so that the gas leakage amount model corresponding to the specified gas leakage environment is obtained, and when the ultrasonic signal under the specified gas leakage environment is obtained later, the gas leakage amount can be detected through the gas leakage amount model, the problem that the current acoustic imaging equipment cannot detect the gas leakage amount is solved, and the gas leakage amount can be directly detected when the gas leakage occurs while the leakage position is obtained through the acoustic imaging equipment.

titles.text: 一种用于检测固化抑尘性能的系统及方法
System and method for detecting solidification dust suppression performance

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a system and a method for detecting solidification dust suppression performance. The operation system is responsible for controlling the operation of a transportation system and a detection and analysis system, the signal acquisition and transmission system comprises a signal receiving module and a signal transmission module, the transportation system comprises a transportation carrier, wheels and a power system, and the detection and analysis system comprises a MIRA ultrasonic shear wave imaging device, an automatic telescopic device, a sliding rail, a quartz crystal oscillation type density sensor, a capacitive humidity sensor and an ultrasonic intensity sensor. The actual condition of the inside of the cured soil is visually seen through an ultrasonic inversion method, and the comprehensive evaluation of the curing dust suppression performance of the curing agent is carried out by combining the data of the intensity, the humidity and the density of the cured soil acquired and analyzed by various sensors.

本发明公开了一种用于检测固化抑尘性能的系统及方法，所述系统包括操作系统，信号采集传输系统，运输系统以及检测与分析系统。所述操作系统负责控制运输系统以及检测与分析系统的运行，所述信号采集与传输系统包括信号接收模块与信号传输模块，所述运输系统包括运输载体，车轮，动力系统，所述检测与分析系统包括MIRA超声剪切波成像装置，自动伸缩装置，滑轨，石英晶体振荡式密度传感器，电容式湿度传感器以及超声波强度传感器。通过超声波反演法直观的看出固化后土壤内部的实际情况，结合各种传感器采集分析出的固化后强度、湿度及密度的数据，对固化剂固化抑尘性能进行综合评价。

titles.text: 一种基于聚焦发射技术的平面波超声成像方法及系统
Plane wave ultrasonic imaging method and system based on focusing and transmitting technology

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a plane wave ultrasonic imaging method and a plane wave ultrasonic imaging system based on a focusing emission technology in the technical field of ultrasonic nondestructive testing, and aims to solve the problems that a traditional plane wave sound beam diverges, the signal-to-noise ratio of an echo signal is poor, and defect imaging is not clear enough or quantification is inaccurate in the prior art. According to the information of the array elements of the transducer, the material of the detection area, the position of the focusing point, the size of the wedge block and the material of the wedge block, the emission delay of the array elements of the transducer is calculated, the emission delay control is carried out on the array elements according to the emission delay of the array elements of the transducer, focused ultrasonic waves are emitted, echo is generated after the action of sound waves and defects, echo signals are collected by each array element, and the defects are imaged by adopting a plane wave imaging method; the invention realizes the emission of focused ultrasound to the superposition part of the interested region and the focusing region, can improve the detection sensitivity and imaging resolution, and improves the definition and accuracy of defect detection imaging.

本发明公开了一种超声无损检测技术领域的基于聚焦发射技术的平面波超声成像方法及系统，旨在解决现有技术中传统平面波声束发散，回波信号的信噪比差，存在对缺陷成像不够清晰或者定量不准确的问题。方法包括根据换能器阵元信息、检测区域的材质、聚焦点的位置、楔块的尺寸及楔块的材质，计算换能器的阵元的发射延时，根据换能器的阵元的发射延时，对于阵元进行发射延时控制，发射聚焦超声波，声波与缺陷作用后有回波，各阵元采集回波信号，采用平面波成像的方法进行缺陷的成像；本发明实现对感兴趣区域与聚焦区域的重合部分发射聚焦超声，可以提高检测的灵敏度以及成像分辨力，提高对缺陷检测成像的清晰度和准确性。

titles.text: 一种用于超声波成像气体泄漏检测仪的图像增强方法
Image enhancement method for ultrasonic imaging gas leakage detector

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to the field of image enhancement, in particular to an image enhancement method for an ultrasonic imaging gas leakage detector. The method comprises the steps of firstly obtaining a gas leakage image of a region to be detected, obtaining sound wave diffusion parameters of each pixel point in a preset first adjacent region of the pixel point according to the change of gray values of each pixel point in different preset directions and the difference of the gray values of the pixel points in opposite preset directions, analyzing the contrast of a local region of the pixel point to obtain contrast parameters of each pixel point, obtaining a gas leakage characteristic value of each pixel point by combining the sound wave diffusion parameters and the contrast parameters of the pixel point, and enhancing the gas leakage image based on the gas leakage characteristic value of each pixel point to obtain an enhanced image. The invention can avoid the excessive enhancement of noise in the gas leakage image and the loss of key information of the image representation gas leakage, and improve the final image enhancement effect.

本发明涉及图像增强领域，具体涉及一种用于超声波成像气体泄漏检测仪的图像增强方法。该方法首先获取待测区域的气体泄漏图像，在像素点的预设第一邻域内，根据不同预设方向上各像素点灰度值的变化，以及相反预设方向上像素点灰度值的差异，获得每个像素点的声波扩散参数，对像素点的局部区域的对比度进行分析，得到每个像素点的对比度参数，结合像素点的声波扩散参数和对比度参数，获得每个像素点的气体泄漏特征值，并基于每个像素点的气体泄漏特征值，对气体泄漏图像进行增强，获得增强图像。本发明能够避免气体泄漏图像中的噪声被过度增强以及图像表征气体泄漏的关键信息的丢失，提高最终的图像增强效果。

titles.text: Image enhancement method for ultrasonic imaging gas leakage detector
一种用于超声波成像气体泄漏检测仪的图像增强方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to the field of image enhancement, in particular to an image enhancement method for an ultrasonic imaging gas leakage detector. The method comprises the steps of firstly obtaining a gas leakage image of a region to be detected, obtaining sound wave diffusion parameters of each pixel point in a preset first adjacent region of the pixel point according to the change of gray values of each pixel point in different preset directions and the difference of the gray values of the pixel points in opposite preset directions, analyzing the contrast of a local region of the pixel point to obtain contrast parameters of each pixel point, obtaining a gas leakage characteristic value of each pixel point by combining the sound wave diffusion parameters and the contrast parameters of the pixel point, and enhancing the gas leakage image based on the gas leakage characteristic value of each pixel point to obtain an enhanced image. The invention can avoid the excessive enhancement of noise in the gas leakage image and the loss of key information of the image representation gas leakage, and improve the final image enhancement effect.

titles.text: 一种相控阵超声检测成像的线性阵列探头布局激励方法
Linear array probe layout excitation method for phased array ultrasonic detection imaging

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明公开了一种相控阵超声检测成像的线性阵列探头布局激励方法，S1：将单个相控阵超声探头拆分为两个独立的相控阵超声探头，并将相控阵超声探头与相控阵超声主机连接；S2：对超声检测系统的激励顺序进行调整，并对两个相阵列超声探头轮替激发；S3：对超声探头的高压激励和回波信号进行采集；S4：移动超声探头进行扫查，将超声信号按实际物理位置进行存储，并对数据体进行C扫描成像。通过改变阵列探头的布局方式和发射~接收顺序，并在空间上增大相邻两组虚拟探头之间的距离，对其进行隔离，避免在高速检测条件下前一次激励的超声波对于下一次检测信号的串扰影响，提升超声检测系统脉冲重复频率工作的上限，实现高速检测下的快速扫查。

The invention discloses a linear array probe layout excitation method for phased array ultrasonic detection imaging, which comprises the following steps of S1: splitting a single phased array ultrasonic probe into two independent phased array ultrasonic probes, and connecting the phased array ultrasonic probes with a phased array ultrasonic mainframe; s2: adjusting the excitation sequence of the ultrasonic detection system, and alternately exciting the two phase array ultrasonic probes; s3: collecting high-voltage excitation and echo signals of an ultrasonic probe; s4: and (3) moving an ultrasonic probe to scan, storing ultrasonic signals according to actual physical positions, and performing C-scanning imaging on the data body. By changing the layout mode and the transmitting-receiving sequence of the array probes and increasing the distance between two adjacent groups of virtual probes in space, the two groups of virtual probes are isolated, the influence of the ultrasonic wave excited at the previous time on the crosstalk of the next detection signal under the high-speed detection condition is avoided, the upper limit of the pulse repetition frequency operation of the ultrasonic detection system is improved, and the rapid scanning under the high-speed detection is realized.

titles.text: 监控摄像设备的控制方法、系统、装置及存储介质
Control method, system, device and storage medium of monitoring camera equipment

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本申请公开了监控摄像设备的控制方法、系统、装置及存储介质。该方法包括：基于两个拾音组件确定待识别声源的两个声源疑似点，其中，两个声源疑似点包括第一声源疑似点和第二声源疑似点；控制摄像设备旋转至第一声源疑似点对应的位置进行图像采集，得到目标图像；对目标图像进行动态目标识别，并根据识别结果决定是否控制摄像设备旋转至第二声源疑似点对应的位置进行图像采集。通过上述方式，能够及时对每一声源疑似点进行图像采集。

The application discloses a control method, a control system, a control device and a storage medium of monitoring camera equipment. The method comprises the following steps: determining two sound source suspected points of a sound source to be identified based on the two sound pickup assemblies, wherein the two sound source suspected points comprise a first sound source suspected point and a second sound source suspected point; controlling the camera equipment to rotate to a position corresponding to the suspected point of the first sound source to acquire an image, and obtaining a target image; and carrying out dynamic target identification on the target image, and determining whether to control the image pickup device to rotate to a position corresponding to the suspected point of the second sound source according to the identification result so as to acquire the image. By the mode, the image acquisition can be performed on the suspected points of each sound source in time.

titles.text: 一种超声影像分割方法及系统
Ultrasonic image segmentation method and system

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention provides an ultrasonic image segmentation method and system, wherein the method comprises the following steps: acquiring acquired ultrasonic image data; training an ultrasonic image segmentation model by taking the ultrasonic image data as a training set, and carrying out segmentation recognition on an ultrasonic image to be recognized based on the trained ultrasonic image segmentation model; in the training stage of the ultrasonic image segmentation model, internal feature images of various basic learners at each resolution level are aggregated into corresponding feature images in a meta learner based on depth integration, the diversity of the feature images is evaluated based on depth diversity loss, and weights are learned through depth diversity quantitative feature images. By the scheme, the accuracy of the segmentation of the ultrasonic image segmentation model under the limited sample can be ensured.

本发明提供一种超声影像分割方法及系统，该方法包括：获取采集的超声影像数据；将所述超声影像数据作为训练集对超声影像分割模型进行训练，基于训练后的超声影像分割模型对待识别超声图像进行分割识别；其中，在所述超声影像分割模型的训练阶段，基于深度集成将各种基本学习器在每个分辨率级别的内部特征图聚合到元学习器中的相应特征图中，基于深度多样化损失评估特征图的多样性，并通过深度多样化量化特征图学习权重。通过该方案可以保障在有限样本下超声影像分割模型分割的准确性。

titles.text: 一种基于图像处理的超声波成像方法
Ultrasonic imaging method based on image processing

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present invention relates to the field of ultrasound imaging, and more particularly, to an ultrasound imaging method based on image processing. The method comprises the following steps: presetting a frequency range of ultrasonic wave emission; acquiring an echo of a target frequency, calculating acoustic impedance of the target frequency according to the echo, and calculating stratum difference of each stratum; dividing a stratum at the current position into a rock area and an oil gas area according to extreme points in a stratum differential sequence of the optimal frequency; converting the echo of the detection area into a gray level map based on gamma correction, and calculating the distinguishing degree of the gray level map; and iteratively updating the adjusting parameters in gamma correction, and obtaining the optimal adjusting parameters when the discrimination is maximum, thereby completing ultrasonic imaging. By the technical scheme, the accuracy of ultrasonic imaging can be improved, the exploration strategy is optimized, and the development risk is reduced.

本发明涉及超声波成像领域，更具体地，本发明涉及一种基于图像处理的超声波成像方法。所述方法包括：预设超声波发射的频率范围；获取目标频率的回波，根据回波计算目标频率的声阻抗，计算每层地层的地层差异性；根据最优频率的地层差异性序列中的极值点将当前位置的地层分为岩石区域和油气区域；基于伽马矫正将探测区域的回波转换为灰度图，计算灰度图的区分度；迭代更新伽马矫正中的调节参数，当区分度最大时，获得最优调节参数，完成超声波成像。通过本发明的技术方案，能够增加超声波成像的准确性，优化勘探策略，降低开发风险。

titles.text: 一种基于图像处理的超声波成像方法
Ultrasonic imaging method based on image processing
