titles.text: 一种基于灰狼算法的全聚焦相控阵三维超声成像方法及系统
Full-focusing phased array three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging method and system based on wolf algorithm

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a full-focus phased array three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging method and system based on a wolf algorithm, which relate to the technical field of three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging and comprise the following steps: optimizing an array arrangement mode of an ultrasonic phased array sparse matrix of an ultrasonic probe by using a wolf algorithm to obtain a mode of capturing the designed sparse matrix; constructing an object three-dimensional coordinate system of the object to be detected, and acquiring ultrasonic data of a target area of the object to be detected by adopting a set sampling parameter and a set sampling interval in a designed sparse matrix capturing mode based on the object three-dimensional coordinate system, wherein each set sampling interval is acquired with a corresponding ultrasonic data set; each ultrasound data set is converted into a binary image using a wolf algorithm, and three-dimensional imaging image reconstruction is performed by multiple binary images. The method solves the technical problems of slow convergence and low efficiency of the phased array ultrasonic imaging sparse matrix array design method in the prior art.

本发明公开了一种基于灰狼算法的全聚焦相控阵三维超声成像方法及系统，涉及三维超声成像技术领域，包括步骤：使用灰狼算法优化设计超声探头的超声相控阵稀疏矩阵的阵列排列方式，得到设计稀疏矩阵捕捉的方式；构建被测物体的物体三维坐标系，基于物体三维坐标系，采用设计稀疏矩阵捕捉的方式使用设定采样参数和设定采样间距对被测物体的目标区域进行超声数据采集，其中，每一个设定采样间距采集有一个对应的超声数据组；使用灰狼算法将每一个超声数据组转化为二元图像，通过多幅二元图像进行三维成像图像重构。本发明的方法，解决了现有技术中相控阵超声成像稀疏矩阵阵列设计方法收敛缓慢、效率偏低的问题的技术问题。

titles.text: 一种时延—多普勒解卷提高超声成像系统分辨力方法
Method for improving resolution of ultrasonic imaging system by delay-Doppler deconvolution

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention belongs to the field of ultrasonic detection, and discloses a method for improving resolution of an ultrasonic imaging system by delay-Doppler deconvolution, which comprises the following steps: exciting the transducer to generate an ultrasonic emission signal; establishing a transmitting signal database, and searching transmitting signals; under an ultrasonic detection scene, acquiring ultrasonic reflection signals by a transducer to obtain echo signal data; calculating a self-ambiguity function of the ultrasonic emission signal; calculating a sampling mutual ambiguity function of a transmitting signal and an echo signal; R-L deconvolution is performed on the sampled mutual ambiguity function, a target reflectivity density function is estimated, and high-precision delay and Doppler shift parameter estimates for the target point are obtained from the reflectivity density function. The invention adopts the method of unreeling, can not be limited by the self-ambiguity function of the ultrasonic transmitting signal, and further improves the resolution of the ultrasonic imaging system for delay-Doppler parameters.

本发明属于超声检测领域，公开了一种时延—多普勒解卷提高超声成像系统分辨力方法，包括：激励换能器产生超声发射信号；建立发射信号数据库，查找发射信号；超声检测场景下，由换能器采集超声反射信号得到回波信号数据；计算超声发射信号的自模糊度函数；计算发射信号及回波信号的采样互模糊度函数；对采样互模糊度函数进行R‑L解卷，估计目标反射性密度函数，从反射性密度函数获得关于目标点的高精度的时延和多普勒频移参数估计。本发明采用解卷的方法，可以不受超声发射信号自模糊度函数限制，进一步提高超声成像系统对于时延‑多普勒参数的分辨力。

titles.text: 一种导钻地质模型更新方法、装置和计算机设备
Updating method and device for drill guiding geological model and computer equipment

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本申请涉及复杂储层勘探开发技术领域，特别是涉及一种导钻地质模型更新方法，该方法通过获取导钻目标位置的声波数据，其中，声波数据为通过对导钻目标位置随钻录取得到；根据声波数据以及钻头前方未钻区域的三维地震资料，进行速度更新及重新成像，得到随钻的测井信息；根据测井信息通过预先建立的智能建模网络，对初始导钻地质模型进行更新，得到更新后的导钻地质模型。本申请以深度学习框架为基础，创建了适用于地质导钻的模型快速建立及更新方法和系统。通过深度学习大数据样本的构建生成对抗网络的训练，随钻测井数据录取及地震成像更新、初始导钻模型的构建及随钻过程中的实时更新。

The application relates to the technical field of complex reservoir exploration and development, in particular to a method for updating a drill guiding geological model, which comprises the steps of obtaining sound wave data of a drill guiding target position, wherein the sound wave data is obtained by logging while drilling the drill guiding target position; according to the acoustic wave data and the three-dimensional seismic data of the non-drilled area in front of the drill bit, carrying out speed updating and re-imaging to obtain logging while drilling information; and updating the initial drill guiding geological model through a pre-established intelligent modeling network according to the logging information to obtain an updated drill guiding geological model. The application establishes a method and a system for quickly establishing and updating a model suitable for geological drilling guiding based on a deep learning framework. Training of an countermeasure network is generated through construction of deep learning big data samples, logging of logging while drilling logging data, seismic imaging updating, construction of an initial drilling guiding model and real-time updating in the while-drilling process.

titles.text: 一种超声检测方法和超声成像系统
Ultrasonic detection method and ultrasonic imaging system

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention relates to the field of power equipment ultrasonic signal noise reduction, and can obtain the power equipment ultrasonic signal with the best noise reduction effect, thereby effectively improving the accuracy of positioning the partial discharge source position of the power equipment. The invention relates to an ultrasonic detection method and an ultrasonic imaging system, which are applied to partial discharge power equipment and comprise the following steps: collecting an original ultrasonic signal sequence of the partial discharge power equipment; preprocessing the original ultrasonic signal sequence to obtain at least two initial thresholds; presetting a corresponding iteration range for each initial threshold value in the at least two initial threshold values, and selecting at least one iteration threshold value in the iteration range of each initial threshold value to perform wavelet threshold value noise reduction processing to obtain an ultrasonic signal sequence to be analyzed; and calculating the noise reduction effect index of the ultrasonic signal sequence to be analyzed, and selecting the ultrasonic signal sequence to be analyzed with the maximum noise reduction effect index as the optimal ultrasonic signal sequence.

本发明涉及电力设备超声信号降噪领域，可以得到降噪效果最好的电力设备超声波信号，从而有效提高电力设备定位局部放电源位置的精确度。本发明涉及一种超声检测方法和超声成像系统，应用于局部放电的电力设备，包括：采集所述局部放电的电力设备的原始超声波信号序列；对所述原始超声波信号序列进行预处理，得到至少两个初始阈值；对所述至少两个初始阈值中每个初始阈值预设对应的迭代范围，在所述每个初始阈值的迭代范围内，选取至少一个迭代阈值进行小波阈值降噪处理，得到待分析超声波信号序列；计算所述待分析超声波信号序列的降噪效果指标，选取降噪效果指标最大的待分析超声波信号序列作为最优超声波信号序列。

titles.text: 一种声学测井的声波远探测成像方法、设备、介质及产品
Acoustic far-detection imaging method, equipment, medium and product for acoustic logging

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The application discloses a sound wave far detection imaging method, equipment, medium and product of acoustic logging, and relates to the field of acoustic logging; determining an imaging azimuth and a logging apparent depth of a far detection acoustic wave imaging section and a fixed coordinate; performing dissection and gridding treatment on the drilling well track; determining a tangent line and a normal line of a drilling well track under the current logging apparent depth; determining an imaging radial extension from the normal; determining a projection imaging azimuth pointed by a normal line under a geodetic coordinate system according to the imaging azimuth under the fixed coordinate system; dividing a far detection acoustic wave imaging section; distributing the original imaging value under the current logging apparent depth along the normal line of the drilling well track; the imaging value is projected onto the drilling well track subdivision and gridding result by adopting an inverse distance interpolation method to obtain the acoustic wave far detection imaging profile under the geodetic coordinate system.

本申请公开了一种声学测井的声波远探测成像方法、设备、介质及产品，涉及声学测井领域，方法包括确定钻井井眼轨迹空间位置参数；确定远探测声波成像剖面及固定坐标下的成像方位和测井视深度；对钻井井眼轨迹进行剖分和网格化处理；确定钻井井眼轨迹在当前测井视深度下的切线和法线；根据法线确定成像径向延伸；根据固定坐标系下成像方位确定大地坐标系下法线指向的投影成像方位；对远探测声波成像剖面进行划分；将当前测井视深度下的原始成像值沿着钻井井眼轨迹的法线进行分布；将成像值采用反距离插值法投影到钻井井眼轨迹剖分和网格化结果上，得到大地坐标系下声波远探测成像剖面图，本申请能够实现对大斜度井、水平井直观显示和成像。

titles.text: 灵活鲁棒的无相位太赫兹孔径编码三维成像方法及装置
Flexible robust phase-free terahertz aperture coding three-dimensional imaging method and device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention discloses a flexible and robust three-dimensional imaging method for encoding a terahertz aperture without a phase, which comprises the following steps: step 1, constructing a non-phase terahertz aperture coding mathematical imaging model based on a distance domain slice and a detection array; step 2, combining a denoising mechanism with the non-phase terahertz aperture coding mathematical imaging model to obtain a non-phase terahertz aperture coding imaging optimization model based on depth denoising priori and a detection array; step 3, iteratively solving the non-phase terahertz aperture coding imaging optimization model by adopting an alternate direction multiplier method, and adding the flexible depth network trained in advance as a sub-module of an alternate direction descending multiplier algorithm in the solving process; and 4, solving the target scattering information of azimuth and pitch directions of all the distance domain slices, and realizing the rapid high-resolution reconstruction of the three-dimensional target through joint reconstruction. The method has stronger flexibility and robustness and higher imaging efficiency, and can realize high-resolution reconstruction of the three-dimensional target.

本发明公开了一种灵活鲁棒的无相位太赫兹孔径编码三维成像方法，包括如下步骤：步骤1、构建基于距离域切片和探测阵列的无相位太赫兹孔径编码数学成像模型；步骤2、将去噪机制与所述无相位太赫兹孔径编码数学成像模型相结合得到基于深度去噪先验和探测阵列的无相位太赫兹孔径编码成像优化模型；步骤3、采用交替方向乘子法迭代求解所述无相位太赫兹孔径编码成像优化模型，且在求解过程中加入提前训练好的的所述灵活深度网络作为交替方向下降乘子算法的子模块；步骤4、求解出所有距离域切片的方位向和俯仰向的目标散射信息，通过联合重构实现三维目标的快速高分辨重建。该方法灵活性和鲁棒性更强、成像效率更高，能够实现三维目标的高分辨重建。

titles.text: 一种声学成像组件及巡检装置
Acoustic imaging assembly and inspection device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention belongs to the technical field of sound wave positioning, in particular to an acoustic imaging assembly and a patrol device, which comprises an arc-shaped fixed sound insulation column, a semi-annular sound insulation plate and an imaging control module, wherein the semi-annular sound insulation plate is sleeved on the outer side of the arc-shaped fixed sound insulation column in a sliding way, the fixed sound insulation post of arc installs and is used for driving semi-ring plate pivoted actuating mechanism, the mounting groove has been seted up to the fixed bottom of sound insulation post of arc, and the internally mounted of mounting groove has sound wave detection mechanism, sound wave detection mechanism and imaging control module communication connection. The invention adopts a contact wrapped acoustic detection mode, can isolate external acoustic interference as much as possible, reduces the influence caused by attenuation of cable fault acoustic wave, improves the accuracy of positioning the cable fault acoustic wave, can synchronously detect abnormal temperature in the acoustic detection process, improves the comprehensiveness of positioning the cable fault, and can assist personnel to control the unmanned aerial vehicle at the same time, thereby being convenient to patrol.

本发明属于声波定位技术领域，尤其是涉及一种声学成像组件及巡检装置，包括弧形固定隔音柱、滑动套设在弧形固定隔音柱外侧的半环形隔音板和成像控制模块，所述弧形固定隔音柱安装有用于驱动半环板转动的驱动机构，所述弧形固定隔音柱的底部开设有安装槽，且安装槽的内部安装有声波检测机构，所述声波检测机构与成像控制模块通信连接。本发明采用接触包裹式的声学检测方式，可以尽可能的隔绝外部声波干扰，并降低线缆故障声波衰减造成的影响，提高对线缆故障声波定位的精准性，且可以在进行声波检测的过程中，同步进行异常温度的检测，提高对线缆故障定位的全面性，同时，可以辅助人员操控无人机，巡检方便。

titles.text: Three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging device
三维超声波成像装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明的目的是提供三维超声波成像装置，使检查对象物的基于超声波的内部检查的精度提高，并可进行自动判断，本发明的三维超声波成像装置包括具有多个压电振动器的超声波换能器；选择从该超声波换能器振荡超声波的压电振动器的驱动元件选择部；将从所选择的压电振动器振荡的超声波射入检查对象物并接收来自该检查对象物的反射回波，检查出该反射回波的电信号的信号检测电路；通过并行运算处理所检测出的反射回波的电信号，生成三维成像数据(I)的信号处理部；和取得来自该信号处理部的三维成像数据，进行所述三维成像数据的图像亮度校正，使该数据的成像强度分布平坦，并显示校正结果的显示处理装置。

A three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging device capable of automatic judgment and an improved the internal examination of an object by ultrasonic wave. The device comprises an ultrasonic transducer having piezoelectric vibrators, a driven element selecting section for selecting a piezoelectric vibrator to oscillate an ultrasonic wave from the ultrasonic transducer, a signal detection circuit for emitting an ultrasonic wave oscillated from the selected piezoelectric vibrator into an object to be examined, receiving reflection echoes from the object, and detect electric signals of the reflection echoes, a signal processing section for creating three-dimensional imaging data I by parallel-computing the electric signals of the detected reflection echoes, and a display unit for capturing the three-dimensional imaging data from the signal processing section, correcting the image brightness of the three-dimensional image data so as to flatten the imaging intensity distribution of the data and displaying the correction result.

titles.text: 三维超声波成像装置
Three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本发明的目的是提供三维超声波成像装置，使检查对象物的基于超声波的内部检查的精度提高，并可进行自动判断，本发明的三维超声波成像装置包括具有多个压电振动器的超声波换能器；选择从该超声波换能器振荡超声波的压电振动器的驱动元件选择部；将从所选择的压电振动器振荡的超声波射入检查对象物并接收来自该检查对象物的反射回波，检查出该反射回波的电信号的信号检测电路；通过并行运算处理所检测出的反射回波的电信号，生成三维成像数据(I)的信号处理部；和取得来自该信号处理部的三维成像数据，进行所述三维成像数据的图像亮度校正，使该数据的成像强度分布平坦，并显示校正结果的显示处理装置。

A three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging device capable of automatic judgment and an improved the internal examination of an object by ultrasonic wave. The device comprises an ultrasonic transducer having piezoelectric vibrators, a driven element selecting section for selecting a piezoelectric vibrator to oscillate an ultrasonic wave from the ultrasonic transducer, a signal detection circuit for emitting an ultrasonic wave oscillated from the selected piezoelectric vibrator into an object to be examined, receiving reflection echoes from the object, and detect electric signals of the reflection echoes, a signal processing section for creating three-dimensional imaging data I by parallel-computing the electric signals of the detected reflection echoes, and a display unit for capturing the three-dimensional imaging data from the signal processing section, correcting the image brightness of the three-dimensional image data so as to flatten the imaging intensity distribution of the data and displaying the correction result.

titles.text: A kind of supersonic imaging device
一种超声成像装置

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本实用新型涉及一种超声成像装置，该装置包括采集模块、存储模块、第一处理器、第一图像输出模块、第二处理器以及第二图像输出模块。采集模块的输出端与存储模块的输入端相连接，存储模块的第一输出端与第一处理器的输入端相连接，第一处理器的输出端与第一图像输出模块的输入端相连接，存储模块的第二输出端与第二处理器的输入端相连接，第二处理器的输出端与第二图像输出模块的输入端相连接，第二处理器的输出端与第二图像输出模块的输入端相连接。上述超声成像装置，一方面通过第一处理器可以获取供普通用户查看的视觉三维图像，增强了超声成像所形成图像的直观性，另一方面可以通过第二处理器获取供专业人员查看的视觉二维图像。

The utility model is related to a kind of supersonic imaging device, and the device includes acquisition module, memory module, first processor, the first image output module, second processor and the second image output module.The output end of acquisition module is connected with the input of memory module, first output end of memory module is connected with the input of first processor, the output end of first processor is connected with the input of the first image output module, second output end of memory module is connected with the input of second processor, the output end of second processor is connected with the input of the second image output module, and the output end of second processor is connected with the input of the second image output module.Above-mentioned supersonic imaging device, on the one hand the 3 D visual image checked for domestic consumer can be obtained by first processor, the intuitive that ultrasonic imaging forms image is enhanced, on the other hand the vision two dimensional image checked for professional can be obtained by second processor.

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging apparatus and system
超声波成像装置及系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本实用新型提供一种超声波成像装置及系统，涉及超声成像技术领域，装置包括：超声波激发电路、超声换能器、收发隔离电路和FPGA模块；超声波激发电路向超声换能器发射窄脉冲信号，以激励超声换能器向目标检测物体发射超声波信号；收发隔离电路接收目标检测物体在接收到超声波信号后所反射的多路回波信号，FPGA模块对多路回波信号进行数字信号处理，得到目标检测物体对应的成像信号。本实用新型采用超声波激发电路发射窄脉冲信号，激励微型电容式超声换能器向目标检测物体发射超声波，可以提高探测精度，并采用收发隔离电路接收目标检测物体反射回的回波信号，结合FPGA模块对回波信号的处理，大大提高了信号处理速度，及成像效率。

The utility model provides a kind of ultrasonic imaging apparatus and system, is related to ultrasonic imaging technique field, device includes：Ultrasonic excitation circuit, ultrasonic transducer, transceiver insulation circuit and FPGA module；Ultrasonic excitation circuit emits narrow pulse signal to ultrasonic transducer, to motivate ultrasonic transducer to emit ultrasonic signal to target detection object；Transceiver insulation circuit receives the multi-path echo signal that target detection object is reflected after receiving ultrasonic signal, and FPGA module carries out Digital Signal Processing to multi-path echo signal, obtains the corresponding imaging signal of target detection object.The utility model uses ultrasonic excitation circuit transmission narrow pulse signal, minisize condenser type ultrasonic transducer is motivated to emit ultrasonic wave to target detection object, detection accuracy can be improved, and the echo-signal that target detection object is reflected back is received using transceiver insulation circuit, processing in conjunction with FPGA module to echo-signal, substantially increase conversion speed and imaging efficiency.

titles.text: 一种试验用混凝土块质量超声检测系统
Ultrasonic testing system for quality of concrete block for test

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一种试验用混凝土块质量超声检测系统，包括信号激励模块，信号激励模块的输出端与信号增幅模块的输入端连接，信号增幅模块的第一输出端与换能器阵列的信号输入端连接，信号增幅模块的第二输出端与换能器开关的输入端连接，换能器开关的输出端和换能器阵列的控制输入端连接，换能器阵列的输出端与信号采集模块的输入端连接，信号采集模块的输出端与数据存储模块的输入端连接，数据存储模块的输出端与超声成像模块的输入端连接；所述的换能器阵列由多个同时发射和接受超声信号的换能器组成，并且每个换能器布置在被检测混凝土块周围；本实用新型使得对混凝土质量测量精度提高，测量范围扩大，超声功率大。

An ultrasonic detection system for the quality of a concrete block for a test comprises a signal excitation module, wherein the output end of the signal excitation module is connected with the input end of a signal amplification module, the first output end of the signal amplification module is connected with the signal input end of a transducer array, the second output end of the signal amplification module is connected with the input end of a transducer switch, the output end of the transducer switch is connected with the control input end of the transducer array, the output end of the transducer array is connected with the input end of a signal acquisition module, the output end of the signal acquisition module is connected with the input end of a data storage module, and the output end of the data storage module is connected with the input end of an ultrasonic imaging module; the transducer array is composed of a plurality of transducers which simultaneously transmit and receive ultrasonic signals, and each transducer is arranged around the detected concrete block; the utility model discloses make and improve concrete quality measurement accuracy, measuring range enlarges, and ultrasonic power is big.

titles.text: Drainage box culvert inboard corrosion detection structure based on three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging method
基于三维超声成像法的排水箱涵内侧腐蚀检测结构

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本实用新型公开了一种基于三维超声成像法的排水箱涵内侧腐蚀检测结构，该检测结构包括布置于排水箱涵表面的至少一条检测测线，该检测测线是由三维超声成像仪每间隔设定距离进行一次检测所形成的；该检测方法利用三维超声成像仪依次对各条检测测线进行检测获得超声波反射信号，并进行数据处理获得三维超声成像法成果图以获知排水箱涵上相对应的混凝土结构层当前厚度，通过与混凝土结构层的设计厚度进行比较，以确定排水箱涵上相对应的混凝土结构层内表面上的腐蚀情况。本实用新型的优点是：检测方法操作简便，不需要开孔取岩芯，无需破损，能够快速实现对大型排水箱涵结构内侧腐蚀程度进行检测，检测数据最终以图像进行直观展示，检测结果精准。

The utility model discloses a drainage box culvert inner side corrosion detection structure based on a three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging method, which comprises at least one detection measuring line arranged on the surface of the drainage box culvert, wherein the detection measuring line is formed by carrying out one-time detection at intervals of a set distance by a three-dimensional ultrasonic imager; the detection method comprises the steps of sequentially detecting each detection measuring line by using a three-dimensional ultrasonic imager to obtain an ultrasonic reflection signal, carrying out data processing to obtain a three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging method result diagram so as to obtain the current thickness of the corresponding concrete structure layer on the drainage box culvert, and comparing the current thickness with the design thickness of the concrete structure layer so as to determine the corrosion condition on the inner surface of the corresponding concrete structure layer on the drainage box culvert. The utility model has the advantages that: the detection method is simple and convenient to operate, a hole is not required to be opened to take a rock core, the damage is not required, the detection of the corrosion degree of the inner side of the large-scale drainage box culvert structure can be rapidly realized, the detection data is finally displayed visually by an image, and the detection result is accurate.

titles.text: Ultrasonic 3D modeling equipment
一种超声3D建模设备

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本实用新型公开了超声3D建模设备，其包括载物平台、扫描臂、超声扫描镜、3D建模主机，超声扫描镜包括扫描架和超声扫描部，该超声扫描部包括超声探头、超声波发射模块、超声回波接收模块，超声探头形成的扫描区域能够将放置在载物平台上的待扫描产品在高度方向全面覆盖；超声回波接收模块根据回波的时间和声波的传递速度可获取待扫描产品表面和/或内部各点距离超声探头的相对距离，并在三维直角坐标系中形成像素点；3D建模主机在信息显示器中还原并显示3D模型。本实用新型利用超声3D扫描成像的原理，对待扫描产品进行内外深度的3D扫描建模，结构简单，实施方便，且成本低。

The utility model discloses an ultrasonic 3D modeling device, which comprises an object carrying platform, a scanning arm, an ultrasonic scanning mirror and a 3D modeling host, wherein the ultrasonic scanning mirror comprises a scanning frame and an ultrasonic scanning part, the ultrasonic scanning part comprises an ultrasonic probe, an ultrasonic transmitting module and an ultrasonic echo receiving module, and a scanning area formed by the ultrasonic probe can comprehensively cover a product to be scanned placed on the object carrying platform in the height direction; the ultrasonic echo receiving module can obtain the relative distance between each point on the surface and/or inside of the product to be scanned and the ultrasonic probe according to the time of the echo and the transmission speed of the sound wave, and form pixel points in a three-dimensional rectangular coordinate system; the 3D modeling host restores and displays the 3D model in the information display. The utility model discloses utilize supersound 3D scanning imaging's principle, treat the scanning product and carry out the 3D scanning modeling of inside and outside degree of depth, simple structure, it is convenient to implement, and with low costs.

titles.text: Top cover device for absorbing and patterning standing wave of sound box and sound box
一种吸收并图形化音箱驻波的顶盖装置及音箱

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本公开公开的一种吸收并图形化音箱驻波的顶盖装置及音箱，包括，顶盖板、吸音颗粒和透明罩壳，所述顶盖板的上方散布自由移动的吸音颗粒，所述透明罩壳扣于所述顶盖板的上方，所述透明罩壳内壁与所述顶盖板之间设置缝隙，所述缝隙宽度小于所述吸音颗粒直径。利用吸音颗粒的震动与位移消除音箱驻波，并实现驻波的图形化，提高音箱音质效果的基础上，有效提高音箱使用的趣味性。

The utility model discloses an absorb and top cap device and audio amplifier of graphical audio amplifier standing wave, include, the lamina tecti, inhale sound granule and transparent housing, the sound granule of inhaling of freely moving is spread to the top of lamina tecti, transparent housing detain in the top of lamina tecti, the transparent housing inner wall with set up the gap between the lamina tecti, the gap width is less than inhale the sound granule diameter. The sound box standing wave is eliminated by utilizing the vibration and the displacement of the sound absorption particles, the imaging of the standing wave is realized, and the interestingness of the sound box is effectively improved on the basis of improving the sound quality effect of the sound box.

titles.text: Ultrasonic transducer and ultrasonic imaging system
一种超声波换能器及超声波成像系统

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The utility model provides an ultrasonic transducer and an ultrasonic imaging system, which are characterized in that the ultrasonic transducer comprises: the device comprises a handheld base (1), a support rod (2) and a transducer array (3). The ultrasonic transducer is a miniature capacitive transducer, and has the advantages of high sensitivity, wide frequency band, impedance matching with a medium, suitability for manufacturing an integrated array and the like. The square transducer array is formed by combining 25 circular ultrasonic transmitting heads with the diameter of 12mm in parallel, and compared with the rectangular array shape, the square transducer array has the advantages of accurate directional range and better imaging effect. On the control of imaging direction, but adopt the portable handheld base of autonomic design, the ultrasonic transducer of multi-azimuth rotation can realize the nimble transform of imaging direction, and it is more convenient to use.

本实用新型提供了一种超声波换能器及超声波成像系统，其特征在于，所述超声波换能器包括：手持底座(1)、支撑杆(2)和换能器阵列(3)。本实用新型的超声波换能器为微型电容式换能器，有着灵敏度高、频带宽、与介质阻抗匹配及适合制造集成阵列等优势。使用的是正方形换能器阵列，由25个直径为12mm圆形超声波发射头并联组合而成，对比长方形阵列形状，指向性范围准确，成像效果更好。在成像方向的控制上，采用自主设计的可移动手持底座、可多方位旋转的超声波换能器，能够实现成像方向的灵活变换，使用更加方便。

titles.text: 空气耦合超声波成像装置和机器人
Air coupling ultrasonic imaging device and robot

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The utility model provides an air coupling ultrasonic imaging device and robot, the device includes: the device comprises a computing unit, a driving unit, a transmitting unit, a receiving unit, an acquisition unit, a signal processing unit and an upper computer; the computing unit is respectively connected with the driving unit and the signal processing unit; the driving unit is connected with the transmitting unit; the acquisition unit is respectively connected with the signal processing unit and the receiving unit; the transmitting unit comprises a plurality of transmitting array elements; the receiving unit comprises a plurality of receiving array elements; the signal processing unit is connected with the upper computer. Adopt the utility model discloses can improve ultrasonic ranging's precision, and then guarantee ultrasonic imaging's quality to widen ultrasonic ranging's application in the perception of robot.

本实用新型提供了一种空气耦合超声波成像装置和机器人，该装置包括：计算单元、驱动单元、发射单元、接收单元、采集单元、信号处理单元和上位机；计算单元分别与驱动单元和信号处理单元连接；驱动单元与发射单元连接；采集单元分别与信号处理单元和接收单元连接；发射单元包括多个发射阵元；接收单元包括多个接收阵元；信号处理单元与上位机连接。采用本实用新型可以提高超声波测距的精度，进而保证超声波成像的质量，从而拓宽超声波测距在机器人感知中的应用。

titles.text: 一种固定装置及无人机携带声学成像仪
Fixing device and unmanned aerial vehicle carries acoustic imaging appearance

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The application provides a fixing device and unmanned aerial vehicle carry acoustic imaging appearance belongs to unmanned aerial vehicle technical field. The securing device includes a securing mounting assembly and an elastic fastening assembly. The four mounting lug plates are respectively fixed on the front side and the rear side of the top ends of the two sides of the fixed frame, and a first chute and a second chute are respectively formed in the inner wall of the bottom of the fixed frame and the inner wall of the top of the fixed frame; the first guide rod is fixedly connected with one side of the limiting plate, the other end of the first guide rod movably penetrates through one side of the fixed frame and is fixedly connected with the first arc-shaped tight-resisting plate, the first spring is sleeved on the outer side of the first guide rod between the fixed frame and the first arc-shaped tight-resisting plate, and the elastic tight-resisting piece is arranged on the other side of the fixed frame. Through the setting of fixed frame, can protect the acoustic imaging appearance body, improve the security of acoustic imaging appearance body.

本申请提供了一种固定装置及无人机携带声学成像仪，属于无人机技术领域。该固定装置包括固定安装组件和弹性紧固组件。四个所述安装耳板分别固定于所述固定框两侧顶部端前后侧，且所述固定框底部内壁和顶部内壁分别开设有第一滑槽和第二滑槽；所述第一导杆与所述限位板一侧固定连接，所述第一导杆另一端活动贯穿所述固定框一侧并与所述第一弧形紧抵板固定连接，所述第一弹簧套设于所述固定框和所述第一弧形紧抵板之间的所述第一导杆外侧，所述弹性紧抵件设置于所述固定框另一侧。通过固定框的设置，能够对声学成像仪本体进行保护，提高声学成像仪本体的安全性。

titles.text: 一种无人机搭载的模块化声成像装置
Unmanned aerial vehicle carries on modularization sound image device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The utility model discloses a modularized acoustic imaging device carried by an unmanned aerial vehicle, which comprises: base, knot seat, electrode shell fragment, connecting plate, electrode connection piece, acoustic imaging working end, knot seat set up the lower terminal surface central point of base put, the electrode shell fragment set up and detain the inside upside of seat, the electrode shell fragment passes through wire and unmanned aerial vehicle electric connection, the connecting plate pass through spout swing joint and detain the seat inside, the electrode connection piece set up at the connecting plate up end, the electrode connection piece correspond with the electrode shell fragment electric connection after the connecting plate is fixed, acoustic imaging working end set up the lower terminal surface at the connecting plate, acoustic imaging working end passes through wire electric connection with the electrode connection piece. The modularized equipment is adopted, the acoustic imaging mechanism is carried on the unmanned aerial vehicle, and meanwhile, the acoustic imaging mechanism can be replaced by other equipment according to use requirements, so that resources can be better utilized. The utility model has the advantages of simple structure, convenient use, good use effect and the like.

本实用新型公开了一种无人机搭载的模块化声成像装置，包括：底座、扣座、电极弹片、连接板、电极连接片、声成像工作端，所述的扣座设置在底座的下端面中心位置，所述的电极弹片设置在扣座内部的上侧，电极弹片通过导线与无人机电性连接，所述的连接板通过滑槽活动连接在扣座内部，所述的电极连接片设置在连接板上端面，电极连接片在连接板固定后与电极弹片对应的电性连接，所述的声成像工作端设置在连接板的下端面，声成像工作端与电极连接片通过导线电性连接。采用模块化的设备，将声成像机构搭载在无人机上，同时根据使用需要可将声成像机构替换成其他设备，能更好的利用资源。本实用新型具有结构简单、使用方便、使用效果好等优点。

titles.text: 安装于无人机的声波成像装置
Install in unmanned aerial vehicle's sound wave image device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The utility model relates to the technical field of acoustic imaging, in particular to an acoustic imaging device mounted on an unmanned aerial vehicle, which comprises an acoustic imaging instrument, wherein the upper end of the acoustic imaging instrument is provided with an unmanned aerial vehicle, the lower surface of the unmanned aerial vehicle is provided with a mounting mechanism, the mounting mechanism is connected into the acoustic imaging instrument, the mounting mechanism comprises a fixing mechanism which is connected to the surface of the side of the unmanned aerial vehicle in a fusion way and a clamping mechanism which is clamped into the fixing mechanism, the fixing mechanism comprises two symmetrically placed fixing grooves welded to the surface of the side of the unmanned aerial vehicle and springs fixedly mounted in the fixing grooves, and the other ends of the springs are connected with connecting blocks; through settling the downside of unmanned aerial vehicle with acoustic imaging appearance, can fly through control unmanned aerial vehicle, carry out acoustic imaging operation to the large tracts of land fast, acoustic imaging appearance and unmanned aerial vehicle are not welded and are connected, can dismantle between the two, be convenient for change and maintenance.

本实用新型涉及声波成像技术领域，具体为安装于无人机的声波成像装置，包括声学成像仪，所述声学成像仪上端设有无人机，所述无人机下表面安装有安装机构，所述安装机构连接于所述声学成像仪内，所述安装机构包括熔融连接于所述无人机侧表面的固定机构以及卡接于所述固定机构内的夹持机构，所述固定机构包括焊接于所述无人机侧表面的两个对称放置的固定槽以及固定安装于每个所述固定槽内部的弹簧，所述弹簧另一端均连接有连接块；通过将声学成像仪安置到无人机的下侧，可以通过控制无人机飞动，快速地对大面积进行声学成像操作，声学成像仪与无人机并非焊死连接，两者之间可以进行拆卸，便于进行更换和维修。

titles.text: 一种用于无人机巡检的声学成像定位仪
Acoustic imaging positioning instrument for unmanned aerial vehicle inspection

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本实用新型公开了一种用于无人机巡检的声学成像定位仪，涉及电力检测设备领域，包括机体，所述机体后端面可拆卸地设有一散热板，该散热板的外表面设有若干凸起的散热筋条。本实用新型采用散热板作为主要的散热部件，并设置凸起的散热筋条来增加散热板与空气的接触面积，从而提高散热效果。相较于现有技术中开放式的散热孔结构，本实用新型所采用的密封式的散热板结构可起到防水和防尘的效果，使得声学成像定位仪能够更好地适用于无人机巡检作业中。

The utility model discloses an acoustic imaging positioning instrument for inspection of unmanned aerial vehicles, which relates to the field of electric power detection equipment and comprises a machine body, wherein a heat radiation plate is detachably arranged on the rear end face of the machine body, and a plurality of raised heat radiation ribs are arranged on the outer surface of the heat radiation plate. The utility model adopts the heat radiation plate as a main heat radiation part and is provided with the raised heat radiation ribs to increase the contact area between the heat radiation plate and the air, thereby improving the heat radiation effect. Compared with the open type radiating hole structure in the prior art, the sealed radiating plate structure adopted by the utility model has waterproof and dustproof effects, so that the acoustic imaging positioning instrument can be better suitable for unmanned aerial vehicle inspection operation.

titles.text: 一种抗噪型声学成像仪
Noise-resistant acoustic imaging instrument

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The utility model relates to the technical field of acoustic imaging, and discloses an anti-noise acoustic imaging instrument which comprises an acoustic imaging device body and a windshield, wherein the windshield is sleeved outside the acoustic imaging device body and covers the acoustic imaging device body, and further, a plurality of radiating holes are formed in two opposite side surfaces of the windshield, and the radiating holes are used for communicating the inner space of the acoustic imaging device body with the space outside the windshield. Compared with the prior art, the anti-noise acoustic imaging instrument realizes high-efficiency heat dissipation of the anti-noise acoustic imaging instrument under different temperature scenes by arranging the heat dissipation holes on the windshield to form the air channel, so that the running stability of the whole anti-noise acoustic imaging instrument is ensured.

本实用新型涉及声成像技术领域，公开了一种抗噪型声学成像仪，其包括声成像装置本体和防风罩，防风罩套设于声成像装置本体外并包覆声成像装置本体，进一步的，防风罩相对的两侧面上设有若干个散热孔，散热孔将声成像装置本体的内部空间与防风罩外的空间相连通。与现有技术相比，该抗噪型声学成像仪通过在防风罩上设置散热孔形成风道实现了抗噪型声学成像仪在不同温度场景下的高效能散热，进而保证整个抗噪型声学成像仪的运行稳定性。

titles.text: 声学成像仪组件及巡检装置
Acoustic imager assembly and inspection device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The utility model provides an acoustic imaging device assembly and a patrol device, and relates to the technical field of detection devices. An acoustic imager assembly comprising: the acoustic imaging instrument comprises a shell and a heating element arranged in the shell, and the heat radiating fan is arranged at the non-pickup end of the shell so as to discharge heat generated by the heating element. According to the acoustic imaging apparatus assembly and the inspection device, the heat of the heating element is discharged by arranging the heat radiating fan on the shell, and the acoustic imaging apparatus can be ensured to work efficiently and stably without sacrificing the audio acquisition quality of the acoustic imaging apparatus.

本实用新型提供一种声学成像仪组件及巡检装置，涉及检测装置技术领域。声学成像仪组件，包括：声学成像仪、罩体及散热扇，所述声学成像仪安装在所述罩体内，所述声学成像仪包括壳体及安装在所述壳体内的发热元件，所述散热扇安装于所述壳体的非拾音端，以排出所述发热元件产生的热量。本实用新型提供的声学成像仪组件及巡检装置，通过在壳体上设置散热扇排出发热元件的热量，无需牺牲声学成像仪的音频采集质量即可确保声学成像仪高效稳定工作。

titles.text: BILLEDDANNENDE ULTRALYDSAPPARAT MED MATRIXSTRUKTUR
IMAGING ULTRASOUND APPARATUS WITH MATRIX STRUCTURE
BILLEDDANNENDE ULTRALYDSAPPARAT
IMAGING ULTRASOUND DEVICE
DISPOSITIF D"IMAGERIE TRIDIMENSIONNELLE À ULTRASON
DREIDIMENSIONALE ULTRASCHALL-ABBILDUNGSVORRICHTUNG
THREE-DIMENSIONAL ULTRASONIC IMAGING DEVICE

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The object of the present invention is to provide a the three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging apparatus for improving accuracy of internal inspection of an object to be inspected and enabling an automatic determination by means of ultrasonic waves. The three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging apparatus according to the present invention includes: an ultrasonic transducer having a plurality of piezoelectric vibrators; a driving element selecting portion for selecting a piezoelectric vibrator to emit an ultrasonic wave among a plurality of the piezoelectric vibrators; a signal detecting circuit for causing ultrasonic waves emitted by the selected piezoelectric vibrator to enter the object to be inspected, receiving echo reflected from the object to be inspected, and thereby detecting an electric signal corresponding to the reflected echo; a signal processing portion for generating three-dimensional imaging data by subjecting the electric signal corresponding to the detected reflected echo to parallel arithmetic processing; and a display processing device for receiving the three-dimensional imaging data from the signal processing portion, correcting image luminance of the three-dimensional imaging data so as to flatten imaging intensity distribution in the plane direction of the surface of the object to be inspected, and then displaying a corrected result.

titles.text: DISPOSITIF D"IMAGERIE TRIDIMENSIONNELLE À ULTRASON
THREE-DIMENSIONAL ULTRASONIC IMAGING DEVICE
DREIDIMENSIONALE ULTRASCHALL-ABBILDUNGSVORRICHTUNG
DREIDIMENSIONALE ULTRASCHALL-ABBILDUNGSVORRICHTUNG
THREE-DIMENSIONAL ULTRASONIC IMAGING DEVICE
DISPOSITIF D'IMAGERIE TRIDIMENSIONNELLE À ULTRASONS
ULTRASONIC TRANSDUCER, ULTRASONIC PROBE AND ULTRASONIC IMAGING DEVICE
TRANSDUCTEUR, SONDE ET DISPOSITIF D'IMAGERIE PAR ULTRA-SONS
ULTRASCHALLWANDLER, ULTRASCHALLSONDE UND ULTRASCHALL-BILDGEBUNGSEINRICHTUNG

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An ultrasonic transducer (100) includes a substrate (1) having a first electrode therein or on a surface thereof and a diaphragm (5) having a second electrode therein or on a surface thereof, with a cavity (4) therebetween. Further, at least one beam (7) is provided on a surface or inside of the diaphragm (5) or the second electrode.

titles.text: TRANSDUCTEUR, SONDE ET DISPOSITIF D'IMAGERIE PAR ULTRA-SONS
ULTRASONIC TRANSDUCER, ULTRASONIC PROBE AND ULTRASONIC IMAGING DEVICE
ULTRASCHALLWANDLER, ULTRASCHALLSONDE UND ULTRASCHALL-BILDGEBUNGSEINRICHTUNG
SONDE ULTRA-SONS
ULTRASONIC PROBE
ULTRASCHALLSONDE
DREIDIMENSIONALE BILDGEBUNG DURCH AKUSTISCHE VERZERRUNG UND DEFOKUSSIERUNG
3- DIMENSIONAL IMAGING BY ACOUSTIC WARPING AND DEFOCUSING
IMAGERIE TRIDIMENSIONNELLE PAR ÉTIREMENT ACOUSTIQUE ET DÉFOCALISATION

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present invention relates to a system for three-dimensional (3-D) acoustic imaging of a scattering structure using information from a two-dimensional (2-D) image. The system uses a characterized sensor array to emit a signal from the sensor array into an object of interest to generate at least one 2-D representation of the object of interest. The 2-D representation comprises a plurality of x and y coordinate pairs and at least one candidate scattering structure. The candidate scattering structure comprises a shape defined by at least one pair of x and y coordinates. The candidate scattering structure shape is restricted to at least one pair of x and y coordinates. The pair of x and y coordinates of the candidate scattering structure shape are then compared with a first coordinate-dependent response function to assign an x, y, and z position of a scattering structure in 3-D space.

La présente invention concerne un système pour l'imagerie acoustique tridimensionnelle (3-D) d'une structure de diffusion à l'aide d'informations provenant d'une image bidimensionnelle (2-D). Le système utilise un réseau de capteurs caractérisé pour émettre un signal depuis le réseau de capteurs dans un objet intéressant pour générer au moins une représentation 2-D de l'objet intéressant. La représentation 2-D comprend une pluralité de paires de coordonnées x et y et au moins une structure de diffusion candidate. La structure de diffusion candidate comprend une forme définie par au moins une paire de coordonnées x et y. La forme de structure de diffusion candidate est limitée à au moins une paire de coordonnées x et y. La paire de coordonnées x et y de la forme de structure de diffusion candidate est ensuite comparée à une première fonction de réponse dépendante de coordonnées pour attribuer une position x, y et z d'une structure de diffusion dans un espace 3-D.

titles.text: Procédé et appareil pour imagerie synthétique à ultrasons
Method and apparatus for ultrasound synthetic imaging
Ultraschallabbildungsverfahren und -vorrichtung

abstracts.paragraph_markup:
Method for ultrasound imaging comprising at least the following steps:
a) a transmission step in which a plurality of ultrasonic waves are transmitted into an imaged region and a set of raw data is acquired by an array of transducers in response to each ultrasonic wave, the ultrasonic waves having different spatial frequency content;
b) a coherence enhancing step in which, for each of a plurality of virtual transmit focal zones in the imaged region, at least one set of coherent data is synthesized from the sets of raw data;
c) a beamforming step in which, for each of a plurality of locations included in each of the virtual transmit focal zones, an image pixel is computed by beamforming, using the set of coherent data.

titles.text: Ultraschallabbildungsverfahren und -vorrichtung
Method and apparatus for ultrasound synthetic imaging
Procédé et appareil pour imagerie synthétique à ultrasons

abstracts.paragraph_markup:
Method for ultrasound imaging comprising at least the following steps:
a) a transmission step in which a plurality of ultrasonic waves are transmitted into an imaged region and a set of raw data is acquired by an array of transducers in response to each ultrasonic wave, the ultrasonic waves having different spatial frequency content;
b) a coherence enhancing step in which, for each of a plurality of virtual transmit focal zones in the imaged region, at least one set of coherent data is synthesized from the sets of raw data;
c) a beamforming step in which, for each of a plurality of locations included in each of the virtual transmit focal zones, an image pixel is computed by beamforming, using the set of coherent data.

titles.text: Zestörungsfreies Testgerät und -verfahren mit Ultraschallbildgebung
Non destructive testing apparatus and method using ultrasound imaging
Appareil  et procédé d'essai non destructif utilisant une imagerie à ultrasons

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Improved imaging is provided for structures under test that have propagation direction dependent ultrasound propagation speed or position dependent ultrasound propagation speed due to fibrous, coarse grain or single crystalline material. A set reflection points is selected in the structure under test and ultrasound propagation time delays between the reflection point or points on one hand and the plurality of positions on the other hand that fit an observed time delay of the detected reflections are computed. This may be done by means of an iterative method. In the iterative method a synthetically focused ultrasound beam is realized by summing measurements after compensation for propagation time delay from different transmitting transducers to the reflection points. Time delays to receiving transducers are measured from the arrival time of reflections of this synthetically focused ultrasound beam, and the propagation time delay from different transmitting transducers is iteratively adapted until it matches time delays corresponding to the measured arrival times. Time delays to other points in the structure under test are interpolated between the selected reflection points and used in the computation of an image of reflections within the structure under test.

titles.text: Ultraschallabbildungssystem und -verfahren mit Nebenkeulenunterdrückung durch Kohärenzfaktorwichtung
Ultrasound imaging system and method with side lobe suppression via coherency factor weighting
Système et procédé d'imagerie ultrasonore avec réduction de lobes secondaires via pondération avec un facteur de cohérence

abstracts.paragraph_markup: This invention relates generally to non-destructive testing and in particular to ultrasound imaging. A adaptive beamforming imaging method of operating a portable ultrasound imaging system having an array of transducer elements is disclosed. The method comprises transmitting a plurality of beamforming ultrasound signals with each transmission using a different sub-aperture of the array; receiving a reflected ultrasound signals and producing DAS (Delay and Sum) beamforming under each individual sub-aperture transmission. Meanwhile, a coherency factor was calculated based on the proportion of coherent energy in the received time delayed signals from each sub-aperture transmission. All beamforming imaging under defined sub-aperture transmissions were adaptive coherent weighted and synthetised into the final beamforming output. The presented method enables a portable imaging system generating imaging with good quality clarity, contrast and resolution; but less complex hardware and low calculating requirements.

titles.text: APPAREIL D'ESSAI NON DESTRUCTIF ET PROCÉDÉ D'UTILISATION D'IMAGERIE ULTRASONORE
NON DESTRUCTIVE TESTING APPARATUS AND METHOD USING ULTRASOUND IMAGING
ZERSTÖRUNGSFREIES TESTGERÄT UND VERFAHREN MIT ULTRASCHALLBILDGEBUNG

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Improved imaging is provided for structures under test that have propagation direction dependent ultrasound propagation speed or position dependent ultrasound propagation speed due to fibrous, coarse grain or single crystalline material. A set reflection points is selected in the structure under test and ultrasound propagation time delays between the reflection point or points on one hand and the plurality of positions on the other hand that fit an observed time delay of the detected reflections are computed. This may be done by means of an iterative method. In the iterative method a synthetically focused ultrasound beam is realized by summing measurements after compensation for propagation time delay from different transmitting transducers to the reflection points. Time delays to receiving transducers are measured from the arrival time of reflections of this synthetically focused ultrasound beam, and the propagation time delay from different transmitting transducers is iteratively adapted until it matches time delays corresponding to the measured arrival times. Time delays to other points in the structure under test are interpolated between the selected reflection points and used in the computation of an image of reflections within the structure under test.

L'invention concerne une imagerie améliorée qui est fournie pour des structures à l'essai qui ont une vitesse de propagation ultrasonore dépendant de la direction de propagation ou une vitesse de propagation ultrasonore dépendant de la position, en raison d'une matière fibreuse, à grains grossiers ou monocristalline. Un point de réflexion fixé est choisi dans la structure à l'essai et des retards de temps de propagation ultrasonore entre le ou les points de réflexion d'une part et la pluralité de positions d'autre part qui ajustent un retard de temps observé des réflexions détectées sont calculés. Ceci peut être fait au moyen d'un procédé itératif. Dans le procédé itératif, un faisceau ultrasonore synthétiquement focalisé est réalisé par sommation de mesures après compensation d'un retard de temps de propagation de différents transducteurs d'émission aux points de réflexion. Des retards de temps aux transducteurs de réception sont mesurés à partir du temps d'arrivée de réflexions de ce faisceau ultrasonore synthétiquement focalisé et le retard de temps de propagation à partir des différents transducteurs d'émission est adapté de manière itérative jusqu'à ce qu'il corresponde aux retards de temps correspondant aux temps d'arrivée mesurés. Les retards de temps aux autres points dans la structure à l'essai sont interpolés entre les points de réflexion sélectionnés et utilisés dans le calcul d'une image de réflexions dans la structure à l'essai.

abstracts.paragraph_markup: L'invention concerne, selon différents modes de réalisation, un appareil et des méthodes pour réaliser une imagerie acoustique. Une onde acoustique peut être enregistrée à un détecteur, l'onde acoustique se propageant d'une cible vers le détecteur. La cible peut être acoustiquement illuminée pour fournir l'onde acoustique. Un signal du détecteur en réponse à l'enregistrement de l'onde acoustique peut être traité dans un modèle de telle sorte que le traitement implémente une lentille acoustique synthétique pour générer une image de la cible. L'invention concerne également un appareil, des systèmes et des méthodes additionnels.

In various embodiments, apparatus and methods are provided to perform acoustic imaging. An acoustic wave can be acquired at a detector, where the acoustic wave propagates from a target to the detector. The target may be acoustically illuminated to provide the acoustic wave. A signal from the detector in response to acquiring the acoustic wave can be processed in a model such that the processing implements a synthetic acoustic lens to generate an image of the target. Additional apparatus, systems, and methods are disclosed.

High frequency acoustic spectrum imaging method
Verfahren zur Abbildung eines Hochfrequenzschallspektrum
Procédé d'imagerie spectrale acoustique haute fréquence

abstracts.paragraph_markup: A method and a device for high frequency acoustic spectrum imaging for an object over a field of view are disclosed. A camera captures an image of the object and a raster with grids is created as an overlay on the captured image. A directional microphone is used to detect high frequency acoustic waves emanating from the object. An acoustic signal data corresponding to the high frequency acoustic waves is generated by a microphone data processing unit. The coordinates (x, y) of the focal point of the directional microphone on the grid of the raster is recorded and sent as a real-time feedback position signal to a processor corresponding to every measurement of the acoustic signal data. The processor plots a visual representation of the acoustic signal data mapping it to the corresponding coordinates (x, y) on the raster and creates a high frequency acoustic spectrum image for the object by superimposing the raster on the captured image.

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The object of the present invention is to provide a the three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging apparatus (10) for improving accuracy of internal inspection of an object (14) to be inspected and enabling an automatic determination by means of ultrasonic waves. The three-dimensional ultrasonic imaging apparatus (10) according to the present invention includes: an ultrasonic transducer (11) having a plurality of piezoelectric vibrators (22); a driving element selecting portion (13) for selecting a piezoelectric vibrator (22) to emit an ultrasonic wave among a plurality of the piezoelectric vibrators (22); a signal detecting circuit (16) for causing ultrasonic waves emitted by the selected piezoelectric vibrator (22) to enter the object (14) to be inspected, receiving echo reflected from the object (14) to be inspected, and thereby detecting an electric signal corresponding to the reflected echo; a signal processing portion (17) for generating three-dimensional imaging data by subjecting the electric signal corresponding to the detected reflected echo to parallel arithmetic processing; and a display processing device (18) for receiving the three-dimensional imaging data from the signal processing portion, correcting image luminance of the three-dimensional imaging data so as to flatten imaging intensity distribution in the plane direction of the surface of the object (14) to be inspected, and then displaying a corrected result.

ZWEIDIMENSIONALE ULTRASCHALLWANDLERANORDNUNG MIT EINEM NICHT RECHTECKIGEN AKTIVEN ERFASSUNGSBEREICH

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Un système d'imagerie ultrasonore (102) comprend un réseau transducteur (108) comprenant un réseau bidimensionnel de rangées (110) d'éléments transducteurs (114). Les éléments transducteurs de chaque rangée s'étendent selon un axe long (116). Les rangées sont parallèles les unes aux autres. Le réseau transducteur comprend un ensemble non rectangulaire d'éléments transducteurs actifs. Le système d'imagerie ultrasonore comprend en outre un ensemble de circuits d'émission (118) qui actionne les éléments transducteurs pour émettre un signal ultrasonore. Le système d'imagerie ultrasonore comprend en outre un ensemble de circuits de réception (120) qui reçoit des échos produits en réponse à une interaction entre le signal ultrasonore et une structure et reçus par les éléments transducteurs. Le système d'imagerie ultrasonore comprend en outre un dispositif de mise en forme de faisceau qui traite les échos et génère une ou plusieurs lignes de balayage indicatrices de la structure.

An ultrasound imaging system (102) includes a transducer array (108) with a two-dimensional array of rows (110) of transducer elements (114). The transducer elements ofeach row extend along a long axis (116). The rows are parallel to each other. The transducer array includes a non-rectangular set of active transducer elements. The ultrasound imaging system further includes transmit circuitry (118) that actuates the transducer elements to transmit an ultrasound signal. The ultrasound imaging system further includes receive circuitry (120) that receives echoes produced in response to an interaction between the ultrasound signal and a structure and received by the transducer elements. The ultrasound imaging system further includes a beamformer that processes the echoes and generates one or more scan lines indicative of the structure.

abstracts.paragraph_markup: According to a sound image direction sense processing method and apparatus provided in embodiments of the present invention, a left-ear channel signal, a right-ear channel signal, and a centered channel signal that are of a sound source are obtained, where the centered channel is located in a mid-vertical plane between the left-ear channel and the right-ear channel; whether a direction of the sound source is a front direction is determined according to the left-ear channel signal, the right-ear channel information, and the centered channel signal, where the front direction is a direction that the centered channel faces; and when the direction of the sound source is the front direction, at least one type of the following processing: front direction enhancing processing or rear direction weakening processing is performed separately on the left-ear channel signal and the right-ear channel signal. Therefore, a difference between front direction sense and rear direction sense of a sound image may be enlarged, so that accuracy of determining a direction of a sound source may be improved.

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Apparatus and method for generating a DC pixel voltage are disclosed. The apparatus includes an amplifier configured to amplify an input signal to generate a voltage signal, wherein the input signal is generated in response to an ultrasonic wave reflecting off an item-to-be-imaged and propagating via a piezoelectric layer; a noise reduction circuit configured to pass the voltage signal from an output of the amplifier to a node, while reducing a propagation of noise from the output of the amplifier to the node; and a circuit configured to generate a DC pixel voltage based on the reduced- noise voltage signal.

L'invention concerne un appareil et un procédé pour générer une tension de pixel à courant continu (CC). L'appareil comprend un amplificateur configuré pour amplifier un signal d'entrée afin de générer un signal de tension, le signal d'entrée étant généré en réponse à une onde ultrasonore se réfléchissant sur un article à imager et se propageant par l'intermédiaire d'une couche piézoélectrique ; un circuit de réduction de bruit configuré pour faire passer le signal de tension d'une sortie de l'amplificateur à un nœud, tout en réduisant une propagation de bruit de la sortie de l'amplificateur au nœud ; et un circuit configuré pour générer une tension de pixel CC sur la base du signal de tension à bruit réduit.

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Systems and methods directed toward acoustic analysis can include a plurality of acoustic sensor arrays, each including a plurality of acoustic sensor elements, and a processor in communication with the plurality of acoustic sensor arrays. The processor can be configured to select one or more of the plurality of acoustic sensor arrays based on one or more input parameters, and generate acoustic image data representative of an acoustic scene based on received acoustic data from the selected one or more acoustic sensor arrays. Such input parameters can include distance information and/or frequency information. Different acoustic sensor arrays can share acoustic sensor elements in common or can be entirely separate from one another. Acoustic image data can be combined with electromagnetic image data from an electromagnetic imaging tool to generate a display image.

SYSTEME UND VERFAHREN ZUR ULTRASCHALLSTRAHLFORMUNG UNTER VERWENDUNG EINER KOHÄRENT COMPOUNDIERTEN FRESNEL-FOKUSSIERUNG

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Une focalisation d'élévation de Fresnel à un angle d'élévation sélectionné est effectuée par l'émission d'un ensemble séquentiel d'impulsions d'ultrasons focalisées de Fresnel, avec l'utilisation d'un motif de phase de Fresnel différent pour chaque impulsion, les signaux de réception ayant une composition cohérente. Les différents motifs de Fresnel permettent de réduire l'énergie de lobe secondaire par un effet de moyenne sur les variations des champs de pression dans les régions de lobe secondaire. Dans certains modes de réalisation, le procédé de focalisation de Fresnel à composition cohérente est combiné à une imagerie d'onde défocalisée à composition cohérente (par exemple, une onde plane ou une onde divergente) dans la direction azimutale. On collecte chacune des tranches d'élévation en modifiant les motifs de Fresnel respectivement utilisés lorsque la séquence d'ondes planes ou d'ondes divergentes est transmise, de telle façon que la composition cohérente puisse profiter aux deux plans simultanément. On peut employer un codage de réception d'Hadamard suivi d'une formation de faisceau de réception dynamique pour améliorer encore les performances dans la direction de l'élévation.

Une focalisation d'élévation de Fresnel à un angle d'élévation sélectionné est effectuée par l'émission d'un ensemble séquentiel d'impulsions d'ultrasons focalisées de Fresnel, avec l'utilisation d'un motif de phase de Fresnel différent pour chaque impulsion, les signaux de réception ayant une composition cohérente. Les différents motifs de Fresnel permettent de réduire l'énergie de lobe secondaire par un effet de moyenne sur les variations des champs de pression dans les régions de lobe secondaire. Dans certains modes de réalisation, le procédé de focalisation de Fresnel à composition cohérente est combiné à une imagerie d'onde défocalisée à composition cohérente (par exemple, une onde plane ou une onde divergente) dans la direction azimutale. On collecte chacune des tranches d'élévation en modifiant les motifs de Fresnel respectivement utilisés lorsque la séquence d'ondes planes ou d'ondes divergentes est transmise, de telle façon que la composition cohérente puisse profiter aux deux plans simultanément. On peut employer un codage de réception d'Hadamard suivi d'une formation de faisceau de réception dynamique pour améliorer encore les performances dans la direction de l'élévation.

Fresnel elevation focusing at a selected elevation angle is performed by transmitting a sequential set of Fresnel-focused ultrasound pulses, where a different Fresnel phase pattern is used for each pulse, and where the receive signals are coherently compounded. The different Fresnel patterns cause the secondary lobe energy to be reduced via averaging of variations of the pressure fields in the secondary lobe regions. In some embodiments, the method of coherently compounded Fresnel focusing is combined with coherently compounded defocused wave (e.g. plane wave or diverging wave) imaging in the azimuth direction. Each of the elevation slices are collected by changing the Fresnel patterns respectively employed when the sequence of plane waves or diverging waves are transmitted, such that the coherent compounding can benefit both planes simultaneously. Hadamard receive encoding and subsequent dynamic receive beamforming may be employed to further improve performance in the elevation direction.

Hadamard receive encoding and subsequent dynamic receive beamforming may be employed to further improve performance in the elevation direction.

abstracts.paragraph_markup: La présente invention a trait à des systèmes, des dispositifs et des procédés pour une imagerie par ultrasons grâce à un échantillonnage épars. Dans un mode de réalisation, un système d'imagerie par ultrasons comprend un réseau d'éléments transducteurs ultrasonores, un ensemble de circuits électroniques en communication avec le réseau d'éléments transducteurs ultrasonores et conçu pour sélectionner une première ouverture de réception de ce réseau incluant une pluralité d'éléments transducteurs ultrasonores contigus et au moins un élément transducteur ultrasonore non contigu, ainsi qu'un formeur de faisceaux en communication avec l'ensemble de circuits électroniques. Chaque élément transducteur ultrasonore de la première ouverture de réception est prévu pour recevoir des échos ultrasonores réfléchis et générer un signal électrique représentatif de données d'imagerie. Le formeur de faisceaux est destiné à recevoir les signaux électriques générés par ladite première ouverture de réception, et à appliquer un poids différent aux signaux électriques générés par les éléments transducteurs ultrasonores contigus et au signal électrique généré par ledit élément transducteur ultrasonore non contigu.

Systems, devices, and methods for ultrasonic imaging by sparse sampling are provided. In one embodiment, an ultrasound imaging system comprises an array of ultrasound transducer elements, electronic circuitry in communication with the array of ultrasound transducer elements and configured to select a first receive aperture of the array comprising a plurality of contiguous ultrasound transducer elements and at least one non-contiguous ultrasound transducer element, and a beamformer in communication with the electronic circuitry. Each ultrasound transducer element of the first receive aperture is configured to receive reflected ultrasound echoes and generate an electrical signal representative of imaging data. The beamformer is configured to receive the electrical signals generated by the first receive aperture and apply different weight to the electrical signals generated by the contiguous ultrasound transducer elements and the electrical signal generated by the at least one non-contiguous ultrasound transducer element.

abstracts.paragraph_markup: A sound field model is easily reproduced from a 2D image data. An acoustic filter of an image data on an unknown space of which parameter is not known can be easily obtained. An acoustic device constituting a controller of an acoustic system includes a computation part (101), to which are connected an imaging device (2) mainly realized by a computer; a sound collector (3), and a storage device (4). The computation part (101) serves an encoder which makes an image of an unknown space associate with a spatial acoustic filter coefficient, so as to stereophonically reproduce a sound field. A decoder which can be a device separately from the acoustic device (100) is connected to a reproducer, in addition to the computation part (101). The reproducer outputs a sound corresponding to a 2D image with a reverberation sound obtained from a spatial acoustic filter characteristic corresponding to the image of the unknown space.

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Des aspects et des modes de réalisation de la présente invention concernent un procédé à ultrasons et un appareil à ultrasons et un produit-programme d'ordinateur permettant de mettre en œuvre ce procédé. Le procédé à ultrasons comprend : la configuration de deux émetteurs ultrasons séparés ou plus pour émettre un signal dans une région de coïncidence ; la configuration d'un réseau de réception pour recevoir des fronts d'onde représentatifs d'un signal émis depuis chacun des deux émetteurs ou plus après interaction du signal émis avec un milieu situé à l'intérieur de la région de coïncidence ; l'analyse de chacun des fronts d'onde reçus pour déterminer une position spatiale relative de chacun des deux émetteurs ultrasonores séparés ou plus ; et l'utilisation de la position spatiale relative déterminée de chacun des deux émetteurs ultrasonores séparés ou plus pour réaliser une combinaison de signaux cohérents pour les fronts d'onde reçus au niveau du réseau de réception depuis chacun des deux émetteurs ou plus après interaction du signal émis avec le milieu situé à l'intérieur de la région de coïncidence. Par conséquent, dans certains modes de réalisation, le procédé permet la fourniture d'un système d'imagerie ultrasonore à multiples transducteurs en fournissant un procédé robuste pour localiser avec précision les transducteurs dans le système aux fins d'une formation de faisceau d'une image finale. Le procédé et l'appareil selon l'invention permettent d'améliorer la qualité d'image en terme de résolution, de pénétration de profondeur, de contraste et de rapport signal sur bruit (SNR).

Des aspects et des modes de réalisation de la présente invention concernent un procédé à ultrasons et un appareil à ultrasons et un produit-programme d'ordinateur permettant de mettre en œuvre ce procédé. Le procédé à ultrasons comprend : la configuration de deux émetteurs ultrasons séparés ou plus pour émettre un signal dans une région de coïncidence ; la configuration d'un réseau de réception pour recevoir des fronts d'onde représentatifs d'un signal émis depuis chacun des deux émetteurs ou plus après interaction du signal émis avec un milieu situé à l'intérieur de la région de coïncidence ; l'analyse de chacun des fronts d'onde reçus pour déterminer une position spatiale relative de chacun des deux émetteurs ultrasonores séparés ou plus ; et l'utilisation de la position spatiale relative déterminée de chacun des deux émetteurs ultrasonores séparés ou plus pour réaliser une combinaison de signaux cohérents pour les fronts d'onde reçus au niveau du réseau de réception depuis chacun des deux émetteurs ou plus après interaction du signal émis avec le milieu situé à l'intérieur de la région de coïncidence. Par conséquent, dans certains modes de réalisation, le procédé permet la fourniture d'un système d'imagerie ultrasonore à multiples transducteurs en fournissant un procédé robuste pour localiser avec précision les transducteurs dans le système aux fins d'une formation de faisceau d'une image finale. Le procédé et l'appareil selon l'invention permettent d'améliorer la qualité d'image en terme de résolution, de pénétration de profondeur, de contraste et de rapport signal sur bruit (SNR).

Aspects and embodiments described provide an ultrasound method and an ultrasound apparatus and computer program product operable to perform that method. The ultrasound method comprises: configuring two or more separate ultrasound transmitters to transmit a signal into a coincident region; configuring a receiving array to receive wavefronts representative of a transmitted signal from each of the two or more transmitters after interaction of the transmitted signal with a medium located within the coincident region; analysing each of the received wavefronts to determine a relative spatial position of each of the two or more separate ultrasound transmitters; and using the determined relative spatial position of each of the two or more separate ultrasound transmitters to perform coherent signal combination of the wavefronts received at the receiving array from each of the two or more transmitters after interaction of the transmitted signal with the medium located within the coincident region. Accordingly, in some embodiments, the method allows for provision of a multi- transducer ultrasound imaging system by providing a robust method to accurately localize the transducers in the system in order to beamform a final image. The method and apparatus described allow for improvements in imaging quality in terms of resolution, depth penetration, contrast and signal to noise ratio (SNR).

Accordingly, in some embodiments, the method allows for provision of a multi- transducer ultrasound imaging system by providing a robust method to accurately localize the transducers in the system in order to beamform a final image. The method and apparatus described allow for improvements in imaging quality in terms of resolution, depth penetration, contrast and signal to noise ratio (SNR).

titles.text: PROCÉDÉ ET APPAREIL PERMETTANT DE SÉLECTIONNER DES ÉTATS DE PUISSANCE DANS UN SYSTÈME D'IMAGERIE PAR ULTRASONS
VERFAHREN UND VORRICHTUNG ZUR AUSWAHL VON LEISTUNGSZUSTÄNDEN IN EINEM ULTRASCHALLBILDGEBUNGSSYSTEM
METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR SELECTING POWER STATES IN AN ULTRASOUND IMAGING SYSTEM

abstracts.paragraph_markup: La présente invention concerne un système d'imagerie par ultrasons qui comprend un processeur qui est programmé pour faire fonctionner le système dans un état de fonctionnement normal et dans au moins deux états de puissance plus faible. Le processeur diminue l'état de puissance de fonctionnement à un état de puissance plus faible lors de la détection d'une ou de plusieurs conditions de fonctionnement telles que l'absence de tissu imagé dans une limite de temps prédéfinie ou l'absence de déplacement du système d'imagerie ou du transducteur dans une limite de temps. Lors d'une réactivation après un état de mise hors tension, le processeur implémente un état de puissance plus faible avant de fonctionner à l'état de fonctionnement normal pour éviter une utilisation excessive de puissance jusqu'à ce que le transducteur soit positionné pour imager un tissu.

An ultrasound imaging system includes a processor that is programmed to operate the system in a normal operating state and two or more lesser power states. The processor lowers the operating power state to a lesser power state upon detecting one or more operating conditions such as no tissue been imaged in a predetermined time limit or that the imaging system or transducer has not been moved in a time limit. Upon awakening from a power off state, the processor implements a lesser power state before operating at the normal operating state to avoid undue power use until the transducer is positioned to image tissue.

An ultrasound imaging system includes a processor that is programmed to operate the system in a normal operating state and two or more lesser power states. The processor lowers the operating power state to a lesser power state upon detecting one or more operating conditions such as no tissue been imaged in a predetermined time limit or that the imaging system or transducer has not been moved in a time limit. Upon awakening from a power off state, the processor implements a lesser power state before operating at the normal operating state to avoid undue power use until the transducer is positioned to image tissue.

VERFAHREN UND VORRICHTUNG ZUR AUSWAHL VON LEISTUNGSZUSTÄNDEN IN EINEM ULTRASCHALLBILDGEBUNGSSYSTEM
SYSTEME UND VERFAHREN ZUM MARKIEREN UND VERKNÜPFEN VON AKUSTISCHEN BILDERN
SYSTÈMES ET PROCÉDÉS D'ÉTIQUETAGE ET DE LIAISON D'IMAGES ACOUSTIQUES
SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR TAGGING AND LINKING ACOUSTIC IMAGES

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Certains systèmes comprennent un réseau de capteurs acoustiques conçus pour recevoir des signaux acoustiques, un outil d'imagerie électromagnétique conçu pour recevoir un rayonnement électromagnétique, un capteur de position conçu pour délivrer des informations de position, une mémoire et un processeur. Le processeur peut recevoir des données acoustiques du réseau de capteurs acoustiques et générer des données d'image acoustique à partir des données acoustiques reçues. Le processeur peut recevoir des données d'image électromagnétique de l'outil d'imagerie électromagnétique et combiner les données d'image acoustique générées et les données d'image électromagnétique reçues pour générer une image d'affichage. Le processeur peut recevoir des informations de position provenant du capteur de position, et sauvegarder l'image d'affichage dans une mémoire associée aux informations de position reçues. Les informations de position peuvent être mémorisées dans des métadonnées de l'image d'affichage ou être affichées à l'intérieur de l'image d'affichage. Le processeur peut être configuré pour lier des images mémorisées en mémoire, tel que sur la base d'informations de position associées à ces images.

Certains systèmes comprennent un réseau de capteurs acoustiques conçus pour recevoir des signaux acoustiques, un outil d'imagerie électromagnétique conçu pour recevoir un rayonnement électromagnétique, un capteur de position conçu pour délivrer des informations de position, une mémoire et un processeur. Le processeur peut recevoir des données acoustiques du réseau de capteurs acoustiques et générer des données d'image acoustique à partir des données acoustiques reçues. Le processeur peut recevoir des données d'image électromagnétique de l'outil d'imagerie électromagnétique et combiner les données d'image acoustique générées et les données d'image électromagnétique reçues pour générer une image d'affichage. Le processeur peut recevoir des informations de position provenant du capteur de position, et sauvegarder l'image d'affichage dans une mémoire associée aux informations de position reçues. Les informations de position peuvent être mémorisées dans des métadonnées de l'image d'affichage ou être affichées à l'intérieur de l'image d'affichage. Le processeur peut être configuré pour lier des images mémorisées en mémoire, tel que sur la base d'informations de position associées à ces images.

Some systems include an acoustic sensor array configured to receive acoustic signals, an electromagnetic imaging tool configured to receive electromagnetic radiation, a position sensor configured to output position information, memory, and a processor. The processor can receive acoustic data from the acoustic sensor array and generate acoustic image data from the received acoustic data. The processor can receive electromagnetic image data from the electromagnetic imaging tool and combine the generated acoustic image data and the received electromagnetic image data to generate a display image. The processor can receive position information from the position sensor, and save the display image in memory associated with the received position information. Position information can be stored in metadata of the display image or displayed within the display image. The processor can be configured to link images stored in memory, such as based on position information associated with such images.

Position information can be stored in metadata of the display image or displayed within the display image. The processor can be configured to link images stored in memory, such as based on position information associated with such images.

titles.text: SYSTÈMES ET PROCÉDÉS DE PROJECTION ET D'AFFICHAGE DE DONNÉES ACOUSTIQUES
SYSTEME UND VERFAHREN ZUR PROJEKTION UND ANZEIGE VON AKUSTISCHEN DATEN
SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR PROJECTING AND DISPLAYING ACOUSTIC DATA

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Les systèmes peuvent comprendre : un réseau de capteurs acoustiques configuré pour recevoir des signaux acoustiques; un illuminateur configuré pour émettre un rayonnement électromagnétique; un outil d'imagerie électromagnétique configuré pour recevoir un rayonnement électromagnétique; un outil de mesure de distance; et un processeur. Le processeur peut : éclairer la scène cible au moyen de l'illuminateur; recevoir des données d'image électromagnétique de l'outil d'imagerie électromagnétique représentant la scène éclairée; recevoir des données acoustiques du réseau de capteurs acoustiques; et recevoir des informations de distance de l'outil de mesure de distance. Le processeur peut également être configuré pour : générer des données d'image acoustique de la scène d'après les données acoustiques reçues et les informations de distance reçues; et générer une image d'affichage comprenant des données d'image acoustique combinées et des données d'image électromagnétique. Le processeur peut déterminer les profondeurs de divers signaux acoustiques au sein d'une scène et générer une représentation de la scène qui présente les profondeurs déterminées, y compris un plan de masse et des représentations volumétriques.

Les systèmes peuvent comprendre : un réseau de capteurs acoustiques configuré pour recevoir des signaux acoustiques; un illuminateur configuré pour émettre un rayonnement électromagnétique; un outil d'imagerie électromagnétique configuré pour recevoir un rayonnement électromagnétique; un outil de mesure de distance; et un processeur. Le processeur peut : éclairer la scène cible au moyen de l'illuminateur; recevoir des données d'image électromagnétique de l'outil d'imagerie électromagnétique représentant la scène éclairée; recevoir des données acoustiques du réseau de capteurs acoustiques; et recevoir des informations de distance de l'outil de mesure de distance. Le processeur peut également être configuré pour : générer des données d'image acoustique de la scène d'après les données acoustiques reçues et les informations de distance reçues; et générer une image d'affichage comprenant des données d'image acoustique combinées et des données d'image électromagnétique. Le processeur peut déterminer les profondeurs de divers signaux acoustiques au sein d'une scène et générer une représentation de la scène qui présente les profondeurs déterminées, y compris un plan de masse et des représentations volumétriques.

Systems can include an acoustic sensor array configured to receive acoustic signals, an illuminator configured to emit electromagnetic radiation, an electromagnetic imaging tool configured to receive electromagnetic radiation, a distance measuring tool, and a processor. The processor can illuminate the target scene via the illuminator, receive electromagnetic image data from the electromagnetic imaging tool representative of the illuminated scene, receive acoustic data from the acoustic sensor array, and receive distance information from the distance measuring tool. The processor can be further configured to generate acoustic image data of the scene based on the received acoustic data and received distance information and generate a display image comprising combined acoustic image data and electromagnetic image data. The processor can determine depths of various acoustic signals within a scene and generate a representation of the scene the shows the determined depths, including floorplan and volumetric representations.
