An apparatus for reproducing a spatially extended sound source having a defined position or direction and geometry in space, the apparatus comprising: an interface (100) for receiving a listener position; A projection plane of a two-dimensional or three-dimensional shell related to the spatially extended sound source using the listener position, information on the geometry of the spatially extended sound source, and information on the position of the spatially extended sound source. a projector 120 for calculating projections; a sound position calculator 140 for calculating positions of at least two sound sources relative to the spatially expanded sound source using the projection plane; and a renderer (160) for rendering the at least two sound sources at the locations to obtain reproduction of the spatially extended sound source with two or more output signals, wherein the renderer (160) renders different sound signals for different locations. configured to use, wherein the different sound signals are associated with the spatially extended sound source, and wherein the renderer 160 responds to received specific information 320 to determine a fixed position of the spatially extended sound source and and/or render the at least two sound sources with respect to orientation.

titles.text: 이상 음원 결정 방법 및 AI 음향 영상 카메라
AI Acoustic Image Camera

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 음원의 위치를 파악하여 위치별 음향 수준 데이터를 생성하는 음원 로컬라이징 수단부와, 위치가 파악된 음원에 대한 시간 영역 음향 신호를 추출하고, 추출된 시간 영역 음향 신호의 음향 특징 이미지를 인공지능 학습 및 인식함으로써 이상 음원으로 추정되는 음원의 종류를 인식하는 인공지능 음향 분석부와, 음원이 위치하고 있는 것으로 인정된 영역의 영상 분석을 통해 음원 위치에 있는 객체의 종류를 인식하는 객체 인식부와, 음원의 종류와 객체의 종류가 공통성을 갖는 경우 진정한 음원으로 판정하는 판단부를 포함하여 구성되는 특징으로 하는 AI 음향 카메라에 관한 것이다.

The present invention relates to an AI sound image camera that is characterized in being configured by comprising: a sound source localizing means part that identifies a location of a sound source and generates the sound level data for each location; an artificial intelligence sound analysis part that extracts a time-domain sound signal for a sound source in which a location is identified, and recognizes a type of sound source estimated to be an abnormal sound source by artificial intelligence learning and recognizing a sound feature image of the extracted time-domain sound signal; an object recognition part that recognizes a type of object at a sound source location through an image analysis of an area recognized as being where the sound source is located; and a determination part that determines the type of sound source and the type of object, when having commonality, as a true sound source.

A sound source localizing unit that identifies the location of a sound source and generates sound level data for each location, extracts a time-domain sound signal for the location of the sound source, and converts the sound feature image of the extracted time-domain sound signal to artificial intelligence learning and An artificial intelligence sound analysis unit that recognizes the type of sound source presumed to be an abnormal sound source by recognizing it, an object recognizer that recognizes the type of object located at the sound source location through image analysis of the area where the sound source is recognized, and It relates to an AI acoustic camera characterized in that it includes a determination unit for determining a true sound source when the type and type of object have a commonality.

titles.text: ULTRASOUND IMAGING DEVICE AND ULTRASOUND IMAGING SYSTEM INCLUDING THE SAME
초음파 영상장치 및 이를 포함하는 초음파 영상시스템

abstracts.paragraph_markup:
An ultrasound imaging apparatus according to the present invention may include an ultrasound transmitting/receiving unit, a masking unit, and an ultrasound image providing unit. The ultrasound transmitting/receiving unit may transmit a transmitting ultrasound signal to the target object in a synthetic aperture method and beamforming the receiving ultrasound signal reflected from the target object to provide a sub data set. The masking unit may mask some of the sub data sets and provide sub mask data based on a transmission beam mask having a hyperbolic shape. The ultrasound image providing unit may provide an ultrasound image based on the sub-mask data.
The ultrasound imaging apparatus according to the present invention generates sub-mask data obtained by correcting sub-data sets based on a transmission beam mask having a hyperbolic shape, and generates an ultrasound image by synthesizing the sub-mask data, thereby generating an ultrasound image. It is possible to prevent distortion of the image occurring in the focusing depth part.

An ultrasound imaging device according to the present invention can comprise: an ultrasound transmitting and receiving unit, a masking unit, and an ultrasound image provision unit. The ultrasound transmitting and receiving unit is able to transmit a transmission ultrasound signal to a target by a synthetic caliber method, and beam-form a reception ultrasound signal reflected from the target to be provide a sub-data set. The masking unit is able to mask a part of the sub data set, and provide a sub mask data based on a transmission beam mask having a hyperbolic shape. The ultrasound image provision unit is able to provide an ultrasound image based on the sub mask data. According to the present invention, the ultrasound imaging device is able to, in a synthetic caliber method, generate a sub mask data by correcting a sub data set based on a transmission beam mask having a hyperbolic shape, synthesize the sub mask data, generate an ultrasound image thereby, and prevent distortion of image occurring in a concentration depth part of the ultrasound image.

본 발명에 따른 초음파 영상장치는 초음파 송수신부, 마스킹부 및 초음파 영상 제공부를 포함할 수 있다. 초음파 송수신부는 합성구경 방식으로 송신 초음파 신호를 대상체에 송신하고, 대상체로부터 반사되는 수신 초음파 신호를 빔포밍하여 서브 데이터 세트를 제공할 수 있다. 마스킹부는 서브 데이터 세트 중 일부를 마스킹하고, 쌍곡선의 형태를 갖는 송신 빔 마스크에 기초하여 서브 마스크 데이터를 제공할 수 있다. 초음파 영상 제공부는 서브 마스크 데이터에 기초하여 초음파 영상을 제공할 수 있다.
본 발명에 따른 초음파 영상장치는 합성구경 방식에 있어서, 쌍곡선 형태의 송신 빔 마스크에 기초하여 서브 데이터 세트를 보정한 서브 마스크 데이터를 생성하고, 서브 마스크 데이터를 합성하여 초음파 영상을 생성함으로써 초음파 영상의 집속깊이 부분에서 발생하는 영상의 왜곡을 방지할 수 있다.

titles.text: AI Acoustic Image Camera
가스 설비 감시용 AI 음향 영상 카메라

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present invention relates to an AI sound camera for monitoring gas facilities, which includes a sound source localizing unit for generating sound level data for each location by measuring sound along with an image, extracting a regenerated time-domain sound signal for a sound source whose location is determined, and , An artificial intelligence sound analysis unit that recognizes the type of sound source estimated to be an abnormal sound source by artificial intelligence learning and recognizing the sound feature image of the extracted time-domain sound signal, and a sound source through image analysis of the area where the sound source is recognized to be located Including an object recognition unit that recognizes the type of object at the location, and a determination unit that determines that the gas leak sound generation point (abnormal sound source) occurs when the type of sound source is gas leakage sound and the type of object is gas equipment and both have a common feature It relates to an AI acoustic camera for monitoring gas facilities, characterized in that it is configured by

The present invention relates to an AI sound camera for monitoring gas facilities, comprising: a sound source localizing means unit which measures sound along with video to generate sound level data for each location; an artificial intelligence sound analysis unit which extracts a regenerative time-domain sound signal for a located sound source and recognizes the type of sound source presumed to be an abnormal sound source by artificial intelligence learning and recognizing the sound feature image of the extracted time-domain sound signal; an object recognition unit which recognizes the type of object at the location of the sound source through image analysis of the area recognized as where the sound source is located; and a judgment unit which determines the gas leak sound generation point (abnormal sound source) when the type of sound source is a gas leak sound and the type of object is a gas facility, and both have something in common. Accordingly, the present invention can determine the point at which the gas leak sound occurs.

본 발명은 가스 설비 감시용 AI 음향 카메라에 관한 것으로, 영상과 함께 음향을 측정하여 위치별 음향 수준 데이터를 생성하는 음원 로컬라이징 수단부와, 위치가 파악된 음원에 대한 재생성 시간 영역 음향 신호를 추출하고, 추출된 시간 영역 음향 신호의 음향 특징 이미지를 인공지능 학습 및 인식함으로써 이상 음원으로 추정되는 음원의 종류를 인식하는 인공지능 음향 분석부와, 음원이 위치하고 있는 것으로 인정된 영역의 영상 분석을 통해 음원 위치에 있는 객체의 종류를 인식하는 객체 인식부와, 음원의 종류가 가스 누설음이고 객체의 종류가 가스 설비로서 양자가 공통성을 갖는 경우 가스 누설음 발생 지점(이상 음원)으로 판정하는 판단부를 포함하여 구성되는 특징으로 하는 가스 설비 감시용 AI 음향 카메라에 관한 것이다.

titles.text: 초음파 이미징 장치
ultrasound imaging device

abstracts.paragraph_markup:
The present specification relates to an ultrasonic imaging device having an assembly 100 of ultrasonic transducers 103 distributed in a plurality of sub-assemblies 105, each having P transducers 103, The device, for each sub-assembly 105,
- K transceiver circuits 123 k ,
- with a configurable routing circuit 125 connecting the P transducers 103 of the sub-assembly 105 to the K transceiver circuits 123 k ,
where P and K are integers greater than or equal to 2, and K is less than P;
Each sub-assembly 105 is connected to any one of a predetermined plurality of transceiver circuits 123 k among the K transceiver circuits 123 k of the sub-assembly through a routing circuit 125, or It has one or more transducers, called moveable transducers, that can be disconnected.

본 명세서는, P개의 트랜스듀서(103)를 각각 갖는, 복수의 서브-결합체들(105)에 분포된 초음파 트랜스듀서들(103)의 결합체(100)를 구비하는 초음파 이미징 장치에 관한 것으로, 이 장치는, 각 서브-결합체(105)에 대하여,
- K개의 트랜시버 회로들(123k)과,
- K개의 트랜시버 회로들(123k)에 서브-결합체(105)의 P개의 트랜스듀서들(103)을 연결하는 구성가능한 라우팅 회로(125)를 구비하며,
여기서 P 및 K는 2 이상의 정수이고, K는 P보다 작으며,
각 서브-결합체(105)는, 라우팅 회로(125)를 통하여, 서브-결합체의 K개의 트랜시버 회로들(123k) 중 미리 정해진 복수의 트랜시버 회로들(123k) 중에서 임의의 하나와 접속되거나 또는 단절될 수 있는, 이동식 트랜스듀서라고 불리는, 하나 이상의 트랜스듀서를 구비한다.

titles.text: 초음파 동적 영상에 기반한 태아 단면의 결정 방법 및 장치
Method and apparatus for determination of fetal section based on ultrasound dynamic imaging

abstracts.paragraph_markup: A method and apparatus for determining a cross-section of a fetus based on an ultrasound dynamic image, the method comprising the steps of sequentially inputting and analyzing fetal ultrasound images of each frame among acquired consecutive multi-frame fetal ultrasound images into a predetermined feature detection model ( 101); acquiring analysis results sequentially output by the feature detection model as feature information of the fetal ultrasound image of each frame (102); A step 103 of determining a cross section corresponding to the fetal ultrasound image according to a category of regional features of the fetal ultrasound image and a category of structural features of the fetal ultrasound image of each frame. The method determines the cross-section of the fetal ultrasound image by acquiring regional features and structural features of fetal ultrasound images of consecutive multi-frames, combining the regional features and structural features of the fetal ultrasound images, and determining the cross-section of the fetal ultrasound image. Accuracy can be improved, that is, the degree of standardization of the cross section of the fetal ultrasound image can be increased, and the efficiency of determining the cross section of the fetal ultrasound image can be improved.

초음파 동적 영상에 기반한 태아 단면의 결정 방법 및 장치에 있어서, 상기 방법은 획득된 연속적인 다중프레임의 태아 초음파 영상 중 각 프레임의 태아 초음파 영상을 사전 결정된 특징 검출 모델에 순차적으로 입력하여 분석하는 단계 (101); 특징 검출 모델에 의해 순차적으로 출력되는 분석 결과를 각 프레임의 태아 초음파 영상의 특징 정보로 획득하는 단계 (102); 각 프레임의 태아 초음파 영상의 부위 특징의 카테고리 및 상기 태아 초음파 영상의 구조적 특징의 카테고리에 따라 상기 태아 초음파 영상에 대응되는 단면을 결정하는 단계 (103)을 포함한다. 상기 방법은 연속적인 다중프레임의 태아 초음파 영상의 부위 특징 및 구조적 특징을 획득하고, 태아 초음파 영상의 부위 특징 및 구조적 특징을 결합하여, 태아 초음파 영상의 단면을 결정함으로써, 태아 초음파 영상의 단면의 결정 정확도를 향상시킬수 있고, 즉 태아 초음파 영상의 단면의 표준화 정도를 높일 수 있으며, 태아 초음파 영상의 단면의 결정 효율을 향상시킬 수 있다.

titles.text: NOISE FILTERING METHOD AND APPARATUS OF VEHICLE ULTRASONIC SENSOR SIGNAL
차량 초음파센서 신호의 노이즈 필터링 방법 및 장치

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present invention includes determining the number of direct wave TOFs and indirect wave TOFs among ultrasonic TOFs received from two sensors adjacent to each other of a vehicle; determining whether dynamic noise is detected if the received ultrasonic TOF includes one direct wave TOF and a previous effective direct wave TOF exists; if the dynamic noise is detected, generating a virtual direct wave TOF and setting it as a regular ultrasound TOF to be used for determining the location of an object instead of the received direct wave TOF; determining whether static noise is detected if a direct wave TOF exists among the received ultrasound TOFs, a previous effective direct wave TOF exists, and an indirect wave TOF exists among the received ultrasound TOFs; If the static noise is detected, the regular ultrasonic TOF to be used for determining the position of the object is determined to be 1 direct wave TOF and 0 indirect wave TOF, and if the static noise is not detected, the regular ultrasonic TOF to be used for determining the position of the object is determined. is composed of a step of determining one direct wave TOF and one indirect wave TOF.

The present invention comprises the steps of: determining the number of direct wave TOFs and the number of indirect wave TOFs among ultrasonic TOFs received from two adjacent sensors of a vehicle; when the received ultrasonic TOF contains one direct wave TOF, and a previous active direct wave TOF exists, determining whether dynamic noises are detected; when the dynamic waves are detected, generating a virtual direct wave TOF to set the same as a regular ultrasonic TOF to be used for position determination of an object instead of the received direct wave TOF; when a direct wave TOF exists in the received ultrasonic TOF, the previous active direct wave TOF exists, and an indirect wave TOF exists in the received ultrasonic TOF, determining whether static noises are detected; and when the static noises are detected, determining one direct wave TOF and 0 indirect wave TOF as the regular ultrasonic TOF to be used for position determination of an object and when the static noises are not detected, determining one direct wave TOF and one indirect wave TOF as the regular ultrasonic TOF to be used for position determination of an object. Accordingly, the present invention can remove noise signals from ultrasonic signals received from the ultrasonic sensor, thereby enabling more precise position determination of objects.

본 발명은 차량의 서로 인접한 두 센서에서 수신된 초음파 TOF들 중, 직접파 TOF와 간접파 TOF의 개수를 판단하는 단계; 상기 수신된 초음파 TOF가 직접파 TOF 1개를 포함하는 경우, 이전 유효 직접파 TOF가 존재하는 상황이면, 동적 노이즈가 검출되는지 판단하는 단계; 상기 동적 노이즈가 검출되는 경우, 가상의 직접파 TOF를 생성하여, 상기 수신된 직접파 TOF 대신 물체의 위치 판단에 사용할 정규의 초음파 TOF로 설정하는 단계; 상기 수신된 초음파 TOF 중 직접파 TOF가 존재하고, 이전 유효 직접파 TOF가 존재하며, 상기 수신된 초음파 TOF에 간접파 TOF가 존재하면, 정적 노이즈가 검출되는지 판단하는 단계; 상기 정적 노이즈가 검출되면, 물체의 위치 판단에 사용할 정규의 초음파 TOF는 직접파 TOF 1개와 간접파 TOF 0개로 결정하고, 상기 정적 노이즈가 검출되지 않으면, 상기 물체의 위치 판단에 사용할 정규의 초음파 TOF는 직접파 TOF 1개와 간접파 TOF 1개로 결정하는 단계를 포함하여 구성된다.

titles.text: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR REPRODUCING A SPATIALLY EXTENDED SOUND SOURCE OR APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR GENERATING A BITSTREAM FROM A SPATIALLY EXTENDED SOUND SOURCE
공간 확장 음원을 재생하는 장치 및 방법 또는 공간 확장 음원으로부터 비트 스트림을 생성하는 장치 및 방법

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An apparatus for reproducing a spatially expanded sound source having a defined position and geometry in space, the apparatus comprising: an interface (100) for receiving a listener position; a projector that calculates the projection of a two-dimensional or three-dimensional hull associated with the spatially expanded sound source onto a projection plane using information about the listener position and the geometry of the spatially expanded sound source and information about the position of the spatially expanded sound source; ; a sound source location calculator that calculates the positions of at least two sound sources relative to the spatially expanded sound source using a projection plane; and a descriptor for depicting at least two sound sources at positions that will obtain reproduction of the spatially expanded sound source having two or more output signals, wherein the descriptor is configured to use different acoustic signals for different positions, wherein the different acoustic signals are spatially expanded. A descriptor linked to the sound source is provided.

공간 내에 규정된 위치와 지오메트리를 갖는 공간 확장 음원을 재생하는 장치로, 이 장치는 청취자 위치를 수신하는 인터페이스(100)와; 청취자 위치와 공간 확장 음원의 지오메트리에 대한 정보와 및 공간 확장 음원의 위치에 대한 정보를 사용하여 공간 확장 음원에 연계된 2차원 또는 3차원 포(hull)의 투영 평면으로의 투영을 연산하는 투영기와; 투영 평면을 사용하여 공간 확장 음원에 대한 적어도 2개의 음원들의 위치들을 연산하는 음원 위치 연산기와; 및 둘 이상의 출력 신호들을 갖는 공간 확장 음원의 재생을 얻을 위치들에 적어도 2개의 음원들을 묘사하는 묘사기로, 이 묘사기가 다른 위치들에 대해 다른 음향 신호들을 사용하도록 구성되고, 다른 음향 신호들이 공간 확장 음원에 연계되는 묘사기를 구비한다.

titles.text: MOTION COMPENSATION ULTRASOUND IMAGING DEVICE AND ULTRASOUND IMAGING SYSTEM INCLUDING THE SAME
모션 보상 초음파 영상장치 및 이를 포함하는 모션 보상 초음파 영상 시스템

abstracts.paragraph_markup:
A motion-compensated ultrasonic imaging device according to an embodiment of the present invention may include a position correction unit, a motion compensation unit, and an image providing unit. The position correction unit provides a plurality of correction frames by correcting the position where frame data included in the plurality of frames is placed based on a reference frame among the plurality of frames obtained by scanning the object at regular angular intervals while moving along the object. can do. The motion compensation unit may provide a plurality of compensation frames by applying a motion compensation value determined as the ultrasound probe moves along the object to compensation frame data included in each of the plurality of compensation frames. The image provider may provide an ultrasound image according to a plurality of compensation frames.
The motion compensation ultrasound imaging device according to the present invention provides a plurality of compensation frames by applying a motion compensation value determined as the ultrasound probe moves along the object to the compensation frame data included in each of the plurality of compensation frames, so that the ultrasound probe The intensity of the target can be prevented from decreasing during the process of scanning while moving and calculating the average of multiple planes with different positions.

본 발명의 실시예에 따른 모션 보상 초음파 영상장치는 위치 보정부, 모션 보상부 및 영상 제공부를 포함할 수 있다. 위치 보정부는 대상체를 따라 이동하면서 일정한 각도 간격으로 대상체를 스캔하여 획득한 복수의 프레임들 중 기준 프레임을 기준으로 복수의 프레임들에 포함되는 프레임 데이터가 배치되는 위치를 보정하여 복수의 보정 프레임들을 제공할 수 있다. 모션 보상부는 복수의 보정 프레임들 각각에 포함되는 보정 프레임 데이터에 초음파 프로브가 대상체를 따라 이동함에 따라 결정되는 모션 보상값을 적용하여 복수의 보상 프레임들을 제공할 수 있다. 영상 제공부는 복수의 보상 프레임들에 따라 초음파 영상을 제공할 수 있다.
본 발명에 따른 모션 보상 초음파 영상장치는 복수의 보정 프레임들 각각에 포함되는 보정 프레임 데이터에 초음파 프로브가 대상체를 따라 이동함에 따라 결정되는 모션 보상값을 적용하여 복수의 보상 프레임들을 제공함으로써 초음파 프로브가 움직이면서 스캔하고, 위치가 다른 여러 개 평면의 평균을 구하는 과정에서 타겟의 Intensity가 감소하는 것을 방지할 수 있다.

titles.text: NOISE MONITORING DEVICE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGNENCE AND METHOD THEREOF
인공지능을 이용한 소음 감시 장치 및 방법

abstracts.paragraph_markup: According to one embodiment of the present invention, a noise monitoring device using artificial intelligence includes an input/output interface module that communicates with a plurality of acoustic cameras and an imaging device; and at least one processor operatively connected to the input/output interface module, wherein the at least one processor determines the volume of sound generated from at least one noise source acquired by at least one of the plurality of acoustic cameras. and a preset standard to determine whether the sound generated from the at least one noise source is noise, obtain the shape of the at least one noise source using an imaging device included in the at least one acoustic camera, and obtain the shape of the at least one noise source. Determining the type of the at least one noise source based on the shape of the at least one noise source, verifying whether the sound generated from the at least one noise source is noise based on the determined type of the at least one noise source, and verifying Record sounds from at least one noise source.

본 발명의 일실시예에 따르면, 인공지능을 이용한 소음 감시 장치에 있어서, 복수개의 음향카메라 및 촬상 장치와 통신을 수행하는 입출력 인터페이스 모듈; 및 상기 입출력 인터페이스 모듈과 작동적으로 연결되는 적어도 하나의 프로세서를 포함하고, 상기 적어도 하나의 프로세서는, 상기 복수개의 음향카메라 중 적어도 어느 하나의 음향카메라가 획득한 적어도 하나의 소음원에서 발생한 소리의 크기와 미리 설정된 기준을 비교하여 상기 적어도 하나의 소음원에서 발생한 소리가 소음인지 결정하고, 상기 적어도 어느 하나의 음향카메라에 포함된 촬상 장치를 이용하여 상기 적어도 하나의 소음원의 형태를 획득하고, 상기 획득한 상기 적어도 하나의 소음원의 형태를 기초로 상기 적어도 하나의 소음원의 종류를 결정하고, 상기 결정한 상기 적어도 하나의 소음원의 종류를 기초로 상기 적어도 하나의 소음원에서 발생한 소리가 소음인지를 검증하고, 상기 검증한 상기 적어도 하나의 소음원에서 발생한 소리를 녹음한다.

titles.text: GENERACION DE IMAGENES ACUSTICAS.
ACOUSTIC IMAGING.

abstracts.paragraph_markup: En diferentes modalidades, se proporcionan aparatos y métodos para llevar a cabo la generación de imágenes acústicas. Se puede adquirir una onda acústica en un detector, donde la onda acústica se propaga desde un objetivo hacia el detector. El objetivo se puede iluminar acústicamente para proporcionar la onda acústica. Se puede procesar una señal del detector en respuesta a adquirir la onda acústica en un modelo de tal forma que el procesamiento implementa una lente acústica sintética para generar una imagen del objetivo. Se divulgan aparatos, sistemas, y métodos adicionales.

In various embodiments, apparatus and methods are provided to perform acoustic imaging. An acoustic wave can be acquired at a detector, where the acoustic wave propagates from a target to the detector. The target may be acoustically illuminated to provide the acoustic wave. A signal from the detector in response to acquiring the acoustic wave can be processed in a model such that the processing implements a synthetic acoustic lens to generate an image of the target. Additional apparatus, systems, and methods are disclosed.

In different modalities, apparatus and methods for carrying out the generation of acoustic images are provided. An acoustic wave can be acquired in a detector, where the acoustic wave propagates from a target towards the detector. The lens can be acoustically illuminated to provide the acoustic wave. A signal from the detector can be processed in response to acquiring the acoustic wave in a model such that the processing implements a synthetic acoustic lens to generate a target image. Additional devices, systems, and methods are disclosed.

titles.text: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR REPRODUCING A SPATIALLY EXTENDED SOUND SOURCE OR APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR GENERATING A BITSTREAM FROM A SPATIALLY EXTENDED SOUND SOURCE.
APARATO Y METODO PARA REPRODUCIR UNA FUENTE DE SONIDO ESPACIALMENTE EXTENDIDA O APARATO Y METODO PARA GENERAR UN FLUJO DE BITS A PARTIR DE UNA FUENTE DE SONIDO ESPACIALMENTE EXTENDIDA.

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Apparatus for reproducing a spatially extended sound source having a defined position and geometry in a space, the apparatus comprises an interface (100) for receiving a listening position; a projector (120) for calculating a projection of a two- or three-dimensional envelope associated with the spatially extended sound source onto a projection plane using the listening position, information about the geometry of the spatially extended sound source, and information about the position of the spatially extended sound source; a sound position calculator (140) for calculating positions of at least two sound sources for the spatially extended sound source using the projection plane; and a renderer (160) for rendering the at least two sound sources at the positions to obtain a spatially extended reproduction of the sound source having two or more output signals, wherein the renderer (160) is configured to use different sound signals for the different positions, wherein the different sound signals are associated with the spatially extended sound source.

Apparatus for reproducing a spatially extended sound source having a defined position and geometry in a space, the apparatus comprises an interface (100) for receiving a listener position; a projector (120) for calculating a projection of a two-dimensional or three-dimensional hull associated with the spatially extended sound source onto a projection plane using the listener position, information on the geometry of the spatially extended sound source, and information on the position of the spatially extended sound source; a sound position calculator (140) for calculating positions of at least two sound sources for the spatially extended sound source using the projection plane; and a renderer (160) for rendering the at least two sound sources at the positions to obtain a reproduction of the spatially extended sound source having two or more output signals, wherein the renderer (160) is configured to use different sound signals for the different positions, wherein the different sound signals are associated with the spatially extended sound source.

Aparato para reproducir una fuente de sonido espacialmente extendida que tiene una posición y geometría definidas en un espacio, el aparato comprende una interfaz (100) para recibir una posición de oyente; un proyector (120) para calcular una proyección de una envoltura bidimensional o tridimensional asociada con la fuente de sonido espacialmente extendida en un plano de proyección que utiliza la posición de oyente, información sobre la geometría de la fuente de sonido espacialmente extendida e información sobre la posición de la fuente de sonido espacialmente extendida; una calculadora de posición de sonido (140) para calcular posiciones de al menos dos fuentes de sonido para la fuente de sonido espacialmente extendida que utiliza el plano de proyección; y un renderizador (160) para renderizar las al menos dos fuentes de sonido en las posiciones para obtener una reproducción de la fuente de sonido espacialmente extendida que tiene dos o más señales de salida, en donde el renderizador (160) se configura para usar diferentes señales de sonido para las diferentes posiciones, en donde las diferentes señales de sonido se asocian con la fuente de sonido espacialmente extendida.

titles.text: REAL-TIME PATTERN RECOGNITION AND AUTOMATIC INTERPRETATION OF ACOUSTIC REFLECTION IMAGES

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Methods, systems, devices, and products for performing well logging in a borehole intersecting an earth formation to obtain and transmit an acoustic reflection image of the formation.Methods include identifying a set of features in the acoustic reflection image substantially fitting a pattern, wherein the set of features corresponds to a portion of at least one reflecting structural interface of the formation; and using a representation of the pattern as the compressed representation of the acoustic reflection image. The features may be amplitude peaks in the acoustic reflection image, and the pattern may be a line segment therein that is obtained from the amplitude peaks. Identifying the set of features may include generating a binary image of the amplitude peaks.

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Изобретение относится к средствам для воспроизведения пространственно протяженного источника звука. Технический результат заключается в повышении эффективности воспроизведения пространственно протяженного источника звука. Принимают позицию слушателя. Вычисляют проекцию двумерной или трехмерной оболочки, ассоциированной с пространственно протяженным источником звука, на плоскость проекции с использованием позиции слушателя, информации относительно геометрии пространственно протяженного источника звука и информации относительно позиции пространственно протяженного источника звука. Вычисляют позиции по меньшей мере двух источников звука для пространственно протяженного источника звука с использованием плоскости проекции. Осуществляют рендеринг по меньшей мере двух источников звука в позициях, чтобы получать воспроизведение пространственно протяженного источника звука, имеющего два или более выходных сигналов. При этом рендеринг содержит этап, на котором используют различные звуковые сигналы для различных позиций, при этом различные звуковые сигналы ассоциированы с пространственно протяженным источником звука. 7 н. и 34 з.п. ф-лы, 11 ил.

FIELD: acoustics.

SUBSTANCE: invention relates to tools for reproducing a spatially extended sound source. The projection of a two or three-dimensional shell associated with a spatially extended sound source on the projection plane is calculated using the position of the listener, information relating to the geometry of the spatially extended sound source, and information relating to the position of the spatially extended sound source. The positions of at least two sound sources for the spatially extended sound source are calculated using the projection plane. At least two sound sources are rendered in the positions to obtain the reproduction of the spatially extended sound source with two or more output signals. Said rendering includes a stage of using different sound signals for different positions, wherein different sound signals are associated with the spatially extended sound source.

EFFECT: increase in the effectiveness of reproducing a spatially extended sound source. The position of a listener is assumed.

titles.text: REAL-TIME PATTERN RECOGNITION AND AUTOMATIC INTERPRETATION OF ACOUSTIC REFLECTION IMAGES

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Methods, systems, devices, and products for performing well logging in a borehole intersecting an earth formation to obtain and transmit an acoustic reflection image of the formation. Methods include identifying a set of features in the acoustic reflection image substantially fitting a pattern, wherein the set of features corresponds to a portion of at least one reflecting structural interface of the formation; and using a representation of the pattern as the compressed representation of the acoustic reflection image. The features may be amplitude peaks in the acoustic reflection image, and the pattern may be a line segment therein that is obtained from the amplitude peaks. Identifying the set of features may include generating a binary image of the amplitude peaks.

يتعلق الاختراع الحالي بطرق، وأنظمة، وأجهزة، ومنتجات لتسجيل أداء البئر في ثقب حفر تتقاطع مع تكوين أرضي للحصول على صورة انعكاس صوتي acoustic reflection image للتكوين وإرسالها. تتضمن الطرق تحديد مجموعة سمات في صورة الانعكاس الصوتي acoustic reflection image والتي تتناسب إلى حدٍ كبير مع نمط، حيث تتماثل مجموعة السمات مع جزء من سطح بيني بنائي عاكس واحد على الأقل للتكوين؛ واستخدام تمثيل النمط في صورة التمثيل المضغوط لصورة الانعكاس الصوتيacoustic reflection image . ويمكن أن تكون السمات عبارة عن ذروات السعة amplitude peaks في صورة الانعكاس الصوتيacoustic reflection image ، ويمكن أن يكون النمط مقطعًا خطيًا بها والذي تم الحصول عليه من ذروات السعة amplitude peaks. وقد يتضمن تحديد مجموعة السمات إنتاج صورة ثنائية binary image لذروات السعة amplitude peaks. شكل1أ

titles.text: Ultrasound imaging device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An ultrasound imaging device includes a support, an ultrasound probe, a uniaxial transporting module, a mounting platform, a first inclination adjustment mechanism, and a second inclination adjustment mechanism. The ultrasound probe is mounted on the support and swings back and forth to scan in a first direction. The uniaxial transporting module is suitable to move in a second direction, and the second direction is substantially perpendicular to the first direction. The first inclination adjustment mechanism is disposed between the uniaxial transporting module and the mounting platform to adjust an inclined angle of the mounting platform with respect to the first direction, and the second inclination adjustment mechanism is disposed between the uniaxial transporting module and the mounting platform to adjust an inclined angle of the mounting platform with respect to the second direction.

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging system and method thereof
超聲波成像系統及方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 本發明涉及一種超聲波成像系統包括多個超聲波傳感單元、設置模組、圖像分析模組及頻率設定模組。設置模組依次選擇一個超聲波傳感單元，設置當前選擇的超聲波傳感單元依次在多個檢測頻率的驅動下發射超聲波，以使得當前選擇的超聲波傳感單元形成多個對應的檢測圖像。圖像分析模組內存儲有標準圖像，將當前選擇的超聲波傳感單元對應的所有檢測圖像分別與標準圖像進行比較以選擇一個檢測圖像作為參考圖像。頻率設定模組將參考圖像對應的檢測頻率設定為當前選擇的超聲波傳感單元對應的驅動頻率並存儲。本發明還提供了一種超聲波成像方法。

The present disclosure relates to an ultrasonic image system. The ultrasonic image system includes a plurality of ultrasonic sensing units, a set module, an image analyzing module, and a frequency set module. The set module selects one of the ultrasonic sensing units, and set the selected ultrasonic sensing unit to be sequentially driven under a plurality of testing frequencies for generates ultrasonic in different frequency and forming a plurality of testing images. The image analyzing module with a standard image compares the testing images of the selected ultrasonic sensing unit with the standard image respectively, and selects one of the testing images as a reference image. The frequency set module sets and stores the testing frequency corresponding to the reference image as a driving frequency of the selected ultrasonic sensing unit. An imaging method for the ultrasonic imaging system is also provided.

The invention relates to an ultrasonic imaging system including a plurality of ultrasonic sensing units, a setting module, an image analysis module and a frequency setting module. The setting module sequentially selects an ultrasonic sensing unit, and sets the currently selected ultrasonic sensing unit to sequentially drive ultrasonic waves under the driving of multiple detection frequencies, so that the currently selected ultrasonic sensing unit forms a plurality of corresponding detection images. A standard image is stored in the image analysis module, and all detection images corresponding to the currently selected ultrasonic sensing unit are compared with the standard image to select a detection image as a reference image. The frequency setting module sets and stores the detection frequency corresponding to the reference image to the driving frequency corresponding to the currently selected ultrasonic sensing unit. The invention also provides an ultrasonic imaging method.

titles.text: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR REPRODUCING A SPATIALLY EXTENDED SOUND SOURCE OR APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR GENERATING A BITSTREAM FROM A SPATIALLY EXTENDED SOUND SOURCE
再現空間擴展聲源的設備與方法、或從空間擴展聲源生成位元流的設備與方法

abstracts.paragraph_markup: 一種再現一空間擴展聲源的設備，空間擴展聲源具有在一空間中已定義之一位置及一幾何形狀，該設備包含：一介面，其用以接收一收聽者位置；一投影器，其利用收聽者位置、空間擴展聲源之幾何形狀上的一資訊、及空間擴展聲源之位置上的一資訊，來計算投射於一投影平面上與空間擴展聲源關聯之二維或三維外殼的一投影；一聲音位置計算器，其利用投影平面計算用於空間擴展聲源之至少二聲源的位置；以及一渲染器，其係渲染位於該等位置之該至少二聲源，以獲得具有兩個以上之輸出訊號的空間擴展聲源之一再現，其中，渲染器係用以對不同之位置使用不同之聲音訊號，且不同之聲音訊號係與空間擴展聲源相關聯。

titles.text: 聲音照相科技執法系統
Sound photography technology law enforcement system

abstracts.paragraph_markup: This model provides a sound camera technology law enforcement system device, which mainly includes: a noise meter, which is used to judge whether the noise exceeds the standard; a sound corrector, which is connected to the noise meter for correction; Noisy vehicles, and recognize the license plate number of the vehicle; environmental camera, used to shoot environmental images; integrated control module, connected to the noise meter, the sound corrector, the license plate recognition camera, and the environmental camera to record the collected audio and video When it is judged by the noise meter that the current vehicle has exceeded the noise standard violation, the license plate recognition camera is activated to recognize the license plate number, and the environmental image captured by the environmental camera at the relevant time is recorded.

本新型提供一種聲音照相科技執法系統裝置，主要包括有：噪音計，通過該噪音計判斷是否為超過標準之噪音；聲音校正器，連接該噪音計進行校正；車牌辨識攝影機，用來拍攝超過標準之噪音車輛，並且進行該車輛的車牌號碼辨識；環境攝影機，用來拍攝環境影像；整合控制模組，連接該噪音計、該聲音校正器、該車牌辨識攝影機、該環境攝影機以記錄收集的影音資料，並根據該噪音計判斷當前的該車輛有超過噪音標準違規的事實時，啟動該車牌辨識攝影機進行該車牌號碼辨識，以及記錄該環境攝影機所拍攝相關時間的該環境影像。

titles.text: Pixel receiver with low frequency noise reduction for ultrasonic imaging apparatus

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Apparatus and method for generating a DC pixel voltage are disclosed. The apparatus includes an amplifier configured to amplify an input signal to generate a voltage signal, wherein the input signal is generated in response to an ultrasonic wave reflecting off an item-to-be-imaged and propagating via a piezoelectric layer; a noise reduction circuit configured to pass the voltage signal from an output of the amplifier to a node, while reducing a propagation of noise from the output of the amplifier to the node; and a circuit configured to generate a DC pixel voltage based on the reduced-noise voltage signal.

Apparatus and method for generating a DC pixel voltage are disclosed. The apparatus includes an amplifier configured to amplify an input signal to generate a voltage signal, wherein the input signal is generated in response to an ultrasonic wave reflecting off an item-to-be-imaged and propagating via a piezoelectric layer; a noise reduction circuit configured to pass the voltage signal from an output of the amplifier to a node, while reducing a propagation of noise from the output of the amplifier to the node; and a circuit configured to generate a DC pixel voltage based on the reduced-noise voltage signal.

titles.text: Method and apparatus for null subtraction ultrasound imaging

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Aspects of the subject disclosure may include, for example, applying different apodization weights for ultrasound echoes to generate a plurality of images of a target where one of the apodization weights has a zero mean value across an aperture of a transducer array and generating a null subtracted image of the target by combining the plurality of images. Other embodiments are disclosed.

Other embodiments are disclosed.

titles.text: Autonomous robotic technologies for industrial inspection

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The present solution provides autonomous robotic technologies for industrial inspection that can flexibly scale to meet many different types of industrial inspection. By utilizing the autonomous robotic technologies disclosed herein, increasingly large and complex industrial inspections may be completed in a fraction of the time previously required for inspections of smaller scales.

titles.text: Two dimension and three dimension imaging with coded pulses based on speed changes of sound/ultrasound

abstracts.paragraph_markup: During transmission, a speed of sound pulses gradually reduces due to acoustic impedance. Regulating a length or a density or a sound speed of the sound pulses affects their average speed in the transmitting medium, sound intensity and detecting depth. Time of flight (TOF) and TOF shift can be used to calculate the depth and moving speed of detecting objects. Calculating a speed of moving objects by simultaneously detecting TOF shift at same site from two separated piezoelectric (PZT) elements improves the testing results with accuracy, simplification and reproducibility. Coding sound pulses to obtained the TOF and the TOF shift will simultaneously calculate the depth and the moving speed of sampling points, which can be used to construct 2D and 3D images for these motionless and/or moving sampling points. Coded sound pulses also improves the quality of the imaging.

titles.text: Two-dimensional ultrasound imaging transducer array with a non-rectangular active sensing region

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An ultrasound imaging system (102) includes a transducer array (108) with a two-dimensional array of rows (110) of transducer elements (114). The transducer elements of each row extend along a long axis (116). The rows are parallel to each other. The transducer array includes a non-rectangular set of active transducer elements. The ultrasound imaging system further includes transmit circuitry (118) that actuates the transducer elements to transmit an ultrasound signal. The ultrasound imaging system further includes receive circuitry (120) that receives echoes produced in response to an interaction between the ultrasound signal and a structure and received by the transducer elements. The ultrasound imaging system further includes a beamformer that processes the echoes and generates one or more scan lines indicative of the structure.

titles.text: System and method for progressive damage monitoring and failure event prediction in a composite structure

abstracts.paragraph_markup: A system for monitoring damage progression in a composite structure includes a load sensor, acoustic emission sensors, a camera, and a monitoring device. The load sensor measures an applied load to the structure. The sensors measure acoustic emission data indicative of possible damage to the structure. The camera captures image data of the structure in a designated portion of the electromagnetic spectrum. The monitoring device executes a method by which the acoustic emission data is synchronously collected with the image data and the applied load. The device automatically maps the acoustic emission data onto the image data to detect an area of damage progression in the composite structure. A failure event in the detected area of damage progression may be predicted using the mapped data, and a control action may be executed in response to the predicted failure event.

titles.text: Ultrasound imaging device and method of generating image for ultrasound imaging device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An object is to simultaneously visualize a plurality of junction surfaces of a workpiece. An ultrasound imaging device serving as solution means includes a signal processing unit that causes a probe to irradiate a workpiece with an ultrasound wave having a predetermined frequency, and that performs gate processing on a reflected wave of the ultrasound wave detected by the probe so as to output a displacement of the reflected wave on two junction surfaces of the workpiece, an image generation unit that generates respective images of the two junction surfaces, based on the displacement of the respective reflected waves on the two junction surfaces, and a height adjustment unit that adjusts a height of a focus of the probe. The height adjustment unit adjusts the height of the probe so as to set the focus of the probe between the two junction surfaces.

An object is to simultaneously visualize a plurality of junction surfaces of a workpiece. The height adjustment unit adjusts the height of the probe so as to set the focus of the probe between the two junction surfaces.

titles.text: Method and apparatus for selecting power states in an ultrasound imaging system

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An ultrasound imaging system includes a processor that is programmed to operate the system in a normal operating state and two or more lesser power states. The processor lowers the operating power state to a lesser power state upon detecting one or more operating conditions such as no tissue been imaged in a predetermined time limit or that the imaging system or transducer has not been moved in a time limit. Upon awakening from a power off state, the processor implements a lesser power state before operating at the normal operating state to avoid undue power use until the transducer is positioned to image tissue.

titles.text: Metadata generation at the storage edge

abstracts.paragraph_markup: A controller, for use in a storage device of a data processing system, includes a host interface, a memory interface and one or more processors. The host interface is configured to communicate over a computer network with one or more remote hosts of a data processing system. The memory interface is configured to communicate locally with a non-volatile memory of the storage device. The one or more processors are configured to manage local storage or retrieval of media objects at the non-volatile memory, and to selectively compute metadata that defines content characteristics of media objects that are stored, or that are to be stored, in the non-volatile memory.

titles.text: Systems and methods for generating metadata describing unstructured data objects at the storage edge

abstracts.paragraph_markup: A storage control device coupled to a storage device and located remotely from a host device receives media object data from the host device. The storage control device identifies a type of the media object data and select, based on the identified type, a computational model from among a plurality of computational models for use by a computational engine of the storage control device. The computational engine uses the selected computational model to generate metadata describing the media object data. The metadata is stored in the storage device so as to be selectively retrievable from the storage device separately from the media object data.

titles.text: Real-time pattern recognition and automatic interpretation of acoustic reflection images

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Methods, systems, devices, and products for performing well logging in a borehole intersecting an earth formation to obtain and transmit an acoustic reflection image of the formation. Methods include identifying a set of features in the acoustic reflection image substantially fitting a pattern, wherein the set of features corresponds to a portion of at least one reflecting structural interface of the formation; and using a representation of the pattern as the compressed representation of the acoustic reflection image. The features may be amplitude peaks in the acoustic reflection image, and the pattern may be a line segment therein that is obtained from the amplitude peaks. Identifying the set of features may include generating a binary image of the amplitude peaks.

titles.text: Systems and methods for ultrasound beamforming using coherently compounded Fresnel focusing

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Fresnel elevation focusing at a selected elevation angle is performed by transmitting a sequential set of Fresnel-focused ultrasound pulses, where a different Fresnel phase pattern is used for each pulse, and where the receive signals are coherently compounded. The different Fresnel patterns cause the secondary lobe energy to be reduced via averaging of variations of the pressure fields in the secondary lobe regions. In some embodiments, the method of coherently compounded Fresnel focusing is combined with coherently compounded defocused wave (e.g. plane wave or diverging wave) imaging in the azimuth direction. Each of the elevation slices are collected by changing the Fresnel patterns respectively employed when the sequence of plane waves or diverging waves are transmitted, such that the coherent compounding can benefit both planes simultaneously. Hadamard receive encoding and subsequent dynamic receive beamforming may be employed to further improve performance in the elevation direction.

titles.text: Metadata generation for multiple object types

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Metadata computation apparatus includes a host interface, a storage interface and one or more processors. The host interface is configured to communicate over a computer network with one or more remote hosts. The storage interface is configured to communicate with one or more non-volatile memories of one or more storage devices. The processors are configured to manage local storage or retrieval of media objects in the non-volatile memories, to compute metadata for a plurality of media objects that are stored, or are en-route for storage, on the storage devices, wherein the media objects are of multiple media types, wherein the computed metadata tags a target feature in the media objects of at least two different media types among the multiple media types, and to store, in the non-volatile memories, the metadata tagging the target feature found in the at least two different media types, for use by the hosts.

titles.text: Acoustic program, acoustic device, and acoustic system

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An acoustic device includes: an imaging device configured to take a sample image of a space as a sound field and create an image data on the space based on the taken sample image; a sound collector configured to collect a sound generated in the space or to collect a previously-collected acoustic data therein; and a computation part configured to previously compute a plurality of parameters relevant to a coefficient of spatial acoustic filter corresponding to the sample image of the space and previously learn a sound field model of the space shown in the sample image. The computation part is configured to construct a sound field model of the sample image taken by the imaging device or of a previously-taken sample image, from the acoustic data collected by the sound collector, using the coefficient of spatial acoustic filter.

The computation part is configured to construct a sound field model of the sample image taken by the imaging device or of a previously-taken sample image, from the acoustic data collected by the sound collector, using the coefficient of spatial acoustic filter.

titles.text: Two-dimensional ultrasound imaging transducer array with a non-rectangular active sensing region

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An ultrasound imaging system (102) includes a transducer array (108) with a two-dimensional array of rows (110) of transducer elements (114). The transducer elements of each row extend along a long axis (116). The rows are parallel to each other. The transducer array includes a non-rectangular set of active transducer elements. The ultrasound imaging system further includes transmit circuitry (118) that actuates the transducer elements to transmit an ultrasound signal. The ultrasound imaging system further includes receive circuitry (120) that receives echoes produced in response to an interaction between the ultrasound signal and a structure and received by the transducer elements. The ultrasound imaging system further includes a beamformer that processes the echoes and generates one or more scan lines indicative of the structure.

titles.text: Automatic ultrasonic imaging inspection method and system based on six-axis manipulator

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An automatic ultrasonic imaging inspection method and system based on a six-axis manipulator. The method includes: controlling, by a motion control card, a six-axis manipulator to perform scanning and an external axis motor to move; when scanning, feeding back, by a probe, an echo signal; when the probe moves to another scanning line, sending, by a controller, a displacement information of the probe along a stepping direction to an ultrasonic imaging device; when the external axis motor works, feeding back, by an encoder, a displacement information of the probe along a scanning direction to the ultrasonic imaging device; allowing the external axis motor to work when the probe moves along a scanning line; and generating, by the ultrasonic imaging device, a two-dimensional scanning image according to the echo signal, and the displacement information of the probe along the stepping direction and the scanning direction.

titles.text: System and a method for sound recognition

abstracts.paragraph_markup: A method for automatic for sound recognition, comprising a) raw spectrogram generation from a sound signal spectrum; b) wide-band spectrum determination; c) wide-band continuous spectrum determination; d) tonal and time-transient spectrum determination; wide-band continuous spectrogram and tonal and time-transient spectrogram determination; and) spectrogram image generation.

titles.text: Two dimension and three dimension imaging based on speed changes of sound/ultrasound

abstracts.paragraph_markup: The invention is based on speed changes of sound/ultrasound pulses and a fixed detecting depth between a transducer and sampling points to collect information of the detecting depth and/or a velocity of motionless and/or moving objects from the sampling points to construct two-dimension or three-dimension images of the sampling points. By taking advantages of a pulse ultrasound and a continuous ultrasound, a method of coded sound pulses can simultaneously collect the information of the detecting depth and the velocity from the sampling points, which improves imaging quality. Calculating a speed of the moving objects by simultaneously detecting time-of-flight (TOF) and TOF shift at same site from two separated piezoelectric (PZT) elements improves testing results with accuracy, simplification and reproducibility. An aliasing can be rectified based on the TOF and the TOF shift.

titles.text: Storage aggregator controller with metadata computation control

abstracts.paragraph_markup: This disclosure describes a storage aggregator controller with metadata computation control. The storage aggregator controller communicates, via a host interface, over a computer network with one or more remote hosts, and also communicates, via a storage device interface, with a plurality of local storage devices, which are separate from the remote host(s) and which have respective non-volatile memories. The storage aggregator controller manages the local storage devices for storage or retrieval of media objects. The storage aggregator controller also governs a selective computation, at aggregator control circuitry or at a storage device controller of one or more of the storage devices, of metadata that defines content characteristics of the media objects that are retrieved from the plurality of storage devices or that are received from the one or more hosts over the computer network for storage in the plurality of storage devices.

titles.text: Systems and methods for representing acoustic signatures from a target scene

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Acoustic imaging systems can include an acoustic sensing array, an electromagnetic imaging tool, a display, and an audio device. A processor can receive data from the acoustic sensor array and the electromagnetic imaging tool to generate a display image combining acoustic image data and electromagnetic image data. Systems can include an audio device that receives an audio output from the processor and outputs audio feedback signals to a user. The audio feedback signals can represent acoustic signals from an acoustic scene. Systems can provide a display image to a user including acoustic image data, and a user can select an acoustic signal for which to provide a corresponding audio output to an audio device. Audio outputs and display images can change dynamically in response to a change in pointing of the acoustic sensing array, such as by changing a stereo audio output.

titles.text: Ultrasonic matrix imaging device

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An ultrasound imaging device includes a plurality of ultrasound transducers arranged in an array of rows and columns. Each of the transducers has a first electrode and a second electrode. The first electrodes of the transducers of a same row are interconnected and the second electrodes of the transducers of a same column are interconnected.

The first electrodes of the transducers of a same row are interconnected and the second electrodes of the transducers of a same column are interconnected.

titles.text: Ultrasound method and apparatus

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Embodiments described provide an ultrasound method, and an ultrasound apparatus and computer program product operable to perform that method. In some embodiments, the method allows for provision of a multi-transducer ultrasound imaging system by providing a robust method to accurately localize the transducers in the system in order to beamform a final image. The method and apparatus described allow for improvements in imaging quality in terms of resolution, depth penetration, contrast and signal to noise ratio (SNR).

titles.text: Apparatus and method for reproducing a spatially extended sound source or apparatus and method for generating a bitstream from a spatially extended sound source

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An apparatus for reproducing a spatially extended sound source having a defined position and geometry in a space includes an interface for receiving a listener position; a projector for calculating a projection of a two-dimensional or three-dimensional hull associated with the spatially extended sound source onto a projection plane using the listener position, information on the geometry of the spatially extended sound source, and information on the position of the spatially extended sound source; a sound position calculator for calculating positions of at least two sound sources for the spatially extended sound source using the projection plane; and a renderer for rendering the at least two sound sources at the positions to obtain a reproduction of the spatially extended sound source having two or more output signals, wherein the renderer is configured to use different sound signals for the different positions.

titles.text: Systems and methods for analyzing and displaying acoustic data

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Some systems include an acoustic sensor array configured to receive acoustic signals, an electromagnetic imaging tool configured to receive electromagnetic radiation, a user interface, a display, and a processor. The processor can receive electromagnetic data from the electromagnetic imaging tool and acoustic data from the acoustic sensor array. The processor can generate acoustic image data of the scene based on the received acoustic data, generate a display image comprising combined acoustic image data and electromagnetic image data, and present the display image on the display. The processor can receive an annotation input from the user interface and update the display image based on the received annotation input. The processor can be configured to determine one or more acoustic parameters associated with the received acoustic signal and determine a criticality associated with the acoustic signal. A user can annotated the display image with determined criticality information or other determined information.

titles.text: Systems and methods for detachable and attachable acoustic imaging sensors

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Some systems include an electromagnetic imaging tool configured to receive electromagnetic radiation, a communication interface, a processor in communication with the electromagnetic imaging tool and the communication interface, and a housing. Systems can include a first sensor head having a first plurality of acoustic sensor elements arranged in a first acoustic sensor array. The communication interface can provide communication between the processor and the sensor head via wired or wireless communication. The communication interface can comprise a docking port in communication with the processor and configured to removably receive a corresponding docking mechanism of the first sensor head. Some systems may include a second sensor head having a second plurality of acoustic sensor elements. The second sensor head may be interchangeably connectable to the communication interface and/or the first sensor head.

titles.text: Systems and methods for ultrasound imaging and focusing

abstracts.paragraph_markup: This disclosure describes systems and methods for ultrasound imaging and targeting. In one example, the systems and methods improve targeting and imaging through a heterogenous medium by using the angular spectrum approach (ASA) alone or in combination with passive acoustic mapping (PAM). In another example, the systems and methods improve the ultrasound imaging of vessels using microbubbles. The imaging of the vessels is also aided by the ASA and PAM. A closed loop controller is described that adjusts the ultrasound pressure provided to a region of interest to a desired pressure based at least in part on the harmonic, ultra-harmonic, sub-harmonic, or broadband frequency ranges for the microbubbles.

titles.text: System and method for generating panoramic acoustic images and virtualizing acoustic imaging devices by segmentation

abstracts.paragraph_markup: An acoustic analysis system includes an acoustic sensor array that receives acoustic signals from a target scene and outputs acoustic data based on the one or more acoustic signals. A processor receives a first set of acoustic data representing a first portion of the target scene and having a first field of view (FOV), generates a first acoustic image based on the first set of acoustic data, receives a second set of acoustic data representing a second portion of the target scene and having a second FOV, wherein the second FOV is different than the first FOV, generates a second acoustic image based on the second set of acoustic data, registers the first acoustic image and the second acoustic image to form an aligned first acoustic image and second acoustic image, and generate a panorama comprising the aligned first acoustic image and second acoustic image for presentation on a display.

A processor receives a first set of acoustic data representing a first portion of the target scene and having a first field of view (FOV), generates a first acoustic image based on the first set of acoustic data, receives a second set of acoustic data representing a second portion of the target scene and having a second FOV, wherein the second FOV is different than the first FOV, generates a second acoustic image based on the second set of acoustic data, registers the first acoustic image and the second acoustic image to form an aligned first acoustic image and second acoustic image, and generate a panorama comprising the aligned first acoustic image and second acoustic image for presentation on a display.

titles.text: Ultrasonic imaging by sparse sampling and associated devices, systems, and methods

abstracts.paragraph_markup: Systems, devices, and methods for ultrasonic imaging by sparse sampling are provided. In one embodiment, an ultrasound imaging system comprises an array of ultrasound transducer elements, electronic circuitry in communication with the array of ultrasound transducer elements and configured to select a first receive aperture of the array comprising a plurality of contiguous ultrasound transducer elements and at least one non-contiguous ultrasound transducer element, and a beamformer in communication with the electronic circuitry. Each ultrasound transducer element of the first receive aperture is configured to receive reflected ultrasound echoes and generate an electrical signal representative of imaging data. The beamformer is configured to receive the electrical signals generated by the first receive aperture and apply different weight to the electrical signals generated by the contiguous ultrasound transducer elements and the electrical signal generated by the at least one non-contiguous ultrasound transducer element.

Systems, devices, and methods for ultrasonic imaging by sparse sampling are provided. Each ultrasound transducer element of the first receive aperture is configured to receive reflected ultrasound echoes and generate an electrical signal representative of imaging data. titles.text: Manufacturing process or in service defects acoustic imaging using sensor array

abstracts.paragraph_markup: A mobile platform is provided which has at least one component having an array of distributed piezoelectric transmitters and an associated array of distributed receivers. The receivers are configured to receive ultrasonic transmissions from the transmitters. Data from the receivers is stored in memory and processed through an algebraic reconstruction tomography algorithm which forms an image of the defect within the component. An algorithm is used to determine the position and size of the defect.
